MAT 1:1 Uwu e mulongo wa bamashali bakulukulu ba Yesu, mushukulu wa Dafeti, uyo walikuba mushukulu wa Abulahamu.
MAT 1:2 Abulahamu walasema Isake, nendi Isake walasema Yakobo, Nendi Yakobo walasema Yuda ne bakwabo,
MAT 1:3 Yuda walasema Pelesi ne Sela muli Tamala, Pelesi walasema Hesiloni, Nendi Hesiloni walasema Lamu,
MAT 1:4 Lamu walasema Aminadabu, nendi Aminadabu walasema Nasoni, nendi Nasoni walasema Salumoni,
MAT 1:5 Salumoni walasema Bowasi muli Lahabi, nendi Bowasi walasema Obedi muli Lute, nendi Obedi walasema Jesi,
MAT 1:6 Jesi walasema Mwami Dafeti, nendi Dafeti walasema Solomoni mu mukashi walikuba wa Uliya.
MAT 1:7 Solomoni walasema Lehabyamu, nendi Lehabyamu walasema Abiya, nendi Abiya walasema Asa,
MAT 1:8 nendi Asa walasema Yehosafati, nendi Yehosafati walasema Yolamu, nendi Yolamu walasema Usiya,
MAT 1:9 Usiya walasema Yotamu, Nendi Yotamu walasema Ahazi, Nendi Ahazi walasema Hezekiya,
MAT 1:10 nendi Hezekiya walasema Manase, nendi Manase walasema Amoni, nendi Amoni walasema Yosiya,
MAT 1:11 Yosiya walasema Yekoniya ne bakwabo pacindi bana Baisilayeli mpobalikumantwa busha ku Babulo.
MAT 1:12 Baisilayeli mpobalamantwa busha ku Babulo, Yekoniya walasema Salatiyele nendi Salatiyele walasema Zelubabele,
MAT 1:13 nendi Zelubabele walasema Abiyudi, Abiyudi walasema Eliyakimu nendi Eliyakimu walasema Asolo,
MAT 1:14 Asolo walasema Sadoki, nendi Sadoki walasema Akimu, nendi Akimu walasema Eliyudi,
MAT 1:15 Nendi Eliyudi walasema Eliyasala, nendi Eliyasala walasema Matani, Matani walasema Yakobo,
MAT 1:16 Nendi Yakobo walasema Yosefe ibendi Maliya, uyu Maliya e walasema Yesu lakwiwangeti Klistu Mupulushi Walaiwa usa.
MAT 1:17 Neco, kufuma pali Abulahamu kushika pali Mwami Dafeti, palikuba misemano likumi ne ina, kayi kufuma pali Mwami Dafeti kushika pacindi bana ba Isilayeli mpobalamantwa busha kuya ku Babulo, napo palikuba misemano likumi ne ina, kayi kufuma pacindi ca kumantwa busha ku Babulo kushika pacindi ca Klistu, napo palikuba misemano likumi ne ina.
MAT 1:18 Lino kusemwa kwa Yesu Klistu kwalenshika munshila iyi. Pacindi Maliya banyina Yesu mpobalikuba bamamikilwa kuli Yosefe. Nomba kabatana baya kumalili, Maliya walacanika ne libunda kupitila mu ngofu ya Mushimu Uswepa.
MAT 1:19 Yosefe walikuba muntu walulama, nkalayanda kumusebanya pantangalala, walayeya kupwisha bubambo bwa cikwati kwakubula kwishiba bantu.
MAT 1:20 Kaciyeya cakwinsa mungelo wa Mwami Lesa walamubonekela muciloto ne kumwambileti, “Yosefe mwanendi Dafeti kotatina kumumanta Maliya kuba mukashobe, ili libunda ndyakute ni ngofu ya Mushimu Uswepa.
MAT 1:21 Nakatumbuke mwana mutuloba uyo ngoshi mukatumbe lina eti Yesu, pakwinga nakapulushe bantu bakendi ku bwipishi bwabo.”
MAT 1:22 Ibi byalenshika kwalikuba kukwanilisha ncalamba Mwami kumushinshimi kwambeti
MAT 1:23 “Mulindu nakabe ne libunda ne kutumbuka mwana mutuloba uyo eti akakwiweti Emanuele, uku ekwambeti ‘Lesa uli nenjafwe’ ”
MAT 1:24 Yosefe mpwalapunduka walensa ncalamwambila mungelo wa Mwami Lesa, walamumanta Maliya kuba mukashendi.
MAT 1:25 Nomba nikukabeco uliya kuya nendi kumalili sobwe mpaka panyuma pakutumbuka mwana mutuloba. Yosefe walamupa Lina eti Yesu.
MAT 2:1 Yesu walasemenwa mu munshi wa Betelehemu mucimpansha ca Yudeya pacindi Helode mpwalikuba mwami mu cishico. Ku Yelusalemu kwalesa bantu baiya shakwenda kwa nyenyenshi balafumina kucishi ca kucwe.
MAT 2:2 Mpobalashika ku Yelusalemu balikabepusheti “Inga mwana ngotwanyumfweti eshakabe Mwami wa Bayuda wasemenwa kupeyo? Afwe twalubona lunyenyenshi lwatuleshanga nkwabele kalupula kucwe, neco tulesa kumukambilila.”
MAT 2:3 Mwami Helode ne bantu bangi balikwikala mu Yelusalemu mpobalanyufweco, balapenga mumyoyo.
MAT 2:4 Neco, Helode walabunganya mwabwangu bwangu, beshimilumbo bamakulene ne beshikwiyisha Milawo ya Mose ne kubepusheti, “Anu Mupulushi Walaiwa ne Lesa nakasemenwe kupeyo ayi?”
MAT 2:5 Balo balambeti, “Nakasemenwe mumunshi wa Betelehemu wa kucishi ca Yudeya, pakwinga tucinsheti Mabala a Lesa alambangeti,”
MAT 2:6 “Obe Betelehemu wa mucishi ca Yudeya, ntobe munshi ung'ana sobwe pakati pa minshi naimbi ya Bayuda. Pakwinga mutangunishi eshakembele Baisilayeli bantu ba Lesa nakakafumine kuli njobe.”
MAT 2:7 Mpwalanyumfweco Helode, walabakwila pambali bantu abo kwakubula bantu nabambi kwinshiba, ne kubepushisha cindi ncobalabona lunyenyenshi ulo.
MAT 2:8 Neco Helode walabambileti, “Kamuyani ku Betelehemu mwenga mu mulangaule cenacena mwana uyo, mwakamucana, mukese kuno mukanjishibishe kumusena nkwabele, kwambeti nenjame nkenga kumukambilila.”
MAT 2:9 Panyuma pakwambilwa maswi alico ne mwami, balanyamuka. Lunyenyenshi lusa ndobalabona kucwe, lwalabatangunina ne kuya kwimana mwilu pamusena palikuba mwanoyo.
MAT 2:10 Mpobalabona lunyenyenshi lusa balakondwa kwine.
MAT 2:11 Popelapo balengila mu ng'anda, balabona mwanoyo kali ne Maliya banyina, balasuntama ne kumukambilila. Balasungulula bifunta ne kupulisha bipo bya golide, lubani ne mafuta anunkila a mule ne kupa mwana.
MAT 2:12 Nomba Lesa walabacenjesha aba bantu bayiya kwenda kwa nyenyenshi muciloto kwambeti kabatabwelela kuli Helode. Neco mpobali kubwelela ku cishi cabo, balapitila nshila imbi.
MAT 2:13 Mpobalafumako, mungelo wa Mwami walabonekela kuli Yosefe muciloto, ne kumwambileti, “Nyamuka, manta mwana ne banyina, ufwambile ku Injipto, uye wikale kopeloko mpaka cindi ncoti nkakwambile, pakwinga Helode nalangaulenga mwana uyu kwambeti amushine.”
MAT 2:14 Popelapo Yosefe walanyamuka mashiku ne kumanta mwana ne banyina kuya ku Injipto.
MAT 2:15 Walakekalako mpaka mpwalafwa Helode. Ici calenshika kwambeti ncalamba Mwami kupitila mumushinshimi cikwanilishiwe cakwambeti, “Ninkakuwe mwaname kufuma mu Injipto.”
MAT 2:16 Helode mpwaleshibeti, basa bantu baiya kwenda kwa nyenyenshi bamubona buluya walakalala, walatuma bantu ku Betelehemu, ne kuminshi yonse ya bambana, kwambeti benga bashine bana batuloba bonse kutatikila pali bakute byaka bibili kwisa panshi. Byaka ibi, balabelengela kufuma pacindi ncalanyumfwa kuli bantu basa baiya kwenda kwa nyenyenshi.
MAT 2:17 Mbyalamba mushinshimi Yelemiya byalakwanilishiwa bya kwambeti,
MAT 2:18 “Mibila ilanyumfwikinga mu Lama, yakulila ne kompolola, Lakelo, lalilinga banabendi, lakananga kumumwenesha pacebo ca banabendi balafu.”
MAT 2:19 Pacindi Helode usa mpwalafwa, mungelo wa Mwami walamubonekela Yosefe muciloto kali ku Injipto.
MAT 2:20 Walamwambileti, “Nyamuka, manta mwana ne banyina, ubwelele ku Islayeli, pakwinga bonse balikuyanda kushina mwana bafwa.”
MAT 2:21 Yosefe walapunduka ne kumanta mwana ne banyina ne kubwelela ku Islayeli.
MAT 2:22 Nomba mpwalanyumfwa kwambeti, Alikelawo, mwanendi Helode, ewapyana baishi kuba mwami waku Yudeya, walatina kuyako. Neco kayi Lesa walamucenjesha Yosefe muciloto, walaya mucimpansha ca Galileya.
MAT 2:23 Balakekala mu munshi wa Nasaleti, kwambeti ncalamba mushinshimi cikwanilishiwe, cakwambeti, “Nakakwiweti, Munasaleti.”
MAT 3:1 Mu masubayo walesa Yohane Mubatishi kakambauka mu cinyika caku Yudeya,
MAT 3:2 kambeti, “Shiyani bwipishi pakwinga Lesa ulipepi kwikalika Bwami bwakendi.”
MAT 3:3 Uyu engwalikwamba Mushinshimi Yesaya mpwalambeti, “Liswi lya muntu labilikishinga mucinyika kambeti, ‘Bambani mukwakwa wa kupitamo Mwami,’ ‘Lulamikani nshila njoti akapitemo.’”
MAT 3:4 Yohane walikufwala mwinjila wabweya bwa Ngamila, ne mukopo wacipaya mubukome. Cakulya cakendi calikuba bikobo ne bwiki bwamucisuwa.
MAT 3:5 Bantu balafumina mu Yelusalemu ne mu Yudeya kayi ne mubibela byonse bilipepi ne mulonga wa Yolodani, balikwisa kuli Yohane.
MAT 3:6 Abo balikulyambilila bwipishi bwabo, balabatishiwa mu mulonga wa Yolodani.
MAT 3:7 Yohane mpwalabona Bayuda bangi bamulikoto lya Bafalisi, ne Basaduki kabayanda kubatishiwa, nendi Yohane walabambileti, “Bana banjoka amwe, niyani sena walamucenjesheti mufwambe kutina bukalu bwa Lesa bulesanga?
MAT 3:8 Neco kamwinsani bintu bilaleshengeti mwashiya bwipishi bwenu.
MAT 3:9 Kamutalibepanga mu myoyo yenu kwambeti, ngamucifwamba cisubulo ca Lesa pakwambeti mushali wetu ni Abulahamu. Cakubinga ndamwambilishingeti Lesa ingawasandula awa mabwe kuba banabendi Abulahamu.
MAT 3:10 Pacino cindi kembe kalibambila kutimbula citondo pamiyanda, neco citondo ciliconse cilabulunga kusema bisepo byaina, nibakacitimbule ne kuciwala mumulilo.”
MAT 3:11 “Ame ndamubatishinga ne menshi kuba cilesho ca kushiya bwipishi bwenu, nomba panyuma pakame palesanga uyo eshakamubatishenga ne Mushimu Uswepa ne mulilo. Nendi wampita ngofu, cakwinseti nkandelela ne kunyamuna nkwabilo shakendi sobwe.
MAT 3:12 Cakupupulushila cilikendi mu makasa akendi, kwambeti atatike kupupulusha. Nakabike maila apupulushiwa cena mu lyanga, nomba bungu nakabutente pamulilo utapu.”
MAT 3:13 Pacindico, Yesu walesa kuli Yohane ku mulonga wa Yolodani, kufuma ku Galileya kwambeti Yohane enga mubatishe.
MAT 3:14 Yohane pakwelekesha kukana walambeti, “Nte njame ndelela kubatishiwa nenjamwe, nomba amwe kayi mulesanga kuli njame?”
MAT 3:15 Nomba Yesu walamukumbuleti, “Obe kosuminowa, pakwinga emotwelela kwinshila bintu byonse byabululami mbyalayandanga Lesa.” Neco Yohane walasumina.
MAT 3:16 Yesu mpwalabatishiwa, walasabuka mu menshi. Popelapo kwilu kwalacaluka, walabona Mushimu wa Lesa kauseluka mbuli nkulimba nekwisa kwikala palyendiye,
MAT 3:17 kwilu kwalanyumfwika Liswi lyakwambeti, “Uyu e Mwaname ngondayandishisha, ndakondwa nendi.”
MAT 4:1 Calakonkapo, Mushimu Uswepa walamutwala Yesu ku cinyika kuya kwelekeshewa ne Muyungaushi.
MAT 4:2 Kwa masuba makumi ana, munshi ne mashiku,Yesu walikulikanisha kulya, neco walanyumfwa nsala.
MAT 4:3 Muyungaushi walesa kulyendiye walambeti, “Na njamwe Mwanendi Lesa, ambilani mabwe awa asanduke abe shinkwa.”
MAT 4:4 Nomba Yesu walambeti, “Kwalembweti muntu nkelela kuba ne buyumi ne shinkwa enka sobwe, nsombi ne Maswi onse ngalambanga Lesa.”
MAT 4:5 Panyuma pakendi, Muyungaushi walamutwala Yesu ku Yelusalemu, mushi waswepa, ne kumutantika pelu pa Ng'anda ya Lesa,
MAT 4:6 ne kumwambileti, “Na cakubinga njobe Mwanendi Lesa, kolilasha panshi, pakwinga kwalembweti, “Lesa nambile bangelo bese bakubake kwambeti, myendo yakobe kaitapunta pamabwe.”
MAT 4:7 Nendi Yesu walambeti, “Kwalembweti, ‘Kotamwelekeshanga Nkambo Lesa wakobe.’ ”
MAT 4:8 Pakupwililisha, Muyungaushi walamumanta Yesu ne kuya kumutantika pa mulundu utali, ne kumulesha bwendeleshi bonse bwa pacishi capanshi ne bulemu bwabo.
MAT 4:9 Satana walambeti, “Byonse ibi nindikupe na usuntaminekowa, ne kunkambilila.”
MAT 4:10 Apa lino Yesu walambeti, “Fumapa, Satana! Mabala alambangeti, ‘Welela kukambilila Nkambo Lesa wakobe, ne kumusebensela enka.’”
MAT 4:11 Popelapo Muyungaushi walamushiya Yesu. Neco bangelo balesa kumunyamfwilisha Yesu.
MAT 4:12 Lino Yesu mpwalanyumfweti, Yohane lasungwa mu jele, walaya ku Galileya,
MAT 4:13 walaleka kwikala ku Nasaleti, walaya kwikala ku Kapelenawo, munshi walikuba mumbali mwa lwenje lwa Galileya, mucibela ca Sebuloni ne Nafitali.
MAT 4:14 Ici calenshika, kukwanilisha calambwa kupitila mushinshimi Yesaya, uyo walambeti,
MAT 4:15 “Obe cimpansha ca Sebuloni, nenjobe cishi ca Nafitali, kunshila yaku lwenje, patala pa Yolodani, obe Galileya, cimpansha ca bantu babula kuba Bayuda!
MAT 4:16 Bantu bekala mu mushinshe ni bakabone mumuni unene. Bantu bekala mucishi ca mufunsha wa lufu, mumuni ulababonekele.”
MAT 4:17 Kufuma cindi copeleco, Yesu walatatika kukambauka kambeti, “Shiyani bwipishi bwenu, pakwinga Lesa ulipepi kwikalika Bwami bwakendi.”
MAT 4:18 Yesu mpwalikwenda mu mbali mwa lwenje lwa Galileya, walabona bantu babili pabukwabo, Shimoni walikukwiweti Petulo, ne Ndileya mukwabo, kabekata inswi mulwenje ne tombe twabo, pakwinga balikuba basulishi banswi.
MAT 4:19 Yesu walabambileti, “Nkonkeleni, ndimwiyishe kuba basulishi ba bantu.”
MAT 4:20 Popelapo balashiya tombe twabo ne kuya nendi.
MAT 4:21 Mpwalendako pang'ana walabona nabambi babili pabukwabo Jemusi ne Yohane, banabendi Sebedayo balikuba mu bwato pamo ne mushali wabo kababamba tombe twabo. Yesu walabakuwa.
MAT 4:22 Popelapo balashiya bwato ne baishi nekuya neYesu.
MAT 4:23 Yesu walendana mucimpansha conse ca Galileya, kaya kwiyisha mu manda akupaililamo ne kukambauka Mulumbe Waina ulambanga sha Bwami, nekusengula bantu balikukute malwashi apusana pusana ne bulema bwapusanapusana.
MAT 4:24 Mpuwo yakendi yalamwaikila mucishi conse ca Siliya, cakwinseti bantu balikabaleta balwashi bonse balikupenga ne malwashi ne bishikubaba byapusana pusana, ne bekatwa ne mishimu yaipa ne balwashi atushita kayi ne balema. bonse walikubasengula.
MAT 4:25 Bantu bangi balikumukonkela kufuma ku Galileya, kucibela calikukwiweti Minshi Likumi, ne kuYelusalemu, neku Yudeya, kayi ne mucibela cakutala kwa mulonga wa Yolodani.
MAT 5:1 Yesu mpwalabona likoto linene lya bantu balikumukonkela, walatanta pa mulundu ne kwikala panshi pamo ne beshikwiya bakendi,
MAT 5:2 walatatika kubeyisha kambeti,
MAT 5:3 “Bakute colwe abo bacinka manungo pali Lesa, pakwinga Bwami bwa kwilu ni bwabo.
MAT 5:4 bakute colwe, bantu balalilinga, pakwinga Lesa nakabaumbulushe.
MAT 5:5 bakute colwe, bantu balicepesha, pakwinga nibakatambule ico Lesa ncalabalaya.
MAT 5:6 bakute colwe, bantu balanyumfunga nsala ne nyotwa ya kwinsa cilayandanga Lesa, pakwinga nibakekutishiwe.
MAT 5:7 bakute colwe bantu bakute nkumbo kubanabo, pakwinga Lesa nakabanyumfwile nkumbo.
MAT 5:8 bakute colwe, bantu baswepa myoyo, pakwinga nibakabone Lesa.
MAT 5:9 bakute colwe bantu balaletenga lumuno, pakwinga nibakakwiweti bana ba Lesa.
MAT 5:10 Bakute colwe bantu balapenshewanga, pacebo cakwinsa calulama, pakwinga Bwami bwa kwilu nibwabo.
MAT 5:11 “Mwalelekwa, omulatukanwanga, kupenshewa, ne kumubepesha bintu bingi bbyaipa pacebo cakwambeti munkonkelenga.
MAT 5:12 Kamusamwani, kayi kamukondwani, pakwinga cilambo cenu kwilu nicinene. Naboyo bashinshimi, amwe kamutana musemwa, balabapenshewa munshila yopeleyo.”
MAT 5:13 “Amwe mulyeti mucele wa bantu bonse pacishi capanshi, nomba na mucele usambuluka, nicani celela kubweshulula mbuli ncowanga? Ulabulu ncito, nikutayowa pansa kaulyataulwa ne bantu.
MAT 5:14 “Amwe mulyeti mumuni wishikumunikila bantu bonse mucishi. Munshi webakwa pa mulundu nkawelela kubula kubonekela.
MAT 5:15 Paliya muntu ukute kubangilisha lampi nekwifwekelela munongo, nsombi bakute kubika pacakubikapo lampi, kwambeti umunikile bantu bonse bali mung'andomo,
MAT 5:16 Cimo cimo nenjamwe munikani pamenso abantu, kwambeti babona ncito shenu shaina, bakatembaule Bameshenu ba kwilu.
MAT 5:17 “Kamutayeyeti ndesakupwisha Milawo ya Mose, ne biyisho bya bashinshimi. Ame ndiyakwisa kwipwisha sobwe, nsombi kwisa kwikwanilisha.
MAT 5:18 Cakubinga ndamwambilishingeti kwilu necishi capanshi kabitanabipwa, paliya libala nilikaba ling'aneconi lya Mulawo lyeshi likafumemo, mpaka byonse bikakwanilishiwe.
MAT 5:19 Neco muntu labulunga kukonka mulawo umo uli mumilawo iyi, nambi kauli ung'aneconi, ne kwiyishako nabambi kwambeti naboyo babule kukonka, nakabe mung'ana mu Bwami bwa kwilu. Nomba muntu uliyense lakonkonga Milawo, ne kwiyishako nabambi kwambeti naboyo baikonke, nakabe mukulene mu Bwami bwa kwilu.
MAT 5:20 Encondamwambililingeti, na bululami bwenu nkabwapita bululami bwa beshikwiyisha milawo ya Mose ne Bafalisi, nteti mukengilemo mu Bwami bwa kwilu pimbi.
MAT 5:21 “Mwalanyumfwa kwambeti, kaindi bantu balambilweti ‘Kotashina, uliyense lashini munendi welela komboloshewa ku nkuta.’
MAT 5:22 Nsombi lino ame ndamwambilingeti, muntu uliyense lakalalilinga mukwabo welela kupewa mulandu ku nkuta, Uliyense lambilinga munendi eti, ‘Omuluya’ Welela komboloshewa ku Nkuta. Nomba uliyense lambilinga munendi eti, ‘Cishilu’ Nendi welela kuyamu mulilo wa Gehena.
MAT 5:23 “Neco na ulesa necipo cakobe cakubenga kuli Lesa pa nteme, kayi wanuka kwambeti, munobe ukute mulandu nenjobe,
MAT 5:24 koshiya cipo cakobeco pambali pa nteme, koya unyumfwane mulumuno ne munobe, wenseco bwela ubenge cipo cakobe kuli Lesa panteme.
MAT 5:25 “Kamufwambananga kunyumfwana ne muntu ngolepishili kamutana mushika ku nkuta. Kutineti ingaukutwala ku momboloshi, nendi momboloshi, ingaukubika mu makasa a mushilikali uyo welela kukuwala mu jele.
MAT 5:26 Cakubinga ndakwambilishinga, nukekale mujele mpaka ukapwishe kulipila mwelo wamali a mulandu.”
MAT 5:27 “Mwalanyumfwa kwambeti kaindi bantu balambilweti, ‘Kotapombola.’
MAT 5:28 Nomba lino ame ndamwambilingeti muntu uliyense lamulangishishinga mutukashi cakumukumbwa, lamupombolo kendi mumoyo wakendi.
MAT 5:29 Na linso lyakobe lilakwipishinga, ulikolobolemo ulitaye. Caina kutayako lubasu lumo lwa mubili wakobe, kupita kuba ne mubili wakwana ne kuwalwa mu Gehena.
MAT 5:30 Kayi na cikasa cakobe cakululyo cilakwipishinga, ucitimbule ucitaye. Caina kutayako lubasu lumo lwamubili wakobe, kupita kuba ne mubili wakwana ne kuwalwa mu Gehena.
MAT 5:31 “Kayi kaindi balambilweti, ‘Na muntu uleka mukashendi, amulembele ne kumupa cipepala cabushike.’
MAT 5:32 Nomba ame lino ndamwambilingeti, uliyense lalekenga mukashendi pacebo cimbi cabula kuba cabupombo, uyo mukashi ebwa kumutuloba naumbi lenshi bupombo, nendi mutuloba uyo lamwebe ukute mulandu wabupombo.
MAT 5:33 “Kayi mwalamfweti, kaindi bantu balambilweti, ‘Kotaumbila cabwepeshi, nsombi cinse ncowalalumbila kuli Lesa.’
MAT 5:34 Nomba ame ndamwambilingeti, lekani kulumbila sobwe. Kamutalumbilangeti, kwilu kwine nditu! pakwinga kwilu ekuli cipuna ca Mwami Lesa,
MAT 5:35 Kamutalumbilangeti, pacishi capanshi nditu! pakwinga pacishi capanshi epakulyata myendo yakendi Lesa. kayi kamutalumbilangeti ‘Pali Yelusalemu nditu!’ Pakwinga Yelusalemu ni munshi wa Mwami mukulene.
MAT 5:36 Kamutalumbilangeti, ‘Mutwi wakame nditu,’ Pakwinga nkamwelela kusandula mishishi kuba ituba nambi ishipa.
MAT 5:37 Kamwambangoweti, ‘Ee’ Nambi ‘ne.’ Cakusankanyapo pali ibi cilafumunga kuli Waipa usa.”
MAT 5:38 Mwalanyumfweti kaindi bantu balambilweti, Linso kubenga linso, lino kubenga lino.
MAT 5:39 Nomba ame lino ndamwambilingeti “Kamutabweshelanga caipa kumuntu lamwipishili sobwe. Na muntu ukuma kulicili lya kululyo, akume kayi kulicili lya kucipiko.
MAT 5:40 Na muntu ukupa mulandu, ne kukukakatisheti umupe mwinjila wakobe, muleke amantile kumo ne munganjo.
MAT 5:41 Muntu uliyense amukakatisha kwenda nendi mushinso wakilomita imo, wende nendi mushinso wamakilomita abili.
MAT 5:42 Muntu amusenga cintu mupeni. Kayi muntu ayandanga kubweleka cintu kulinjobe kotamukanina.”
MAT 5:43 Mwalanyumfweti kaindi bantu balambilweti, Kosuna munobe, mupele mulwani wakobe.
MAT 5:44 Nomba ame lino ndamwambilingeti, basuneni balwani benu ne kubapaililako kuli Lesa abo balamupenshenga.
MAT 5:45 Mwenseco, emposhimubele limo bana ba Bameshenu balikwilu, bakute kuleta lumwi pa bantu baipa ne baina. Kayi bakute kulokela mfula pa bantu baina ne baipa.
MAT 5:46 Na kamusunakowa bantu bamusuni, ngamutambulapo cilambo cini kuli Lesa? Beshimisonko nabo nte ncobakute kwinsa copeleco?
MAT 5:47 Kayi nakamupa mitende banse benu bonka, mulenshipo cani capita nabambi? Sena bantu batamwinshi Lesa nkabakute kwinsa copeleco?
MAT 5:48 Kamubani babula kampenda, mbuli Bameshenu bakwilu ncobabula kampenda.
MAT 6:1 “Kamutaliboneshanga kwinsa ncito shaina pamenso abantu kwambeti bamubone, mwenseco, nteti mukatambulepo cilambo kuli Bameshenu balikwilu.
MAT 6:2 Neco mwapanga cintu ciliconse kumuntu laciyandanga, kamutaliboneshanga mbuli mobakute kwinshila bantu bandemishibili basa mumanda akupaililamo, ne munshila sha muminshi, balo bakute kwinseco kwambeti bantu bababone ne kubalumbaisha. Nditu ndamwambilishingeti abo balatambulililimo cilambo cabo.
MAT 6:3 Nomba obe wanyamfwanga bapenshi, munobe ngoli nendi pepi kabatenshiba sobwe.
MAT 6:4 Wenseco, bipo byankumbo byakobe nukabinshibe wenka. Lino Baiso bakute kubona byasolekwa nibakakupe cilambo.”
MAT 6:5 Mwapailanga kamutensanga mbuli bandemi shibili basa ncobakute kwinsa, balo bakute kuyanda kupaila kabali bemana mumanda akupaililamo, ne pamampambano anshila kwambeti bantu bababone. Cakubinga balo balatambulili limo cilambo
MAT 6:6 Nomba obe wayandanga kupaila, ingila mucimpetela, cala cisasa, upaile kuli Baiso bataboneke, Baiso bakute kubona byasolekwa nibakakupe cilambo.
MAT 6:7 Pacindi ncomulapailinga, kamutambanga maswi amo amo, mbuli ncobakute kwinsa bantu batamwinshi Lesa. Balo bakute kuyeyeti bafulishanga byakwamba empwelela kubanyumfwa Lesa.
MAT 6:8 Nomba amwe kamutabangeti endibo, pakwinga Bameshenu babinshi mbyomwabula, kamutana mubasenga.
MAT 6:9 Ecebo cakendi amwe pakupaila kamwambangeti, Bameshetu omuli kwilu, lina lyenu lilemekwe,
MAT 6:10 Bwami bwenu bwise, Kuyanda kwenu kwinshike. Panshi pano mbuli ncekubele kwilu,
MAT 6:11 Mutupe lelo cakulya cetu ca masuba onse.
MAT 6:12 Mutulekeleleko bwipishi bwetu, mbuli nenjafwe ncotukute kubalekelelako bakute kutwipishila,
MAT 6:13 Kamutasuminisha kwambeti tuwile mukweleshewa, Nsombi tukwabilileni kuli Waipa usa. “Pakwinga Bwami ne ngofu kayi ne bulemeneno ni bwenu kwamuyayaya. Ameni
MAT 6:14 Cakubinga na mulekelela bantu bwipishi bwabo, Bameshenu ba kwilu nabo nibakamulekelele.
MAT 6:15 Nomba na nkamulekelele bantu bwipishi bwabo, nabo Bameshenu nteti bakamulekelele bwipishi bwenu sobwe.”
MAT 6:16 “Mwalikanishanga kulya, kamutabonekanga kungumana pamenso. mbuli ncobakute kwinsa bandemi shibili basa, balo bakute kwipisha pamenso kwambeti bantu bababoneti balikanishinga kulya. Cakubinga, balatambulililimo cilambo cabo.
MAT 6:17 Nomba obe walikanishanga kulya, samba kumenso, ne kusakula cena mishishi ku mutwi,
MAT 6:18 kwambeti bantu kabatenshibeti ulalikanishinga kulya, nsombi Baiso bataboneke ebelela kwinshiba bonka. Abo Baiso bakute kubona byasolekwa mbyolenshi nibakakupe cilambo.”
MAT 6:19 “Kamutalibunjikila buboni pacishi capanshi pano, apo mpobukute kubumbwa muswa, nambi kuba ne ndala, kayi nabo bakabwalala, mpobakute kwingila ne kwiba.
MAT 6:20 Neco kamubunganyani buboni bwenu kwilu, uko kwabula muswa nambi ndala, uko kabwalala nkwela kwalilwa kwingila ne kuyakwiba.
MAT 6:21 Pakwinga kowabika buboni bwakobe, moyo wakobe ukute kauli kopeloko.”
MAT 6:22 “Menso elampi ya mubili na menso kalicena, mubili wakobe wonse ukute kauli wakwana kumunikilwa.
MAT 6:23 Nomba na menso akobe nkalipo cena, na mumuni mulinjobe usanduka kuba mushinshe. Lino akute aba citatiko ca mushinshe washipa mbii!”
MAT 6:24 “Muntu nkela kusebensela bantu babili pacindi cimo, pakwinga ngaupelapo umo, ne kusunako naumbi, nakashomeke kuli umo, ne kusampula naumbi. Nkamwelela kusebensela Lesa, ne buboni pacindi cimo.”
MAT 6:25 “Ecebo cakendi ndamwambilingeti kamutayakamwanga ne buyumi bwenu, kwambeti nitukalye cani, nambi nitukanwe cani? Nambi nitukafwale cani, sena buyumi bwenu nkabwapita cakulya? Nambi mubili nkawapita byakufwala?
MAT 6:26 Kamubonani bikeni, nkabikute kubyala mbuto, nambi kutebula ne kubika mulyanga sobwe, nomba Bameshenu bakwilu bakute kubilyesha. Sena amwe nkamwayandika kupita bikeni?
MAT 6:27 Niyani mulinjamwe wayakamwa ne buyumi, wela kucikonsha kunungako busuba bumowa ku buyumi bwakendi?”
MAT 6:28 “Inga mukute kushilacani mano ku byakufwala? Bonani maluba amucisuwa mwakute kukulila, nkakute kusebensa, nambi kulyanina bikwisa sobwe.
MAT 6:29 Nomba ndamwambilinga mwami Solomoni, nambi walikuba mubile, uliyawa kufwalapo byakufwala byabekema mbuli maluba.
MAT 6:30 Lino na Lesa kacikonsha kufwalika mila yamucisuwa, iyo ikute kubakowa lelo, lilo nikwitenta mulilo, Lesa ngaubula kumufwalika sena akaka! Mobalushomo lung'anamwe!”
MAT 6:31 “Ecebo cakendi kamutayakamwanga ne kwambeti, ‘Inga lelo nindicicane kupeyo cakulya’ Nambi ‘cakunwa’ Nambi ‘cakufwala?
MAT 6:32 Ibi nibintu mbyobakute kuyakamwa bantu batamwinshi Lesa. Amwe Bameshenu ba kwilu bacinshi kwambeti nenjamwe mulabiyandanga bintu ibi.
MAT 6:33 Nomba amwe nanshi mulangaule Bwami bwa Lesa, ne bululami bwakendi, nabimbi ibi Lesa nakamubikilepo.
MAT 6:34 Neco nkabayakamwa ne byalilo, byalilo nibyalilo. Busuba bulibonse bukute makatasho abo.”
MAT 7:1 “Kamutomboloshanga banenu, kwambeti nenjamwe Lesa akabule kumombolosha.
MAT 7:2 Momukute komboloshela banenu, mopelomo nenjamwe Lesa mweti akamomboloshele. Kayi mwelo ngomukute kusebenshesha pakombolosha, mwelo wopelowo nukasebensheshewe pali njamwe.
MAT 7:3 Mukute kuboneconi kantu kang'ana kali mulinso mwamunobe, kotayeye omwine cishiki cili mulinso lyakobe?
MAT 7:4 Ngaumwambileconi munobeti, ‘Tubone ndikufunye kantu mulinso,’ Kakuli obe mulinso mwakobe muli cishiki?
MAT 7:5 Obe wandemi shibili! nanshi tatika kufunya cishiki ico cili mu linso lyakobe, empowelela kubona cena ne kukafunyamo kantu kali mulinso lyamunobe.
MAT 7:6 “Kamutapa bakabwa bintu bya Lesa, pakwinga ingabamubwelela ne kwisa kumuluma. Nambi kuwalila nkumba mikanda yamalungu, pakwinga nishikalwataulowa.”
MAT 7:7 Senga nakamupe, langaula nimukacane, kukonkosha nibakamucalwile cisasa.
MAT 7:8 Ee, muntu lasengenga winga kupewa, muntu lalangaulunga winga kucicana, kayi muntu lakonkoshonga bakute kumucalwila cisasa.
MAT 7:9 Niyani pakati penu amwe bamashali welela kupa libwe mwanendi lasenge shinkwa?
MAT 7:10 Nambi usenga lunswi, ngamumupa njoka sena?
MAT 7:11 Lino amwe ne kwipa kwenuku, mucinshi kupa banabenu bintu byaina, kulyeconi kuli Bameshenu bakwilu, sena ngabalilwa kupa bintu byaina kuli balamusengenga?
MAT 7:12 Neco, mubintu bili byonse mbyomulayandangeti bantu bamwinshile, mwelela nanshi amwe kubenshila byopelebyo. Pakwinga uku ekukwanilisha milawo ya Mose, ne biyisho bya bashinshimi.
MAT 7:13 Kamwingililani mwakulipakatisha pacishinga cing'ana. Pakwinga cishinga cilatwalanga ku lufu ni cinene, ne nshila yatandabala ne bantu balapitingamonga nibagi.
MAT 7:14 Nomba cishinga cakuya kwingila kubuyumi nica kulipakatisha, ne nshila yakendi yayuma kwendamo, nabo balendengamonga nibang'ana.
MAT 7:15 Kamucenjelani ne bashinshimi bandemi shibili. Bakute besanga kulinjamwe kababoneka babomba myoyo eti mbelele. Nomba mukati balyeti baumpe bansala.
MAT 7:16 Nimukabeshibile ku bisepo byabo. Sena bitondo bya myunga ngabisema minyansa? Sena ingamucana nkuyu ku kankolong'onso?
MAT 7:17 Citondo caina cikute kusema bisepo byaina, nomba citondo caipa cikute kusema bisepo byaipa.
MAT 7:18 Citondo caina nkacelela kusema bisepo byaipa sobwe, nambi citondo caipa kusema bisepo byaina nkacinshiki pimbi.
MAT 7:19 Citondo ciliconse citaseme bisepo byaina bakute kucitimbula ne kuciwala pa mulilo.
MAT 7:20 Neco, bantu nimukabeshibile kuncito shabo.
MAT 7:21 “Nteye muntu lambangoweti, ‘Nkambo, Nkambo,’ Eti akengile mu Bwami bwa kwilu sobwe, nsombi uyo lenshinga ncobalayandanga Bata ba kwilu.
MAT 7:22 Pabusuba bwakomboloshewa bantu bangi nibakambengeti, ‘Nkambo, Nkambo!’ Sena afwe ntetwali kukambauka mu lina lyenu? Twalikucikonsha kupulisha mishimu yaipa pakusebenshesha lina lyenu, mu lina lyenu kayi twalikwinsa bishikukankamanisha.
MAT 7:23 Nomba ame ninkabambile pamensotuba kwambeti, ‘nkandimwishipo sobwe, fumani apa!’ Mobeshi kwinsa byaipa.”
MAT 7:24 “Uliyense lanyumfunga ne kwakonkela maswi akame, welana ndendende ne muntu wamano uyo walebaka ng'anda yakendi palibwe lyacandanshi.
MAT 7:25 Kwalaloka mfula, milonga yalesula, lukupwe lwangofu lwalauma kung'anda, nomba ng'anda iliya kuwa sobwe, pakwinga walaibaka palibwe lyacandanshi.”
MAT 7:26 “Nomba uliyense lanyumfunga maswi akame, nsombi kabula kwakonkela, welana ndendende, ne muntu wapunama uyo walebaka ng'anda yakendi pa museya.
MAT 7:27 Kwalaloka mfula, milonga yalesula, lukupwe lwangofu lwalauma kung'anda, ng'anda yalawa, nomba kuwa kwa ng'andeyo kwalikuba kunene kuyosha.”
MAT 7:28 Yesu mpwalapwisha kwamba makani awa, bantu bangi balakankamana ne njiyishilo yakendi.
MAT 7:29 Pakwinga nkalikubeti beshikwiyisha milawo ya Mose, nsombi nendi walikwiyisha ne ngofu.
MAT 8:1 Yesu mpwalaseluka pa mulundu pasa, bantu bangi balamukonkela.
MAT 8:2 Lino muntu walikukute bulwashi bwa mankuntu, walesakusuntama ne kwambeti, “Nkambo, nakamuyanda ngamunswepesha”
MAT 8:3 Yesu walatandabula cikasa cakendi ne kumukumya, ne kwambeti, “Ee, ndayandanga, ‘Swepa!’ Popelapo walabacena.”
MAT 8:4 Kufumapo Yesu walamwambileti, “Nyumfwa, kotambilako nabambi sobwe, obe koya uliboneshe kuli shimilumbo, utwale mulumbo usa ngwalamba Mose, kwambeti bantu baboneti ulaba cena.”
MAT 8:5 Mpwalashika Yesu mu munshi wa Kapelenawo, mushilikali mukulene wabashilikali mwanda, walesa kusenga lunyamfwo.
MAT 8:6 Walasengeti, “Nkambo, musebenshi wakame wona kung'anda nimulwashi, nkelela kucikonsha kwenda, lakolwanga.”
MAT 8:7 Yesu walamwambileti, “Ndesanga kumusengula.”
MAT 8:8 Nomba mushilikali usa walambeti, “Sobwe Nkambo, ame nkandelela kwambeti amwe mwenga kuyakwingila mung'anda yakame, kamwambani maswi onka, musebenshi wakame nabe cena.
MAT 8:9 “Pali bamakulene mbonkute kunyumfwila, nomba nenjame nkute bashilikali bakute kunyumfwila. Na ndambili mushilikali, ‘Koya’ Cakubinga ukute kuya. Na ndambili naumbi eti ‘Kwesa kuno’ Cakubinga ukute kwisa, na ndambili musha wakameti, ‘kwensa ici cakubinga ukute kucinsa.’ ”
MAT 8:10 Lino Yesu mpwalanyumfweco walakankamana, walambila bantu basa balikumukonkeleti, “Kwamba cakubinga, nambi pakati pa Baislayeli paliya kucanikapo lushomo lulicisa.
MAT 8:11 Cakubinga ndamwambilishingeti bantu bangi nibakafumine kucwe, ne kumbonshi, kwisakwikala pamo ne Abulahamu ne Isake kayi ne Yakobo pa malyalya amu Bwami bwakwilu.
MAT 8:12 Nomba abo banga belela kuba mu Bwami ubo, nibakataiwe kunsa mumushinshe. Kopeloko nibakalile ne kukokota meno abo, cebo cakubabwa.”
MAT 8:13 Popelapo Yesu walambila mukulene wabashilikali, “Kamuyani kung'anda, cinshike kwelana ne lushomo ndokute.” Pacindi copeleco musebenshi wakendi walaba cena.
MAT 8:14 Yesu mpwalengila mu ng'anda ya Petulo, walabona kumakwendi batukashi kabali bona, kabakolwa cimpwita.
MAT 8:15 Walabekata kucikasa popelapo cimpwita calapwa. Kumakwendi Petulo balapunduka, ne kutatika kubambila Yesu cakulya.
MAT 8:16 Mansailo, pabusuba bopelobo, bantu balaleta balwashi bangi bekatwa ne mishimu yaipa, Yesu walikupulisha mishimu ne maswi onka, kayi balwashi bonse walikubasengula.
MAT 8:17 Byonsebi walabinsa kwambeti, mbyalamba mushinshimi Yesaya bikwanilishiwe, byakwambeti, “Nendi walamanta bishikubaba ne malwashi etu.”
MAT 8:18 Yesu mpwalabona likoto lyabantu balikuba bamushinguluka, walambila beshikwiya bakendi, “Katutampukilani kutala kwa lwenje kusa.”
MAT 8:19 Nomba pacindi copeleco palashika umo wabeshikwiyisha milawo ya Mose walambila Yesu eti, “Bashikwiyisha, ame ndayandanga kuba shikwiya wenu kayi nindimukonkelenga kulikonse nkomulenga.”
MAT 8:20 Yesu walamukumbuleti, “Bamwaba bakute bilingo, nabyo bikeni bikute bisangala byakwikalamo. Nomba ame nde Mwana Muntu ndiya musena wakona nepumwininapo.”
MAT 8:21 Nomba shikwiya naumbi walambila Yesu, eti, “Nkambo, nsuminisheni mbwelele nanshi embike bata.”
MAT 8:22 Neye Yesu walamwambileti, “Obe nkonkele. Kobaleka bafwa babikenga bantu babo bafwa.”
MAT 8:23 Yesu pamo ne beshikwiya bakendi balatanta bwato nekuya.
MAT 8:24 Mwacimfundumukila kwalesa lukupwe luyosha pa lwenje, mankape alatatika kwingila mu bwatomo, nomba Yesu walikali wonatulo.
MAT 8:25 Kacili wona, beshikwiya balayakumunyukumuna ne kwambeti, “Nkambo, tupulusheni, tulipepi kufwa!”
MAT 8:26 Yesu walabakumbuleti, “Mulatininga cani amwe mobantu mukute lushomo lung'ana?” Mpwalambeco walemana ne kulucancilila lukupwe ne mankape, popelapo pa lwenje palamwena tonto.
MAT 8:27 Beshikwiya basa balakankamana ne kwambeti, “Inga uyu ni muntu ulyeconi cakwinseti lukupwe ne mankape byonse bilamunyumfwilinga?”
MAT 8:28 Yesu mpwalashika kutala kwa lwenje, mu cibela ca Gadala, walakumanya bantu babili bekatwa ne mishimu yaipa kabafuma kunamaumbwe. Balikuba bakalu, cakwinseti paliya muntu naba umo walikupita nshila iyo.
MAT 8:29 Pacindi copeleco balatatika kolobesheti, “Mulayandanga cani amwe Mwanendi Lesa? Sena mulesa kuno kwisa kutupensha cindi kacitanacishika?”
MAT 8:30 Nomba palikuba litanga linene lya nkumba shalikulya pepi napo mpobalikuba.
MAT 8:31 Mishimu yaipa yalamupapatila Yesu, ne kwambeti, “Mwatupulisha, mutusuminishe twenga kwingila mulitanga lya nkumba shisa shilipasa.”
MAT 8:32 Yesu walayambileti, “Ee, kamuyani,” Nayo yalapula ne kuya kwingila munkumba shisa. Popelapo likoto lya nkumba lyalafwambalubilo kuselemukila kumukolo kwa mulundu ne kuyakuwila mulwenje, moshalakafwila shonse.
MAT 8:33 Abo balikwembela nkumba balafwamba, balashika kumunshi, nekwambila bantu bintu byonse byalenshika kubantu basa babili balikuba bekatwa ne mishimu yaipa.
MAT 8:34 Popelapo bantu bonse mumunshi balapula kuya kukumana ne Yesu. mpobalamucana balamusenga kwambeti afume mucibela ico.
MAT 9:1 Yesu walatanta mu bwato ne kutampuka lwenje, kuya kumunshi nkwalikwikala.
MAT 9:2 Kopeloko bantu nabambi balamuletela mulema watontola myendo kabali bamoneka pampasa. pakubona lushomo lwabo, Yesu walambila mulema uyo “Yumisha moyo omwanobe! bwipishi bwakobe bulalekelelwa.”
MAT 9:3 Mpwalenseco beshikwiyisha milawo ya Mose nabambi, balatatika kumufwiya mumyoyo yabo ne kwambeti, “Uyu muntu lanyanshanga Lesa!”
MAT 9:4 Nomba Yesu pakwishiba miyeyo yabo walambeti, “Mukute kuyeyela cani bintu byaipa mumyoyo yenu?
MAT 9:5 Capubako nicipeyo kwambeti, ‘Bwipishi bwakobe bulalekelelwa’ Nambi kwambeti, ‘nyamuka wende.’
MAT 9:6 Nomba ndayandanga kwambeti mwinshibeti, Mwana Muntu ukute ngofu shakulekelela bwipishi pacishi capanshi pano.” Neco walambila mulema watontola myenda uyu, “Nyamuka manta mpasa yakobe, koya kwenu.”
MAT 9:7 Popelapo muntu usa walanyamuka ne kuya kumunshi kwabo.
MAT 9:8 Bantu basa mpobalaboneco, balekatwa buyowa, ne kulumbanya Lesa walapa bantu ngofu shabwendeleshi shilicisa.
MAT 9:9 Yesu mpwalikufumako walabona muntu walikukwiweti, Mateyo kaliwekala mukanda ka misonko, walamwambileti, “Nenjobe, nkonke.” Pacindi copeleco Mateyo walanyamuka ne kumukonkela.
MAT 9:10 Yesu mpwalikulya mu ng'anda ya Mateyo. Kwalesa beshimisonko bangi, ne beshi kwinsa byaipa, balesa kulya nendi pamo ne beshikwiya bakendi.
MAT 9:11 Mpobalaboneco Bafalisi, balatatika kubepusha beshikwiya bakendi Yesu eti, “Inga bashikwiyisha benu balalingeconi pamo ne beshimisonko, ne beshi kwinsa byaipa?”
MAT 9:12 Nendi Yesu pakunyumfweco, walabakumbuleti, “Bantu balabulunga kukolwa nkabakute kuyanda mu ng'anga sobwe, nsombi balwashi ebakute kuyanda mung'anda.”
MAT 9:13 “Nomba kamwiyani cilambanga maswi awa, alambangeti, ‘Nkandayandangeti bantu bampe milumbo sobwe, nsombi ndayandangeti bantu beenshilenga nkumbo kubanabo.’ Pakwinga nkandaleshila kukuwa bantu balulama sobwe, nsombi beshikwinsa byaipa.”
MAT 9:14 Panyuma pakendi beshikwiya ba Yohane mubatishi, balesa kuli Yesu ne kumwipusheti, “Afwe, ne Bafalisi tukute kulikanisha kulya tunkanda twingi, nomba nicani beshikwiya benu nkabakute kulikanishapo?”
MAT 9:15 Nendi Yesu walambeti, “Sena banendi shibwinga ngabalyetesha bacibanga pamo ne shibwinga? Ico nkacinshiki sobwe! Nomba nicikashike cindi ncotibakamufulepo shibwinga usa, popelapo nibakatatike kulikanisha kulya.
MAT 9:16 “Muntu nkakute kumamika cikamba ca cikwisa ca lino lino ne kucitungila pa mwinjila ukulukulu, pakwinga cikamba ca cikwisa ca lino lino ngacikokonyana nekumatula uwo mwinjila ukulukulu, ne kumatuka kulico kukute kushiya cibwanko.
MAT 9:17 Kayi paliya muntu ukute kubika waini mucifwafumwa cacipaya cakaindi sobwe, pakwinga nawinseco, cifwafumwa cacipaya ngacipasuka, waini ngautaika, nasho nkomwa ngashibula ncito. Waini walino lino bakute kubika munkomwa sha lino lino. Neco byonse bibili bikute kubambwa cena.”
MAT 9:18 Yesu kacamba, kwalesa mukulene wa Bayuda walesa kumusuntamina ne kwambeti, “Mwaname mutukashi ulipepi kufwa, ndapapata kamwisani mubike makasa enu palyendiye, kwambeti abe muyumi.”
MAT 9:19 Popelapo Yesu ne beshikwiya bakendi balanyamuka ne kuya nendi.
MAT 9:20 Lino palikuba mutukashi walikukolwa bulwashi bwa mukunko kwa byaka likumi ne bibili, walesa cakunyuma kwa Yesu, ne kwisa kwikata kucelele kwa munganjo wa Yesu,
MAT 9:21 mumoyo mwakendi walikayeyeti, “Na njikatekowa munganjo wakendi ni nsengulwe.”
MAT 9:22 Yesu popelapo walacebuka ne kumubona mutukashi uyo, Yesu walambeti, “Yumisha moyo mwaname, lushomo lwakobe lulakupulushu.” Pacindi copeleco mutukashi usa walasengulwa.
MAT 9:23 Yesu mpwalashika ku ng'anda kwa mukulene wa Bayuda usa, walacana bantu kabalilisha mikonkobesho nebisekele, nabambi kabalyuma pacali kulila mibila.
MAT 9:24 Lino nendi Yesu walabambileti, “Kamupulani mwense, kashimbi uyu uliya kufwa sobwe, nsombi wonowatulo.” Popelapo bangi balatatika kumuseka.
MAT 9:25 Nomba bonse mpobalapulamo mu ng'anda,Yesu walaya kucimpetela nkwalikuba ne kuyakwikata kashimbi uyu pacikasa, popelapo walapunduka.
MAT 9:26 Impuwo iyi yalanyumfwika mucibela ca cishico.
MAT 9:27 Mpwalikufumako, bantu bashipilwa babili balamukonkela nekutatika kubilikisheti, “Amwe Yesu mwanendi Dafeti, tunyumfwilekoni nkumbo!”
MAT 9:28 Yesu mpwalengila mung'anda bashipilwa babili basa balesa kulyendiye. nendi walabepusheti, “Sena mwashometi ngandimusengula?” Naboyo balakumbuleti, “Ee twashoma Nkambo.”
MAT 9:29 Yesu walabekata mumenso, ne kwambeti, “Cinshike kwelana ne lushomo lwenu.”
MAT 9:30 Popelapo menso abo alacaluka, balacikonsha kubona. Nomba Yesu walabambilisheti kabataya bambileko muntu naba umo sobwe.
MAT 9:31 Nomba kufumapo balo balatatika kumwaya mpuwo kumuntu uliyense mucibela ico.
MAT 9:32 Mpobalapula mung'anda nekutatika kuya, bantu nabambi balaleta muntu walikuba cibulu, cebo cakwikatwa ne mushimu waipa.
MAT 9:33 Yesu mpwalaufunya mushimu waipa usa, muntusa walacikonsha kwamba. Nomba bantu balakankamana cakwinseti balatatika kwambeti, “Nkatuna tucibonapo cintu camushoboyu mu Islayeli!”
MAT 9:34 Nomba nabo Bafalisi balambeti, “Lamupanga ngofu shakufunya mishimu yaipa ni mukulene wa mishimu yaipa.”
MAT 9:35 Yesu walendana mu minshi inene, ne ing'ana ing'ana, walikwiyisha mu misena yabo yakupaililamo, ne kukambauka Mulumbe Waina wa Bwami bwa Lesa, Kayi walasengula bulema bwapusanapusana ne malwashi apusana pusana.
MAT 9:36 Yesu mpwalabona makoto a bantu, walanyumfwa luse, pakwinga balikuba bantu balemenwa kayi batyompwa kubeti mbelele shabula mwembeshi.
MAT 9:37 Yesu walambila beshikwiya bakendi eti, “Butebushi bulafulu, nomba basebenshi balacepe.
MAT 9:38 Neco, kamusengani Lesa mwine butebushi kwambeti atume basebenshi bangi kuya kutebula.”
MAT 10:1 Yesu walakuwa beshikwiya bakendi likumi ne babili, walabapa ngofu sha kupulisha mishimu yaipa, kayi ne ngofu shakusengula bulema apusanapusana ne malwashi apusanapusana.
MAT 10:2 Maina abatumwa basa likumi ne babili, ni Shimoni, walikukwiweti, Petulo ne Ndileya mukwabo, ne Jemusi mwanendi Sebedayo, ne Yohane mukwabo,
MAT 10:3 ne Filipo, ne Batolomeyo, ne Tomasi ne Mateyo, walikusonkesha misonko, ne Jemusi mwanendi Alufeyo, ne Tadeyo,
MAT 10:4 ne Shimoni wa mucipani ca bantu balikulwanina lwanguluko mu cishi ca Islayeli, kayi ne Yuda Sikalyote, uyo walamulisha Yesu kubalwani.
MAT 10:5 Aba bantu bali likumi ne babili, Yesu walabatuma ne kubapa malailile akwambeti, “Kamutaya kubantu babula kuba Bayuda sobwe, nambi kuya kwingila mu munshi uliwonse wa bene Samaliya sobwe.
MAT 10:6 Nomba amwe kamuyani kuli Baislayeli abo balyeti mbelele shataika.
MAT 10:7 Kamuyani, mukambaukengeti, Lesa ulipepi kwikalika bwami bwakendi.
MAT 10:8 Sengulani balwashi, kupundusha bafwa, kusengula mankuntu, ne kupulisha mishimu yaipa. Mulatambulu kwabulyo, ne njamwe kamupani kwabulyo.
MAT 10:9 Kamutamanta mali mumpotomona shenu, golide nambi silifa, nambi mali amukuba.
MAT 10:10 Kamutamanta cipokolo ca pabulwendo, nambi kumanta minjila ibili, nambi nkwabilo, nambi nkoli. Basebenshi bela kutambula bintu mbyobabula.
MAT 10:11 “Mwengila mu munshi uliwonse, mulangaule muntu layandishishinga kumutambula, amutambula ikalani ku ng'anda kopeloko mpaka cishika cindi cakufumamo.
MAT 10:12 Pakwingila mu ng'anda mwambengeti, ‘lumuno lube ne njamwe.’
MAT 10:13 Lino bamutambula calushinisho bene ng'anda, lumuno lwenu lube nabo nditu, nomba na bene ng'anda balakana kumutambula, lumuno lwenu lubwelele kulinjamwe.
MAT 10:14 Muntu uliyense akana kumutambula, nambi kunyumfwa maswi ngomukute, pampamunani lusuko lwakumyendo kwenu mwafumanga mung'andomo nambi mumunshi umo.
MAT 10:15 Cakubinga ndamwambilishingeti, pabusuba bwalombolosho, nicikabeko capuba kubantu baku Sodomu, ne Gomola, kupita bantu ba mumunshi uwo.
MAT 10:16 “Kamunyumfwani! Ndamutumunga mbuli mbelele pakati pa baumpe, neco kamubani bacenjela mbuli njoka, nomba kayi babomba myoyo mbuli nkulimba.
MAT 10:17 Mucenjele nabo bantu, pakwinga nibakamwikate ne bakamutwale kunkuta, ne kumukwapula bikoti mu manda abo akupaililamo.
MAT 10:18 Nibakamutwale ku bamanduna, ne kubami, pacebo canjame, cakwinseti ni mukambeleko bakamboni pamenso pabo, ne pamenso abantu bamishobo naimbi.
MAT 10:19 Bakamutwalanga ku nkuta, kamutaka yakamwanga kwambeti, ‘Inga ne twambeconi’ Nambi nitwambe cani. Pacindi copeleco ni mukapewe maswi akwamba.
MAT 10:20 Pakwinga ntamwe mweshi mukambenga sobwe, nsombi shikwamba ni Mushimu Uswepa wa Lesa Bameshenu, eti ukambenga kupitila muli njamwe.
MAT 10:21 “Mukwabo nakabukile mukwabo nekumushinisha, baishi nibakabukile mwana nekumushinisha, nabo bana nibakabukile bamashali babo, ne kubashinisha.
MAT 10:22 Bantu bonse ni bakapelane ne njamwe pacebo cakame. Nomba uyo eshakemanowa ncili mukunshoma mpaka kumapwililisho, endiyeti akapuluke.
MAT 10:23 Lino bakatatika kumupensha mu munshi uwu ne uwo, mukafwambile ku minshi naimbi. Cakubinga ndamwambilishingeti, kamutana mupwisha kwendela minshi yonse ya Baislayeli, Mwana Muntu nakabenga kaliwesa kendi.
MAT 10:24 “Shikwiya nkapita lamwiyishinga sobwe, kayi musebenshi nkapita muntu walamwingisha ncito sobwe.
MAT 10:25 Ee, ngacibeco kwambeti, shikwiya ngawelana ne lamwiyishinga, kayi musebenshi ngawelana ne walamwingisha ncito. Nomba lino na mwine mukowa, bantu balamupa lina eti, Belesebulu, Inga bantu bamukowa wakendi sena nkabelela kubapa maina aipa apitapo?”
MAT 10:26 “Neco, kamutatinanga bantu, kantu kalikonse kafwekelelwa nikakafwekulwe, kayi kalikonse kasolekwa nikakeshibikwe.
MAT 10:27 Mbyondamwambilinga mu mushinshe, amwe mukabyambilenga patuba, ibyo mbyomulanyumfwili kumukushi, amwe mukabyambilenga pelu paciluli.
MAT 10:28 Kamutatinanga abo bakute kushina mubili, pakwinga nkabela kushina mushimu. Nsombi amwe kamutinani uyo wela kononga byonse bibili, mubili ne mushimu pamo, mu Gehena.
MAT 10:29 Sena tutite tubili nkatukute kulwa ne kalyali kamo? Nsombi paliya nakakaba kamo kakute kulaka panshi kwakubula Bameshenu kwinshiba.
MAT 10:30 Nomba kulinjamwe, ne mishishi ya mu mutwi yonse yabelengewa ne Lesa.
MAT 10:31 Neco kamutatina, amwe mwapita mwelo wa tutite twingi!
MAT 10:32 “Abo bakute kunsumina pamenso abantu kwambeti nibakame, nenjame ninkabasumine pamenso a Bata balikwilu.
MAT 10:33 Nomba lankananga pamenso abantu, nenjame ninkamukane pamenso a Bata bakwilu kwambeti nkandimwishipo sobwe.”
MAT 10:34 “Sena mulayeyengeti ndaleshila lumuno pacishi capanshi? Ame ndiya kwishila lumuno sobwe, nsombi censho ca nkondo.
MAT 10:35 Ndalesa kupansanya mwana mutuloba ne baishi, mwana mutukashi ne banyina, mulekashi ne banyina shala,
MAT 10:36 balwani ba muntu nibakabe bansebendi.
MAT 10:37 “Muntu wasunisha baishi ne banyina kupita ame, nkelela kuba shikwiya wakame sobwe. Kayi uyo wasunisha mwana mutuloba nambi mwana mutukashi kupita ame neye nkelela kuba shikwiya wakame.
MAT 10:38 Alikane mwine, kayi alibambile kupeshewa, ne kufwa cebo ca kunkonkela.
MAT 10:39 Uliyense layandanga kupulusha buyumi bwakendi, nakabutaye, nsombi uyo latayanga buyumi bwakendi pacebo cakame, nakabucane nditu!
MAT 10:40 “Muntu lamutambulunga, latambulungame, nendi lantambulunga, latambulunga uyo walantuma.
MAT 10:41 Muntu latambulunga mushinshimi, pacebo cakwambeti ni mushinshimi, nakatambule cilambo ca mushinshimi. Latambulunga muntu walulama, pacebo cakwambeti walulama, nakatambule cilambo ca muntu walulama.
MAT 10:42 Uliyense lapanga menshi atontola mu nkomeshi, kuli umo wa beshikwiya bakame, pacebo cakwambeti ni shikwiya wakame, cakubinga ndamwambilingeti, nendi nteti akalilwe kutambula cilambo camwelela.”
MAT 11:1 Yesu mpwalapwisha kubapa busele beshikwiya bakendi likumi ne babili, walafumako nekuya kwiyisha, ne kukambauka mu minshi.
MAT 11:2 Mbyalikwinsa Klistu, byalanyumfwika kuli Yohane mubatishi kali mujele, neco walatuma beshikwiya bakendi kulyendiye.
MAT 11:3 Kuya kumwipusheti, “Sena njamwe ngobalikwambeti lakesanga, mpani tupembele naumbi?”
MAT 11:4 Yesu walakumbuleti, “Kamuyani mumwambile Yohane, bintu mbyomulanyumfunga, ne kubibona.
MAT 11:5 Bashipilwa balabononga, nabo balema miyendo balendenga, bashimankuntu balasengulwanga, bashinka matwi balatatiki kunyumfwa, bafwa balapundukunga, nawo Mulumbe Waina ulakambaukwanga kubapenshi.
MAT 11:6 Walelekwa muntu labulunga kutonshanya shanjame.”
MAT 11:7 Pacindi beshikwiya ba Yohane basa mpobalafumako, Yesu walatatika kwamba sha Yohane, ne kwipusha makoto abantu eti, “Mpomwalikuya kucinyika, mwalayakubona cani? Sena lyalikuba litete lyalikutenkana ne lukupwe?
MAT 11:8 Mwalayakubona cani? Sena ni muntu wafwala byakufwala bya mulo wadula? Bantu bakute kufwala byakufwala bya mulo wadula bakute kwikala mu manda a bami!
MAT 11:9 Kamung'ambilani, mwalayakubona cani? Sena walikuba mushinshimi? Ee, nicakubinga, nomba ndamwambilishingeti, mwalabona wapita mushinshimi.
MAT 11:10 Uyu endiye usa Mabala a Lesa ngalikwambeti, “Mutumwa wakame uyu, ndamutumunga pantangu pakobe, kwambeti abambile limo nshila njoti ukeshilemo.”
MAT 11:11 Cakubinga ndamwambilingeti, mubantu bonse balasemwa kubatukashi, paliya naba umo munene wapita Yohane Mubatishi, nomba nendi uyo mung'ana mu Bwami bwakwilu wamupita Yohane.
MAT 11:12 Kufuma pacindi ca Yohane mubatishi mpaka lelo, Bwami bakwilu bwakwabililwa mwangofu ne bantu balayandangowa kubulumina banabo.
MAT 11:13 Mu milawo ya Mose, ne bashinshimi balikabamba sha Bwami bopelobu, mpaka kushika kucindi ca Yohane mubatishi.
MAT 11:14 Na mulayandanga kushoma, ishibani kwambeti, Yohane endiye Eliya walikwambweti lakesanga,
MAT 11:15 Uyo ukute matwi, kanyumfwani!
MAT 11:16 Anu bantu bamusemanowu ngandibelenkanya necani? Balyeti batwanike balatotekeshananga pamusena wa makwebo, bambi kabepusha banabo eti,
MAT 11:17 “Twalamombela ngoma, nomba mwalabulila cani kushana? Twalembila nyimbo sha malila, nomba nicani amwe muliya kulilako sobwe?”
MAT 11:18 “Yohane mubatishi mpwalesa, kalikanisha byakulya, ne byakunwa, mwali kamwambeti, wekatwa ne mushimu waipa!”
MAT 11:19 Mwana Muntu nendi walikulya nekunwa, uliyense walatatika kwambeti, “Kamubonani muntuyu nicakolwa, kayi nimukuma, wasunana ne beshimisonko ne bantu babwipishi, nomba Mano akendi alabonekenga mubyakwinsa byakendi.”
MAT 11:20 Panyuma pakendi Yesu walatatika kushingana minshi njalenshilamo bintu bingi byangofu, pakwinga bantu mu minshiyo baliya kushinta myoyo yabo sobwe.
MAT 11:21 Walambeti, “Malele obe Kolasini! Malele obe Betisaida! Pakwinga bintu byangofu byalenshika kulinjamwe, anu nibyalenshikila ku Tulo ne Sidoni, nshinga bantu bakendi ne balafwala masankunya, ne kulitila milota, kubonesha kushinta myoyo kwabo,
MAT 11:22 Nomba ndamwambilingeti, pabusuba bwa lombolosho, nicikabeko capuba kunyumfwilako luse Tulo ne Sidoni, kupita amwe.
MAT 11:23 Nenjobe Kapelenawo, sena ulayeyengeti nakakutantike kwilu? Wangwela! Nakakulashe panshi mpaka ku musena wa bantu bafwa, pakwinga bintu bya ngofu byalenshika kulinjobe, ne byalenshikila mu Sodomu, nshinga Sodomu nacilipo nelelo.
MAT 11:24 Nomba ndamwambilingeti, pabusuba bwalombolosho nicikabe capubako kunyumfwilako luse bene Sodomu kupita amwe!”
MAT 11:25 Pacindi copeleco Yesu walambeti, “Amwe Ta, mobene kwilu ne cishi capanshi, ndamulumbu pakuyubulula bintu ibi kubatwanike, ne kubisoleka kubantu bamano akucishi,
MAT 11:26 Ee, Ta, kwinamoyo kwenu mwalayanda kwinseco.
MAT 11:27 “Ta mwalampa bintu byose mumakasa akame, paliya nabaumo wela kumwinshiba cena Mwana, nsombi Baishi bonka ebala kumwinshiba cena, kayi paliya nabaumo wela kwinshiba cena babula kuba Baishi, nsombi Mwana ewinshi cena Baishi, neye ukute kuyubulwila abo mbwalayandanga.
MAT 11:28 “Kamwisani kulinjame amwe omwalema cebo ca kunyamuna mitolo, kwambeti mucane kupumwina.
MAT 11:29 Kamumantani lijoko lyakame, kayi mwiye kulinjame.Pakwinga ndabomba moyo kayi ndalicepesha, kayi nimwise mucane kupumwina.
MAT 11:30 Lijoko lyakame lyapuba, ne mutolo wakame wapuba.”
MAT 12:1 Pabusuba bwa Sabata, bwakupumwina kwa Bayuda, Yesu walikapita mu libala lya maila pamo ne beshikwiya, beshikwiya bakendi balanyumfwa nsala, neco balatatika kuningula ngala sha maila ne kushilya.
MAT 12:2 Mpobalaboneco Bafalisi, Yesu balamwambileti, “Kamubonani ncobalenshinga beshikwiya benu pabusuba bwa Sabata cabula kusuminishiwa ne Mulawo”
MAT 12:3 Nendi walabambileti, “Sena muliya kubelengapo ncalensa Dafeti, mpwalanyumfwa nsala pamo ne banendi mbwalikuba nabo?
MAT 12:4 Ntepasa walakengila mu Ng'anda ya Lesa, kuya kulya shinkwa wishikubengwa kuli Lesa ico calikuba catonda, nkabalikuba basuminishiwa ne mulawo kulya shinkwa uyo sobwe, nsombi beshimilumbo.
MAT 12:5 Mpani muliya kubelengapo mu Milawo kwambeti, beshimilumbo nabo balikupwaya mulawo pabusuba bwa Sabata ne kuboneketi baliya mulandu.
MAT 12:6 Cakubinga ndamwambilishingeti, mpwali pano wapita Ng'anda ya Lesa.
MAT 12:7 Nshinga nemucishi bupandulushi bwa Maswi a Lesa alambangeti, ‘Nkandayandangeti bantu bampe milumbo sobwe, nsombi ndayandangeti bantu benshilenga nkumbo kubanabo. nsuni nkumbo, kupita milumbo, anu ne mutambili bantu babula bwipishi eti bakute bwipishi,’
MAT 12:8 Pakwinga Mwana Muntu emwine busuba bwa Sabata.”
MAT 12:9 Mpwalafumapo Yesu walakengila mu ng'anda yakupaililamo,
MAT 12:10 Umo mwalikuba muntu watontola cikasa, bantu nabambi balikuyanda pakumucaninapo mulandu wakumubepeshela Yesu, balamwipusheti, “Sena Milawo yasuminisha kusengula muntu pabusuba bwa Sabata?”
MAT 12:11 Nendi Yesu walabakumbuleti, “Niyani palinjamwe ukute kambelele kamowa, welela kubula kukatampula kawila mucisengu pa busuba bwa Sabata?
MAT 12:12 Nomba muntu ntewapita mbelele! Na nico ekwambeti Milawo yasuminisha kwinsa byaina pabusuba bwa Sabata.”
MAT 12:13 Neco walamwambila usa muntu, “Tandabula cikasa cakobe!” Nendi walatandabula, popelapo cikasa cakendi calaba cena mbuli cinendi.
MAT 12:14 Popelapo basa Bafalisi balapula kuya kupangana mobelela kumushinina Yesu.
MAT 12:15 Yesu mpwalanyumfweti balapangananga, walafumamo. Abo bantu bonse balikumukonkela walikubasengula malwashi onse.
MAT 12:16 Nomba nendi walabakonkomesha kwambeti, kabatamuyubululanga,
MAT 12:17 walenseco kwambeti ncalamba Lesa kumushinshimi wakendi Yesaya cikwanilishiwe cakwambeti,
MAT 12:18 “kamubonani, musebenshi wakame uyu ngondalasala, Ndimusuni, moyo wakame wakondwa nendi, Ninkabike Mushimu mulyendiye. Nendi nakakambaukenga shalombolosho kubantu ba mishobo naimbi,
MAT 12:19 Nteti akatotekepo, nambi kompolola sobwe, Paliya muntu eti akanyumfwepo liswi akendi munshila sha muminshi,
MAT 12:20 Nendi nteti akatyokole litete lyomfwama, nambi kushima muniko ulayandanga kushimika, mpaka cancinencine cikakwane,
MAT 12:21 Kupembelela kwa bantu bonse nikukabikwe mu lina lyakendi.”
MAT 12:22 Panyuma pakendi bantu balaleta muntu washipilwa, kayi utacikonsho kwamba wekatwa ne mishimu yaipa, Yesu walamusengula, walatatika kwamba ne kubona cena.
MAT 12:23 Bantu bangi balakankamana kabambeti, “Sena uyu nte mwanendi Dafeti?”
MAT 12:24 Nomba Bafalisi mpobalanyumfweco balambeti, “Sobwe, ngofu shakupulisha mishimu yaipa lashifulunga kuli belezebulu mukulene wa mishimu yaipa.”
MAT 12:25 Yesu mpwaleshiba ncebalikuyeya walabambileti, “Cishi ciliconse capansana mu makoto makoto ne kutatika kulwana, nkacela kwikalisha nsombi ngaconongeka. Nambi bantu mu munshi, ne mumikowa batatika kubukilana ne kulwana, uwo munshi nambi mukowa nkapelela kuba kunyumfwana sobwe.
MAT 12:26 Na bali mubwami bwa Satana kabapulishana palwabo bene, ekwambeti bapansana, inga bwami bwakendi Satana ngabuyumeconi?
MAT 12:27 Na ame kamung'ambeti ndapulishinga mishimu yaipa ne ngofu sha belezebulu, inga beshikwiya benu balo balapulishinga mishimu yaipa ne ngofu shabani? Ecebo cakendi beshikwiya benu ebabanga bakamboni pacilubo cenu.
MAT 12:28 Na ame ndapulishinga mishimu yaipa ne ngofu ya Mushimu wa Lesa, anu ekwambeti Lesa latatiki kubika Bwami bwakendi pakati penu.”
MAT 12:29 Paliya muntu welela kwingila mu ng'anda ya muntu wangofu kuya kumantamo buboni bwakendi, katanamusunga muntu wangofuyo. Enseco welela kuya kumantamo bintu mung'andomo.
MAT 12:30 “Uyo labulunga kubela kulubasu lwakame latotekeshananga nenjame, uyo labulunga kunyamfwako kubunganya, nendi ni shikumwaya.
MAT 12:31 Ecebo cakendi ndamwambilishingeti, Lesa nakalekelele bwipishi bonse, ne maswi aipa. Nomba ku muntu lanyanshanga Mushimu Uswepa, Lesa nteti akamulekelelepo.
MAT 12:32 Ni cimo cimo uliyense lambilinga Mwana Muntu maswi aipa, Lesa nakamulekeleleko, nomba uliyense lanyanshanga Mushimu Uswepa, Lesa nteti akamulekelelepo sobwe pacino cindi, nambi mucindi cakuntangu.”
MAT 12:33 Na mwambeti citondo ici caina, ekwambeti ne bisepo byakendi byaina, kayi mwambeti, citondo ici caipa, ekwambeti ne bisepo byakendi byaipa, citondo cikute kwishibikwa kubisepo byakendi.
MAT 12:34 Bana banjoka amwe! Ngamucikonsheconi kwamba byaina pakwinga mwaipa? Pakwinga mulomo ukute kwamba byesula mumoyo.
MAT 12:35 Muntu waina ukute kupulisha byaina kufuma pamulunda wa buboni bwakendi bwaina. Nendi muntu waipa ukute kupulisha byaipa kufuma pamulunda wa buboni bwakendi bwaipa.
MAT 12:36 Ndamwambilishingeti pa busuba bwalombolosho, bantu ni bakacanike ne mulandu pa maswi abula kwelela ngobalikwamba,
MAT 12:37 pakwinga nemaswi akobe nukacaniketi uliya mulandu, kayi maswi akobe nakakupeshe mulandu.
MAT 12:38 Beshikwiyisha milawo ya Mose ne Bafalisi balamwambila Yesu eti, “Bashikwiyisha, tulayandanga mutulesheko cingashilo cishikukankamanisha.”
MAT 12:39 Nomba nendi Yesu walambeti, Ha! Kwipa musemano uwu wabantu babula lushomo balayandanga kubona cingashilo cishikukankamanisha, Nomba nteti bakacibonepo sobwe cingashilo kupatulakowa cisa ca mushinshimi Yona.
MAT 12:40 Mbuli Yona usa ncalikuba mulibunda lya luswi lunene lusa masuba atatu, munshi ne mashiku, nendi Mwana Muntu na kabikwe panshi mubulongo masuba atatu, munshi ne mashiku.
MAT 12:41 Bantu baku Ninive, nibakapundukile pamo ne bantu ba musemanowu pa busuba bwa lombolosho, kwambeti bantu ba ku ninive bakabatotekeko, nte pasa balo balalapa mpobalanyumfwa kukambauka kwa Yona. Nsombi pano mpwali wapita Yona.
MAT 12:42 Pa busuba bwalombolosho, mwami mutukashi waku Sheba nakapunduke pamo ne bantu bamusemanuwu, nakese akabatoteke. Pakwinga nendi walenda musuma, kwisa kunyumfwa kwamba kwa mano a mwami Solomoni, nomba pano pali wapita Solomoni.
MAT 12:43 “Na mushimu waipa ulapulu mu muntu, ukute kuya kwendenda mucishi cabula menshi, kulangaula musena wakupumwininako, nomba nkaukute kucanika.
MAT 12:44 Neco ukute kwambeti, ndabwelenga kung'anda kwakame kusa nkondalapula, lino washika ukute ucana mung'anda musa muli tonto, mwapyangwa ne kubambwa cena.
MAT 12:45 Ukute kuya kumanta mishimu inendi isanu ne ibili yaipa kupita walo, panyuma pakendi yonse ikute kuya kwingila ne kwikalilila mopelomo. Neco bwikalo bwa muntu uyo bukute kwipa kupita ncalikuba pakutanguna, nicikabeco kumusemanuwu waipa.”
MAT 12:46 Yesu kacamba ne bantu bangi basa, bakwabo ne banyina balashika, balemana pansa, balikuyanda kwambako nendi.
MAT 12:47 Lino muntu naumbi walakamwambila Yesu kwambeti, “Banyoko ne bakwenu bali apa pansa balayandanga kwambako ne njobe.”
MAT 12:48 Yesu walamukumbuleti, “Anu bama ni bani? Ne bakwetu nibani?”
MAT 12:49 Mpwalambeco walatondeka kwalikuba beshikwiya bakendi ne kwambeti, Ame aba e Bama ne bakwetu,
MAT 12:50 Pakwinga uliyense lenshinga kuyanda kwa Bata ba kwilu, uyo emukwetu mutuloba, enkashi yakame, kayi e Bama.
MAT 13:1 Yesu pa busuba bopelobo walapula mung'anda, ne kuya kwikala panshi mu mbali mwa lwenje.
MAT 13:2 Kopeleko kwalabungana bantu bangi, Yesu walengila ne kuya kwikala mubwato, bantu bonse balemana kumutunta.
MAT 13:3 Yesu walamba ne bantu aba bintu bingi mumikoshano, walambeti, “Muntu naumbi walaya kumwaya mbuto.
MAT 13:4 Mpwalikumwaya mbuto, nashimbi mbuto shalawila munshila, shalalyewa ne bikeni.
MAT 13:5 Imbuto nashimbi shalawila pabulongo bwa mabwe, apo palikubula bulongo bwingi, shalamena bwangu pakwinga bulongo nkabwalikuba bwingi.
MAT 13:6 Nomba lisuba mpolyalatako, shalapya ne lumwi, neco shalanyana, pakwinga miyanda nkayalikuba yayapanshi sobwe.
MAT 13:7 Imbuto nashimbi shalawila pa myunga. Pakukula matewu, myunga yalashinkilila kukula kwa mbuto shisa.
MAT 13:8 Nomba mbuto nashimbi shalawila pa bulongo bwabolela cena, shalasema mifuko ingi namumbi mwalikuba nseke mwanda, namumbi nseke makumi asanu ne limo, namumbi nseke makumi atatu, kupita shalabyalwa”
MAT 13:9 Yesu walambeti, “Uyo ukute matwi, anyumfwe!”
MAT 13:10 Panyuma pakendi beshikwiya ba Yesu balamwipusheti, “Inga nipacebo cini bantu aba ncomulambanga nabo mumikoshanyo?”
MAT 13:11 Nendi walambeti, “Amwe Lesa walamuyubulwila byasolekwa bya Bwami bwa kwilu, nsombi kuli nabambi uliya kubayubulwilapo sobwe.
MAT 13:12 Ukuteko kantu nibakamupeko nabimbi, nakabe ne bintu bingi. Nomba uyo wabula kantu kalikonse, ne kang'anako nkakute nibaka mulamune.
MAT 13:13 Ncondambilinga mumikoshanyo ne bantu aba nicebo cakwambeti, nambi balalanganga, nkabalabononga sobwe, nambi balanyumfunga, nkabalanyufunga nambi kunyumfwishisha sobwe.
MAT 13:14 Ebantu aba balakwanilisha ncalikwamba mushinshimi Yesaya,” “Kunyumfwa nimukanyumfwenga, nsombi nteti mukanyumfwishishenga kubona nimukabonenga, nsombi nteti mukabonesheshenga sobwe.
MAT 13:15 Cakubinga myoyo yabantu yafumpa, bashinka bishili mumatwi mwabo, bacala menso abo. Ne calabula kubeco, ngababona ne menso abo. ngabanyumfwa ne matwi abo, mano abo ngaishiba ne kushinta myoyo, kwambeti ame ndibasengule.”
MAT 13:16 “Nombamwe menso enu alelekwa pakwinga alabononga, nawo matwi enu alanyumfunga.
MAT 13:17 Kwamba cakubinga, bashinshimi ne bantu bangi balulama balikuyandishisha kubona bintu ibi mbyomulabononga, nsombi balo baliya kubibonapo sobwe, balikuyandishisha kunyumfwa mbyomulanyumfunga, nsombi baliya kubinyumfwapo sobwe.”
MAT 13:18 “Amwe lino munyumfwishishe bupandulushi bwa mukoshanyo wa muntu usa walikumwaya mbuto.
MAT 13:19 Muntu uliyense anyumfwa Maswi, kwakubula kwanyumfwishisha, Waipa ukute kwisakufunyamo Maswi abyalwa mumoyo, Ishi embuto shisa shalabyalwa munshila.
MAT 13:20 Imbuto shalabyalwa pabulongo bwa mabwe shilapandululunga muntu ukute kunyumfwa Maswi ne kwatambula mwabwangu bwangu mwakukondwa.
MAT 13:21 Lino pacebo cakubula miyanda yashimpa cena, ukute kulikakatishako kwakacindi kang'anowa, cakwinseti aba mumapensho ne kunyumfwa bishikubaba pacebo ca Maswi asa, muntuyo ukute kubwelela panyuma pacindi copeleco.
MAT 13:22 Imbuto shisa shalabyalwa pa myunga shilapandululunga muntu ukute kunyumfwa Maswi a Lesa, nomba cebo cakutatilwa ne bintu byapacishi ne kuyandishisha mali, kukute kutyompwesha kukula kwa Maswi asa, neco nkakute kusemapo bisepo sobwe.
MAT 13:23 Nomba mbuto shisa shalabyalwa pabulongo bwabolela shilapandululunga muntu uyo ukute kwatambula Maswi a Lesa ne kwanyumfwishisha, Muntuyu ukute kusema bisepo, mwanda, nacimbi cindi makumi asanu ne limo, nambi makumi atatu a bishango byalabyalwa.”
MAT 13:24 Yesu walabambila kayi mukoshanyo naumbi, walambeti, “Bwami bwakwilu bwakoshana ne muntu walabyala mbuto shaina mulibala lyakendi.
MAT 13:25 Nomba cindi ncobalikuba bonatulo bantu bonse, mulwani wakendi walesa kubyalamo musonde pakati pa maila, ne kufumapo.
MAT 13:26 Lino mumena wa maila mpowalikukula nekuba ne mapumpu, nawo musonde walatatika kuboneka.”
MAT 13:27 Basebenshi bakendi mwine libala usa, balamwipusheti, “Nkambo, sena nte mwalabyalamo'wa mbuto shaina mulibala lyenu? Inga nawo musonde ulabonekenga mongeconi?”
MAT 13:28 Nendi walabakumbuleti, “Nimulwani wakame wenseco,” Nabo basebenshi balamwipusha kayi, “Sena twenga tutumunemo?”
MAT 13:29 Walambeti, “Sobwe! Mwenseco ngamutumwina kumo ne maila mwatumunanga musonde uwo.
MAT 13:30 Kamubilekani bikulile pamo mpaka cindi cakucesa. Pacindico ninkambile beshikucesa Kamucesani nanshi musonde, musunge mitolo mitolo, muutente. Panyuma pakendi mubunganye maila ne kuya kwabika mu lyanga lyakame.”
MAT 13:31 Kayi Yesu walabapa mukoshanyo naumbi walambeti, “Bwami bwakwilu bulyeti nseke shakatondo ka masitadi ako muntu nkalakabyala mulibala lyakendi.
MAT 13:32 Nseke shakatondo aka ni shing'anashing'ana mwelanisha ne nseke nashimbi. Nomba mbuto yakendi yakula, ikute kupita bifukusa nabimbi, ikute kuba citondo cinene, umo bikeni bikute kwisa kwibakamo bisangala mu misampi yakendi.”
MAT 13:33 Yesu walabapa mukoshanyo naumbi kayi, walambeti, “Bwami bwakwilu bulyeti cishikufufumisha shinkwa, ico mutukashi naumbi ncalasankanya pamo ne bunga bwakwana bikopo bibili, mpaka bunga bonse bwalafufumuka.”
MAT 13:34 Yesu byonsebi walikubambila bantu mumikoshanyo, pacindici uliya kwambapo nabo cintu ciliconse kwabula mukoshanyo.
MAT 13:35 Uko kwalikuba kukwanilisha calambwa ne mushinshimi, kwambeti, “Ninkambenga nabo mumikoshanyo, Ninkayubulule byalikuba byasolekwa kufuma pakulengwa kwacishi capanshi.”
MAT 13:36 Yesu walashiya makoto abantu basa, ne kuya kwingila mung'anda, beshikwiya bakendi balamusengeti, “Kamutupandulwilako mukoshanyo wa musonde wa mulibala usa.”
MAT 13:37 “Yesu nendi walambeti, Usa shikumwaya mbuto shaina endiye Mwana Muntu.
MAT 13:38 Libala lisa ecishi cino capanshi. Shisa mbuto shaina ebantu bene Bwami bwa Lesa. Musonde ni bantu baipa bakendi Waipa usa.
MAT 13:39 Mulwani usa walabyala musonde ni Muyungaushi. Kucesa maila kusa ekupwa kwacishi capanshi, ne beshikucesa ni bangelo.
MAT 13:40 Mbuli ncobalabunganya musonde ne kutenta pamulilo, nicikabeco pakupwa kwa cishicapanshi
MAT 13:41 Mwana Muntu nakatume bangelo bakendi, kwisa kufunyamo mu Bwami bwakendi bantu bonse bakute kwipisha banabo, pamo ne bonse bamicito yaipa.
MAT 13:42 Nibakabawale mubufuni bwa mulilo, kopeloko nibakalilenga ne kukokota meno.
MAT 13:43 Nomba bantu balulama nibakabaleti lisuba mu Bwami bwa Bameshabo, Uyo ukute matwi, anyumfwe!
MAT 13:44 “Bwami bwakwilu ngatubwelanika cisa; Muntu naumbi walafumbula mali asolekwa mulibala. neye kayi walafumbika pambi, panyuma pakendi mwakukondwa, walakaulisha bintu byonse mbyalikukute ne kuya kula libala lisa.
MAT 13:45 “Kayi Bwami bwakwilu ngatubwelanika cisa; Muntu naumbi shimakwebo, walayakulangaula malungu a mulo wadula.
MAT 13:46 Mpwalacana libwe limo lya mulo wadula, walaya kuyakulisha bintu byonse mbyalikukute ne kuyakula libwe lyamulo wadula lisa ndyalikuyandishisha.
MAT 13:47 “Bwami bwakwilu ngatubwelanika cisa; Basulishi balawala kombe mulwenje nekubungulula nswi sha mishobo yonse,
MAT 13:48 kesula bakute kukakwelela kumutunta, bakute kwikala panshi nekutatika kusalapo nswi shaina kababika mu mitanga, shaipa nikushitaya.
MAT 13:49 Nicikenshikeco pakupwa kwacishici, bangelo nibakafunyepo bantu baipa pakati pa bantu balulama,
MAT 13:50 ne kubawala mubufuni bwamulilo, kopeloko nibakalilenga ne kukokota meno.”
MAT 13:51 Yesu walabepusha beshikwiya bakendi, “Sena mulanyumfwishishi cena bintu ibi byonse?” Balo balambeti, “Ee”
MAT 13:52 Kayi walabambileti, “Ecebo cakendi shikwiyisha uliyense wa milawo laba shikwiya wa Bwami bwakwilu, ulyeti mwine ng'anda uyo ukute kupulisha bintu bya linolino ne byakaindi kufuma mulyanga lya buboni bwakendi.”
MAT 13:53 Yesu mpwalapwisha kwamba mikoshanyo walafumako.
MAT 13:54 Mpwalashika mucibela cakucomwabo, walatatika kwiyisha bantu mu ng'anda yakupaililamo. Abo balikumunyumfwa balikunkamana ne kwipusheti, “Mano, ne ngofu shakankamanisha shilicisa muntuyu walashifunya kupeyo?
MAT 13:55 Sena uyu nte mwana wa shikupala mapulanga usa? Sena nte mwanendi Maliya? Sena bamakwabo nte Jemusi ne Yosefe ne Shimoni ne Yuda?
MAT 13:56 Sena nkashi shakendi shonse ntetulinasho pamo pano? Inga bintu ibi walabicana kupeyo?”
MAT 13:57 Neco balamusula, nomba nendi Yesu walabambileti, Mushinshimi nkakute kupewa bulemu ne banse bendi mbaikala nabo mumunshi, nsombi bantu bakumbi.
MAT 13:58 Neco, Yesu uliya kwinsako bintu bingi byangofu, pacebo cakubula lushomo kwabo.
MAT 14:1 Pacindi copeleco, mwami Helode waku Galileya walanyumfwa bintu byalikwamba bantu mbyalikwinsa Yesu.
MAT 14:2 Walambila bantu bakendi bamakulene, “Uyu ingakali Yohane Mubatishi usa elapunduku kubafu! Ecebo cakendi ncalenshilinga bishikunkamanisha bilicisa.”
MAT 14:3 Pakwinga Helode ewalatuma bashilikali kuyakwikata Yohane, ne kumubika mujele. Walenseco pacebo ca Helodiya, walikuba mukashi wa Filipo, mukwabo Helode.
MAT 14:4 Pakwinga Yohane walamwambila Helode kwambeti, “Mulawo nkawasuminisha amwe kumweba uyu mutukashi,”
MAT 14:5 Ncalikuyanda Helode nikushina Yohane, nsombi walikutina bantu, pakwinga bantu balikwambeti Yohane nimushinshimi.
MAT 14:6 Mpobwalashika busuba bwa kwanuka kusemwa kwa Helode, mwana mutukashi wa Helodiya walashana pamenso pa bantu bonse balakwiwa ku malyalya awo, Helode walakondwa,
MAT 14:7 cakwinseti walensa kulumbileti, “Cakubinga nditu ninkupe ciliconse ncoti usenge.”
MAT 14:8 Lino banyina balamwambila cintu ncoti engakusenga. Mwana mutukashi usa walambeti, “Kamumpani mumbale popelepano mutwi wa Yohane mubatishi.”
MAT 14:9 Mwami Helode walanyumfwa nsoni, nomba pacebo ca kulumbila kusa, kayi ne bantu basa mbwalakuwa kumalyalya asa, walambeti, “Mwana mutukashuyu apewe mutwi ngwalasenge.”
MAT 14:10 Popelapo walatuma muntu kuya kumutimbula mutwi Yohane mujele.
MAT 14:11 Walaumantila mumbale mutwi ne kutwala kumwana mutukashi, nendi walautwala ku banyina.
MAT 14:12 Panyuma pakendi beshikwiya bakendi Yohane balesa kumanta citumbi ne kuyakubika mumanda, kufumapo balayakumwambila Yesu.
MAT 14:13 Yesu mpwalanyumfweco walatanta bwato ne kufumako, ne kuya kumusena kwabula bantu. Nomba bantu mpobalanyumfweti Yesu lafumuko balamukonkela ne myendo kufuma muminshi yabo.
MAT 14:14 Yesu mpwalabona likoto lyabantu, walaseluka mubwato, walabanyumfwila nkumbo, kayi walatatika kusengula balwashi.
MAT 14:15 Beshikwiya bakendi pacindi camansailo, Yesu balamwambileti, “Kuno nikucisuwa, ano nimansailo kamubambilani bantu aba benga kuminshi bengakula byakulya.”
MAT 14:16 Nomba nendi Yesu walabambileti, “Nkabelela kuya kumbi, amwe nimubape cakulya.”
MAT 14:17 Balo balambeti, “Tukutekowa shinkwa usanu, ne nswi shibili.”
MAT 14:18 Yesu walambeti, “kamuletani kuno.”
MAT 14:19 Mpobalamutwalila, Yesu walambila bantu baseti bekale panshi pa mila, Yesu walamanta shinkwa usanu ne nswi shibili, walalungumana kulanga kwilu, ne kulumba Lesa, panyuma pakendi walakomona komona shinkwa usa ne kupa beshikwiya bakendi, nabo balayabila bantu bonse.
MAT 14:20 Bantu bonse balalya ne kwikuta. Panyuma pakendi beshikwiya balayowela byalashala ne kwisusha mitanga likumi ne ibili.
MAT 14:21 Bantu bonse balikubapo balalya, balikuba batuloba myanda makumi asanu kutabelengela kumo batukashi ne bana.
MAT 14:22 Pacindi copeleco, Yesu walambila beshikwiya bakendi kwambeti batante bwato batangune kuya kutala, nendi walashalila kunyuma kacambila bantu eti benga kwabo.
MAT 14:23 Mpwalalayana ne bantu basa, Yesu walatanta mumulundu kuyakupaila enka, palatatika kushipuluka kacili kopeloko enka.
MAT 14:24 Pacindici bwato busa bwalikuba pakati pa lwenje, patali ne kumutunta, kabapenga kukwasula cebo camankape, pakwinga balikabalwana ne lukupwe lunene.
MAT 14:25 Cindi cakumaca kakutubuluka Yesu walesa nkobalikuba kesakwenda pa menshi.
MAT 14:26 Beshikwiya bakendi mpobalamubona kenda pamenshi, balatina, balambeti, “Nicipuku!” Balatatika kutamauka cebo ca buyowa.
MAT 14:27 Yesu pacindi copeleco walabambileti, “Kamwikalikani cali! Njame, kamutatina sobwe!”
MAT 14:28 Nendi Petulo walambeti, “Nkambo, na njamwe kamunsuminisha ne njame njise uko pamenshi,”
MAT 14:29 Nendi Yesu walambeti, “Kwesa!” Petulo nendi walafuma mubwato, ne kutatika kwenda pamenshi kuya kuli Yesu.
MAT 14:30 Mpwalabona kukonempa kwalukupwe walaba ne buyowa, walatatika kwibila, walatatika kubilikisheti, “Nkambo, kamumpulushako!”
MAT 14:31 Yesu popelapo walatandabula cikasa ne kumwikata, ne kwambeti, “Obe okute lushomo lung'ana ulatonshanini cani?”
MAT 14:32 Panyuma pakendi bonse babili balaya kwingila mubwato busa ne lukupwe lwalacileka.
MAT 14:33 Beshikwiya basa balikuba mu bwato balamukambilila Yesu ne kwambeti, “Cakubinga njamwe Mwanendi Lesa.”
MAT 14:34 Lino bonse balatampuka lwenje ne kushika ku Genesaleti.
MAT 14:35 Bantu bakucishico balamwishiba Yesu, balaya kwishibisha banabo mucibela conse, neco balaleta balwashi bonse kuli Yesu.
MAT 14:36 Balamusengeti abasuminishe balwashi bekatekowa mwinjila wakendi, cakubinga bonse balekatako balikusengulwa.
MAT 15:1 Busuba nabumbi Bafalisi ne beshikwiyisha Milawo ya Mose nabambi balesa kuli Yesu kufumina ku Yelusalemu, balamwipusheti,
MAT 15:2 Nipacebo cini beshikwiya benu nkabalasungunga mwambo wa bakulukulu? Nkabalasambanga kumakasa balyanga cakulya.
MAT 15:3 Nendi Yesu walabakumbuleti, “Inga ne njamwe mukute kusulila cani Milawo ya Lesa, ne kuyuminina nta ku mwambo wamashali benu bakulukulu?”
MAT 15:4 Lesa walambeti, “Kopa bulemu baiso ne banyoko kayi kwambeti, uyo lanyanshanga baishi ne banyina welela kushinwa nditu.
MAT 15:5 Nsombi amwe mukute kwambeti, ‘Muntu ambila baishi, nambi banyina, eti, mbyondayandanga kumunyamfwani, ndabibenge kuli Lesa,
MAT 15:6 nteko kwambeti uyo uliya kupa bulemu baishi,’ Cebo ca mwambo wenuwo Maswi a Lesa akute kuba abulyo.”
MAT 15:7 Amwe bantu bandemi shibili, mushinshimi Yesaya walamba cakubinga mpwalambeti,
MAT 15:8 “Bantu aba bakute kumpa bulemu bwa pamulomo nsombi moyo wabo ulikutali ne njame.
MAT 15:9 Ee, bakute kunkambilila, nsombi kunkambilila kulico ni kwabulyo, pakwinga mbyobakute kwiyisha, nteyo milawo yakame, nsombi niya bantu.”
MAT 15:10 Panyuma pakendi Yesu walabakuwa bantu basa, kwambeti bese pepi ne kubambileti, “Kamunyumfwani, kayi munyumfwishishe cena,
MAT 15:11 cintu cikute kwingila mu mulomo, nteco cikute kwipisha muntu sobwe, nsombi cisa cikute kupula pamulomo pakendi endico cikute kwipisha muntu.”
MAT 15:12 Popelapo beshikwiya bakendi nabo balamwipusheti, “Sena mucinshi kwambeti mubalabanyufwishi nsoni Bafalisi ne ncomulamba?”
MAT 15:13 Yesu walambeti, “Imbuto iliyonse yabula kubyalwa ne Bata bakwilu, ni katumunwe.
MAT 15:14 Balekeni, aba nibatangunishi bashipilwa babantu bashipilwa, Lino na washipilwa utangunina washipilwa munendi, babili bonse ni bakawile mucisengu.”
MAT 15:15 Pacindici nendi Petulo walamwipusha Yesu kwambeti, “Tupandululwileni mukoshanyowu.”
MAT 15:16 Yesu walambeti, “Anu ne njamwe kayi nkamulanyumfwishishinga?
MAT 15:17 Sena kamucinshi kwambeti, ciliconse cilengilinga mumulomo cikute kwingila mulibunda mwakendi, ne kuya kucitaila kucisuwa?
MAT 15:18 Nomba bilapulunga mu mulomo wa muntu bikute kufuma mumoyo, neco, ibi ebikute kumwipisha.
MAT 15:19 Pakwinga mu myoyo ya bantu emukute kufuma manjeyaulwa aipa, nambi akushina nambi abupombo nambi abufule nambi akwiba nambi abukamboni bwabwepeshi, kayi ne abufwiyishi.
MAT 15:20 Ibi ebikute kwipisha muntu. Nteko kulya cakulya kwakubula kusamba kumakasa sobwe.”
MAT 15:21 Yesu walafumako, ne kuya kubibela bya Tulo ne Sidoni.
MAT 15:22 Mutukashi naumbi mu Kenani wamucibela ca kopeloko, walesa kuli Yesu, kabilikisheti, “Kamunyumfwilako nkumbo, Nkambo, Mobana bendi Dafeti. Mwaname mutukashi lapenge kwine pakwinga wekatwa ne mushimu waipa.”
MAT 15:23 Nomba Yesu uliya kumukumbulapo. Beshikwiya bakendi Yesu balesa kumusengeti, “Anu kamumwambilani enga, bonani latuyobekelenga.”
MAT 15:24 Nendi Yesu walambeti, “Ame ndalatumwa ku mbelele shataika sha Baislayeli.”
MAT 15:25 Mutukashi usa walasuntama, ne kwambeti, “Kamunyamfwilishako Nkambo.”
MAT 15:26 Yesu walamwambileti, “Nkacaina kupa bakabwa cakulya cabana.”
MAT 15:27 Mutukashi usa walambeti, “Ee, nicakubinga Nkambo, nomba ntepasa bakabwa bakute nabo kubweselela bilalakanga panshi alyanga mwine ng'anda.”
MAT 15:28 Nendi Yesu walambeti, “Obe mutukashi lushomo lwakobe ni lunene, cinshike nditu ncolayandanga.” Popelapo mwanendi mutukashi usa walabacena.
MAT 15:29 Kufumapo, Yesu walaya kwendana mu mbali mwa lwenje lwa Galileya, kayi walatanta mulundu ne kwikala panshi kopeloko.
MAT 15:30 Nomba bantu bangi balesa kuli Yesu, balamuletela balwashi, balema myendo ne bashipilwa ne balemana ne bacibulu ne nabambi. mpobalikubaleta pantangu pakendi, walikabasengula bonse.
MAT 15:31 Lino bantu bangi balakankamana, pakubona bacibulu kabamba, balemana kabasengulwa, balema myendo basa kabenda, kayi bashipilwa kabacikonsha kubona, neco balamutembaula Lesa wa Baislayeli.
MAT 15:32 Yesu walakuwa beshikwiya bakendi nekubambileti, “Ame ndabanyumfwilinga luse bantu aba, pakwinga balekala ne njame kwa masuba atatu, kayi kwakubula cakulya. Nkansuni kubambileti, benga kwabo ne nsala kabatana balyapo, pakwinga ngabawisuka bayanga munshila.”
MAT 15:33 Beshikwiya bakendi balamwipusheti, “Inga kucisuwa kuno ngatucicana kupeyo cakulya celela kukwana bantu bangi cisa?”
MAT 15:34 Nendi Yesu walabepusheti, “Inga mukuteko shinkwa ungaye?” Balo balamukumbuleti, “Usanu ne ubili, kayi ne tunswi twakubelengowa.”
MAT 15:35 Yesu walabambila bantu basa kwambeti bekale panshi.
MAT 15:36 Panyuma pakendi walamanta shinkwa usanu ne ubili usa ne nswi, walalumba Lesa, ne kukomona komona shinkwa, walapa beshikwiya bakendi, nabo balayabila bantu.
MAT 15:37 Bantu bonse balalya, balekuta. Balayowela byalashalapo ne kwisusha mitanga isanu ne ibili.
MAT 15:38 Lino bantu bonse pamo balalya balikuba batuloba myanda makumi ana, kutabelengela kumo batukashi ne batwanike.
MAT 15:39 Panyuma pakulayana ne bantu basa, Yesu walatanta bwato walaya kucibela ca Magadani.
MAT 16:1 Kayi Bafalisi ne Basaduki nabambi balesa kuli Yesu kwisa kumwelekesha pakumwipusheti, abaleshe cishibisho ceshikufuma kwilu.
MAT 16:2 Nomba nendi Yesu walabambileti, “Mansailo mwaboneti kwilu kwafubela pyuu, mukute kwambeti lilo nibukace cena,
MAT 16:3 kayi bwaca mukute mwambeti, ‘Lelo niloke mfula yamabwe, pakwinga kwilu kwafubela ciyosha, kayi kuli makumbi ashipa mbii.’ Mukute kucikonsha kupandulula mbuli ncokulabonekenga kwilu ku makumbi, nomba cilalanga kupandulula bishibisho byapacindi cino.
MAT 16:4 Musemano wa bantu baipa, kayi babula lushomo, balayandanga cishibisho cishikukankamanisha? Paliyawa cishibisho ncoti bakapewe capita cisa ca Yona.” Yesu mpwalambeco walafumapo nekuya kumbi.
MAT 16:5 Mpobalikutampuka kuya kutala kwa lwenje, beshikwiya balalubako kumanta shinkwa.
MAT 16:6 Yesu walabambileti, “Mucenjele ne cishikufufumusha ca Bafalisi neca Basaduki.”
MAT 16:7 Beshikwiya bakendi balatatika kwamba pa lwabo beneti, lambangeco pakwinga tuliya kumanta shinkwa.
MAT 16:8 Yesu walenshiba ncobalikwamba, neco walabepusheti, “Inga nipacebo cini ncomulambilingeti muliya shinkwa? Kucepa lushomo ndomukute mobantu amwe.
MAT 16:9 Mpaka pacino cindi mobantu amwe mucili mungubi? Sena nkamulanukunga kwambeti, ne shinkwa usanu, ndalalyesha bantu myanda makumi asanu? Inga mwalesusha mitanga ingaye ya byashalapo?
MAT 16:10 Pacindi nacimo cisa ne shinkwa usanu ne ubili ndalalyesha bantu myanda makumi ana, inga mwalesusha mitanga ingaye ya byashalapo?
MAT 16:11 Cilamwalilingeconi kwinshibeti, nkandambanga sha shinkwa? Kamucenjelani ne cishikufufumusha ca Bafalisi ne Basaduki.”
MAT 16:12 Apa lino empobaleshibeti, Yesu nkalikwambeti bacenjele ne cishikufufumusha shinkwa, nsombi kwambeti bacenjele ne biyisho bya Bafalisi ne Ba saduki.
MAT 16:13 Yesu mpwalashika ku bibela bya Kaisaleya waku Filipi, walabepusha beshikwiya bakendi, “Inga bantu balambangeti Mwana Muntu niyani?”
MAT 16:14 Balo balambeti, “Nabambi balambangeti Mwana Muntu ni Yohane mubatishi, nabambi eti Mwana Muntu ni Eliya nabambi, eti Mwana Muntu ni Yelemiya, nambi umo wa bashinshimi.”
MAT 16:15 Yesu walabepusha beshikwiya bakendi, “Inga amwe, mukute kwambeti ame njame bani?”
MAT 16:16 Nendi Shimoni Petulo walakumbuleti, “Amwe njamwe Klistu, Mwanendi Lesa muyumi”
MAT 16:17 Nendi Yesu walamwambileti, “Walelekwa njobe, Shimoni mwanendi Yona, pakwinga lakuyubulwili ici nte muntu sobwe, nsombi ni Bata balikwilu.
MAT 16:18 Ame ndambangeti, lino obe njobe Petulo, nomba palibwe lyacandanshi ili ninkebakepo mubungano. Kayi lufu nteti lukakomepo mubungano.
MAT 16:19 Ninkakupe makiyi akucalwisha Bwami bwakwilu, neco ncoti mukasungenga panshi pano, nicikasungwenga ne kwilu, kayi ibyo mbyoti mukasungululenga panshi pano, nibikasungululwenga ne kwilu.”
MAT 16:20 Yesu mpwalambeco walabambila beshikwiya eti, kabatambilanga bantu kwambeti endiye Klistu.
MAT 16:21 Kufuma cindico, Yesu walatatika kubeshibishila limo beshikwiya bakendi kwambeti, “Ndelela kuya ku Yelusalemu, uko bamakulene Baciyuda, ne bamakulene ba beshimilumbo, ne beshikwiyisha milawo ya Mose, nkoti bakampenshe cikamba. Nibakanshine, nsombi pabusuba bwa butatu kayi ninkapundushiwe kubuyumi.”
MAT 16:22 Petulo mpwalanyumfweco, walamumanta Yesu pambali ne kumukansa, walambeti, “Sobwe Nkambo, ici kacitenshika, Lesa katacisuminisha kwambeti cinshike,”
MAT 16:23 Nendi Yesu walacebuka ne kumukalalila Petulo mwangofu, walambeti, “Fumapa, Satana obe! Ulayandanga kuncimwisha! Kuyeya kwakobe nteko kwa Lesa sobwe, nsombi ni kwabuntu.”
MAT 16:24 Yesu mpwalambeco, beshikwiya bakendi walabambileti, “Muntu layandanga kukonka ame, alikane mwine, kayi alimantile mwine lusanda ankonke.
MAT 16:25 Pakwinga layandanga kupulusha buyumi bwakendi nakabutaye. Nomba uyo latayanga buyumi bwakendi pacebo cakame, nakabucane.
MAT 16:26 Inga nicani ncenga ucanapo, na muntu uba ne bintu byonse byapano pacishi, nomba nendi usomekapo kabeshi ne kutaya buyumi bwakendi? Anu muntu ngaubenga cani kwambeti alubule buyumi bwakendi?”
MAT 16:27 Neco nditu Mwana Muntu lakesanga pamo ne bangelo bakendi mubulemu bwa Baishi. Popelapo nakabweshele muntu uliyense kwelana ne ncito shakendi.
MAT 16:28 Cakubinga ndamwambilishingeti, popele pano mpobali nabambi beti bakabule kufwa, kabatana bamubona Mwana Muntu kesa mubulemu bwa Bwami.
MAT 17:1 Mpopalapita masuba asanu ne limo, Yesu walamantapo Petulo, Jemusi ne Yohane mukwabo, walatanta nabo pamulundu utali kwabonka.
MAT 17:2 Lino cinso ca Yesu calasanduka kababona, cinso cakendi calabala tuu mbuli lisuba, ne byakufwala byakendi byalabeka mbee.
MAT 17:3 Popelapo Mose ne Eliya balabonekela kulyendibo kababandika ne Yesu.
MAT 17:4 Mpwalaboneco, Petulo walambila Yesu, kwambeti, “Nkambo, cilabacena kwambeti, mpotuli pano, anu na kamusuni, nitwibake mishasha itatu, umo wenu, naumbi wa Mose, naumbi ube wa Eliya.”
MAT 17:5 Kacambeco likumbi lituba lyalesa kubafwekelela, umo mulikumbi mwalanyumfwika Liswi lyakwambeti, “Uyu e Mwaname ngonsuni, mulyendiye ndakondwa, Kamumunyumfwilani.”
MAT 17:6 Mpobalanyumfweco, beshikwiya basa balatina kwine, balawa panshi cakufulumana.
MAT 17:7 Nomba Yesu walesa kubekata, ne kwambeti, “Pundukani kamutaba ne buyowa.”
MAT 17:8 Nomba mpobalenamuka, paliya muntu ngobalabonapo sobwe, nsombi Yesu enka.
MAT 17:9 Mpobalikuseluka pa mulundu usa Yesu walabambileti, “Mbyomulabono mucimbonimboni, kamutaya mwambileko uliyense, mpaka Mwana Muntu akapundushiwe kubafu.”
MAT 17:10 Beshikwiya basa balamwipusheti, “Inga nipacebo cini beshikwiyisha milawo ya Mose ncobakute kwambileti, Eliya ewelela kutanguna kwisa?”
MAT 17:11 Yesu walambeti, “Nicakubinga Eliya ewelela kutanguna kwisa kubamba bintu byonse.
MAT 17:12 Nomba ndamwambilishingeti, Eliya walesa kendi, bantu ebabula kumwingashila, nsombi balamwinshila bintu byonse mbyobalikuyanda kulyendiye. Nicimo cimo Mwana Muntu nendi nibakamupenshe.”
MAT 17:13 Popelapo beshikwiya balenshibeti wambanga sha Yohane mubatishi.
MAT 17:14 Mpobalabwelela kusa kwalikuba likoto lyabantu, naumbi muntu walesa kusuntama kuli Yesu,
MAT 17:15 walambeti, “Nkambo kamumunyumfwilako nkumbo, mwaname ukute bulwashi bwa kashita, lapenge, cindi conse ukute kuwila pamulilo, ne pamenshi.
MAT 17:16 Ndanga ndesa nendi kuli beshikwiya benu aba, nomba balalilwa kumusengula.”
MAT 17:17 Yesu walambeti, “Ha! Amwe musemano wa bantu babula lushomo, bamiyeyo yalunkanwa, ninjikale nenu kushika cindi cini sena? Ndelela kulishishibisha kushika cindi citali cilyeconi sena? Kamumuletani kuno uyo mwana.”
MAT 17:18 Yesu walaukalalila mushimu waipa, popelapo walafuma mu mwana. Pacindi copeleco walaba cena.
MAT 17:19 Panyuma pakendi beshikwiya balesa kuli Yesu pambali ne kumwipusheti, “Inga twalilwaconi afwe kupulisha mushimu waipa usa?”
