MAR 16:6 Nomba nendi walabambileti, “Kamutakankamana, ndicinsheti mulalangaulunga Yesu waku Nasaleti usa wanga wapopwa palusanda, Lapunduku kubafu, nkalimo sobwe, kamwisani mulibonene mobene mukati muno mobanga bamubika.
MAR 16:7 Lino kamuyani mwambile beshikwiya bakendi ne Petulo kwambeti, nendi latangunu kendi kuya ku Galileya nkweshi mwenga mumubone mbuli ncalamwambila.”
MAR 16:8 Balapula mumanda ne kufwamba kufumako ku manda kabatutuma,ne kukankamana, neco paliya muntu ngobalambilako, pakwinga balekatwa ne buyowa.
MAR 16:9 Lino Yesu mpwalapunduka pasondo mumenemene, walabonekela nanshi kuli Maliya Magadala usa ngwalapulishamo mishimu yaipa isanu ne ibili.
MAR 16:10 Mutukashuyu walaya kwambila abo mbwali kuba nabo Yesu, pakwinga balikuba baungumana kabalila.
MAR 16:11 Nomba mpobalanyumfweti nimuyumi, kayi labonekele kulyendiye, balakana kushoma sobwe.
MAR 16:12 Panyuma pakendi walabonekela kubantu babili mucinso cimbi, mpobalikwenda kabaya kumunshi.
MAR 16:13 Aba bantu balabwelela kuya kwambila beshikwiya, nomba naboyo baliya kubashoma sobwe.
MAR 16:14 Panyuma pakendi kayi walabonekela kuli beshikwiya likumi ne umo pacindi ncobalikulya cakulya patebulu, nomba walabakalalila pacebo ca kubula lushomo, pakwinga myoyo yabo yalikuba yayuma, baliya kushoma mpobalambilwa ne bantu balamubona mpwalapundushiwa kubafu.
MAR 16:15 Nomba nendi walabambileti, “Kamuyani mukambauke Mulumbe Waina mu cishi conse, ku mishobo yonse ya bantu.
MAR 16:16 Abo betibashomenga ne kubatishiwa beti bakapuluke, nomba beti bakabule kushoma beti bakacanike ne mulandu.
MAR 16:17 Abo bashoma nibakaleshenga bingashilo ibi, mulina lyakame nibakapulishenga mishimu yaipa, nibakambenga mumilaka yensu.
MAR 16:18 Nibakamantenga njoka mumakasa, nambi banwa cintu ciliconse cikute mutondo nteti bakakolewe sobwe, nibakabikenga makasa pa balwashi, nabo nibakabe cena.”
MAR 16:19 (Neco Mwami Yesu mpwalapwisha kwamba nabo, walamantwa kuya kwilu, ne kuya kwikala kucikasa cakululyo ca Lesa.
MAR 16:20 Lino balaya kukambauka kulikonse, Mwami walikusebensa nabo, kushininkisheti kukambauka kwabo kwalikuba kwa ncinencine kupitila mu bingashilo byalikwinshika.)
LUK 1:1 Teofilo Walemekwa, bantu bangi balelekesha kwambeti balembe sha makani abintu ibyo byalenshika pakati petu,
LUK 1:2 balalemba mbuli ncobalambilwa kuli bakamboni balabona bintu ibyo mpobyalatatikila kwinshika. abo ebalikukambauka Mulumbe uwo.
LUK 1:3 Pabintu byonse ibi ndalepushisha mwabuya, kufuma pacindi ncobyalatatika kwinshika, neco ndayeye kwambeti ndimulembele mbuli mobyakonkanilana.
LUK 1:4 Ndenshici kwambeti mwinshibe cakubinga pali byonse mbyobalamwambila.
LUK 1:5 Pacindi mwami Helode mpwalikuba muleli wacishi ca Yudeya kwalikuba shimilumbo walikukwiweti Sakaliya, wamukalikoto ka beshimilumbo ka Abija. Mukashendi Sakaliya walikuba Lisabeti wa mumukowa wa Aloni.
LUK 1:6 Bonse babili balikuba bantu beshikunyumfwila Lesa, kayi bali kukonkela Milawo ne byonse Lesa mbyalikuyandeti babinse.
LUK 1:7 Nomba nkabalikukutepo mwana, pakwinga Lisabeti walikuba cumba kayi balikuba balacekulu.
LUK 1:8 Busuba nabumbi, Sakaliya walikusebensa ncito yakendi yabushimilumbo mu Ng'anda ya Lesa. Pakwinga bwalikuba busuba bwalikoto lyakendi.
LUK 1:9 Lino kwelana ne cinga ca beshimilumbo, balasala Sakaliya kwambeti ayenga mu Ng'anda ya Lesa kuya kutenta lubani.
LUK 1:10 Pacindi Sakaliya mpwalikutenta lubani, likoto lya bantu balikuba pansa kabapaila.
LUK 1:11 Lino mwakutayeyela Sakaliya walabona mungelo wa Mwami, kali wemana kulubasu lwalulyo lwanteme pali kutentelwa lubani.
LUK 1:12 Sakaliya walakankamana nekutina.
LUK 1:13 Nsombi mungelo uyo walamwambileti, “Kotatina Sakaliya, Lesa lanyumfu kupaila kwakobe, neco mukashobe lisabeti nakakusemene mwana mutuloba ukamutumbe lineti Yohane.
LUK 1:14 Nakakukondweleshe ne kukusangalasha cikamba, kayi bantu bangi naboyo nibakakondwe pacebo cakusemwa kwakendi.
LUK 1:15 Pakwinga mwana uyo nakabe mukulene pamenso a Lesa, kayi nteshi akanwenga waini nambi byeshikukola. Nakakutenga ngofu sha Mushimu Uswepa nkacili mulibunda.
LUK 1:16 Uyu muntu nakenshisheti ba Isilayeli bangi bakabwele kuli Mwami Lesa wabo.
LUK 1:17 Yohane nakabe kuntangu kwa Mwami, kayi nakabe ne Mushimu nengofu mbuli shali kuba ne mushinshimi Eliya. Nakalete lunyufwano pakati pabana neba meshabo.” “Nakasandule bantu batanyumfwili Lesa kwambeti bakabe ne miyeyo ya bantu balulama. Nakabambe bantu ba Mwami kwambeti babenga balibambila.”
LUK 1:18 Sakaliya walepusha mungelo uyo, “Nomba nganjishibaconi kwambeti ncolambanga nicikenshike? Pakwinga ame ndacekulu neye mukashame lacekulu.”
LUK 1:19 Mungelo usa walakumbuleti, ame njame Gabiliyeli. Nkute kwimana pamenso a Lesa cindi conse. Nendi elantumu kwambeti nkwambile bintu ibi.
LUK 1:20 Nomba pakwinga uliya kushoma mulumbe uyu ngondamba weti ukenshike pacindi celela, nube cibulu nteti ucikonshenga kwamba, mpaka ibi bintu bikenshike.
LUK 1:21 Pacindi ico bantu balikupembelela Sakaliya balakankamana nkabepushanyeti nicani lamanta cindi citali mu Ng'anda ya Lesa?
LUK 1:22 Lino mpwalapula pansa nkalikucikonsha kwamba nabo. Nomba nabo balenshiba kwambeti labono cimboni mboni, popelapo walatatika kwamba ne makasa mbuli cibulu, neco walapitilisha kuba cibulu.
LUK 1:23 Mpwalapwa masuba akusebensa mu Ng'anda ya Lesa, Sakaliya walaya kucomwabo.
LUK 1:24 Panyuma pakendi Lisabeti walemita, lino nkalikupulapula mu ng'anda kwamyenshi isanu nkambeti,
LUK 1:25 “Lesa lino lanyumfwili inkumbo pakunyinshileci lafunyu insoni shakame pamenso abantu.”
LUK 1:26 Mumwenshi wacisanu ne umo kufuma mpwalemita Lisabeti, Lesa walatuma mungelo Gabiliyeli ku munshi naumbi waku Galileya, walikukwiweti Nasaleti.
LUK 1:27 Walaya ku mulindu walikukwiweti Maliya. Maliya walikuba wamamikilwa kumutuloba lina lyakendi ni Yosefe wa mumukowa wa Dafeti.
LUK 1:28 Mungelo mpwalashika kuli Maliya walambeti, mitende obe walelekwa ne Lesa. Lesa uli ne njobe.
LUK 1:29 Maliya mpwalanyumfwa maswi a mungelo walatilimuka walipusha mumoyo wakendi eti, “Nikupa mitende kwamushobo cini uku?”
LUK 1:30 Popelapo mungelo walamwambileti, “Kotatina, Maliya; Pakwinga Lesa lakunyumfwili inkumbo.
LUK 1:31 Bona nukemite ne kusema mwana mutuloba ukamutumbeti Yesu.
LUK 1:32 “Nakabe mukulene kayi nakakwiweti mwanendi Lesa wakwilu wapitapo. Mwami Lesa nakamupe cipuna ca bwami ca Dafeti.
LUK 1:33 Nakabe Mwami wa ba Islaeli kucindi conse ne bwendeleshi bwakendi nteshi bukapwepo!”
LUK 1:34 Lino, Maliya walamwipusha Mungelo eti, “Nomba ici ngacinshika econi ame nkana nkumanapo ne mutuloba?”
LUK 1:35 Mungelo walakumbuleti, Mushimu Uswepa nukese palinjobe nengofu sha Lesa wapita byonse nishikakufwekelele. Neco mwana eshi akasemwe nakakwiweti waswepa, Mwanendi Lesa.
LUK 1:36 “Bona mukwenu Lisabeti usa walikwambweti nkaseme, lino lapembelenga kuya kuba ne mwana mutuloba mubucembele bwakendi. Pakwinga ukute myenshi isanu ne umo kakute libunda.
LUK 1:37 Pakwinga paliya ceshi cikamwalile Lesa.”
LUK 1:38 Maliya walakumbuleti, “Kacinshika mbuli momulambili, pakwinga ame ndemusha wa Mwami.” Lino mungelo usa walamushiya.
LUK 1:39 Mpopalapita masuba ang'ana, Maliya walanyamuka bulwendo bwakufwambana kuya kumusena wa milundu, kumunshi wa Yudeya.
LUK 1:40 Walengila mung'anda ya Sakaliya nekumupa mutende Lisabeti.
LUK 1:41 Pacindi Lisabeti mpwalanyumfwa mutende wa Maliya, mwana walatatika kunyanyala mwakukondwa mulibunda mwakendi. Lisabeti walesushiwa ne ngofu sha Mushimu Uswepa,
LUK 1:42 kayi walolobesha ne kwambeti, “Ukute colwe pakati pa batukashi bonse, kayi mwanobe weshi akasemwe walelekwa.
LUK 1:43 Anu njame bani kwambeti mfwakashilwe ne banyina Mwami wakame?
LUK 1:44 Pakwinga mpondalanyumfowa mutende wenu, mwana walatatika kunyanyala mwakukondwa mulibunda mwakame.
LUK 1:45 Ukute colwe pakwinga walashoma kwambeti makani Lesa ayo ngowalambilwa nakubinga nakenshike.”
LUK 1:46 Popelapo Maliya walalumbaisha nekwambeti, “Ndalumbu Mwami mumoyo mwakame,
LUK 1:47 Kayi mushimu wakame wakondwa muli Lesa Mupulushi wakame.
LUK 1:48 Pakwinga labono kulicepesha kwakame ndemusha wakendi kufuma lelo, bantu bonse pacishi ca panshi nibakankuweti walelekwa.
LUK 1:49 Pakwinga nendi Lesa wangofu shonse lanjinshili bintu binene, lina lyakendi lyaswepa.
LUK 1:50 Kayi inkumbo shakendi shili pali bonse bantu abo bakute kumulemeka kufuma kumusemano kushika kumusemano naumbi.
LUK 1:51 Likasa lyakendi lilenshi bintu binene byangofu byeshi kukankamanisha, lamwaya bantu bakute miyeyo ya kulisumpula.
LUK 1:52 Lafunyu Bami bangofu shinene pabipuna byabo, nekusumpula abo beshi kulicepesha.
LUK 1:53 Lapa bantu bakute nsala bintu bingi kwambeti bekute, Lababweshe babile kwakubula kubapapo kantu kalikonse.
LUK 1:54 Lanyamfwa Islaeli musebenshi wakendi kayi uliya kuluba kumwinshila inkumbo
LUK 1:55 mbuli ncalalaya bamashali betu bakulukulu, Abulahamu ne bashikulu bakendi mpaka muyayaya.”
LUK 1:56 Maliya walekala ne Lisabeti myenshi yanda kukwana itatu, panyuma pakendi walabwelela kucomwabo.
LUK 1:57 Lino cindi cakwambeti Lisabeti atumbuke calakwana, walasema mwana mutuloba.
LUK 1:58 Beshikamukowa ne banendi mpobalanyufwa mbuli Mwami ncalamubela inkumbo Lisabeti balakondwa pamo bonse ne ndiye.
LUK 1:59 Mwana usa mpwalakwanisha nsondo ne busuba bumo balesa kwambeti bamwelule, kayi bamutumbe lina lyabaishi ba Sakaliya,
LUK 1:60 nsombi banyina balakana kwambeti, “Welela kukwiweti Yohane.”
LUK 1:61 Balo bantu balamukumbuleti, “Nomba kuliyawa ukute lina lyamushoboyo kubeshi kamukowa.”
LUK 1:62 Lino balambila baishi ne makasa, ne kubepusheti, “Mulandanga tumutumbe lina cini?”
LUK 1:63 Popelapo Sakaliya walasebensesha makasa pakusenga cakulembelapo, ne kulembeti, “Lina lyakendi ni Yohane.” Bantu bonse balakankamana.
LUK 1:64 Mpwalapwishowa kulemba Sakaliya walatatika kwamba, nekutatika kulumbaisha Lesa.
LUK 1:65 Bantu bonse balatina abo balikuba bekala pepi nendiye. Neco lulumbi ulo lwalamwaika mucishi conse ca tulundu twa mu Yudeya.
LUK 1:66 Bonse abo balanyufwa mulumbe uyo bali kabayeya mumyoyo yabo kayi ne kulipusheti, “Uyu mwana nakabe wamushobo cini?” Pakwinga cilabonekelenga limo kwambeti ngofu sha Lesa shili pali endiye.
LUK 1:67 Lino Sakaliya baishi Yohane, walesushiwa ne ngofu sha Mushimu Uswepa nekutatika kwambeti,
LUK 1:68 “Alumbaishiwe Mwami Lesa wa ba Islaeli, Pakwinga Lesa lanyamfwa bantu bakendi ne kubapulusha.
LUK 1:69 Latupa mupulushi ukute ngofu, walafuma mulibunda lya Dafeti musebenshi wa Lesa.
LUK 1:70 Ibi walabyambila limo kupitila mubashinshimi bakendi baswepa bakeendi,
LUK 1:71 Kwambeti nakatupulushe kufuma mumakasa abalwani betu, ne kuli abo bonse batupata.
LUK 1:72 Walambeti, nakanyumfwile inkumbo bamashali betu bakeendi, kayi nteshi akalubeko cipangano cakendi caswepa.
LUK 1:73 Ncalalumbila kumushali wetu Abulahamu ne kumushomesheti,
LUK 1:74 nakatupulushe mumakasa abalwani betu, kwambeti tukamusebensele mwakubula buyowa,
LUK 1:75 Kayi tube baswepa nekuba balulama pamenso akendi, masuba onse abuyumi bwetu.
LUK 1:76 Lino mwana obe, nukakwiweti mushinshimi wa Lesa wa wangofu shonse, Pakwinga obe nukabe pantangu pa Mwami, akumubambila nshila.
LUK 1:77 Nukenshibishe bantu bakendi kwambeti, nibakapulushiwe kayi nekulekelelwa bwipishi bwabo.
LUK 1:78 Mwami Lesa wetu ukute nkumbo nakatupe mumuni wa kwilu ulyeti kutubuluka kwa kumaca.
LUK 1:79 nukabe mumuni weti ukamunikile bantu bonse bekala mu mushinshe wa lufu, nekututangunina mulumuno.”
LUK 1:80 Usa mwana Yohani walakula nekushimpa mumushimu. Walekala mucinyika kushikila busuba mpwalabonekela patuba kubantu mu Isilaeli.
LUK 2:1 Masuba ayo Agasita, mwami waku Loma walabika mulawo wakwambeti bantu bonse bali mubulelo bwa Loma balembwe.
LUK 2:2 Uku kwalikuba kulembesha kwakuyamba kwalenshika cindi Kwilinyasi mpwalikuba mwendeleshi wa cishi ca Siliya.
LUK 2:3 Lino bonse bantu balaya akulembesha umo ne umo kumunshi kucomwabo.
LUK 2:4 Yosefe neye walanyamuka kufuma ku Nasaleti munshi walikuba mucimpansha ca Galileya kuya kumunshi wa Dafeti, uko kwali kukwiweti Betelehemu, mucishi ca Yudeya, pakwinga walikuba wamulibunda lya Dafeti.
LUK 2:5 Walaya pamo ne Maliya uyo ngwalikuba wamamikila, kwambeti naboyo baye balembwe. Cindi ico Maliya walikuba wemita.
LUK 2:6 Kabacili kopeloko masuba akwambeti Maliya apulukemo alakwana,
LUK 2:7 walasema mwana wakwiya mutuloba. Walamupetelesha mubikwisa ne kumoneka mucibaya mwali kulyela ng'ombe, pakwinga nkakwalikuba musena mu ng'anda ya bensu.
LUK 2:8 Kucishi kopeloko kwalikuba bembeshi balikwembela mbelele shabo mashiku.
LUK 2:9 Mwakutayeyela, mungelo wa Mwami walabonekela kuli endibo. Kubala kwa bulemeneno bwa Mwami kwalabamunikila tuu! Lino balatina.
LUK 2:10 Nomba mungelo walabambileti, “Kamutatina pakwinga ndalete Mulumbe Waina weti ukondweleshe bantu bonse.
LUK 2:11 Mashiku alelo mumunshi wa mwami Dafeti mulasemwe Mupulushi wenu wananikwa uyo walaiwa, Klistu endiye Mwami.
LUK 2:12 Lino cishibisho cakendi nici; Nimuye mucane mwana kateta wafungailwa mubikwisa kaliwona mucibaya mwakulyela ng'ombe.”
LUK 2:13 Mwakutayeyela kwalabonekela likoto lya bangelo bangi ba kwilu pamo ne mungelo usa bali kulumbaisha Lesa kabambeti,
LUK 2:14 “Alumbwe Lesa wa kwilu wapitapo kayi panshi pabe lumuno pakati pa bantu Lesa mbakondwa nabo.”
LUK 2:15 Bangelo balabwelela kwilu, lino bembeshi balatatika kwambilaneti, “Katuyani tushikeko ku Betelehemu tuye tubone cilenshiki ico ncalatwambili Mwami.”
LUK 2:16 Lino balaya mwakufwambana, nekucana Maliya ne Yosefu boneka mwana mucibaya mwalikulyela ng'ombe.
LUK 2:17 Mpobalamubona, bembeshi basa balabamba byonse mbyalabambila mungelo usa pamwana walasemwa.
LUK 2:18 Bonse balanyumfwa makani ayo alambwa ne bembeshi balakankamana.
LUK 2:19 Maliya walapitilisha kubyanuka bintu byonse ibi kayi walinkabiyeyapo mumoyo wakendi cindi conse.
LUK 2:20 Bembeshi basa balabwelela, nkabalemeka nekulumbaisha Lesa pabyonse mbyobalanyufwa nekubona. Calenshika ndendende mbuli mwalabambilila Mungelo.
LUK 2:21 Mwana usa mpwalakwanisha masuba asanu ne atatu balamwelula nekumutumba lineti Yesu. Lina ndyalamba mungelo, Yesu nkatana aba mulibunda lyabanyina.
LUK 2:22 Mpocalashika cindi cakwambeti, Yosefe ne maliya bense mwambo wakuswepesha pakukonka Milawo Lesa njalapa Mose, mwanoyo balaya nendi ku Yelusalemu kwambeti bamubenge kuli Mwami.
LUK 2:23 Pakwinga calembwa mu Milawo Lesa njalapa Mose kwambeti, “Mwana uliyense mutuloba, wakwiya welela kubengwa kuli Lesa.”
LUK 2:24 Balaya akubenga mulumbo wa nkulimba shibili nambi bana ba baciba babili kwelana mbuli calembwa mu Milawo ya Lesa njalapa Mose.
LUK 2:25 Lino mu Yelusalemu mwalikuba muntu walikukwiweti Simyoni, walikuba muntu walikutina Lesa. kayi Mushimu Uswepa walikuba pali endiye. Walikupembelela cindi cakwambeti Lesa akapulushe Baislaeli.
LUK 2:26 Mushimu Uswepa walamuyubulwila kwambeti nteshi akafwe nkatanabona Klistu mupulushi walaiwa ne Lesa.
LUK 2:27 Busuba bumbi Mushimu Uswepa walamwambila simyoni kwambeti ayenga kung'anda ya Lesa. Bamashali ba Yesu balengila mu Ng'anda ya Lesa ne mwana kwambeti bamwinshile mwambo wa Milawo ya Lesa njalapa Mose.
LUK 2:28 Popelapo Simyoni walatambula mwana nekumufukatila mumakasa mwakendi ne kulumbaisha Lesa ne maswi akwambeti,
LUK 2:29 “Mwami, lino ndekeni ame musebenshi wenu, njenga mulumuno, pakwinga mulenshi ncomwalanshomesha.
LUK 2:30 Pakwinga menso akame alabono lupulusho lwenu,
LUK 2:31 lupulusho ulo ndomwalabamba, pamenso abantu bonse.
LUK 2:32 Uyu ni mumuni walambweti nukamunikile bantu ba mishobo naimbi, nekwambeti pakabe bulemeneno pa bantu benu Ba isilayeli.”
LUK 2:33 Baishi ne banyina balakankamana mpobalanyumfwa maswi ngalamba Simyoni pa mwana uyu.
LUK 2:34 Lino Simyoni walabaleleka nekwambila Maliya banyina mwana eti, uyu mwana walasalwa ne Lesa, “Kwambeti awishe ne kupundusha bangi pakati pa bantu ba mu Islayeli. Nakabe cishibisho catumwa ne Lesa, ico bantu bangi ncoti bakakane.
LUK 2:35 Neco miyeyo ili mumyoyo yabantu bangi, nikabonekele patuba. Nenjobe Maliya mapensho nakakwikate ne kuyasa kumuyo eti cibeshi.”
LUK 2:36 Kayi kwalikuba mushinshimi mutukashi mukalibingi lina lyakendi ni Ana. Walikuba mwanendi Faniwelo wa mulibunda lya Asha uyo walekala ne baibendi byaka bisanu ne bibili, Lino neye walikuba mucembele.
LUK 2:37 Pacindi co walikuba ne byaka makumi asanu ne atatu kayi ne byaka bina. Cindi conse walikwikala mu Ng'anda ya Lesa. Walikapaila kuli Lesa mashiku ne munshi kayi ni muntu walikulikanisha kulya.
LUK 2:38 Nendi mpwalashikako copeleco cindi, walatatika kulumbaisha Lesa, kambila bantu bonse sha mwana uyo ngobalikupembelela cindi Lesa mposhi akapulushe Yelusalemu.
LUK 2:39 Yosefe ne Maliya mpobalapwisha kwinsa byonse kwelana ne Milawo Lesa njalapa Mose, balabwelela kucomwabo ku Nasaleti mucishi ca Galileya.
LUK 2:40 Mwana usa walakula nekuba ne ngofu kayi walaba ne mano. Neco Lesa walamuleleka.
LUK 2:41 Bashali ba Yesu balikuya lyonse ku Yelusalemu mwaka ne mwaka akusekelela Pasika.
LUK 2:42 Yesu mpwalaba ne myaka likumi ne ibili, balaya kopeloko mbuli cinga cabo.
LUK 2:43 Mpobalapwisha kusekelela bala bwelela kucomwabo, Yesu walashala ku Yelusalemu, bashali bakendi nkabalenshiba.
LUK 2:44 Balo bashali bakendi bali kabayeyeti uli mulikoto lya bantu mbobali kuyanabo munshila, balenda musuma wa busuba bumo. Lino balatatika kumuyandaula kubamakwabo ne kubanabo.
LUK 2:45 Mpobalacaneti kuliyawa, balabwelela ku Yelusalemu kabaya akumulangola.
LUK 2:46 Balamucana mpopalapita masuba atatu mu Ng'anda ya Lesa, nkali ekala pakati pa beshikwiyisha, nkanyumfwila maswi abo kayi nkabepusha mipusho.
LUK 2:47 Bantu bonse balakankamana mpobalanyufwa mbuli mwalikubakumbulila ne mano.
LUK 2:48 Bashali bakendi mpobalamubona balakankamana. Lino banyina balamwipusheti, “Mwana obe, ulatwinshili cani cisa? Bona ame ne baiso tulashupiki kukuyandola.”
LUK 2:49 Yesu walakumbuleti, “Nomba nkamundangwela cani, sena nkamucishi kwambeti ndelela kuba mung'anda ya Bata?”
LUK 2:50 Balo baliya kunyufwishisha ncalabakumbula.
LUK 2:51 Lino Yesu walanyamuka nekuya nabo kucomwabo ku Nasaleti pakwinga walikunyumfwila banyina. Maliya walasunga bintu ibi byonse mumoyo wakendi.
LUK 2:52 Yesu walakula necimo ca mano kayi walaba mwana weshi kukondwelesha Lesa nebantu bonse.
LUK 3:1 Mu mwaka walikumi ne cisanu Tibelyo, mwami wa ku Loma. Pontiyasi Pilato pacindi ico walikuba emuleli wacishi ca Yudeya. Helodi neye walikuba muleli wa cishi ca Galileya. Filipo mukwabo Helodi, walikendelesha cishi ca Ituliya ne Tilakoniti. Lisaniya walikuba emuleli wa cishi ca Abilini.
LUK 3:2 Pa cindico Anasi ne Kayafa balikuba beshimilumbo bamakulene. Pacindi copeleci Lesa walamupa mulumbe Yohane mwanendi Sakaliya mucinyika.
LUK 3:3 Popelapo Yohane walaya akukambauka muminshi yonse yalikuba yashunguluka mulonga wa Yolodani, kabambileti, “Sandukani mu myoyo yenu, mubatishiwe, kwambeti Lesa amulekelele bwipishi bwenu.”
LUK 3:4 Ibi embyalamba mushinshimi Yesaya eti, “Muntu labilikishinga mucinyika lambangeti, ‘Kamubamba nshila ya mwami. Kamululamika nshila yakendi.
LUK 3:5 Misena yonse yakunama nikafukilwe, milundu ne bina byonse nibikacepeshewe. Nshila shapetuka petuka nishikalulamikwe. Sha byeshikupuntula nishikaswepe.
LUK 3:6 Lino mishobo yonse ya bantu nikabone lupulusho lwa Lesa!’ ”
LUK 3:7 Bantu bangi balaya nkwalikuba Yohane kwambeti enga ababatishe. Nomba nendi walabambileti, “Amwe omulyeti njoka, niyani lamucenjeshe kufwamba bukalu bwa Lesa bulesanga?
LUK 3:8 Kamwinsani milimo yaina yeshikulesha kwambeti mulasanduku myoyo yenu. Kamutambangeti, mwalulama pakwinga Abulahamu. ebameshenu. Ndamwambilinga Lesa ngausandula mabwe aya kuba banabendi Abulahamu.
LUK 3:9 Nomba lino kembe kakankwa kendi pamiyanda ya bitondo. Neco citondo cili conse citaseme bisepo byaina, nicikatemwe nekuciwala pamulilo.”
LUK 3:10 Nomba bantu balamwipusha Yohane eti, “Nomba lino twinse aconi?”
LUK 3:11 Nendi Yohane walambeti, “Uyo ukute byakulya apeko munendi wabula. Neye ukute byakufwala ense copeleco.”
LUK 3:12 Naboyo beshimisonko balikuyanda kubatishiwa, balamwipusha Yohane eti, “Shikwiyisha, nomba twinsenga cani?”
LUK 3:13 Nendi Yohane walabambileti, “Mutasonkeshanga mwelo wapitilila.”
LUK 3:14 Naboyo bashilikali balamwipusheti, “Nomba twinsenga cani?” Nendi Yohane walabambileti, “Mutalamunanga muntu cintu cakendi pakumuyosha nambi kumunanika mulandu. Amwe mali ngomulafolonga amukwanine.”
LUK 3:15 Pakwinga pacindici bantu bangi balikupembelela kwisa kwa Mupulushi Walaiwa ne Lesa, bantu balatatika kuyeyeti mpani Yohane eMupulushi usa Walaiwa ne Lesa.
LUK 3:16 Lino Yohane walabambila bonseti, “Ame ndamubatishinga ne menshi, nsombi lesanga wampita kayi nkandela kucikonsha kuba musha wakendi uyo wela kusungulula ntambo sha nkwabilo shakendi. Uyo nendi naka mubatishenga ne Mushimu Uswepa ne mulilo.
LUK 3:17 Nendi ukute cakupupulushilako maila mumakasa akendi kwambeti apupulushe nekwalongela mulyanga, Lino nakatente bungu bonse mumulilo utashimiki.”
LUK 3:18 Yohane walikukambauka Mulumbe Waina nekubacenjesha munshila shapusa pusana.
LUK 3:19 Nomba Yohane walakalalila mwami Helodi pacebo cakweba Helodyasi, muka mukwabo, ne pacebo ca bintu byaipa nabimbi mbyalikwinsa.
LUK 3:20 Kusankanya pabwipishi ubu, Helode walamusunga Yohane mujele.
LUK 3:21 Busuba nabumbi bantu bonse mpobalabatishiwa, neye Yesu walabatishiwa. Lino pacindi mpwali kupaila kwilu kwalacaluka,
LUK 3:22 Kai ne Mushimu Uswepa walikuboneketi nkulimba walaseluka nekwisa kwikala pali endiye. Ne liswi lyalanyumfwika kwilu eti, “Njobe mwaname ngonsuni mumoyo mwakame, pali njobe ndakondwa.”
LUK 3:23 Yesu walatatika incito yakendi yakwiyisha nkali ne myaka makumi atatu. Bantu balikumwambeti nimwana wa Yosefe, uyo walikuba mwana wa Eli,
LUK 3:24 Eli mwanendi Matati, Matati mwanendi Levi, Levi mwanendi Meliki, Meliki mwanendi janai, Janai mwanendi Yosefe,
LUK 3:25 Yosefe mwanendi Matayasi, Matayasi mwanendi Amosi, Amosi mwanendi Nahumu, Nahumu mwanendi Esili, Esili mwanendi Nagai,
LUK 3:26 Nagai mwanendi Mahati, Mahati mwanendi Matatiyasi, Matatiyasi mwanendi Semeine, Semeine mwanendi Yoseki, Yoseki mwanendi Yoda,
LUK 3:27 Yoda Mwanendi Yowanani, Yowanani mwanendi Lesa, Lesa mwanendi Zelubabelo, Zelubabelo mwanendi Seyalatyelo, Seyalatyelo mwanendi Neli,
LUK 3:28 Neli mwanendi Meluki, Meluki mwanendi Adi, Adi mwanendi Kosamu, Kosamu mwanendi Elimadamu, Elimadamu mwanendi Ele,
LUK 3:29 Ele mwanendi Yoshiwa, Yoshiwa mwanendi Eliyaza, Eliyaza mwanendi Yolimu, Yolimu mwanendi Matati, Matati mwanendi Levi,
LUK 3:30 Levi mwanendi Simyoni, Simyoni mwanendi Yudasi, Yudasi mwanendi Yosefe, Yosefe, mwanendi Yonamu, Yonamu mwanendi Eliyakimu,
LUK 3:31 Eliyakimu mwanendi Meliya, Meliya mwanendi Mena, Mena mwanendi Matata, Matata mwanendi Natamu, Natamu mwanendi Dafeti,
LUK 3:32 Dafeti mwanendi Yese, Yese mwanendi Obedi, Obedi mwanendi Bowasi, Bowasi mwanendi Sala, Sala mwanendi Nasoni,
LUK 3:33 Nasoni mwanendi Aminadabu, Aminadabu mwanendi Adimini, Adimini mwanendi Ani, Ani mwanendi Hesiloni, Hesiloni mwanendi Pelesi, Pelesi mwanendi Yuda,
LUK 3:34 Yuda mwanendi Yakobo, Yakobo mwanendi Isaki, Isaki mwanendi Abulahamu, Abulahamu mwanendi Tela, Tela mwanendi Naholi,
LUK 3:35 Naholi mwanendi Selaki, Selaki mwanendi Leu, Leu mwanendi Pelegi, Pelegi mwanendi Eba, Eba mwanendi Sela,
LUK 3:36 Sela mwanendi Kainani, Kainani mwanendi Alifakisadi, Alifakisadi mwanendi Semu, Semu mwanendi Nowa, Nowa mwanendi Lameki,
LUK 3:37 Lameki mwanendi Metusela, Metusela mwanendi Enoki, Enoki mwanendi Yaledi, Yaledi mwanendi Mahalale, Mahalale mwanendi Kenani,
LUK 3:38 Kenani mwanendi Enosi, Enosi mwanendi Seti, Seti mwanendi Adamu, Adamu mwanendi Lesa.
LUK 4:1 Yesu walafumako kumulonga wa Yolodani kaliwesula ne Mushimu Uswepa. Kayi Mushimu Uswepa walamutangunina kuya mucinyika,
LUK 4:2 umo mucinyika walekalamo masuba makumi ana kasunkwa ne Satana, kayi nkalalyapo kantu kalikonse. Lino masubayo mpwalapwa Yesu walanyumfwa nsala.
LUK 4:3 Lino Satana walamwambileti, “Na njobe mwanendi Lesa, ambila libwe ili lisanduke shinkwa.”
LUK 4:4 Yesu walakumbuleti, “Calembwa mu Maswi a Lesa eti, muntu nkela kuba ne buyumi mubyakulya byonka.”
LUK 4:5 Kufumapo Satana walamumanta Yesu nekumutwala pa mulundu nekumulesha bwami bonse bwa mu cishi ca panshi mucindi cing'ana.
LUK 4:6 Lino Satana walambila Yesu eti, “Ubu bonse bwami ne bulemu bwakendi ngankupa, pakwinga bonse bwalapewa kuli njame. Nkute ngofu shakupa muntu ngonsuni.
LUK 4:7 Lino ndakwambilinga na umfukamine ekwambeti, bonse bulelo ubu nibube bwakobe.”
LUK 4:8 Yesu walamukumbuleti, “Calembwa mu Maswi a Lesa eti, fukamina Mwami Lesa wakobe enka nekumusebensela!”
LUK 4:9 Kumapwilisho Satana walamutwala Yesu ku Yelusalemu nekumubika pa Ng'anda ya Lesa. Nekumwambileti, “Na omwanendi Lesa liwale panshi,
LUK 4:10 pakwinga calembwa mu Maswi a Lesa eti, ‘Lesa nakatume bangelo bakendi kwambeti bakutabe,’
LUK 4:11 Nibakakubake mumakasa “Kwambeti utalilinga kucimpanta cakobe pamabwe.”
LUK 4:12 Nomba Yesu walambeti, “Calembwa mu Maswi a Lesa eti, ‘Utasunka Mwami, Lesa wakobe.’ ”
LUK 4:13 Nomba Satana mpwalapwisha kumusunka Yesu munshila iliyonse, walamushiya kwambeti akamukonke cindi nacimbi.
LUK 4:14 Yesu walabwelela ku Galileya kakute ngofu sha Mushimu Uswepa. Lulumbi lwakendi lwalaya mucishi conseco.
LUK 4:15 Walikeyisha mumanda akupaililamo aba Yuda, kayi bantu bonse balamulemeka.
LUK 4:16 Yesu walaya ku Nasaleti uko nkwalakulila. Kayi pabusuba bwa Sabata walengila mung'anda yakupaililamo, pakwinga ecalikuba cinga cakendi, walemana kwambeti abelenge Maswi,
LUK 4:17 balamupa libuku lya mushinshimi Yesaya. Lino neye walacalula libuku ilyo nekucana palembweti,
LUK 4:18 “Mushimu wa Mwami Lesa uli pali njame. Pakwinga lansala kwambeti ndibambile mulumbe waina bapenshi. Lantumu kwambeti ndibambile basungwa eti basungululwe, bampofu babone, bantu bashantililwa balubulwe.
LUK 4:19 Kayi lantumu kuya kubambileti, cindi cilashiki ncoti Lesa akapulushe bantu bakendi.”
LUK 4:20 Yesu mpwalapwisha walifweka libuku nekupa shimilumbo wa mung'anda yakupaililamo yaba Yuda, nekwikala panshi. Bantu bonse balikuba mung'anda balamulangilisha.
LUK 4:21 Lino Yesu walabambileti, “Lelo maswi awa ngomulanyumfu alakwanilishiwa”
LUK 4:22 Bantu bonse balamulumbaisha kayi balakankamana ne maswi ngalikwamba mwamano, neco bantu balambeti “Sena uyu nte mwanendi Yosefe?”
LUK 4:23 Lino Yesu walabambileti, “Cancinencine nimukambengeti, ‘mung'anga, lipulushe wenka.’ Kayi nimukambengeti, ‘Twalanyumfwa ncowalensa ku Kapelenawo,nako kuno lino linshile omwine.’
LUK 4:24 Ndamwambilinga cakubinga, mushinshimi nkakute kutambulwa cena ne bantu bakumunshi kucomwabo.
LUK 4:25 “Lino kamunyufwani, mumasuba a Eliya kwalikuba ba mukalubingi bangi balikuyanda lunyamfwo mu Isilaeli, mpokwalaba cilala kwa myaka itatu ne myenshi isanu ne umo mpokwalaba nsala mucishi conse.
LUK 4:26 Eliya uliya kutumwapo kumuntu uliyense palibasa bonse mu Islayeli, nsombi walatumwa ku mukalubingi mutukashi wakumunshi wa Zalefati, mucishi ca Sidoni.
LUK 4:27 Palikuba bantu bangi balikukolwa bulwashi bwamankuntu mu Isilaeli mumasuba amushinshimi Elisha. Nsombi Namani enka wa ku Siliya ewalasengulwa.”
LUK 4:28 Mpobalanyumfweco, bantu bonse balikuba mung'anda yakupaililamo balakalala.
LUK 4:29 Popelapo balanyamuka nekumukwekwanya kumufunya mumushi usa, nekumutwala pa mulundu mpobalikuba bebaka munshi wabo kwambeti bamuwale panshi.
LUK 4:30 Nomba nendi walapita pakati pa bantu nekuya.
LUK 4:31 Yesu walaya ku Kapelenawo, mumunshi wa mucishi ca Galileya walikayisha bantu pabusuba bwa Sabata.
LUK 4:32 Kwiyisha kwakendi, kwalekata myoyo yabantu pakwinga maswi akendi alalesha kwambeti akute ngofu sha bwendeleshi.
LUK 4:33 Mung'anda yakupailila mwalikuba muntu walikuba wekatwa ne mushimu waipa walolobesha ne liswi lyapelu eti,
LUK 4:34 “Anu tulamwinshi cani amwe Yesu wa ku Nasaleti? Sena mulesa kutononga? Ndamwinshibi njamwe Waswepa mutumwa wa Lesa!”
LUK 4:35 Lino Yesu walakalalila mushimu waipa eti, “Mwena, fuma mu muntuyu!” Neco mushimu waipa walamuwisha panshi pakati pa bantu nekufuma muli endiye cakubula kumulingapo.
LUK 4:36 Bantu bonse balakankamana nekwipushanyeti, “Anu ni maswi cini aya cakubinga nendi lambilinga mishimu yaipa cangofu nayoyo ilamunyumfwilinga nekufumamo.”
LUK 4:37 Neco lulumbi lwakendi lwalanyumfwika mumisena yonse yashunguluka cishi.
LUK 4:38 Lino Yesu walafumako ku ng'anda yakupaililamo nekuya ku ng'anda ya Shimoni. Kumakwendi Shimoni batukashi balikuba balwashi cimpwita. Lino bantu balasenga Yesu eti abashilike.
LUK 4:39 Neco Yesu walaya kwimana pepi nendiye walakalalila cimpwita, kofuma, cindi copeleco cimpwita calapwa. Kumakwendi abo balapunduka nekutatika kubabambila byakulya.
LUK 4:40 Lisuba mpolyalebila abo balikukute banabo balikuba ne malwashi apusana pusana, balabaleta kwalikuba Yesu. Walabekata ne makasa bonse balwashi, popelapo balaba cena.
LUK 4:41 Nayo mishimu yaipa yalikufuma mubantu bangi kayolobesheti, “Njobe mwanendi Lesa!” Nsombi nendi walaikalalila ne kwikanisha kwamba pakwinga yalikumwishibeti ni wasalwa wa Lesa.
LUK 4:42 Mpobwalaca Yesu walafuma ku Kapelenawo nekuya kubusena kwalikubula kwikala bantu. Bantu balatatika kumuyandaula, mpobalamucana balelesha kumusenga camakasa abili kwambeti ataya kumbi.
LUK 4:43 Nsombi nendi walabakumbuleti, “Ndelela kukambauka Mulumbe Waina wa Bwami bwa Lesa kuminshi imbi pakwinga encito njalantuma Lesa.”
LUK 4:44 Neco walikukambauka mumanda akupaililamo aku Yudeya onse.
LUK 5:1 Busuba nabumbi Yesu walikuba wemana mumbali mwa lwenje lwa Genesaleti. Bantu bangi bali kabanyakana kwambeti banyumfwe Maswi a Lesa.
LUK 5:2 Lino Yesu walabona mato abili asungwa mumbali, beshikushina inswi balikuba balafumumo kabasuka tombe twabo.
LUK 5:3 Yesu walengila mubwato bumo ubo bwalikuba bwa Shimoni, neye walasengeti abunyakileko pa lwenje. Walekala mubwato nekutatika kwiyisha bantu.
LUK 5:4 Mpwalapwisha kwiyisha, walambila Shimoni eti, “Bunyakileni bwato pakati, kwambeti muwale tombe twenu mumenshi mwikate inswi.”
LUK 5:5 Shimoni walakumbuleti, “Shikwiyisha, kufuma mashiku bulatucele tuliya kwikatapo inswi, pakwinga mulamba njamwe ningwale tombe.”
LUK 5:6 Lino balawala tombe twabo, nekwikata inswi shingi, tombe twabo twalatatika kupasuka.
LUK 5:7 Lino balakuwa banabo balikuba mubwato bumbi kwambeti bese babanyafweko kusabula, naboyo balesa, nomba balesusha mato abili nkayanda kwibila.
LUK 5:8 Shimoni Petulo mpwalaboneco walasuntama pantangu pa Yesu nekwambeti, “Kamundekelela Mwami Pakwinga ndeshikwinsa byaipa.”
LUK 5:9 Shimoni ne banendi balenseco pakwinga balakankamana pa kufula kwa inswi isho nshobalekata.
LUK 5:10 Neco Jemusi ne Yohane bana bendi Zebediya kayi nebanendi Shimoni, naboyo balakankamana. Lino Yesu walambila Shimoni eti, “Kotatina pakwinga kufuma lelo nube weshikwikata bantu.”
LUK 5:11 Popelapo balatanta mato ayo kuya kutala kwa mulonga, balashiya byonse nekunkokela Yesu.
LUK 5:12 Yesu mpwalikuba mumunshi naumbi walakumana ne muntu wali kukolwa bulwashi bwa mankuntu mubili wonse. Mpwalabona Yesu mulwashi uyu walasuntama kuntangu nekumusengeti, “Mwami ndicishi kwambeti mukute ngofu shakusengula nsenguleni.”
LUK 5:13 Yesu walatandabula likasa lyakendi, walamwikata ne kwambeti, “Ee ndayandanga, koba cena!” Popelapo mankuntu alapwa.
LUK 5:14 Kufumapo Yesu walamwambileti, “Konyumfwa, kotambila muntu nambi umo makani awa. Nomba obe ululame wenga kuli beshikwiyisha, uyenga ulileshe kuli beshimilumbo kwambeti ulaba cena. Uye ubenge bupe kwelana ne ncalamba Mose kwambeti bantu bashometi ulaba cena.”
LUK 5:15 Necikabeco impuwo ya Yesu yalanyumfwika kubantu bangi. Neco bantu balikwisa kuli endiye kwambeti banyumfwe Maswi akendi kayi nekubasengula malwashi abo.
LUK 5:16 Lino nendi Yesu walaya kwa enka akupaila.
LUK 5:17 Nabumbi busuba Yesu walikeyisha, popelapo palikuba Bafalisi ne beshikwiyisha milawo nabambi. Bantu aba balafuma muminshi yonse ya ku Galileya, ku Yudeya kayi neku Yelusalemu. Ngofu sha Lesa shalikuba muli Yesu kwambeti abasengule.
LUK 5:18 Kufumapo bantu nabambi balaleta mutuloba walikuba watontola mubili nkabali bamunyamuna pa mpasa. Balelesha kwambeti bamwingishe mu ng'andeti bamoneke pantangu pa Yesu.
LUK 5:19 Naboyo balikuyanda kumwingishila pacishinga, lino pakwinga bantu balafula balalilwa kwambeti bamutwale mukati. Neco balatanta nendi pa ciluli ca ng'anda ne kupasula mulyango, balamwingisha ne kumulelesha pampasa yakendi pakati pabantu ne kumushikisha pantangu pa Yesu.
LUK 5:20 Yesu mpwalabona kushoma kwakendi, “Walambeti, bwipishi bwakobe bulalekelelwa.”
LUK 5:21 Lino beshikwiyisha Milawo kayi ne Bafalisi balatatika kwipushaneti, “Nomba uyu niyani lanyashanga Lesa? Niyani welela kulekelela bwipishi sena nte Lesa enka?”
LUK 5:22 Lino Yesu walenshiba ncobalikuyeya mumyoyo yabo neku bepusheti, “Nomba mulayeyelenga cani bintu bya mushoboyo mu myoyo yenu?
LUK 5:23 Nicipeyo capuba kwambila muntu eti, ‘Bwipishi bwakobe bulalekelelwa,’ Nambi kwambeti, ‘Nyamuka, wende’
LUK 5:24 Lino ndayandanga kumwambileti mwinshibe kwambeti mwana muntu ukute ngofu shakulekelela bwipishi pacishi ca panshi.” Kufumapo walambila usa watontola mubileti, “Ndakwambilinga, nyamuka, manta mpasa yakobe wenga kucomwenu.”
LUK 5:25 Popelapo walapunduka bonse kabalanga nemenso abo, walamanta mpasa mpwalikuba wona nekutatika kuya nkalumbaisha Lesa.
LUK 5:26 Bantu bonse balakankamana kayi balatina. Lino balatatika kulumbaisha Lesa ne kwambeti, “Ici ncotulabono lelo, nkatutana tucibonapo sobwe.”
LUK 5:27 Popelapo Yesu walafuma pansa nekubona weshikusonkesha musonko walikukwiweti Levi, nkali ekala mu ng'anda yamusonko.Yesu walamwambileti, “Nkonkele.”
LUK 5:28 Popelapo neye walanyamuka, nekushiya byonse nekumukonkela.
LUK 5:29 Lino Levi walabamba byakulya bingi kwambeti basekelele ne Yesu mu ng'anda yakendi. Kwalikuba beshikusonkesha misonko bangi ne bantu nabambi kabalya pamo.
LUK 5:30 Bafalisi nabambi ne beshikwiyisha milawo balatatika kudandaulila beshikwiya ba Yesu eti, “Nomba nicani mulalyelenga nekunwa pamo ne beshikusonkesha kayi ne bantu babwipishi?”
LUK 5:31 Lino Yesu walabakumbuleti, “Bayumi nkabakute kulangaula mu ng'anga sobwe, nsombi balwashi.
LUK 5:32 Ndiya kwishila balulama nsombi babwipishi kwambeti basanduke mu myoyo yabo.”
LUK 5:33 Bantu nabambi balepusha Yesu eti, “Beshikwiya ba Yohane mubatishi bali kuba necindi cakulikanisha kulya nekupaila, naboyo beshikwiya ba Bafalisi bangi balikwinsa copeleco, bakobe baliya cindi camushoboyo, balo bakute kulya ne kunwowa.”
LUK 5:34 Lino Yesu walabakumuleti, “Sena balikubwinga ingamubakakatisha kutalya nebanabo, shibwinga kacilipo? Sobwe!
LUK 5:35 Nsombi cindi nicikashike shibwinga mpoti bakamufunyepo pali endibo, Lino ico cindi nibakalikanishe kulya.”
LUK 5:36 Kufumapo Yesu walabambila cikoshanisho eti, “Kuliya muntu welela kukwamuna cimami cacikwisa caina nekutunga pa cakufwala cakeendi. Nkela kwinseco pakwinga naco ngacononga cikwisa kayi cimami nkacela kwendelana pacakufwala ico sobwe.
LUK 5:37 Kuliya muntu welela kubika waini walino lino munkomwa yacipaya cakendi. Nalabikimo waini walino lino ukute kupasula nkomwa. Waini wonse ngawitika ne konongeka.
LUK 5:38 Nomba waini walino lino welela kubikiwa mucinkuli calino lino.
LUK 5:39 Kuliya muntu welela kuyanda kunwa waini walino lino na lanu waini wakaindi pakwinga mukute kwambeti, ‘Usa wakaindi ewaina.’”
LUK 6:1 Busuba nabumbi pa Sabata Yesu ne beshikwiya bakendi balikwenda kabapita mumabala a Maila. Beshikwiya bakendi balatatika kuyapa ngala sha Maila ne kushipikisa mumakasa nkabalya.
LUK 6:2 Kufumapo Bafalisi nabambi balepusheti, “Nomba mulenshilinga cani bintu byabula kusuminishiwa pabusuba bwa Sabata?”
LUK 6:3 Yesu walakumbuleti, “Sena muliya kubelengapo calensa Dafeti pacindi mpwalanyumfwa nsala ne banendi?
LUK 6:4 Walengila mu Ng'anda ya Lesa nekumanta shinkwa waswepa. Walalya nebanendi shinkwa uyo weshikulyewowa ne beshimilumbo bonka kwelana ne milawo yabo.”
LUK 6:5 Lino Yesu walabambileti, “Ame nde Mwana Muntu njame ndemwine busuba bwa Sabata.”
LUK 6:6 Nabumbi busuba pa Sabata, Yesu walengila mung'anda yakupaililamo kuya kwiyisha. Mung'anda umo mwalikuba mutuloba watontola likasa lyalulyo.
LUK 6:7 Beshikwiyisha bamilawo ne Bafalisi bali kabalangishisha eti babone, na Yesu ngaumusengula mutuloba usa pabusuba bwa Sabata kwambeti bamucaninepo mulandu.
LUK 6:8 Nendi walenshiba ncobalikuyeya. Lino walambila mutuloba usa walikuba watontola likaseti, “kwesa kuno wimane kuntangu.” Neye walanyamuka nekuya kwimana kuntangu.
LUK 6:9 Lino “Ndamwipushunga, nomba milawo ikute kutusuminisha kwinsa cani pabusuba bwa Sabata? Kwinsa caina ku muntu nambi kumwinshila caipa? Kupulusha buyumi bwa muntu nambi kubononga?”
LUK 6:10 Apwishe kwambeco walalangishisha bantu bonse balikuba mu Ng'anda yakupaililamo, nendi walambila mutuloba useti, “Tandabula likasa lyakobe.” Neye walatandabula, lino lyalaba cena.
LUK 6:11 Nsombi nabo balakalala nekutatika kulifuyafuya cakumwinsa Yesu.
LUK 6:12 Pacindico Yesu walaya kumulundu kuya kupaila lino bwalaca kapaila.
LUK 6:13 Mpobwalaca walakuwa beshikwiya bakendi. Pakati pabo walasala bali kumi nebabili abo mbalakuweti batumwa.
LUK 6:14 Maina abo naya; Shimoni uyo ngwalapa lina lya Petulo, ne Ndileya mukwabo, Jemusi ne Yohane, Filipo ne Batolomeyo,
LUK 6:15 Mateyo, Tomasi, ne Jemusi mwanendi Alufeyo Kai ne Shimoni wa mucipani ca bantu balikulwanina lwanguluko mu cishi ca Islayeli,
LUK 6:16 ne Yudasi mwanendi Jemusi kayi ne Yuda isikalyoti walesa akumuyaba Yesu kubalwani.
LUK 6:17 Yesu mpwalikuselela pamulundu pamo ne beshikwiya, walemana pololoka. Palikuba likoto linene lya beshikwiya bakendi kayi ne likoto linene lya bantu lyalafuma kulubasu lwa ku Yudeya neku Yelusalemu. Bambi balafuma muminshi ya Tulo ne Sidoni, ne mumbali mwa Mulonga.
LUK 6:18 Naboyo balesa akukutika Yesu kayi kwambeti abasenguleko malwashi. Lino bonse balikupenshewa ne mishimu yaipa balacanikako kwambeti abasengule.
LUK 6:19 Bantu bonse balikabayanda kumukumya, pakwinga ngofu shalikufuma muli endiye, shalikubasengula bonse.
LUK 6:20 Yesu walalanga beshikwiya bakendi nekubambileti, “Mwalelekwa amwe mwapenga Pakwinga Bwami bwa Lesa nibwenu!
LUK 6:21 Mwalelekewa amwe mulanyumfunga nsala cino cindi, pakwinga nimukekute! Mwalelekwa amwe omulalilinga pakwinga nimukakondwe!
LUK 6:22 “Mwalelekwa omwapatwa ne bantu, kusulwa ne kutukanwa kayi nekumwambeti mwaipa pacebo ca kukonkela ame nde Mwana Muntu!
LUK 6:23 Kamukondwani cangofu nekushana kayi ne nekusamwa pakwinga cilambo cenu nicinene kwilu. Pakwinga naboyo bashali babo encobalenshila bashinshimi bakulukulu.
LUK 6:24 “Nsombi mapensho nakabe pali njamwe mobabile “pakwinga amwe mwatambula kendi bubile bwenu!
LUK 6:25 “Mapensho nakabe pali njamwe omwekuta cino cindi, “Pakwinga nimukafwe nsala! Mapensho nakabe pali njamwe omwakondwanga cindi cino, pakwinga nimukongumane kayi nimukalile!
LUK 6:26 “Mapensho nakabe pali njamwe mwense omukute kwambwa kuba baina kubantu bonse pakwinga nebamashali babo encobali kubenshila copeleco bashinshimi bandemi shibili.
LUK 6:27 “Lino mwense omulakutikinga maswi akame ndamwambilingeti, kamusuna balwani benu kayi nekwinshila byaina abo bamupata.
LUK 6:28 Mubasengelenga kwambeti Lesa abaleleke abo beshikumushinganya kayi nabo beshi kumupensha kayi mubapaililenga.
LUK 6:29 Na muntu lakumu kulicili, Pilibuka akume nekumbi nakoyo. Na muntu lakulamunu cakufwala cakobe capelu umuleke amante ne camukati.
LUK 6:30 Na muntu lakusenge cintu umupe. Kai na muntu lamanta cintu cakobe utamwambileti acibweshe.
LUK 6:31 Ncomulandanga kwambeti bantu bamwinshile, ne njamwe benshileni copeleco.
LUK 6:32 “Nomba na musuni bantu bonka abo bamusuni, lino ngamulumbwecon? Pakwinga naboyo babwipishi basuni abo babasuni.
LUK 6:33 Na mulenshinga byaina kulyabo beshi kumwinshila byaina, nomba ngamulumbweconi? Pakwinga naboyo babwipishi encobakute kwinsa.
LUK 6:34 Na mukute kukongolesha abo bonka mbomwashometi nibakamubweshele, nomba ngamulumbaishiweconi? Kai naboyo babwipishi bakute kukongoleshana nemwelo wopelowo!
LUK 6:35 Amwe mutenseco, kamusunani balwani benu kayi mubenshilenga byaina. Kamutakweletesha kwambeti bakamubweshele. Nimukatambule cipo cenu kwilu. Nimukabe bana ba Lesa wapitapo. Pakwinga neye ukute kwinshila byaina bantu batalumbu ne baipa.
LUK 6:36 Mbuli bameshenu bakwilu ncobakute inkumbo, nenjamwe mube nenkumbo mbuli bameshenu ba kwilu.
LUK 6:37 “Mutabetekanga bantu kwambeti nenjamwe Lesa katakamubeteka. Mutapa muntu mulandu kwambeti mutakapewa mulandu ne njamwe, nsombi kamulekelelani, Lesa neye nakamulekelele.
LUK 6:38 Pani banenu pakolola makasa enu, neye Lesa nakamwinshile copeleco, nakamupeni cipimo caina, cashindailwa kayi kacisempukila panshi. Cipimo ncomukute kupiminako banenu neye Lesa nceti akamupimineko.”
LUK 6:39 Lino Yesu walabambila cikoshanyo eti, “Sena muntu mpofu ngautangunina mpofu munendi? Sena bonse babili nkabela kuwila mucisengu?”
LUK 6:40 Kuliya weshikwiya welela kupita shikwiyisha wakendi, nomba muntu uliyense ukute kubeti shikwiyisha wakendi nalapwishi kwiya.
LUK 6:41 “Nomba ngobona aconi kapampansha kali mulinso lya munobe nekushiya citondo cili mulinso mwakobe?
LUK 6:42 Nomba ngawambileconi mukwenu eti, mukwabo, tubone nkufunye kapampansha kali mulinso, na obe mulinso mwakobe omwine kamuli citondo ncolabulunga kubona? Obe mubepeshi tanguna ufunye citondo cili mulinso lya kobe, emposhi ubone cena nekufunya kapampasha kali mulinso lya mukwenu.
LUK 6:43 “Kuliyawa citondo caina celela kwikata bisepo byaipa, nambi citondo caipa kwikata bisepo byaina.
LUK 6:44 Anu ekwambeti citondo cili conse cikute kwinshibika nebisepo byakendi. Kuliyawa muntu ukute kuyapa nkuyu kucitondo ca myunga nambi ku binkupu byabitondo.
LUK 6:45 Muntu uli cena ukute kupulisha byaina bili mumoyo mwakendi, neye muntu waipa ukute kupulisha byaipa bili mumoyo mwakendi pakwinga mulomo ukute kwamba byesula mumoyo.”
LUK 6:46 “Nipacebo cini mukute kwambeti, ‘Mwami, Mwami,’ Kakuli nkamukute kwinsa ibyo mbyonkute kwamba?
LUK 6:47 Muntu uliyense lesanga kulinjame nekunyumfwa maswi akame nekwainsa, nindi muleshe ncabele.
LUK 6:48 Ulyeti muntu walebaka ng'anda, uyo walemba kuya panshi akushika palibwe linene, ne kwibaka ng'anda. Mulonga mpowalesula, meshi alatatika kuma kung'anda iyo. Nomba iliyawa kuwa pakwinga walebaka cena.
LUK 6:49 Nsombi uyo ukute kunyumfwa maswi akame nekutainsa, ulyeti muntu walebaka ng'anda cakubula kwimba panshi. Menshi mpwalesula, alatatika kuma kung'anda. Lino ng'anda yalawa eti nyang'a nyang'a nekonongeka.”
LUK 7:1 Yesu mpwalapwisha kwambila bantu maswi awa, walaya ku Kapelenawo.
LUK 7:2 Kwalikuba mutangunishi naumbi walikuba mukulene wa bashilikali bakwana mwanda walikuba ne musha ngwali kusuna. Musha uyo wali kakolwa cakwambeti walikuba pepi ne kufwa
LUK 7:3 Lino mpwalanyufwa lulumbi lwa Yesu, walatuma bamakulene nabambi ba Bayuda kuya akumusengeti amushilike musebenshi wa mukulene wa bashilikali.
LUK 7:4 Abo balatumwa balashika kuli Yesu, balamusenga camakasa abili kwambeti, “Kamubonani uyu muntu mwelela kumunyafwa,
LUK 7:5 pakwinga usuni mushobo wetu kayi walatwibakila ng'anda yakupaililamo.”
LUK 7:6 Lino Yesu walaya nabo. Mpwalashika pepi ne ng'anda, mukulene wa bashilikali walatuma banendi kuli Yesu kuya kumwambileti, “Mwami, mutalishupa, pakwinga ame nkandelela kwambeti amwe mwingile mung'anda yakame.
LUK 7:7 Weco ndiya kulibikapo kuba walulama kwisa kuli njamwe. Nomba mwambowa maswi musha wakame nabe cena.
LUK 7:8 Pakwinga nenjame nkute kukonkela milawo yabamakulene pancinto kayi nkute bashilikali mbonkute kutangunina. Na ndamwambili mushilikali eti, koya, neye ukute kuya. Na ndamwambili mushilikali eti, Kwesa, neye ukute kwisa, Na ndamwambili musha wakame eti, insa ici, neye ukute kwinsa.”
LUK 7:9 Yesu mpwalanyumfweco, walakankamana. Lino walalanga kubantu bangi abo balikumukonkela ne kwambeti, “Cakubinga ndiya kubonapo lushomo lwamushoboyu pakati paba Isilaeli sobwe!”
LUK 7:10 Balatumwa basa balabwelela kung'anda, nekuya akucana musha uyo laba cena.
LUK 7:11 Kufumapo Yesu walaya mumunshi umbi ukute kukwiweti Naini. Beshikwiya bakendi nelikoto lya bantu balaya nendi.
LUK 7:12 Yesu mpwalashika pepi ne munshi, walakumanya bantu kabali banyamuna citumbi, ca mutuloba wafwa walikuba emwana enka kuli banyina bamuka lubingi. Bantu bangi ba mumunshi balikuba pamo ne mukalubingi.
LUK 7:13 Yesu mpwalabona mukalubingi uyo walamunyumfwila inkumbo ne kumwambileti, “Kocileka kulila.”
LUK 7:14 Yesu walashika kuntangu ne kwikata citumbi ico, Lino balikuba bamanta citumbi ico balemana. Kayi kufumapo walambeti, “Obe mwana mutuloba ndakwambilingeti, punduka!”
LUK 7:15 Mwana mutuloboyo walikuba wafwa walapunduka nekwikala, walatatika kwamba. Lino Yesu walamubwesha kuli banyina.
LUK 7:16 Nomba bantu bonse balatina, popelapo balalumbaisha Lesa kabambeti, “Mushinshimi mukulene labonekele pakati petu, kayi Lesa wesa akupulusha bantu bakendi.”
LUK 7:17 Kufumapo lulumbi lwa Yesu yalamwaika mucishi conse ca Yudeya kayi ne bishi byonse byalikuba byashunguluka.
LUK 7:18 Beshikwiya ba Yohane balamwambila byonse. Lino Yohane walakuwa babili pa beshikwiya bakendi,
LUK 7:19 ne kubatuma kuli Mwami Yesu kuya kwipusheti, “Sena njamwe ngwalamba Yohane eti lesanga nambi tulangilile naumbi?”
LUK 7:20 Balatumwa abo mpobalashika kuli Yesu, balamwambileti, “Yohane mubatishi latutumu kwambeti twipushe na njamwe uyo lesanga nambi tulangililenga naumbi?”
LUK 7:21 Pacindico Yesu walikashilika malwashi abantu bangi apusana pusana, bamapensho ne kufunya mishimu yaipa kayi walasengula bampofu bangi.
LUK 7:22 Lino Yesu walakumbula beshikwiya ba Yohane eti, “Kamuyani mumwambile Yohane byonse mbyomulabono ne kunyufwa, bampofu balabononga, balema myendo balendenga, beshimankuntu balabanga cena, bashinka matwi balanyufunga, bafu balapundukunga kayi bapenga balanyumfunga Mulumbe Waina.
LUK 7:23 Walelekwa muntu uyo labulunga kutonshanya pali njame.”
LUK 7:24 Lino beshikwiya bakendi Yohane mpobalaya, Yesu walatatika kwambila bantu bangi balikubapo sha makani a Yohane mubatishi eti, “Mpomwalaya akubona Yohane mucinyika mwalikuyeyeti ulyeti cani? Sena mwalikuyeyeti Yohane uliya ngofu eti litete likute kutenkanowa ne mpepo?
LUK 7:25 Nomba mwalikuyeyeti Yohane ulyeti cani? Sena nimuntu walikuba wafwala byakufwala byaina? Sobwe bantu beshi kufwala byaina, bakute kusuna malyalya nekwikala mumanda abami.
LUK 7:26 Kamung'ambila, nicani ncomwalaya akubona? Sena mwalikuyeyeti Yohane nimushinshimi? Ee, ndamwambilinga cakubinga kwambeti mwalabona wapita mushinshimi.
LUK 7:27 Pakwinga Yohane ewuyo walambwa mumabala a Lesa, Lesa walambeti, “Ninkatume mutumwa wakame kuntangu kwakobe kwambeti akakubambile nshila.”
LUK 7:28 “Ndamwambilinga kufuma keendi kuliyawa kubapo muntu wapita Yohane, nsombi usa mung'ana mu Bwami bwa Lesa emukulene kupita endiye.”
LUK 7:29 Bantu bonse ne beshikusonkesha misonko balanyumfwa kukambauka kwa Yohane, mpobalabatishiwa balasumina kwambeti Lesa walulama.
LUK 7:30 Nsombi Bafalisi ne beshikwiyisha Milawo pakukana kubatishiwa ne Yohane, balakana ncalikuyanda kubenshila Lesa.
LUK 7:31 Yesu walapitilisha kwambeti, “Anu bantu ba cino cindi ngandi bakoshanisha ne cani? Anu balyeti cani?”
LUK 7:32 Balyeti batwanike bekala pabusena bwakulishilapo kabolobeshanyeti, “Twalamulilishila ngoma, amwe muliya kushana! ‘Twalamwimbila inyimbo sha malila amwe muliya kulila!’
LUK 7:33 “Pakwinga Yohane mubatishi walesa nkalikanisha kulya kayi nkali kunwapo waini, nomba amwe mwalambeti, ‘Ukute mushimu waipa.’
LUK 7:34 Lino Mwana Muntu mpwalesa walatatika kulya ne kunwa, amwe mwalambeti, kamubonani ni weshikulyowa nekukolwa, kayi banendi ni beshimisonko kayi ne babwipishi.
LUK 7:35 Nsombi mano a Lesa akute kubonekela kuba ancine ncine kuli bonse bakute kwatambula.”
LUK 7:36 Mufalisi naumbi walakuwa Yesu eti ayenga akulya nendiye. Lino Yesu walaya akwingila mung'anda nekwikala pakulyela.
LUK 7:37 Mu munshi uwu mwalikuba mutukashi wabwikalo bwaipa. Mpwalanyumfweti Yesu lalinga mung'anda ya Mufalisi uyo, walamanta kankuli kesula mafuta anunkila cena.
LUK 7:38 Walashika nekusuntama kunyuma kwa Yesu, pepi ne myendo kalila. Walatontosha myendo bya Yesu ne misoshi yakendi ne kutatika kwipukuta ne mishishi yakendi, nekumyanguta bimpanta bya Yessu ne kutatika kumunanika mafuta ayo.
LUK 7:39 Lino Mufalisi usa walakuwa Yesu mpwalaboneco, walatatika kuyeyeti, “Muntu uyu nabanga mushinshimi wancincine nalenshibi mbuli ncabele mutukashi uyu lamwikatanga pakwinga nkamwisheti nimwipishi.”
LUK 7:40 Lino Yesu walamwambileti, “Shimoni nkute byakukwambila.” Shimoni walakumbuleti, “Beshikwiyisha kamwambani”
LUK 7:41 Yesu walambeti, “Palikuba bantu babili balabweleka mali ku muntu. Umo walabweleka myanda isanu ya mali, naumbi mali makumi asanu.
LUK 7:42 Mpocalashika cindi ca kubwesha, bonse babili balalilwa kubwesha nkongole, lino walabalekelela. Nomba pabantu babili basa, nupeyo shikubwelekesha mali ngweshakasune cikamba?”
LUK 7:43 Shimoni walakumbuleti, “Ame ndayeyengeti uyo walabweleka mali angi,” Yesu walamwambileti, “Ulakumbulu cena.”
LUK 7:44 Lino walalanga kumuntukashi usa ne kumwambila Shimoni eti, “Sena ulabono mutukashi uyu? Mpondashiki mung'anda yakobe uliyawa kumpapo menshi akusamba kumyendo. Nsombi nendi lasambishi myendo yakame nemishoshi yakendi nekwipukuta ne mishishi yakendi.
LUK 7:45 Obe uliyawa kumyanguta pakumpa mutende, nsombi nendi kufuma mpondeshili mung'anda liya kucilekapo kumyanguta myendo yakame.
LUK 7:46 Bona mondeshili uliyawa kunanikapo mafuta mumutwi, nsombi uyu lananiki mafuta anunkila cena kubimpanta.
LUK 7:47 Ndakwambilinga cancine ncine, kuyandishisha kunene nkwalandeshe, cilaleshengeti bwipishi bwakendi bwingi bulalekelelwa. Nomba muntu lalekelelwa bwipishi bung'ana ukute kusuna pang'ana.”
LUK 7:48 Kufumapo Yesu walamwambila mutukashi uyo eti, “Bwipishi bwakobe bulalekelelwa.”
LUK 7:49 Lino abo bali kabalya pamo ne Yesu balatatika kwipushanyeti, “Anu niyani muntu uyu weshi kulekelela ne bwipishi?”
LUK 7:50 Lino Yesu walambila mutukashi uyo eti, “Lushomo lwakobe lulakupulushu, koya mulumuno.”
LUK 8:1 Kufumapo Yesu walendana muminshi, kaya kukambauka Mulumbe Waina wa Bwami bwa Lesa, walikuba ne beshikwiya bali likumi ne babili.
LUK 8:2 Ne batukashi nabamb balafunyiwa mishimu yaipa ne malwashi, Maliya waku Magadala uyo walikukute mishimu yaipa isanu ne ibili
LUK 8:3 Yowana mukashi wa Kuza uyo walikuba kapitawo wa Helode, Susana, kayi ne nabambi bangi balikunyamfwilisha Yesu ne beshikwiya bakendi kusebensesha mali abo.
LUK 8:4 Bantu bangi balabungana kwalikuba Yesu kufuma muminshi. Lino nendi walabapa mukoshanyo eti,
LUK 8:5 “Kwalikuba muntu umbi walaya akumwaya imbuto. Lino mpwalikumwaya, shimbi imbuto shalalakila munshila shalalyataulwa, bikeni byalashilya.
LUK 8:6 Shimbi mbuto shalalakila pabulongo bwamabwe. Mposhalamena, misonga yalatatika kuyuma pakwinga kwalabula katonto mubulongo,
LUK 8:7 Shimbi imbuto shalalakila patufukusa twa myunga, lino tufukusa pakukula twalatatika kushantilila.
LUK 8:8 Nomba shimbi imbuto shalalakila pabulongo bwaina. Shalakula ne kwikata myanda myanda.” Lino Yesu walamba ne liswi lyapelu kwambeti, “uyo ukute matwi, anyumfwe!”
LUK 8:9 Beshikwiya bakendi balamwipusha pabupandulwishi bwa mukoshanyo uwu.
LUK 8:10 Yesu walakumbuleti, “Amwe mwalapewa kwinshiba bintu byasolama bya Bwami bwa Lesa. Nsombi bambi bakute kunyumfwa bambilwa mumikoshanyo ekwambeti, ‘balangishishe, nomba babule kubona’ Kayi ‘Bakutike, nsombi batanyumfwishisha.’”
LUK 8:11 Kupandulula kwa mukoshanyo wa mbuto ni uku, imbuto ni Maswi a Lesa.
LUK 8:12 Isho imbuto shalalakila munshila shakoshana ne bantu beshi kunyumfwa Maswi a Lesa, nomba pacindi cing'ana, Satana ukute kwafunya mumyoyo yabo kwambeti babule kushoma ne kupuluka.
LUK 8:13 Isho imbuto shalalakila pabulongo bwa mabwe shakoshana ne bantu abo balanyumfunga Maswi a Lesa ne kwatambula cakusangalala sombi pakwinga baliya miyanda yashimpa bakute kushoma kwa kacindi kang'ana neco na balasunkwa bakute kuwa.
LUK 8:14 Isho imbuto shalalakila pamyunga shakoshana ne bantu beshi kunyumfwa Maswi a Lesa, nomba miyeyo yakuyanda bubile ne byeshikukondwelesha bikute kubakoma, neco nkabekata bisepo byakoma,
LUK 8:15 Nsombi isho shalalakila mubulongo bwaina, shakosna ne bantu beshi kunyumfwa Maswi a Lesa, ne kwaikata ne kushoma mumyoyo yabo yaina, neco bakute kulimbikila mpaka kwikata bisepo.
LUK 8:16 “Kuliya muntu welela kumunika lampi ne kulifwekelela ne nongo nambi kubika mwinshi lyatebulu. Nsombi ukute ubika pelu kwambeti limunikile abo beti bengile mung'anda.”
LUK 8:17 “Pakwinga kuliya cintu casolama ceti cikabule kuyubulululwa patuba, kayi cintu ciliconse casolekwa ni cikabonekele patuba.
LUK 8:18 “Neco kamucenjelani mbuli ncomukute kunyufwa Maswi a Lesa. Pakwinga uyo ukute kendi nakabikilwepo, nsombi uyo wabula kantu nibakamulamune konse nkakute.”
LUK 8:19 Lino banyina Yesu ne bamakwabo balashika nkwalikuba, lino baliya kucikonsha kushika pepi nendiye pacebo cakwambeti bantu balikuba bangi.
LUK 8:20 Lino muntu naumbi walambila Yesu eti, “Bamanyenu ne bakwenu bemana pansa, balandanga kumubona.”
LUK 8:21 Nendi Yesu walabambileti, “Bama ne bakwetu niyabo beshi kunyumfwa Maswi a Lesa nekwinsa ncalambanga.”
LUK 8:22 Busuba nabumbi Yesu ne beshikwiya bakendi balengila mubwato, Yesu walambeti, “Katutampukilani kutala kwa lwenje kusa.” Popelapo balanyamuka.
LUK 8:23 Lino bwato mpobwalikuya, Yesu walona. Kwalesa cilukupwe cinene pamenshi. Bwato bwalatatika kwisula ne menshi kabuyanda pepi nekwibila.
LUK 8:24 Kufumapo beshikwiya balaya kuli Yesu ne kumwambileti, “Mwami, Mwami, kamupundukani tulafu!” Lino Yesu walapunduka walakalalila lukupwe ne mankape alamwena tonto
LUK 8:25 Lino Yesu walambila beshikwiya bakendi eti, “Nomba lushomo lwenu lulikupeyo?” Nabo balatina nekupwilwa mano nkabepushanyeti, “Nomba uyu nimuntu uli econi lambilinga lukupwe nalo lulamunyumfwilinga?”
LUK 8:26 Balo balashika kucishi ca Gelasa calangana ne cishi ca Galileya.
LUK 8:27 Yesu mpwalafuma mubwato walakumanya, mutuloba naumbi walafuma mumunshi. Mutuloba usa walikukute mishimu yaipa. Lingi walikwenda matakosha, nkalikwikala pa ng'anda nsombi mumaceni akumanda.
LUK 8:28 Mpwalamubona Yesu, walolobesha ne kufukama kuntangu ne kwamba ne liswi lya pelu eti, “Nomba ndamwinshi cani amwe Yesu mwanendi Lesa wakwilu wapitapo? Ndamusengenga mutampesha.”
LUK 8:29 Walambeco pakwinga Yesu walambila mushimu waipa eti ufumemo muli endiye. Mankanda angi mushimu wamwikata, nambi bantu bamusunga makasa ne ncetani kayi ne nshimbi kumyendo eti bamululamike, wali kasutula. Lino mishimu yaipa yalikumutwala ku cisuwa.
LUK 8:30 Lino Yesu wamwipusheti, “Njobe bani?” Neye walakumbuleti, “Njame likoto” Walambeco pakwinga walikukute mishimu yaipa ingi.
LUK 8:31 Lino popelapo mishimu yaipa iyo yalamupapata Yesu eti ataitandanyina kucisengu citali.
LUK 8:32 Lino mwinshi mwa mulundu mwalikuba litanga linene lya nkumba lyali kalilya. lino mishimu yaipa isa yalasenga Yesu eti yenga ingile munkumba isho, neye walaisuminisha.
LUK 8:33 Lino yalafumamo mumutuloba usa ne kwingila munkumba, Lino litanga lyonse lyalaselemukila kumukolo lubilo kuya kulwenje nekuya kuliwalamo nekufwilamo.
LUK 8:34 Beshikwembela nkumba mpobalaboneco, balaya akwambila bantu balikwikala mumusena kayi ne muminshi calenshika.
LUK 8:35 Neco bantu balesa akubona calenshika. Mpobalashika kwalikuba Yesu, balacana muntu walafunyiwa mishimu yaipa wekala pepi ne Yesu kaliwafwala, mano kali akwana cena. Lino bantu balatina.
LUK 8:36 Bantu balabona byalenshika balambila bantu mbuli ncalaba cena muntu uyo walikuba ne mishimu yaipa.
LUK 8:37 Lino bantu bonse balikwikala mucishi ca Gelasa balapapatila Yesu eti afumemo mucishi cabo pacebo cakwambeti balatina. Kufumapo walengila mubwato kwambeti abwelele
LUK 8:38 Lino mutuloba uyo walafunyiwa mishimu yaipa walasenga Yesu eti benga bonse, linoYesu walamukanisha ne kumwambileti,
LUK 8:39 “Bwelela kucomwenu uye wambe bintu byonse Lesa mbyalakwinshili. Popelapo muntu usa walaya mumunshi wonse kaya kwamba sha bintu Yesu mbyalamwinshila.”
LUK 8:40 Lino Yesu mpwalabwelela kulubasu lumbi lwa lwenje bantu bangi balamutambula, balikuba bakondwa pakwinga bonse bali kaba mupembelela.
LUK 8:41 Lino kwalesa muntu wali kukwiweti Yailo uyo wali kutangunina ng'anda yakupaililamo walesa kusuntama kuntangu kwa Yesu ne kumusengeti ayenga kung'anda yakendi.
LUK 8:42 pakwinga mwanendi mutukashi wa myaka likumi ne ibili mwana umowa, ngwalikukute wali kakolwa cakwambeti ngofwa. Yesu mpwalikuya, bantu bangi balamushankanya.
LUK 8:43 Palikuba mutukashi naumbi walikukolwa bulwashi bwa mukunko kwa byaka likumi ne bibili. Walapwisha buboni bwakendi bonse mubang'anga, nsombi kuliya muntu nambi umo walakonsha kumusengula.
LUK 8:44 Mutukashi uyo walesa kunyuma kwa Yesu pabantu bangi balikuba bamushinguluka nekwikata kucelele kwamunganjo wakendi, popelapo bulwashi bwamukunko bwalapwa.
LUK 8:45 Neco Yesu walepusheti, “Niyani lanjikata ku munganjo?” Bonse bantu balakana eti paliyawa. Petulo walambeti, “Kufula bantu balamukumyunga kayi bantu balamushankanyanga.”
LUK 8:46 Lino Yesu walambeti, “Nkwali muntu naumbi lanjikata kumunganjo, pakwinga ndanyumfu ngofu shimbi shilafumumo mulinjame.”
LUK 8:47 Lino mutukashi usa mpwalaboneti nkela kusolamapo walalitwala kuli Yesu nkatutuma walawa kuntangu kwakendi Yesu. Ne kwamba byonse pamenso a bantu kabanyumfwa mbuli ncalamwikata kumunganjo ne kuba cena pacindi copeleco.
LUK 8:48 Yesu walamwambileti, “Mwaname, pakwinga washoma njame, koya mulumuno.”
LUK 8:49 Yesu kacamba kwalesa muntu kufuma ku ng'anda ya mukulene wa ng'anda yakupaililamo ne kumwambila Yailo eti, “Mwanenu lafu kendi, mutapensha beshikwiyisha.”
LUK 8:50 Yesu mpwalanyumfwa makani ayo walambila Yailo eti, “Utatina, koshoma, mwanobe nabe cena.”
LUK 8:51 Yesu mpwalashika kung'anda ya Yailo liya kusuminisha muntu nambi umo eti engilemo, nsombi Petulo, Yohane, ne Jemusi kayi ne baishi nebanyina ba mwana.
LUK 8:52 Bantu bonse mung'anda bali kabalila mwana mutukashi walikuba wafwa. Necikabeco Yesu walabambileti, “Kamucilekani kulila pakwinga uyu mwana nkafwapo, wonowa tulo.”
LUK 8:53 Popelapo bonse balamuwela, pakwinga bonse balikwi shibeti lafu kendi.
LUK 8:54 Lino Yesu walekata mwana uyo pacikasa nekwambeti, “Mwana obe punduka!”
LUK 8:55 Popelapo walaba muyumi, walanyamuka. Lino Yesu walabambileti bamupe cakulya mwana alye.
LUK 8:56 Baishi ne banyina ba mwana uyo balakankamana. Lino Yesu walabambileti kamutaya kwambila muntu uliyense pamakani aya alenshiki.
LUK 9:1 Yesu walabunganya beshikwiya bakendi ne kubapa ngofu shakufunya mishimu yaipa ne kushilika malwashi.
LUK 9:2 Lino Yesu walabatuma kuya kukambauka sha Bwami bwakendi Lesa ne kushilika malwashi.
LUK 9:3 Walabambileti, “Mutanyamunapo cintu nambi cimo mubulwendo bwenu, mutamanta inkoli, mukopa, cakulya, mali nambi byakufwala bibili.
LUK 9:4 Mwakashika mung'anda moshi bakamutambule cena, mukekale mwepelomo kushikikila busuba mboti mukafume mumushi umo.
LUK 9:5 Uko nkweshi bakabule kumutambula, pakufuma mumushi umo, mukalipampe lusuko kumyendo. Ici nicikabe cishibisho kuli endibo.”
LUK 9:6 Beshikwiya balenda muminshi yonse, kabaya akukambauka Mulumbe Waina ne kushilika malwashi kuli konse.
LUK 9:7 Lino mwami Helode, mpwalanyumfwa byonse byalenshika, walapenga mumoyo pakwinga bantu bambi bali kabambeti, “Uyu ni Yohane lapunduku kufuma kubafu.”
LUK 9:8 Bambi bali kabambeti, “Ni Eliya laboneke kayi, nabambi eti, ni umo wa bashinshimi bakulukulu lapunduku kubafu.”
LUK 9:9 Helode walambeti, “Yohane ni usa ngondatimbula mutwi, nomba niyani uyu lenshinga bintu ibi mbyondanyumfunga?” Neco wali kayanda kubona Yesu uyo.
LUK 9:10 Lino mpobabwelela batumwa balamwambila Yesu byonse mbyobalensa. Kufumapo Yesu walaya ne beshikwiya bakendi kuminshi yaku Betisaida.
LUK 9:11 Bantu bangi mpobalanyumfwa balamukonkela uko nkwalaya. Yesu walabatambula, neku bambila sha Bwami bwakendi Lesa, ne kushilika abo bali kabasuni kwambeti babe cena.
LUK 9:12 Lisuba mpolyalikuba pepi kwibila, beshikwiya bakendi bali likumi ne babili balaya kuli Yesu ne kumwambileti, “Kamubambilani bantu benga muminshi ne misena ili pepi balangole byakulya ne kwakona pakwinga kuno nikucisuwa.”
LUK 9:13 Nsombi Yesu walabambileti, “Amwe mubape byakulya.” Beshikwiya bakumbuleti, “Tukute owa shinkwa usanu ne inswi shibili. Lino sena musuni kwambeti tuye tule byakulya byakwana bantu aba?”
LUK 9:14 Palikuba batuloba bonka bakwana 5,000. Lino Yesu walabambila beshikwiya bakendi eti, “Kamwambilani bantu bekale mumakoto, likoto lya makumi ali asanu.”
LUK 9:15 Beshikwiya balensa mbuli ncobalambilwa.
LUK 9:16 Yesu walanyamuna shinkwa usanu ne Iswi shibili uto, walalanga kwilu ne kulumba Lesa, walakomona nekupa beshikwiya eti bayabile bantu.
LUK 9:17 Bantu bonse balalya nekwikuta. Nomba beshikwiya balabwesa byonse byalashalako ku bantu nekwisusha bitundu likumi ne bibili.
LUK 9:18 Nabumbi busuba Yesu wali kapaila enka, beshikwiya bakendi naboyo balikuba pepi. Lino walabepusheti, “Sena bantu bangi balambangeti ame njame bani?”
LUK 9:19 Balo balakumbuleti, “Bambi balambangeti njamwe Yohane mubatishi. Kayi nabambi balambangeti njamwe Eliya. Kayi nabambi eti njamwe umo wabanshinshimi bakulukulu walapunduka kubafu.”
LUK 9:20 Lino Yesu walabepusheti, “Nomba amwe mukute kwambeti ame njame bani?” Petulo walakumbuleti, “Njamwe Wananikwa wa Lesa.”
LUK 9:21 Nomba Yesu walakonkomesha beshikwiya kwambeti kabatambila muntu nambi umo makani aya.
LUK 9:22 Kayi walambeti, “Mwana Muntu welela kupenshewa ne kukanwa ne bamakulene beshimilumbo ne bamakulene baba Yuda ne beshikwiyisha ba Milawo nibakamukane. Nendi naka shinwe, nsombi busuba bwabutatu nakapunduke kubafu.”
LUK 9:23 Kufumapo walambila bonseti, “Namuntu layandanga kunkonkela ame, welela kushiya nekusula bintu byonse busuba ne busuba kunyamuna lusanda lwakendi nekunkonkela.
LUK 9:24 Pakwinga layandanga kupulusha buyumi bwakendi nakabutaye. Nomba uyo latayanga buyumi bwakendi pacebo ca njame, cakubinga nakabucane.
LUK 9:25 Nomba cainapo ni cani na muntu laba ne bintu byonse bili mucishi capanshi cino, nendi ubutaya buyumi bwakendi bwancinencine nambi kubononga?
LUK 9:26 Palico na muntu unyumfwa insoni pacebo ca maswi akame, neye Mwana Muntu nakamunyufwile insoni pakwisa mubulemu bwakendi ne mubulemu bwa Baishi nebwa bangelo bwaswepa.
LUK 9:27 Cakubinga ndamwambilingeti mpobali bambi pano beshi bakabule kufwa kabatana babona Bwami bwa Lesa.”
LUK 9:28 Mpopalapita masuba asanu ne atatu Yesu mpwalamba makani aya, walamanta Petulo ne Yohane ne Jemusi walaya pa mulundu kuya kupaila.
LUK 9:29 Lino mpwalikupaila, ciwa cakendi Yesu calasanduka ne byakufwala byakendi byalabemba tuu.
LUK 9:30 Popelapo kwalaboneka batuloba babili Mose ne Eliya kabamba ne Yesu.
LUK 9:31 Balaboneka mubulemu bwa kwilu kayi kabambilana sha palufu lwa Yesu lwakuya kufwila ku Yelusalemu.
LUK 9:32 Lino Petulo ne abo mbwalikuba nabo balikuba mutulo. Nomba mpobalapunduka balabona bulemu bwa Yesu ne bantu babili bemana pepi nendiye.
LUK 9:33 Pacindi mpwalikupansana nabo, Petulo walambila Yesu eti, “Bashikwiyisha, cileni kwambeti tuli pano katwibaka mishasha itatu, umbi wenu, umbi wa Mose, umbi wa Eliya.” Petulo nkalikwishiba ncali kwamba.
LUK 9:34 Kacamba, kwalesa likumbi lyabafwekelela. Lino beshikwiya balatina.
LUK 9:35 Lino mulikumbi umo mwalanyumfwika liswi lya kwambeti, “Uyu emwaname ndalamusala neco mumunyumfwile!”
LUK 9:36 Lino maswi mpwalacileka kunyufwika, beshikwiya balabona Yesu lashala enka. Neco balamwena tonto, kufuma apo baliya kwambilapo muntu nambi umo mbuli ncobalabona.
LUK 9:37 Mumene mene Yesu ne beshikwiya bakendi batatu balaseluka pa mulundu, nalyo likoto linene lyabantu lyalakumanina ne Yesu.
LUK 9:38 Popelapo, muntu umbi wamulikoto ilyo walolobesheti, “Bashikwiyisha, ndamusengengeti munyumfwileko inkumbo uyu emwaname enka ngonkute.
LUK 9:39 Ukute mushimu waipa na ulamwikata ukute kakuwa, kayi ne kunyukuma mpaka ufuma lipofu kumulomo. Kayi nkaukute kumulekapo mpaka umulingapo.
LUK 9:40 Lino ndanga ndasenge beshikwiya benu eti baufunye, nomba balalilwa.”
LUK 9:41 Yesu walakumbuleti, “Ha! Bantu babula lushomo, mweshikupindimuna miyeyeyo, nomba ninjikale nenu cindi citali econi? Kamumuletani kuno mwana.”
LUK 9:42 Mwana uyo mpwalikuya kuli Yesu, mushimu waipa walamuwala panshi ne kumunyukumuna. Nendi Yesu walakalalila mushimu waipa ne kushilika mwana usa. Lino walamubwesha kuli baishi.
LUK 9:43 Bantu bonse balakankamana mpobalabona ngofu shinene sha Lesa. Bantu kabacikankamana pa bintu ibyo mbyalensa, Yesu wabambila beshikwiya bakendi eti,
LUK 9:44 “Kamunyumfwishisha makani aya ngoti ndimwambile! ame Mwana Muntu ninkayabwe mumakasa abantu.”
LUK 9:45 Nsombi balo baliya kwinshiba ncalikwamba pakwinga calikuba casolama nomba baliyawa kwanyumfwishisha. Kayi balatina kumwipusha.
LUK 9:46 Beshikwiya balatatika kupikishana kwambeti benshibe nomba mukulene niyani pakati pabo.
LUK 9:47 Lino Yesu walenshiba ncobali kabayeya mumyoyo, walamanta mwana nekumwikalika kulubasu lwakendi.
LUK 9:48 Lino walabambileti, “Muntu uliyense welela kutambula mwana mbuli uyu mulina lyakame, latambulu ame. Muntu uliyense ukute kutambula ame latambulunga uyo walantuma, pakwinga uyo ngomwasula pakati penu emukulene.”
LUK 9:49 Lino Yohane walambeti, “Amwe beshikwiyisha, twabona muntu umbi nkafunya mishimu yaipa mulina lyenu, nomba twamukanisha pakwinga nte wa mulikoto lyetu.”
LUK 9:50 Yesu walamwambileti, “Mutamukanisha, pakwinga uyo labulunga kutotekeshana nenjamwe uli kulubasu lwenu.”
LUK 9:51 Lino mpocalashika cindi cakwambeti Yesu enga kwilu, walayeya kuya ku Yelesalemu.
LUK 9:52 Walatuma batumwa kuntangu kwakendi abo balaya kuya kwingila mumunshi wa Samaliya kwambeti bamubambile busena.
LUK 9:53 Bantu ba mumunshi uyo baliyawa kumutambula pakwinga walikaya ku Yelusalemu.
LUK 9:54 Lino beshikwiya ba Yesu, Jemusi ne Yohane, mpobalabona balambeti, “Mwami, sena nkatwela kwambeti tukuwe mulilo ufume kwilu wise wononge bantu aba?”
LUK 9:55 Yesu walacebuka ne kubakalalila beshikwiya.
LUK 9:56 Popelapo bonse balanyamuka balaya kumunshi umbi.
LUK 9:57 Mpobalikuya munshila, muntu umbi walambila Yesu eti, “Nindimukonkelenga kuli konse nkweshi mwenganga.”
LUK 9:58 Yesu walamukumbuleti, “Bamwaba bakute mishima, kayi ne bikeni bikute bisangala, lino Mwana Muntu liyawa pakona.”
LUK 9:59 Panyuma pakendi Yesu walambila naumbi eti, “Unkokele.” Nsombi nendi muntu uyo walambeti, “Mwami tanshika munsuminishe njenga mbike bata.”
LUK 9:60 Yesu walakumbuleti, “Leka bafwa babike bafu banabo, nsombi obe koya ukambauke sha Bwami bwa Lesa.”
LUK 9:61 Naumbi muntu walambeti, “Nindimukonkele Mwami, lino tanguna nje ndaye kung'anda yakame.”
LUK 9:62 Yesu walakumbuleti, “Muntu atatika kulima ne ngombe, kayi nkacebuku kunyuma, Lesa liya nendi incito mu Bwami bwakendi.”
LUK 10:1 Panyuma pakendi Mwami Yesu walasala bambi batuloba makumi asanu ne abili ne bantu babili ne kubatuma nanshi kuntangu kuya muminshi ne misena yonse nkwalikuyanda kuyako.
LUK 10:2 Kufumapo walabambileti, “Kutebula kulafulu, lino beshikutebula balacepe. Lino sengani kuli mwine libala kwambeti atume bambi basebenshi beshikutebula.”
LUK 10:3 Kamuyani, nomba ndamutumunga mbuli bana bambelele pakati pabaumpe.
LUK 10:4 Mutamanta mpotomona ya mali, cola nambi nkwabilo. Mutataya cindi ca kupana mutende ne bantu munshila.
LUK 10:5 Mung'anda muli monse momulengili mutangune kwambeti, Mube lumuno mung'anda muno.
LUK 10:6 Na mung'anda umo muli muntu layandanga lumuno, lumuno ulo nilukabe kuli endiye. Nsombi na muliya muntu wa mushoboyo, ekwambeti lumuno nilukabwelele kuli njamwe.
LUK 10:7 Mwakekala mung'anda yopeleyo kayi mukalye ne kunwa byonse byoti bakamupe pakwinga musebenshi uliwonse ukute kutambula malipilo akendi. Mutafumanga nkomulashikili nekuya kumanda ambi.
LUK 10:8 Mwashika mumushi mweshi bakamutambule mukalye byonse mbyeti bakamupe.
LUK 10:9 Mukasengule bantu balwashi mumunshi umo kayi nekubambila bantu eti, Bwami bwa Lesa bulesa pepi nenjamwe.
LUK 10:10 Mwakashika mumunshi umbi bantu bakabule kumutambula, kamuyani munshila sha mumunshi uyo nekwambeti,
LUK 10:11 nambi lusuko lwamuminshi iyi lulamatila kumyendo yetu nikulupampa nekwambeti lube kamboni. Lino inshibani kwambeti Bwami bwalesa Lesa buli pepi!
LUK 10:12 Ndamwambilinga cakubingeti pabusuba bwakubeteka, minshi iyo nikabe ne mulandu kupita munshi wa Sodomu!
LUK 10:13 “Ukute malele, obe Kolasini ne Betisaida! Pakwinga kuli incito yangofu yalenshika muli amwe, ne yalenshika kuminshi ya Tulo ne Sidoni, bantu bakusa, ne balasanduka kendi kuleka bwipishi nekufwala masaka kayi nekulinanika milota, kubonesheti balatembenuku kuleka bwipishi.
LUK 10:14 Ndamwambilinga cakubingeti pabusuba bwakubeteka Lesa nakamupeni mulandu unene kupita baku Tulo ne Sidoni.
LUK 10:15 Nenjobe Kapelenawo, sena ulayeyengeti nibakakunyamune mpaka kwilu? Sobwe, nibakakuwale panshi pabusena bwa bafu!”
LUK 10:16 Yesu walambila beshikwiya bakendi eti. “Uyo lanyumfwili amwe ekwambeti lanyumfwili ame, uyo weshi kukana ame lakana ne Bata balantuma.”
LUK 10:17 Bantu bali makumi asanu ne abili ne bantu babili balabwelako kabalibakondwa balambeti, “Mwami, Lino ne mishimu yaipa ilatunyumfwilinga twayambila mulina lyenu.”
LUK 10:18 Yesu walabakumbuleti, “Ndamubona Satana nkalaka kwilu eti kubyasha kwamfula.
LUK 10:19 Lino kamunyufwani! Ndamupanga ngofu shakulyata injoka ne tupilili kayi ne kukoma ngofu shonse sha mulwani. Kuliya ceti cikamulinge.
LUK 10:20 Nsombi mutakondwa kwambeti mishimu yaipa yamunyumfwilanga, nomba kondwani pakwinga mena enu alembwa kwilu.”
LUK 10:21 Pacindico Yesu walakondwa mu Mushimu Uswepa. Lino walambeti, “Ndalumbu Ta, amwe mwine kwilu ne cishi ca panshi pakwinga mulayubululu kubantu babula kwiya bintu mbyomwalasoleka kubantu ba mano ne baiya. Cakubinga Ta, mwalayanda kwinsa kwelana nekuyanda kwenu.
LUK 10:22 “Ba Ta balabika bintu byonse mumakasa akame. Kuliya muntu winshi mwana, nsombi ba Ta bonka. Kayi kuliya muntu winshi ba Ta, nsombi Mwana enka kayi ne abo Mwana mbwalasaleti abayubulwile.”
LUK 10:23 Popelapo walalanga kuli beshikwiya bakendi nekubambila kulubasu eti, “Bakute colwe abo balabononga bintu ibi mbyomulabononga.
LUK 10:24 Ndamwambilingeti banshinshimi ne bami bangi bali kuyandishisha kubona mbyomulabononga, nomba baliya kubibonapo. Ni cakubinga bali kuyandishisha kunyumfwa bintu mbyomulayumfunga, nomba baliya kubinyumfwa.”
LUK 10:25 Popelapo kwalesa shikwiyisha Milawo kwambeti asunkwe Yesu ne kumwipusheti, “Amwe beshikwiyisha, nicani ncendela kwinsa kwambeti nkatambule buyumi butapu?”
LUK 10:26 Yesu walamwipusheti, “Nomba mu Milawo mwalembwa cani? nomba mukute kubelengamo cani?”
LUK 10:27 Shikwiyisha Milawo walakumbuleti, “Suna Mwami Lesa wakobe ne moyo wakobe wonse, ne buyumi bwakobe bonse, nengofu shakobe shonse kayi ne miyeyo yakobe yonse, ‘Kayi kosuna munobe mbuli ncolisuni omwine.’ ”
LUK 10:28 Yesu wamwambileti, “Ulakumbulu cena, uye winseco, nukabe ne buyumi butapu.”
LUK 10:29 Lino shikwiyisha pakuyanda kulibonesheti walulama, walepusha Yesu eti, “Nomba muname niyani?”
LUK 10:30 Yesu walakumbuleti, “Kwalikuba muntu ku Yelusalemu walikuya ku Yeliko. Mpwalikuya munshila, walakumanya kapondo balamwikata, balamufulula ne kumuma, nekumushiya nkali wawisuka.
LUK 10:31 Lino shimilumbo walikapita munshila yopeleyo, mpwalabona muntu uyo walomwa, walapitila kumbali.
LUK 10:32 Neye Mulevi walikapita munshila yopeleyo, mpwalashika palikuba muntu walomwa walamubona nomba neye walapitila kumbali.
LUK 10:33 Nsombi Musamaliya walikuba pabulwendo munshila yopeleyo mpwalamubona muntuyo walanyumfwa inkumbo.
LUK 10:34 Walaya mpwalikuba wona waletila mafuta ne waini pabilonda byakendi nekusungapo bikwisa. Mpwalapwisha kwinseco walamumanta pambongolo yakendi ne kumutwala kung'anda ya bensu uko nkwalamubamba cena.
LUK 10:35 Bushiku bwalakonkapo mu Samaliya uyo walapa mali mwine ng'anda ya bensu nekumwambileti, ‘Mumusunge cena, na mukasebensenshe mali naambi ninkese nkalipile ndakabwelanga.’”
LUK 10:36 Lino Yesu pakupwisha walepusha shikwiyisha milawo eti, “Lino mumuyeyo wakobe, niyani pabantu batatu aba welela kuba munendi wamuntu walomwa ne kapondo?”
LUK 10:37 Shikwiyisha milawo walakumbuleti, “Uyo walamunyumfwila inkumbo.” Lino Yesu walamwambileti, “koya lino winse mbuli copeleco.”
LUK 10:38 Lino Yesu nebeshikwiya bakendi mpobalikuba mulwendo lwabo, balashika mumunshi mwali kwikala Malita. Mutukashi uyo walabatambula ne makasa abili mung'anda yakendi.
LUK 10:39 Malita walikuba ne mukwabo Maliya uyo walikuba wekala panshi pepi ne Yesu kakutika kwiyisha kwakendi.
LUK 10:40 Lino pacindico Malita incito yalamufulila walaya kuli Yesu nekwambeti, “Mwami sena nkamubweni kwambeti kanike wakame landekelenga incito yonse? Kamumwambilani ese anyafwe.”
LUK 10:41 Mwami Yesu walamukumbuleti, “Malita obe! wasukamanga nekupeshewa pa bintu bingi,
LUK 10:42 nsombi kuli cintu cimo cisuniki, Maliya lasala cintu caina kayi kuliyeti akamulamunepo.”
LUK 11:1 Nabumbi busuba Yesu walikapaila kumusena umo. Mpwalapwisha, umo weshikwiya wakendi wamwambileti, “Mwami, kamutwiyishani kupaila mbuli Yohane ncalaisha beshikwiya bakendi.”
LUK 11:2 Yesu walabambileti, “Pakupaila kamwambangeti, “Ta, lilemekwe lina lyenu lyaswepa, Bwami bwenu bwise.
LUK 11:3 Mutupenga byakulya bilayandikinga lelo, kayi ne masuba onse.
LUK 11:4 Mutulekelele bwipishi bwetu mbuli ncotukute kulekelela bantu beshikutwipishila, Kamutatutwala mumasunko.”
LUK 11:5 Lino walabambileti, Nomba na umbi popele pano uya kung'anda yamunendi pakati pamashiku nekwambeti, Mwana, kombwelekako shinkwa utatu,
LUK 11:6 pakwinga ndapolelwa mwensu uli pabulwendo. Lino ndiya cakumupa kwambeti alye!
LUK 11:7 Lino munobe akumbwila mukati eti, utanshupa! Kucishinga tulacalako kendi kayi ame nebana bakame tulono kendi. Nkandelela kupunduka kwambeti nkupe shinkwa.
LUK 11:8 Ndamwambilingeti, nakapunduke nekumupa, kwakubula kwambeti nimunendi nsombi pakwinga lakakatili kumusenga. Nakamupe byonse mbyabula.
LUK 11:9 Weco ndamwambilinga, kamusengani nimukapewe, kamulangolani nimukacane kayi kamukonkoshani nibakamucalilwe.
LUK 11:10 “Pakwinga uyo weshi kusenga ukute kupewa, ne uyo weshi kulangola ukute kucana neye weshi kukonkosha nibakamucalwile.
LUK 11:11 lino niyani mushali pakati penu, na mwanendi umusenga inswi, sena ngomupa injoka?
LUK 11:12 Nambi amusenga liyi, sena ngomupa kapilili?
LUK 11:13 Nomba amwe, mobantu baipa, mukute kupa bana benu byaina, nomba bata ba kwilu ngabalilweconi kupa Mushimu Uswepa kuli abo balamusengenga?”
LUK 11:14 Yesu walikafunya mushimu waipa walikukanisha muntuyo kwamba. Mushimu uyo mpowalafumamo, muntuyo walatatika kwamba. Neco bantu bonse balikubapo balakankamana.
LUK 11:15 Nsombi bambi balambeti, “Ukute kufunya mishimu yaipa pakwinga Belezebulu emwami wa mishimu yaipa, eukute kumupa ngofu.”
LUK 11:16 Cindi copeleco bambi balelesha kusunka Yesu eti ababoneshe cikankamanisho ceshi cifuma kwilu.
LUK 11:17 Nsombi Yesu walenshiba miyeyo yabo, Lino walabambileti, “Bulelo bonse bwabukilana ne kutatika kulwana, bulelo ubo bukute kumwaika. Na bantu ba mukowa umo babukilana, mukowa uwo ngomwaika.
LUK 11:18 Nomba na bwami bwa Satana bubukilana, nomba bwami ubo ngabuyuma econi? Amwe mulambangeti, nkute kupulisha mishimu yaipa ne ngofu sha Belezebulu.
LUK 11:19 Lino na ame ndapulishinga mishimu yaipa mbuli ncobalenshinga beshikwiya benu, nomba ame ngamung'ambeconi eti ndapulishinga mishimu yaipa ne ngofu sha Belezebulu, nomba beshikwiya benu balapulishinga mishimu yaipa nengofu shabani? Palico beshikwiya benu nibakamulesheti mwalubila.
LUK 11:20 Nsombi na ame nkute kupulisha mishimu yaipa mungofu sha Lesa, ekwambeti Bwami bwa Lesa buli pakati penu.”
LUK 11:21 Na muntu wangofu kalangilila ng'anda yakendi ne byensho, buboni bwakendi nkabwela kwibwapo.
LUK 11:22 Nsombi umbi wapitapo ngofu na lesa, nekumukoma, ukute kumanta bibya byakendi byonse mbyacinkilamo ne kuyabanya buboni mbwalebila bantu.
LUK 11:23 “Muntu uliyense labulunga kwikatishana nenjame nimulwani wakame, uyo labulunga kunyamfwa kubunganisha mbelele, nendi niweshi kupalanganya.”
LUK 11:24 “Na mushimu waipa ulafumu mumuntu, ukute kuya mumalundu a kuyandaula kwakupumwinina. Nakulabulu kucanika, ukute kwambeti, nimbwelele mung'anda yakame mondalafuma.
LUK 11:25 Lino na ulabwelele ukute kucana ng'anda iyo yaswepa cena.
LUK 11:26 Lino ukute kuletelapo imbi isanu ne ibili yapitapo pali nayo, kwambeti bengile nekwikala mumuntu uyo. Neco bwikalo bwamuntu uyo bukute kwipa kupita bwakutanguna.”
LUK 11:27 Yesu mpwalapwisha kwambeco mutukashi umbi mulikoto walolobesheti, walelekwa mutukashi walakusema nekukuyamwisha.
LUK 11:28 Lino Yesu walakumbuleti, “bakute colwe abo balanyumfunga Maswi a Lesa ne kwinsa ncalambanga!”
LUK 11:29 Bantu mpobalikuya kufula, Yesu walatatika kwambeti, “Bantu bacino cindi baipa, bakute kuyanda kubona cingashilo cishikufuma kwilu, lino nteshibakacibonepo cingashilo ico, nsombi ca mushinshimi Yona.
LUK 11:30 Mbuli Yona ncalikuba cingashilo ku Ninive, neye Mwana Muntu nakabe cingashilo capewa kubantu ba cino cindi.
LUK 11:31 Pabusuba bwakubeteka mwami mutukashi wa kumbonshi kwa cishi ca Sheba nakamutoteke pakwinga walafuma kwakuma cishi kwisa akunyumfwa mano a Solomoni. Kamubonani pano mpwali wapita Solomoni
LUK 11:32 Pabusuba bwakubetekwa, bantu baku Ninive nibakapunduke pamo ne bantu bamusemano uwu, nibakabatoteke. Pakwinga balo balasanduka kufuma kubwipishi, mpwalabakambaukila Yona. Lino mpwali pano wapita Yona.”
LUK 11:33 “Kuliya muntu wela kumunika lampi ne kwisoleka nambi kwifwekelela ne nongo, nsombi ukute kwibika pelu kwambeti imunikile bonse balengilinga mung'anda.
LUK 11:34 Menso enu emumuni wa mubili wenu. Na menso enu ali cena. Ne mubili wonse ukute kuba mu mumuni. Nsombi na menso enu abula kuba cena, mubili wonse ukute kuba mumunshinshe.
LUK 11:35 Lino kamucenjelani kwambeti mumuni uli muli njamwe utaba mushinshe.
LUK 11:36 Neco na mubili wonse kauli mumuni kwakubula mushinshe, mubili wonse ukutekuba mumuni mbuli lampi lilakumunikilinga.”
LUK 11:37 Yesu mpwalapwisha kwamba, Mufalisi walamukuwa eti alye nendiye. Neco Yesu walaya mung'anda nekwikala kwambeti kulya.
LUK 11:38 Mufalisi uyo walakankamana mpwalaboneti Yesu latatiki kulya katana asamba kumakasa kwelena ne myambo yabo.
LUK 11:39 Popelapo Mwami Yesu walamwambileti, “Lino amwe Bafalisi mukute kusuka kunsa kwambale nenkomeshi, nsombi mumyoyo yenu mwesula kulisuna ne nebukapondo.
LUK 11:40 Amwe mobantu baluya! Sena Lesa walalenga byakunsa ntendiye walalenga ne byamukati?
LUK 11:41 Pakupa bapenga, mubapenga bintu ibyo bili mukati munkomeshi ne mumbale, Lino byonse bintu byenu nibikabe byaswepa.”
LUK 11:42 “Mapensho, kuli amwe Bafalisi! Pakwinga mulabikilinga mano kwambeti mupe Lesa ca likumi pa tuntu tungana tungangana tweshikulengesha kwambeti buchisa bununkile cena. Nsombi nkamukute kwinshila bantu bintu byalulama nambi kusuna Lesa. Pakwinga bintu ibi mwelela kubinsa, kwakubula kusula nabimbi ibyo.”
LUK 11:43 “Mapensho nakabe pali njamwe Bafalisi! Pakwinga mukute kusala bipuna byabulemu mumanda akupaililamo, ne kusuna kupewa mitende yabulemu mumisena yakulishilamo.”
LUK 11:44 “Mapensho nakabe pali njamwe bafalisi, pakwinga mulyeti manda ataboneke ngobakute kulyatapo cakubula kwinshiba.”
LUK 11:45 Lino shikwiyisha Milawo umbi walakumbuleti, “Amwe mobeshikwiyisha pakwambeco nenjafwe mulatusampulunga.”
LUK 11:46 Yesu walambeti mapensho kuli abo beshikwiyisha Milawo pakwinga mukute kupa bantu mikuli yalema, nsombi amwe mobene nkamukumyuko nambi pang'ana.
LUK 11:47 Mapensho nakbe pali njamwe, pakwinga mukute kwibaka byumbwe byaina byabashinshimi, kakuli bamashali benu ebalashina bashinshimi.
LUK 11:48 Lino ekwambeti ico calensa bamashali benu cilaleshengeti mukute kucisuminisha kwambeti balo balashina bashinshimi amwe mwalebaka byumbwe.
LUK 11:49 Weco Lesa mu mano akendi walambeti, ninkabatume bashinshimi ne batumwa, Lino nabambi pakati pabo nibakabashine kayi nabambi nibakabapenshewe.
LUK 11:50 Nomba bantu bacino cindi nibakapewe mulandu wa bashinshimi bonse balashinwa kufuma kumatatikilo a cishi capanshi,
LUK 11:51 Kutatikila kukushinwa kwa Abelo kushikila kukushinwa kwa Sakaliya, uyo walashinwa pakati pa cipaililo kayi ne Musena Uswepa wa Ng'anda yakendi Lesa. Ndamwambilingeti bantu ba musemano uwu nibakapewe mulandu palibi byonse.
LUK 11:52 “Malele kuli abo beshikwiyisha milawo! Mwalamanta maki akucalwila bantu bamano. Amwe mobene muliya kwingila, mwalakanisha abo balikuyanda kwingila.”
LUK 11:53 Yesu mpwalafuma mung'anda umo, beshikwiyisha Milawo kayi ne Bafalisi balatatika kumutongokila ne kumwipusha mipusho ingi yapusana pusana.
LUK 11:54 Balikuyanda kumucaninapo mulandu mumyambo yakendi.
