LUK 12:1 Pacindico bantu mpobalabungana kwalikuba Yesu, bantu balatatika kulyatana cebo cakufula, Yesu walatanguna kwambila beshikwiya bakendi eti, “Kamucenjelani kamutabeti cishikufufumisha shinkwa ca Bafalisi, pakwinga nkabenshi ncobakute kwamba.
LUK 12:2 Kantu kalikonse kafwekewa nikakafwekulwe nambi kasolama nikakenshibikwe.
LUK 12:3 Neco bilibyonse mbyomulamba mumushinshe nibikanyufwike patuba pa bonse, mbyomulabelebeshana ne muntu mucipinda nibikambwe pamenso a bantu.”
LUK 12:4 “Ndamwambilinga mobanse mutatina abo beshikushina mubili, nomba kuliya nacimbi ncobela kwinsapo.
LUK 12:5 Lino ndamwambilingeti ngomwelela kutina ni Lesa uyo ukute kushina buyumi bwa muntu, kayi ukute ngofu shakumuwalani mumulilo utapu, mumutinenga Lesa.”
LUK 12:6 Sena Tutite tusanu ntebakute kulishiwa ne tumali tung'ana twa mangwe? Lino kuliya nambi umo Lesa ngwakute kulubapo.
LUK 12:7 Nomba mishishi yenu ili mumutwi mwenu yonse waibelenga. Neco mutatinanga pakwinga amwe mwadula kupita baciba bangi.
LUK 12:8 “Ndamwambilinga cakubinga, muntu uliyense lansumininga pamenso abantu, nenjame nde Mwana Muntu ninkamusumine pamenso a bangelo ba Lesa.
LUK 12:9 Nsombi Muntu uliyense lankananga pamenso a bantu, nenjame nde Mwana Muntu ninkamukane pamenso a bangelo ba Lesa.”
LUK 12:10 “Muntu uliyense weshi kwamba maswi aipa pa Mwana Muntu inga ulekelelwa, nsombi muntu uliyense weshikusampula Mushimu Uswepa, nteshi akalekelelwepo.”
LUK 12:11 “Bakamwikata kwambeti bakamubeteke mung'anda yakupaililamo, kuli beshikwendelesha nambi kubaleli, mutakasukameti, nimukumbuleconi, nekukaba kuyeyeti nomba nituye twambe cani?
LUK 12:12 Pakwinga Mushimu Uswepa nakamwishibishe ncomwelela kwamba pacindico.”
LUK 12:13 Umbi muntu walikuba mulikoto walambila Yesu eti, “Beshikwiyisha, kamumwambila mukwetu ampeko buboni bwalashiya bata balobe.”
LUK 12:14 Nsombi Yesu wamukumbuleti, “Obe nomba niyani walampa incito yakumubeteka amwe nambi kuyabanya bintu byalamushila bameshenu balobe?”
LUK 12:15 Lino Yesu walapitilisha kubambila bantu, “Kamucenjelani kayi mutaba bantu basunishi buboni. Pakwinga buyumi bwa muntu nkabwela kupimwa ne buboni mbwakute.”
LUK 12:16 Kayi Yesu walabambila mukoshanyo eti, “Umbi muntu mubile walikukute libala umo mwalekata byakulya bingi.
LUK 12:17 Mpwalaboneco walatatika kuyeya mumoyo eti, ‘Ndiya butala bunene mwakubika byakulya byakame byonse ibi ninjinseconi’
LUK 12:18 Lino walambeti, ‘Nimwaye matala akame nekwibaka ambi anene kwambeti mbikemo byakulya ne buboni bwakame bumbi bonse.
LUK 12:19 Lino ninkambile moyo wakameti, ukute buboni bwingi bwakwana byaka bingi. Neco pumwina, kolya ne kunwa nekukondwa.’
LUK 12:20 Nsombi Lesa walamwambileti, ‘Omuluya! Lelo lyopele mashiku nufwe. Nomba bintu byonse ibi mbyowalabamba kushikila cino cindi nibibe byabani?”
LUK 12:21 Lino Yesu pakupwisha walambeti, “Encoti cikabe kuli abo beshikulibunjikila buboni, kakuli pamenso a Lesa baliyapo buboni.”
LUK 12:22 Yesu walambila beshikwiya bakendi eti, “Pacebo ici ndamwambilingeti mutalisukama pa buyumi bwenu eti nitulye cani nambi nitufwale cani.
LUK 12:23 Pakwinga buyumi bwapita byakulya, ne mubili wapita byakufwala.
LUK 12:24 Kamubonani bikwangala, nkabishanga, nkabitebulu biliya ng'anda yakusungilamo bintu nambi manga. Nsombi Lesa ukute kubisanina. Sena nkamwinshi kwambeti Lesa umusuni kupita bikeni?
LUK 12:25 Niyani palyamwe welakunungilako busuba bumo kubuyumi bwakendi?
LUK 12:26 Nomba na nkamwela kucikonsha kwinsa kantu kang'ana eti ako, nipacebo cini mulasukamanga pa bintu bimbi ibyo?
LUK 12:27 Kamubonani maluba ncakute kukula. Nkakute kusebensa nambi kutunga byakufwala, nsombi ndamwambilingeti nambi Mwami Solomoni mububile bwakendi bonse, liya kubapo ne byakufwala byaina byalaboneka eti limo pa malubayo.
LUK 12:28 Lino na ni Lesa ukute kufwalika mwila uyo ukute kwinsa lelo mpouli, lilo bauwala pa mulilo, nomba amwe, nkela kumufwalika? Amwe bantu balushomo lung'ana!”
LUK 12:29 “Weco mutasukamanga nambi kuyeyeti nimulye cani nambi kunwa.
LUK 12:30 Ibi bintu, bantu bakunsa bakute kubiyandaula, nsombi Bameshenu bacinshi kwambeti byonse mubisuni.
LUK 12:31 Neco kamuyandaulani Bwami bwa Lesa, nakamupeni bintu byonse ibyo.”
LUK 12:32 “Amwe kalikoto kang'ana kambelele shakame, mutatina pakwinga Bameshenu balayanda kumupa Bwami.
LUK 12:33 Kamulishani buboni mbomukute, mali mupe bapenga. Kamulilangwela mpotomona shitabolo kayi mubike buboni bwenu kwilu nkweti bukabule kubola, pakwinga kuliya kabwalala wela kushikako, ne muswa nkawela kubononga.
LUK 12:34 Pakwinga myoyo yenu ikutekuba kuli bubile bwenu.”
LUK 12:35 “Kamubani balibambila cindi conse kayi malampi enu abenga abangila lyonse.
LUK 12:36 Kamubani eti basebenshi balapembelenga mwami wabo lafumunga kubwinga kwambeti mpoti ashikile ne kukonkosha, nabo bamucalwile bwangu.
LUK 12:37 Bakute colwe basebenshi beshi bakacanike kabalanga ne menso mwami wabo akabwela. Ndamwambilinga cakubingeti mwami wabo nakafwale byakufwala bya ncito nekubekalika nekubapa byakulya.
LUK 12:38 Bakute colwe basebenshi mwami mboti akacane balibambila, nambi akese pakati pamashiku nambi kumaca.
LUK 12:39 Nsombi kamwanukangeti, mwine ng'anda abangawenshiba cindi kabwalala ncalesanga, inga nkela kuleka kabwalala kwingila mung'anda yakendi.
LUK 12:40 Nenjamwe copeleco, kamubani mwalibambila kumutambula Mwana Muntu pakwinga lakesanga pacindi ncomwabula kwingashila.”
LUK 12:41 Neye Petulo walepusheti, “Mwami, sena mukoshanyo uyu mulambilinga afwe twenka nambi bantu bonse?”
LUK 12:42 Mwami Yesu walakumbuleti, nomba niyani musebenshi ukute lushomo kayi ne mano? Uyo mwami ngoshi akape incito yakulangilila bonse ba mu ng'anda yakendi nekupa banendi byakulya pacindi celela?
LUK 12:43 Nakatambule cilambo musebenshi uyo mwami wakendi pakubwelela ngweti akacane nkensa ico.
LUK 12:44 Ndamwambilinga cakubingeti mwami wakendi nakamupe incito yakubona bintu byonse mbyakute.
LUK 12:45 Lino na musebeshi uyo lamba mumoyo wakendi eti, mwami wakame lacelwa kwisa, lino utatika kuma basebenshi banendi batuloba ne batukashi kayi ne kutatika kulya, kunwa ne kukolwa.
LUK 12:46 Mwami wa musebeshi uyo lakesanga pabusuba mbwateshi kayi nepa cindi ncabula kwingashila. Nakamupe cisubulo ciyosha ne kumuwala uko nkoti kukabenga bantu babula lushomo.
LUK 12:47 Musebenshi uyo wishi mwami wakendi ncasuni, nomba liya kulibambila nambi kwinsa ncasuni mwami wakendi nakamukwipe cangofu.
LUK 12:48 Nomba musebenshi utacinshi ncasuni mwami wakendi, na lepishi mwakubula kwinshiba nakomwe pang'ana. Muntu uliyense walapewa bingi welela kubwesha bingi. Muntu walapewa bingi kwambeti asunge, nakambilwe kubwesha bingi pelu pa ibyo mbyalapewa.
LUK 12:49 “Ndalesa kuwala mulilo mucishi capanshi, nendakondwa kwambeti mulilo newabangila kendi!
LUK 12:50 Nomba ndelela kwingila mulubatisho lwamapensho anene, neco moyo wakame nkawekalikana kushikila mapensho ayo akenshike.
LUK 12:51 Sena mulayeyengeti ndalaleta lumuno mucishi ca panshi? Cakubinga ndiyawa, nsombi ndalaleta kupansana.
LUK 12:52 Kufuma lelo mumukowa umo nimukabe bantu basanu bapatana, batatu nibakapatane nebabili. Naboyo babili nibakabukilane ne batatu
LUK 12:53 Baishi nibakabukile mwana mutuloba, neye mwana mutuloba nakabukile baishi, banyina nibakabukile mwana mutukashi, neye mwana mutukashi nakabukile banyina. Kumakwendi batukashi nibakabukile mulekashi, neye mulekashi nakabukile kumakwendi batukashi.”
LUK 12:54 Yesu walambila bantu bonseti, “Na mulabono likumbi kalifumina kumboshi, mukute kwambeti, imfula niloke lelo, nicakubinga ikute kuloka.
LUK 12:55 Na impepo itatika kupupula kufumina kumusansa mukute kwambeti lelo nikupye cepa, kayi kukute kuba copeleco.
LUK 12:56 Amwe bantu batenshi mbyomulambanga, mukute kwinshiba kuboneka kwa cishi capanshi ne kwilu, nomba nicani nkamukute kwinshiba bupandulushi bwa bintu bilenshikinga masuba ano?”
LUK 12:57 “Nomba nipacebo cini nkamukute kwinsa byalulama mobene?
LUK 12:58 Na mulenga kunkuta ne munobe wa mulandu,wela kufwambana kunyumfwana nendi kamucili panshila, kwambeti katakutwala kuli weshi kubeteka. Pakwinga neye weshikubeteka inga ukutwala kumushilikali, neye mushilikali inga ukusunga mujele.
LUK 12:59 Ndakwambilinga cakubingeti nteshi ukafumemo kushikila ukalipile byonse bilayandikinga.”
LUK 13:1 Pacindico bantu bambi balikubapo balamwambila Yesu makani a bantu baku Galileya abo Pilato mbwalashina mung'anda ya Lesa nekusankanya milopa yabo pamilumbo njobalikubenga kuli Lesa.
LUK 13:2 Lino Yesu walabakumbuleti, “Sena mulayeyengeti abo ba Galileya balashininwa balikuba baipa kupita ba Galileya bambi bonse?
LUK 13:3 Sobwe! Lino ndamwambilingeti na mubule kusanduka kubwipishi bwenu nenjamwe nimukafweti basa.
LUK 13:4 Nomba abo bantu likumi nebasanu ne batatu lwalabawila lubumbu lutali lwa ku Siloamu, mulayeyengeti balikuba baipa kupita bantu bonse balikwikala mu Yelusalemu?
LUK 13:5 Sobwe! Nsombi namubule kusanduka kubwipishi bwenu nenjamwe nimukafwe eti basa.”
LUK 13:6 Kayi Yesu walabambila mukoshanyo uwu, “Kwalikuba muntu naumbi walikukute citondo ca mukuyu calikuba mulibala lya minyansa. Bumbi busuba walaya kucitondo kuya kubonako nkuyu, nsombi liya kushicanako.
LUK 13:7 Lino walambila musebenshi eti, ‘Bona nibyaka bitatu nkanjisa kuno kuyanda nkuyu kumukuyu uyu, nsombi nkankute kucanapo. Lino citeme cilonongelenga cani bulongo’
LUK 13:8 Nomba nendi walakumbuleti, ‘Mwami ulekeni kwacaka cino conka. Nindubambilile cena nekubika mboleshi.
LUK 13:9 Mpani nicikekate bisepo mwakali. Nsombi na cikabule kwikata mukaciteme.’”
LUK 13:10 Lino pabusuba bumbi bwa Sabata, Yesu walikwiyisha mung'anda yakupaililamo.
LUK 13:11 Mung'anda umo mwalikuba mutukashi walikuba ne mishimu yaipa walapenga kwa byaka likumi ne bisanu ne bitatu. Walikwenda kali wakotama, nkalikucikosha kololoka nambi pang'ana.
LUK 13:12 Lino Yesu mpwalabona mutukashi uyo walamwambileti, “Mutukashi, ulasungululwa kubulwashi bwakobe.”
LUK 13:13 Lino Yesu walabika makasa akendi pali endiye, popelapo walololoka nekutatika kulumbaisha Lesa.
LUK 13:14 Lino mukulene wa ng'anda ya kupaililamo walakalala cepa mpwalaboneti Yesu lashiliki muntu pa busuba bwa Sabata. Lino walambila bantu eti, “Kuli masuba asanu ne bumo ngotwelela kusebensa mbuli ncocalembwa mumilawo. Neco mwisenga kushilikwa mumasubayo, kufunyakowa pa busuba bwa Sabata Sobwe.”
LUK 13:15 Lino Mwami Yesu walamukumbuleti, “Amwe mobantu omukute kwamba mbyomutenshi, niyani mulikoto wela kubula kucalwila musune nambi mbongolo yakendi ne kuya kwinwisha menshi pa busuba bwa Sabata?
LUK 13:16 Nomba uyo mutukashi mwana wa mumukowa wa Abulahamu uyo Satana ngwalasunga kwa byaka likumi ne bisanu ne bitatu, sena nkelela kusungululwa pa busuba bwa Sabata?”
LUK 13:17 Yesu mpwalambeco balwani bakendi balanyumfwa nsoni, nsombi bantu bonse balasangalala pabintu byonse byaina bikankamanisha mbyalensa.
LUK 13:18 Yesu walepusheti, “Anu bwami bwa Lesa bulyeti cani? Nomba ngandibukoshanisha necani?
LUK 13:19 Bwakoshana ne luseke lwa mastadi ulo muntu ndwalabyala mulibala mwakendi. Mpolwalamena nekukula, calaba citondo cinene kayi ne bikeni byalabambilamo bisangala mumisampi yaco.”
LUK 13:20 Kayi Yesu walepusheti, “Anu Bwami bwa Lesa ngandibukoshanisha necani?
LUK 13:21 Bulyeti cikufufumusha shinkwa, ico mutukashi ncalasankanya ne bunga wakwana bikopo bitatu, kushikila byonse byalafutumuka.”
LUK 13:22 Yesu mpalikuba pabulwendo bwakuya ku Yelusalemu, walenda muminshi kaya kwiyisha.
LUK 13:23 Lino umbi muntu walepusha Yesu eti, “Mwami, sena ni bang'ana beti bakapuluke?” Yesu walakumbuleti,
LUK 13:24 “Kamweleshani cangofu kwingila pacishinga cing'ana pakwinga ndamwambilingeti bantu bangi nibakeleshe kwingila, nsombi nteshi bakacikoshe.
LUK 13:25 Lino mwine ng'anda nakanyamuke nekucala kucishinga. Lino amwe mwemana pansa nimukatatike kukonkosha ne kwambeti, ‘Kamutucalwilako.’ Nsombi nendi nakamukumbuleti, ‘Kandimwinshi nkomulafumini.’
LUK 13:26 Lino nimukatatike kwambeti, ‘Pasa twalikulya ne kunwa pamo nenjamwe kayi mwalikwiyisha muminshi yetu.’
LUK 13:27 Nsombi nakamwambileti kandimwinshi nkomulafumininga, fumani apa mwense babwipishi.
LUK 13:28 Lino nimukalile nekukokota meno, nimukabone Abulahamu ne Isaki ne Yakobo kayi ne bashinshimi bonse kabali mu Bwami bwa Lesa, nsombi amwe kamuli pansa.
LUK 13:29 Bantu nibakafume kucwe ne kumboshi ne kumusansa ne kunyika, kwisa kwikala nekulya mu Bwami bwa Lesa.
LUK 13:30 Lino abo balikunyuma nibakabe kuntangu naboyo balikuntangu nibakabe kunyuma.”
LUK 13:31 Pacindi ico Bafalisi bambi balesa kuli Yesu nekumwambileti, “Kamufumani kuno, mwenga kumusena umbi pakwinga Helode layandanga kumushina.”
LUK 13:32 Nsombi Yesu walakumbuleti, “Kamuyani mumwambile uyo mwaba eti, ‘Ndafunyunga mishimu yaipa ne kushilika bantu lelo ne lilo. Lino pabusuba bwa butatu ninkapwishe incito yakame.’
LUK 13:33 Necikabeco ndelela kuba pa bulwendo lelo, ne lilo kayi ne busuba bwakonkapo, pakwinga nkacainapo mushinshimi kushinwa kumbi, nsombi ku Yelusalemu.”
LUK 13:34 “Obe Yelusalemu, Yelusalemu, weshikushina bashinshimi nekupwaya mabwe bantu abo Lesa mbwalatuma kuli njobe. Lingi ndalikuyanda kubunganya bantu mbuli ncoikute kwinsa inkuku pakufukatila twana twayo mumapapamino, nsombi obe walakana.”
LUK 13:35 Neco ng'anda ya Lesa inene iyi nikabe matongo. Ndamwambilingeti nteshi mukambonepo kayi kushikila mukambeti, “Walelekwa uyo lesanga mulina lya Mwami Lesa.”
LUK 14:1 Nabumbi busuba bwa Sabata Yesu walakwiwa kuya kulya kung'anda ya mukulene wa Bafalisi. Popelapo Bafalisi bali kabamulangishisha.
LUK 14:2 Lino pantangu pakendi Yesu palikuba muntu walikuba washimba mubili.
LUK 14:3 Lino Yesu walepusha Bafalisi ne beshikwiyisha Milawo eti, “Sena Milawo ikute kusuminisha kushilika muntu pa busuba bwa Sabata nambi ne?”
LUK 14:4 Nsombi balo balamwenowa. Lino Yesu walamanta muntu uyo, wamushilika nekumwambileti koya.
LUK 14:5 Popelapo Yesu walabepusheti, “Nomba nibani pakati penu. Na ng'ombe iwila mumukalo pa busuba bwa Sabata, sena nkela kwisabula pa cindico?”
LUK 14:6 Lino balalilwa kumukumbula.
LUK 14:7 Yesu mpwalabona bantu balakwiwa kulya nendi balatatika kulisalila bipuna byabulemu, walabambila mukoshanisho eti,
LUK 14:8 “Na muntu umukuwa kubwinga, mutekalanga pacipuna ca bulemu, pakwinga uyo muntu lamukuwu inga kakute bambi bapita amwe ba bulemu.
LUK 14:9 Neco uyo walamukuwa mwense mobabili nakese akamwambileti, kamufumani apa, pani cipuna ici kumuntu uyu, Lino nimukanyumfwe insoni mwakanyamuka kuya kwikala pa cipuma cabula bulemu.
LUK 14:10 Nomba na bamukuwa, kamuyani mwikale pabusena bwabula kuba bwabulemu kwambeti uyo mwine lamukuwu akamwambileti, ‘Kamwisani mwikalile pano, pa cipuna ca bulemu.’ Ici nicikakupe bulemu pamenso abantu bonse mbowalakwiwa nabo.
LUK 14:11 Pakwinga muntu uliyense weshikulisumpula nakacepeshewe nsombi muntu weshikulicepesha nakasumpulwe.”
LUK 14:12 Lino Yesu walambila Mufalisi walabakuweti, “Na mulakuwu bantu kwisakulya nabo cakulya ca munshi nambi ca mansailo, mutakuwa banenu, bakamukowa, ne bamakwenu nambi banobe babile, pakwinga naboyo nga bamukuwani, neco ngamutambulila limo cipo cenu.
LUK 14:13 Nsombi na ulabamba byakulya byakusekelela, kuwa bakandu ne balema kayi ne bampofu.
LUK 14:14 Lino nukapewe colwe, pakwinga balo nkabela kucikonsha kumubweshela. Lesa nakamubweshele pabusuba ubo baswepa bakapunduka kubafu.”
LUK 14:15 Muntu umbi palyabo Yesu mbwalikulyanabo, mpwalanyumfwa makani aya, walambila Yesu eti, “Walelekwa uyo eti akalye nabo pakusekelela mu Bwami bwa Lesa.”
LUK 14:16 Nendi Yesu walakumbuleti, “Kwalikuba muntu umbi walabamba malyalya kwambeti basekelele, ne kukuwa bantu bangi.
LUK 14:17 Cindi camalyalya mpocalashika walatuma musebenshi wakendi kuya kubakuwa nekubambileti, kamwisani bintu byonse bilabambiwa.
LUK 14:18 Nsombi bonse balakwiwa balatalika kwamba bintu byalabatatisha. Mutanshi walambeti, ndaulu libala neco ndelela kuya kulibona. Bandekeleleko nteti njise.”
LUK 14:19 Umbi walambeti, Ndaulu ng'ombe shakwana bipani bisanu, ndenga akushelesha, mundekeleleko nteti njise.
LUK 14:20 Naumbi walambeti, Ame ndeba mutukashi lino lino neco nteshi njise.
LUK 14:21 “Lino musebenshi walabwelela ne kumwambila mwami wakendi byonse ibyo. Mwine ng'anda walakalala, lino walamwambila musebesheti, endesha, koya munshila shinene ne shing'ana sha mumushi ukuwe bakandu ne balema kayi ne bampofu wise nabo kuno.
LUK 14:22 Mpwalabwela musebenshi walambeti, mwami, ndenshi kwelena nencomulang'ambili, kayi busena mobucili.
LUK 14:23 Lino mwami wakendi walakumbuleti, koya munshila ne mumikondo ya muminshi ubambile bantu cangofu eti bese kwambeti ng'anda yakame isule.
LUK 14:24 Ndamwambilingeti paliya nambi umo palyabo mbondalakuwa weshi alyeko malyalya akusekelela kwakame!”
LUK 14:25 Likoto linene lya bantu lyalakonkela Yesu, lino walapindamuka ne kubambileti,
LUK 14:26 Muntu uliyense layandanga kuba weshikwiya wakame welela kusuna ame kupita baishi ne banyina, nambi bakashendi ne bana, banse batukashi ne batuloba, kupita buyumi bwakendi.
LUK 14:27 Muntu uliyense labulunga kulikana mwine ne kuba walimbambila kupenshewa, nkela kuba shikwiya wakame.
LUK 14:28 “Nomba niyani umo pali amwe ayandanga kwibaka ng'anda itali, sena nkakute kwikala panshi nekubona na ukute mali akwana bintu bikute kuyandika kwambeti apwishe ng'anda iyo?
LUK 14:29 Pakwinga nalabulu kwinseco, ngacikonshyowa kubamba panshi, nekwalilwa kupwisha. Nomba bantu beshikubona ibi inga bamuseka.
LUK 14:30 Nibakambeti, uyu muntu walatatika kwibaka ng'anda, nomba lalilwa kupwisha.”
LUK 14:31 “Nomba nimwami cini, wela pakuya kulwana ne mwami umbi, nkakute kwikala panshi nekuyeya cena? Ukute kuyeya kwambeti nibashilikali byulu makumi abili bela kulwana ne mwami usa umbi, uyo lesanga bela kucikonshya ni bashilikali byulu likumi limo.
LUK 14:32 Neco na labono kwambeti nkela kucikonshya, ukute kutuma beshikumwimanina kwambeti be ngabasenge lumuno, mwami usa kacili kutali.
LUK 14:33 “Weco muntu uliyense labulunga kushiya bintu byonse mbyakute, nkela kuba weshikwiya wakame.”
LUK 14:34 “Mucele waina nomba na ulasambuluku ngamwinseconi kwambeti ube cena kayi?
LUK 14:35 Uliyawa incito kubulongo nambi pa bufumba bwakubika mulibala bakute kutayowa. muntu ukute matwi anyumfwe!”
LUK 15:1 Lino beshikusonkesha musonko ne bantu nabambi balikubula kukonka Milawo, balesa kwambeti banyumfwe mulumbe wa Yesu.
LUK 15:2 Lino Bafalisi ne beshikwiyisha ba Milawo balatatika kudandaula ne kwambeti, “Uyu muntu latambulungeconi bantu babwipishi, nekulya nabo.”
LUK 15:3 Lino Yesu walabambila mukoshanyo eti,
LUK 15:4 “Na umbi pali amwe kakute mbelele shili mwanda, lino imo itaika sena nkela kushiya mbelele shili makumi asanu ne ana ne shisanu ne shina ne kuya kulangaula kushikila wicana?
LUK 15:5 Lino na layicana ukute kukondwa ne kwinyamuna pamafushi
LUK 15:6 nekwitwala kung'anda. Lino ukute kukuwa banendi ne beshikamukowa nekubambileti, katukondwani pamo pakwinga mbelele yakame yanga yataika ndaicana,
LUK 15:7 ndamwambilingeti, nakoyo kwilu nikukabe kukondwa pamuntu umo wabwipishi lasanduku kubwipishi, kupita bantu bali makumi asanu ne ana ne basanu ne bana balulama batasuni kusanduka.”
LUK 15:8 “Na mutukashi umbi nkakute mali amasilifa likumi, na imo itaika ngawinseconi? Sena nte ukute kumunika lampi nekupyanga mung'anda yakendi nekulangaula cena monse kushikila wicana?
LUK 15:9 Alicana ukute kukuwa banendi ne beshikamukowa nekubambileti, ‘Katukondwani pamo pakwinga lyali lyakame lyanga lyataika ndalicana.’”
LUK 15:10 Yesu walabambileti, “Ndamwambilinga ne kwilu encobakute kwinsa bangelo ba Lesa bakute kukondwa na muntu umo weshi kwinsa bwipishi lasanduku mubyaipa.”
LUK 15:11 Yesu kayi walabambileti, “Kwalikuba mutuloba naumbi walikukute bana batuloba babili.
LUK 15:12 Lino kanike bantu walabambila baisheti, ‘Ta, kamumpani buboni mbomwela kunjabilako ame mumpele limo.’ Nabo bameshabo balabayabanya buboni bwabo.
LUK 15:13 Kapatana papita masuba angi, kanike bantu uyo walolisha buboni bwakendi nekumanta mali kuya pabulwendo kucishi ca kutali uko nkwalaya akononga mali akendi onse mubwikalo bwaipa.
LUK 15:14 Mpwalapwisha mali akendi onse, mucishi umo mwalaba nsala inene, lino walatatika kupenga.
LUK 15:15 Lino walaya kumuntu naumbi wa mucishi umo. Lino muntu uyo walamupa incito yakwembela ne kusanina nkumba.
LUK 15:16 Mutuloba uyo walatatika kukumbwa bufufu bwamusekese mboshali kulya nkumba. Nomba kuliya nambi muntu umo walikumupa byakulya.”
LUK 15:17 “Lino mpwalekalikana mano mumoyo wakendi walambeti, basebenshi bonse ba bata bakute byakulya bingi balekutunga, lino ame kuno ndayandanga kufwa kunsala.
LUK 15:18 Ndanyamukunga njenga kuli bata njengambeti, Ta, ndalepisha kuli Lesa ne kuli njamwe.
LUK 15:19 Nkandelela kukwiweti mwanenu, nsombi munsuminishe nsanduke musebenshi wenu.”
LUK 15:20 Lino walanyamuka nekubwelela kuli baishi. “Nkacili patali baishi balamubona, lino bamunyumfwila inkumbo, ne kumukonka akumukumbata ne kumumyanguta mwakukondwa.
LUK 15:21 Mwana uyo walabambila baisheti, ta, ndalepisha kuli Lesa ne kuli amwe. Nkandelelela kukwiweti mwanenu.
LUK 15:22 Nomba baishi balambila basebenshi babo eti, ‘Kamufwambanani mulete byakufwala byaina afwale. Mumufwalike likosa kumunwe ne nkwabilo kumyendo.
LUK 15:23 Salaniponi ng'ombe yansuka inene mushine kwambeti tulye tukondwe.
LUK 15:24 Pakwinga uyu mwaname wanga wafwa, lino laba muyumi kayi wanga wataika lino lacaniki.’ Pacindici balatatika kusekelela.”
LUK 15:25 Pacindico mukulene bantu walikuba kulibala. Lino mpwalashika pepi ne ng'anda, walanyumfwa bantu bali kabembila ne kushana ne kulubisha.
LUK 15:26 Walakuwa musebenshi umo nekumwipusheti, “cilenshikinga kuno nicani?”
LUK 15:27 Musebenshi walakumbuleti, “Mukwenu lesa neco baiso bamushinini ng'ombe yansuka inene pakwinga lesa nkali muyumi.”
LUK 15:28 Mpwalanyumfweco popelapo walakalala kayi walakana nekwingila mung'anda. Nomba baishi balapula pansa kuya kumukombeleleti engile mung'anda.
LUK 15:29 Nendi walakumbula baishi eti, kamubonani! byaka kufula mbyondamusebensele eti ndemusha kayi ndiyawa kumwipishilapo nambi pang'ana nomba muliya kumpapo nambi kapongo konka kwambeti kondwepo nebaname.
LUK 15:30 Nsombi mwanenu uyu walononga buboni bwenu mubatukashi bapombo, mpwalesa kung'anda, mulamushinini ng'ombe yansuka!
LUK 15:31 Baishi balamwambileti, “Omwaname, obe uli nenjame cindi conse kayi bintu byonse mbyonkute nibyakobe.
LUK 15:32 Nsombi lino katukondwa nekusekelela pakwinga kanike wakobe walikuba wafwa, lino nimuyumi, walikuba wataika, lino lacaniki.”
LUK 16:1 Yesu walabambila beshikwiya bakendi eti, Kwalikuba muntu mubile walikukute kapitawo weshi kubona buboni. Bantu balamwamba muntu uyo eti lonongonga buboni bwa mwami wakendi.
LUK 16:2 Lino walakuwa kapitawo wabuboni nekumwipusheti, “Nomba nicani ncondanyufunga pali njobe? Mpandulwile sha bukapitawo bwakobe pakwinga nkowelela kuba kapitawo sobwe.”
LUK 16:3 Lino kapitawo walatatika kuyeya mumoyo mwakendi eti, “Ninjiseconi mwami wakame layandanga kumfunya incito? Ndiya ngofu shakulima kayi kusenga kukutekumpa insoni.
LUK 16:4 Lino nceti njinse nici, kwambeti bantu bakantambule mumandabo, ndakafuma incito.”
LUK 16:5 Lino walatika kukuwa bonse balikukute nkongole ku mwami wakendi umo ne umo nekwipusha mutanshi eti, “Walakweleta shingaye kumwami wakame?”
LUK 16:6 Neye walakumbuleti, “Ndalakweleta mingomo mwanda ya mafuta”. Neco kapitawo uyo walamwambileti, “Manta lipepa apo palembwa nkongole yakobe, ufwambane wikale panshi ulembepo eti, mingomo yakwana makumi asanu.”
LUK 16:7 Lino walepusha umbi eti, “Nomba obe walakweleta shingaye?” Walakumbuleti, “Ndalakweleta masaka ali mwanda a maila.” Lino neye walamwambileti, “Manta Lipepa palembwa nkongole yakobe, Ulembepo masaka makumi asanu ne atatu.”
LUK 16:8 Mwami wakendi uyo walalumbaisha kapitawo wa buboni wabula kushomeka pakucenjela kwakendi. Pakwinga bantu ba mucishi ca panshi pano nibasongo pa kubamba makani abo kupita bantu bali mu mumuni wa Lesa.
LUK 16:9 Yesu walapitilisha kubambileti, “Ndamwambilinga kamulicanina banenu babuboni bwa mucishi cino kwambeti, buboni bwakapwa nibakamutambule mumanda amuyayaya.
LUK 16:10 Muntu uliyense washomeka pabintu bing'ana, nakashomeke pa bintu bingi. Uyo wabula kushomeka pabintu bing'ana, nteshi akashomeke pabintu bingi.
LUK 16:11 Lino na nkamwashomeka pabuboni bwa pacishi cino, nomba niyani eti akamushome nekumupani buboni bwancincine?
LUK 16:12 Na kamulimwabula kushomeka pabuboni bwa bantu bambi, nomba niyani eti akamupeni buboni bwelela kuba bwenu?”
LUK 16:13 “Kuliya musebenshi wela kusebensela bami babili, pakwinga ukute kupatapo umbi nekusuna umbi, nambi kunyumfwila umbi nekusula umbi. Anu ekwambeti nkamwela kusebensela Lesa ne buboni.”
LUK 16:14 Bafalisi mpolabanyumfwa makani aya balatatika kushibuluka Yesu pakwinga balo balikusunisha mali.
LUK 16:15 Nsombi Yesu walabambileti, “Amwe mukute kulibonesha kubantu eti mwalulama, necikabeco Lesa winshi myoyo yenu. Pakwinga bintu byonse bantu mbyobakute kwambeti byaina, nsombi kuli Lesa kuliya mobibelele.”
LUK 16:16 Milawo Lesa njalapa Mose ne Maswi alalemba bashinshimi byali kusebensa cindi ca Yohane mubatishi. Kufuma pacindico Mulumbe Waina wa Bwami bwa Lesa ukute kukambaukwa, kayi ne bantu bangi baleleshenga ne ngofu kwambeti bengile mu Bwami ubu.
LUK 16:17 Nsombi capuba kwambeti kwilu necishi kupwa, kupita liswi limo lya Milawo kupwa ngofu.
LUK 16:18 “Muntu uliyense laleke mukashendi nekweba mukashi naumbi, lenshi bupombo. Neye uyo lebe mutukashi ngwalaleka munendi lenshinga bupombo”.
LUK 16:19 Kwalikuba muntu mubile walikufwala byadula uyo walikulya cena lyonse.
LUK 16:20 Lino kwalikuba muntu wapenga lina lyakendi walikuba Lazalo. Walikukute bilonda mubili wonse, walikusuna kona pa cishinga ca ng'anda ya muntu mubile uyo.
LUK 16:21 Lazalo walikaminina mate uto twakulya twalikulaka panshi pa tebulu ya muntu mubile uyo, naboyo bakabwa bali kabesa akumyanguta pabilonda byakendi.
LUK 16:22 Muntu wapenga uyo walafwa, bangelo balamutwala kwilu mumakasa a Abulahamu. Muntu mubile uyo neye walafwa nekumufukila mumanda.
LUK 16:23 Lino mubile uyo mpwalikupenga mumusena wa bafu, walalanga kwilu nekubona Lazalo kulubasu lwa Abulahamu nkali patali.
LUK 16:24 Lino walolobesha eti, “Ta Abulahamu kamunyumfwilako inkumbo. Kamutumani Lazalo kwambeti abike cikumo cakendi mumenshi kwambeti atontoshe lulemi lwakame pakwinga ndashupiki mumulilo muno.”
LUK 16:25 Lino Abulahamu walambeti, “Mwaname kwanuka mpowalikuba muyumi walatambula bintu byonse byaina, neye Lazalo walatambula bintu byeshikubaba. Lino neye kuno wakondwa, obe uli mumapensho anene.
LUK 16:26 Kayi pakati petu nenjobe pali cisengu, cakwambeti kuliya muntu ulikuno wela kucikonsha kusabuka kwisa uko, nambi uli uko kwisa kuno.”
LUK 16:27 Kufumapo mubile uyo walambeti, “Anu ndasengenga Ta, mutume Lazalo kung'anda ya bata.
LUK 16:28 Pakwinga nkute bakwetu basanu. Enga abacenjeshe kwambeti naboyo batakesa kumusena wa mapensho kuno.”
LUK 16:29 Nsombi Abulahamu walambeti, “abo bakute mabuku alalembwa ne Mose ne bashinshimi, kabanyumfwani byalembwamo.”
LUK 16:30 Nendi walakumbuleti, sobwe ta Abulahamu, na umbi ufuma kubafu nekuyako, mpobela kusanduka kubwipishi bwabo.
LUK 16:31 Abulahamu walamwambileti, “na nkabanyumfwilinga Mabala alalembwa ne Mose ne bashinshimi nteshi bakanyumfwepo nambi umbi akapunduke kubafu.”
LUK 17:1 Yesu walambila beshikwiya bakendi eti, “Bintu bikute kulengesha muntu kwambeti aipishe nibikaboneke, nsombi mapensho nakabe pali bantu beshikubileta.
LUK 17:2 Nomba caina kwambeti muntu uyo asungwe ne libwe linene lya mwampelo munshingo ne kumuwala mu lwenje, kupita kulengesha umo wa bana bang'ana aba kwipisha.”
LUK 17:3 Neco kamucenjelani! Na mukwenu lakwipishili, umukalalile, na lasenge kulekelelwa umulekelele.
LUK 17:4 Na lakwipishili mankanda asanu ne abili pabusuba bumo, kayi mankanda onse ayo kesa kuli njobe nekwambeti, “Ndepishi,” Welela kumulekelela.
LUK 17:5 Lino batumwa balambila Mwami eti, “Kamukonempesha lushomo lwetu.”
LUK 17:6 Mwami Yesu walabakumbuleti, “Nemwabanga ne lushomo lulyeti luseke lwa masitadi, ngamucikonsha kwambila citondo eti, ‘Shukuka apo ulishimpike mumulonga, nacoyo ngacimunyumfwila.’ ”
LUK 17:7 “Nomba naumbi pakati penu kakute musebenshi shikulima mulibala nambi kwembela mbelele. Nomba sena akomboka ngomwambila eti, ‘Fwambana kwesa ulye cakulya’
LUK 17:8 Sobwe nkela kwinseco! Nsombi ngomwambileti, ‘Kontelekela cakulya, na upwishe ufwale cena nekundetela byakulya, lino ndapwisha nenjobe mpoti ulye ne kunwa.’
LUK 17:9 Lino sena ngomulumba musebenshi pakwinga lenshi ncowamwambila?
LUK 17:10 Copeleco nenjamwe, na mulenshi ncomwalambilwa mwelela kwambeti, ‘To basebenshi babula kwelela kutambula kantu. Pakwinga tulenshi mulimo wetu!’ ”
LUK 17:11 Yesu mpwalikuya ku Yelusalemu, walapita panyinsa ya Samaliya ne Galileya.
LUK 17:12 Mpwalashika mumunshi naumbi, beshimankuntu bali likumi balamukumanya ne kwimana pataliko.
LUK 17:13 Lino balobelesheti, “Amwe Yesu, Nkambo kamutunyumfwilako nkumbo!”
LUK 17:14 Yesu mpwalababona walabambileti, “Kamuyani ku beshimilumbo baye bamuboneti mulaba cena.” Lino mpobalikuya kwenda munshila, balaba cena.
LUK 17:15 Lino umo pakati pabo mpwalaboneti laba cena, walabwelela kuli Yesu nkaya akulumbaisha Lesa ne liswi lyapelu.
LUK 17:16 Lino mpwalashika kuli Yesu walafukama kuntangu kwakendi ne kumulumba. Shimankuntu uyu walikuba mu Samaliya.
LUK 17:17 Lino Yesu walambeti, “Sena bashilikwa nkabanga likumi? Nomba bambi basanu ne bana balikupe?
LUK 17:18 Nomba nicani kulesowa muswamashi enka kwisa kulumbaisha Lesa?
LUK 17:19 Kufumapo, Yesu walambila shimankuntu uyo, pakwinga wanshoma nyamuka koya, Lushomo lwakobe lulakushiliki.”
LUK 17:20 Bafalisi bambi balepusha Yesu eti, “Bwami bwa Lesa nibukese lilyoni?” Yesu walabakumbuleti, “Bwami bwa Lesa, nteshi bukese mwakubonekela ne menso sobwe.
LUK 17:21 Kuliya weshi akambeti, ‘Nibuno bulikuno!’ Nambi eti, ‘Nibusa kusa!’ Pakwinga Bwami bwa Lesa buli pakati penu.”
LUK 17:22 Lino walakumbula beshikwiya bakendi eti, “Nicikashike cindi mpoti mukayande kubona Mwana Muntu mubusuba bumo, nomba nteshi mukabubonepo sobwe.
LUK 17:23 Nikukabe bantu beshi bakamwambileti, ‘Kamubona nte busa bulikusa, nambi eti, ubu bulipano, mutakayako nambi kubakonkela sobwe.’
LUK 17:24 Pakwinga mbuli kubyasha ncokukute kucilingana mwilu nekubonekela kumbasu shonse, enceti kukabe pabusuba bwakwisa Mwana Muntu.
LUK 17:25 Nsombi welela kutanguna kupenshewa, nekukanwa ne bantu ba cino cindi.
LUK 17:26 “Mbuli ncocalikuba mumasuba a Nowa encoti cikabe mumasuba a Mwana Muntu.
LUK 17:27 Mucindico bantu bali kabalya, ne kunwa, kweba kayi ne kwebwa kushikila busuba Nowa mbwalengila mubwato. Lino muyoba unene walesa nekubononga bonse.
LUK 17:28 Nicikabeti ncocalikuba mucindi ca Loti, bantu bali kabalya ne kunwa, kula ne kulisha, kubyala ne kwibaka manda.
LUK 17:29 Nsombi busuba Loti mpwalafuma mu Sodomu, Lesa walalasha mulilo wa salufa walalaka kwilu nekubononga bonse.
LUK 17:30 Nicikabe copeleco pabusuba Mwana Muntu mpoti akese.
LUK 17:31 “Busuba ubo, uyo eti akabenga paciluli ca ng'anda atakaseluketi amante bintu byakendi mung'anda, neye uyo eti akabenga mulibala atakabwelela kung'anda.
LUK 17:32 Kamwanukani muka Loti!
LUK 17:33 Uyo layandanga kupulusha buyumi bwakendi, nakabutaye. Nsombi uyo latayanga buyumi bwakendi pacebo cakame, nakabupulushe.
LUK 17:34 Ndamwambilinga pabusuba ubo mashiku, bantu babili nibakabenga bona pabulili bumo, umo nakamantwe, umbi nakashale.
LUK 17:35 Batukashi babili nibakapelenga pantu pamo umo nakamantwe, umbi nakashale.
LUK 17:36 Bantu babili nibakabenga mulibala, nsombi umo nakamantwe, umbi nakashale.”
LUK 17:37 Beshikwiya balamwipusheti, “Mwami, nikupeyo nkoti bikenshikile ibi?” Yesu walakumbuleti, “Uko kulafwili cintu nawoyo makubi akute kubungana kopeloko.”
LUK 18:1 Lino Yesu walabambila beshikwiya bakendi mukoshano, pakuyanda kubeyisha kwambeti bapailenga lyonse kwakubula kubwelela kunyuma.
LUK 18:2 Walambeti, “Kwalikuba mubeteshi mumunshi umbi walikubula kutina Lesa nambi kulemeka muntu.
LUK 18:3 Kwalikuba mukalubingi mutukashi mumunshi wopeloyo walikaya kuli shikubeteka ne kumusengeti, ‘Munyamfweko pa mulandu ngonkute ku mulwani wakame.’
LUK 18:4 Masuba alafula mubeteshi kakanowa, nsombi panyuma pakendi walayeya mwineti, necikaba kwambeti nkantini Lesa nambi kulemeka muntu,
LUK 18:5 pakwinga mukalubingi uyu landemeshe kunjobekela, nindimubetekele mulandu wakendi, kwambeti ngaundemesha kwisa kuno!”
LUK 18:6 Lino Mwami walambeti, “Nte mulanyumfu maswi amubeteshi wabula kululama usa.
LUK 18:7 Sena Lesa nteshi akabetekeshe mulandu wa balulama bakendi abo balamusengenga munshi ne mashiku? Sena nakalilwe kubanyamfwa?
LUK 18:8 Ndamwambilingeti nakafwambane kubabetekela mulandu wabo. Sena pakwisa Mwana Muntu nakacane bantu bakute lushomo panshi pano?”
LUK 18:9 Lino Yesu walamba mukoshano umbi kulyabo bali kabayeyeti balulama kupita bonse nekunyansha banabo.
LUK 18:10 Walambeti, “Kwalikuba bantu babili balaya akupaila ku Ng'anda ya Lesa. Umbi walikuba Mufalisi naumbi walikuba weshimisonko.
LUK 18:11 “Lino Mufalisi walanyamuka nekupaileti, ndamulumbunga obe Lesa, pakwinga ame nkandipo eti bantu nabambi bonse. Nabo nibantu babula kululama kayi ni bapombo. Kayi ndalumbu pakwinga kandipo eti uyu weshi kusonkesha musonko uyu.
LUK 18:12 Ndalikanishinga kulya mankanda abili munsondo, kayi nkute kubenga calikumi pabintu byonse mbyonkute kucana.
LUK 18:13 “Nsombi weshikusonkesha musonko usa walemana patali, liya kulangapo kwilu. Nsombi walikalyuma pantiti nekwambeti, Lesa, kamunyumfwilako inkumbo ame ndemwipishi.”
LUK 18:14 Yesu walabambileti, “Cancine ncine, weshimusonko walabwelela kucomwabo kali walulama pamenso a Lesa, mu Falisi neye liya. Pakwinga muntu uliyense weshi kulisumpula nakacepeshewe, nomba muntu weshi kulicepesha nakasumpulwe.”
LUK 18:15 Bantu nabambi balaleta bana bang'ana kuli Yesu kwambeti abike makasa akendi pabana nekubaleleka. Beshikwiya bakendi mpobalaboneco balabakalalila bantu abo balaleta bana.
LUK 18:16 Nsombi Yesu walakuwa bana nekwambeti. “Kamulekani bana bang'ana bese kuli njame, mutabakanishanga, pakwinga Bwami bwa Lesa ni bwa bantu balyeti bana aba.
LUK 18:17 Ndamwambilinga cakubingeti uyo labulunga kutambula Bwami Bwa Lesa eti mwana, cakubinga nteshi akengilemo.”
LUK 18:18 Mukulene wa Bayuda naumbi walepusha Yesu eti. “Bashikwiyisha baina, nomba ndelelela kwinseconi kwambeti nkatambule buyumi butapu?”
LUK 18:19 Yesu walepusheti, “Nomba nicani ncolambilico kwambeti ndaina? Kuliya muntu waina, nsombi Lesa enka.
LUK 18:20 Milawo uyinshi yeshi kwambeti, ‘Utensa bulale, utashina, kotaiba, utapa bukamboni bwabwepeshi, lemeka baiso ne banyoko.’”
LUK 18:21 Muntu uyo walakumbuleti, “Iyi Milawo yonse nkute kwikonka kufuma kubutwanike bwakame.”
LUK 18:22 Yesu mpwalanyumfweco, walamwambileti, “Kulashalowa cintu cimo ncowelela kwinsa. Koya ulishe byonse mbyokute, mali upe bapenga, lino nukabe nebuboni kwilu. Wenseco, wise unkonkele.”
LUK 18:23 Nsombi muntu usa mpwalanyumfweco, walongumana pakwinga walikuba ne mubile bwingi.
LUK 18:24 Yesu mpwalabona, kungumana kwa muntu usa walambeti, “Cayuma kwambeti bantu babile bakengile mu Bwami bwa Lesa.
LUK 18:25 Capuba kwambeti ngamila ingile mukamulyango ka nyeleti kupita muntu mubile kwingila mu Bwami bwa Lesa.”
LUK 18:26 Bantu balanyumfwa makani aya balepusheti, “Nomba niyani eti akapuluke?”
LUK 18:27 Yesu walakumbuleti, “Ibi bintu bitakonsheke nebantu, bikute kukonsheka ne Lesa.”
LUK 18:28 Lino Petulo walambeti, “Kamubona! Afwe twalashiya manda etu nekukonkela njamwe.”
LUK 18:29 Yesu walakumbuleti, “Ndamwambilinga cakubinga paliya muntu walashiya ng'anda, nambi mukashendi nambi bamakwabo nambi bashali bakendi nambi bana bakendi pacebo ca Bwami bwa Lesa,
LUK 18:30 eti akabule kutambula bintu bingi pacino cindi, kayi mucindi cilesanga nakatambule buyumi butapu.”
LUK 18:31 Yesu walamanta beshikwiya bakendi bali likumi ne babili kuya palubasu nekubambileti, “Tulenga ku Yelusalemu uko byonse byalalemba bashinshimi pa Mwana Muntu nkoti bikenshikile.
LUK 18:32 Pakwinga Mwana Muntu nakatwalwe mumakasa abantu bakunsa abo beshi bakamuwele, kumutukana, nekumusankila mata.
LUK 18:33 Nibakamukwipe nekumushina, nsombi pabusuba bwabutatu nakapundushiwe kubafu.”
LUK 18:34 Beshikwiya bakendi baliya kunyumfwishisha pamakani ayo. Maswi aya baliya kwanyumfwishisha pakwinga alikuba asolama kuli endibo, neco baliya kwinshiba ncali kwamba.
LUK 18:35 Yesu mpwalashika pepi ne Yeliko walacana mpofu kali wekala mumbali mwa nshila, kasengelela.
LUK 18:36 Lino mpofu uyo mpwalanyumfwa bantu bangi kabapita munshileyo, walepusheti, “Nicani cilenshikinga?”
LUK 18:37 Bantu balamwambileti, “Ni Yesu wa ku Nasaleti lapitinga.”
LUK 18:38 Lino walolobesheti, “Yesu mwana wa Dafeti konyumfwilako inkumbo!”
LUK 18:39 Lino bantu balikuba kutangu balamukalilila nekumwambileti mwena. Nsombi nendi walapitilisha kolobesheti, “Mwanendi Dafeti, konyumfwilako inkumbo!”
LUK 18:40 Neye Yesu walemana ne kwambila bantu eti bamulete kuli endiye. Mpwalashika pepi Yesu walamwipusheti,
LUK 18:41 nicani ncolandangeti nkwinshile? Neye walamukumbuleti, “Mwami, ndayandanga kwambeti ntatike kubona kayi.”
LUK 18:42 Lino Yesu walamwambileti, “Tatika kubona, pakwinga ulanshomo, lushomo lwakobe lulakushiliki.”
LUK 18:43 Pacindi copeleco walatatika kubona. Lino walakonkela Yesu nkaya kulumbaisha Lesa. Bantu bonse mpobalabona calenshika naboyo balalalumbaisha Lesa.
LUK 19:1 Yesu walengila mu Yeliko, nekupitilila.
LUK 19:2 Mu Yeliko mopelomo mwalikuba muntu wali kukwiweti Zakeyo. Walikuba shikusonkesha misonko mukulene, kayi walikuba mubile.
LUK 19:3 Walikuyandishisha kubona Yesu ncabele nomba walikuba mufupi, walalilwa kumubona pakwinga bantu balafulisha.
LUK 19:4 Neco walafwambila kuntangu ne kutanta mu citondo ca mukuyu kwambeti amubone, pakwinga Yesu empalikupitila popelapo.
LUK 19:5 Yesu mpwalashika pamusenapo walalanga kwilu nekumwambileti, “Zakeyo, fwambana seluka pakwinga ndelela kuya kwikala kung'anda yakobe lelo.”
LUK 19:6 Lino Zakeyo walaseluka cakufwambana nekutambula Yesu mwakukondwa.
LUK 19:7 Lino bantu bonse balabonako, balatatika kudandaula ne kwambeti, “Kamubonani muntu uyu lenga kwikala kung'anda ya muntu mwipishi.”
LUK 19:8 Nomba Zakeyo walanyamuka nekwambila Mwami eti, “Mwami,kamubonani, ninkape buboni bwakame kupa bapenshi. Na ndalamanta kantu kumuntu munshila yabula kwelela, ndimubweshele mankanda ana.”
LUK 19:9 Yesu walamwambileti, “Lelo kupuluka kulesa mung'anda ino, pakwinga muntu uyu neye nimwanendi Abulahamu.
LUK 19:10 Neco Mwana Muntu walesa kuyandaula nekupulusha bataika.”
LUK 19:11 Bantu kabacinyumfwa mbyalikwamba Yesu,walapitilisha kayi kubambila mukoshano pakwinga balashika pepi ku Yelusalemu. Nomba bantu bali kabayeyeti Bwami bwa Lesa buli pepi kwisa.
LUK 19:12 Lino walambeti, “Kwalikuba muntu, walikuba walemekwa uyo walaya kucishi ca kutali kuya kupewa bwami nekubwelela kayi.
LUK 19:13 Katanaya walakuwa basebenshi bakendi nekupa mali a golide likumi ku musebenshi umo ne umo” Nekubambileti, “kamwinsanga makwebo mpaka nkabwele.”
LUK 19:14 Lino bantu mbwalikwikala nabo mucishi umo nkabali kumuyanda, neco balatuma ntumwi kuya kucishico akwambeti, “Afwe nkatulayandanga muntu uyo kuba mwami wetu.”
LUK 19:15 “Necikabeco muntu uyo walaya kupewa bwami busa, lino mpwalabwela kwabo, walakuwa basebenshi bakendi abo mbwalapa mali kwambeti,bamwambile bwili mbwacanapo umo ne umo.”
LUK 19:16 Lino musebenshi mutanshi walesa walambeti, “Nkambo pamali ngomwalampa ndacaninipo bwili bwa mali ali likumi.”
LUK 19:17 Lino mwami wakendi walamwambileti, “Ulenshi cena, Omusebenshi waina! Pakwinga walashomeka mubintu bing'ana nube weshikwendelesha minshi ili likumi.”
LUK 19:18 Neye musebenshi wabubili walesa walambeti, “Mwami pamali asanu ngomwalampa ndacaninipo bwili bwa mali ali asanu.”
LUK 19:19 Mwami walamwambileti, “Obe nube weshikwendelesha minshi isanu.”
LUK 19:20 Lino musebenshi naumbi walesa walambeti, “Mwami, mali enu ndalasunga pakakwisa.
LUK 19:21 Ndalatina pakwinga mobakalu, mukute kutambula byabula byenu nekutebula mbyomwabula kubyala.”
LUK 19:22 Mwami wakendi walakumbuleti, “Obe musebenshi waipa! Lino ninkutoteke kwelana ne maswi ngolamba. Ucishi kwambeti ndemukalu, nkute kumanta byabula byakame nekutebula mpondabula kubyala.
LUK 19:23 Nomba uliya kubikila cani ku banki mali akame, kwambeti pakubwelela ncane bwili?”
LUK 19:24 “Lino walambila balikubapo eti, ‘Mulamuneni mali ayo mupe ukute mali likumi.’
LUK 19:25 Balo balambeti, ‘Mwami, uyo ukute kendi mali ali likumi.’
LUK 19:26 Nsombi mwami walakumbuleti, ndamwambilinga ukute kantu nakabikilwepo nabimbi, nsombi uyo ukute kang'ana nibakamunyongomone nako konse kankute.
LUK 19:27 Lino balwani bakame abo bali kuyandeti ame ntaba mwami wabo, kamubaleta kuno mubashine kambonako!”
LUK 19:28 Yesu mpwalapwisha kwambeco, walabatangunina kuya ku Yelusalemu.
LUK 19:29 Mpwalashika pepi ne minshi ya Betifagi ne Betaniya pepi ne mulundu wa maolifi walatuma beshikwiya bakendi babili,
LUK 19:30 Nekubambileti, “Kamuyani mumunshi usa ngomulabononga. Mwashika, nimucane mwana wambongolo kali wasungwa uyo utana utantwapo kendi ne bantu, muye mumusungulule, mumulete kuno.
LUK 19:31 Na umbi muntu amwipusheti, ‘Mulamusungulilinga cani’ Mumwambileti, ‘Mwami ukute nendi incito.’”
LUK 19:32 Nicakubinga beshikwiya babili basa balaya kucana mbuli ncalabamba Yesu.
LUK 19:33 Mpobali kusungulula mbongolo, bene balepusheti, “Nomba mulamusungulwilinga cani?”
LUK 19:34 Nabo balakumbuleti, “Mwami ukute nendi incito.”
LUK 19:35 Lino balatwala mbongolo kuli Yesu, nekutatika kuyansa byakufwala byabo pelu nekumutantikapo Yesu.
LUK 19:36 Lino Yesu mpwalikuya kali watanta mbongolo, bantu balayansa byakufwala byabo munshila kulesha bulemu kulyendiye.
LUK 19:37 Mpwalashika pepi neku Yelusalemu mwinshi mwa mulundu wa maolifi, likoto linene lya beshikwiya bali kabamukonkela balatatika kukondwa. Kayi balumbaisha Lesa ne maswi a pelu pacebo ca incito ya ngofu njobalabona.
LUK 19:38 Balambeti, “Walelekwa Mwami uyo lesanga mulina lya Lesa. Lumuno kwilu ne bulemu bube kuli Lesa.”
LUK 19:39 Lino Bafalisi nabambi balikuba mulikoto balambila Yesu eti, “Bashikwiyisha, kamwambilani beshikwiya benu bamwene.”
LUK 19:40 Yesu walakumbuleti, “Ndamwambilinga na aba bamwene, mabwe nawo nawolobeshe.”
LUK 19:41 Lino Yesu mpwalashika pepi nekubona Yelusalemu, walalila.
LUK 19:42 Walambeti, “Na obe newalenshiba lelo, bintu byeshikuleta lumuno! Nsombi nkobishi pakwinga menso akobe nkela kubibona.
LUK 19:43 Necikabeco nicikashike cindi balwani bakobe mpoti bakakushinguluke nekukushinkila konse konse.
LUK 19:44 Nibakakumwayaule nekushina bantu bakobe bonse. Nteshi bakashiye libwe pelu palinendi, pakwinga uliyawa kwishiba cindi Lesa ncalesa akukupulusha.”
LUK 19:45 Yesu walengila mu Ng'anda ya Lesa nekutatika kutandanyamo abo bali kabolisha mukati mulubuwa lwa Ng'anda ya Lesa,
LUK 19:46 walabambileti, “Calembwa Mumabala a Lesa kwambeti, ‘Ng'anda yakame nikakwiweti Ng'anda yakupaililamo.’ Nsombi amwe mulaisandulu kuba ng'anda mwakuyubila bakapondo!”
LUK 19:47 Lino Yesu walikeyisha lyonse mu Ng'anda ya Lesa. Nomba bamakulene beshimilumbo, beshikwiyisha Milawo ne batangunishi ba Bayuda balikuyanda kumushina,
LUK 19:48 Lino balabula cakwinsa pakwinga bantu bonse balikuba nendi cindi conse kwambeti banyumfwe maswi akendi.
LUK 20:1 Nabumbi busuba Yesu mpwalikwiyisha nekukambauka Mulumbe Waina mu Ng'anda ya Lesa, bamakulene beshimilumbo, beshikwiyisha Milawo kayi ne bamakulene ba Bayuda balesa.
LUK 20:2 Balepusheti, “Kotwambila, nomba ningofucini nshokute pakwinsa bintu ibi? Wakupa ngofu shakwinsa ibi bintu niyani?”
LUK 20:3 Yesu walabakumbuleti, “Nenjame ndamwipushunga mwipusho umo. Kamungambilani,
LUK 20:4 Nomba niyani walapa Yohane ngofu shakubatisha? Sena ni Lesa nambi nibantu?”
LUK 20:5 Nabo balatatika kwipushana bonka eti, “Na twambeti, ni Lesa, nendi natwipusheti, ‘Nomba nicani muliya kumushoma?
LUK 20:6 Lino na twambeti, nibantu, bantu bonse nibatuwale mabwe pakwinga bacinsheti Yohane walikuba mushinshimi.”
LUK 20:7 Neco balakumbuleti, “Nkatucinshi na walashifunya kupeyo.”
LUK 20:8 Lino Yesu walabakumbuleti, “Nenjame anu nteshi ndimwambile uyo walampa ngofu shakwinsa bintu ibi.”
LUK 20:9 Lino Yesu walapitilisha kubambila bantu mukoshanyo eti, Kwalikuba muntu walalima libala lyaminyansa ne kulibwelekesha balimi, lino walaya pabulwendo bwa kucishi nacimbi, uko nkwalekala cindi citali.
LUK 20:10 Mpocalashika cindi cakutebula bisepo, muntu uyo, walatuma musebenshi wakendi kubalimi abo kwambeti bamupeko bisepo byamulibala lyakendi. Nsombi balimi abo balekata musebenshi uyo nekumuma nekumutandanya kwabula kumupapo kantu.
LUK 20:11 Mwine libala walatumako naumbi musebenshi. Neye balamuma, ne kumusebanya, kayi nekumutandanya kwakubula kantu mumakasa.
LUK 20:12 Lino walatumako naumbi wabutatu, nsombi neye balamupwayaula nekumutaila kunsa.
LUK 20:13 Lino mwine libala uyo walambeti, “Ninjiseconi lino? Anu nintumeko mwaname ngonsunishi mpani nendi nibenga bamupe bulemu.”
LUK 20:14 Nsombi balimi abo mpobalamubona, balatatika kwambilaneti, “Uyu endiye weshi akapyane buboni bonse, katumushina kwambeti buboni bonse bukabe bwetu.”
LUK 20:15 Neco balamukwelela pansa pa libala nekumushina. Lino Yesu walabepusheti, “Nomba nicani nceshi akense mwine libala kubalimi abo?
LUK 20:16 Nakese akubashina balimi abo nekupa bambi libala ilyo.” Bantu basa mpobalanyumfweco balambeti, “Citakenshika.”
LUK 20:17 Yesu walabalangishisha nekubepusheti, lino malembo ayo akute kwamba cani? “Libwe ilyo ndyobalakana beshikwibaka, lyalaba elibwe lya pakona pa ng'anda lyayandika.
LUK 20:18 Muntu uliyense weshi akawile pa libwe ili nakatyokauke. Nsombi uyo weshi likamulakile, nakasansauke.”
LUK 20:19 Beshikwiyisha Milawo ne bamakulene beshimilumbo bali kuyanda kwikata Yesu pacindi copeleco pakwinga balenshibeti Yesu walikwamba endibo mumukoshanyo uyo. Nsombi balatina bantu balikubapo.
LUK 20:20 Neco nabo balikabalangaula cindi caina, balatuma bantu kwambeti bamweleshe, palikulibonesheti balulama mung'ambilo yabo kwambeti bamuteye kose mukwamba, kwambeti benga bamubepeshele kuli bendeleshi, pakwinga neye walikukute ngofu ne bwendeleshi bonse.
LUK 20:21 Bantu abo balepusha Yesu eti, “Bashikwiyisha, tucinshi kwambeti mukute kwamba ne kwiyisha byalulama. Nkamukute kulanga eti uyu niyani. Nsombi mukute kwiyisha Milawo ya Lesa cancine ncine.
LUK 20:22 Kamutwambila, sena Milawo ya Lesa yasuminisha kubenga musonko ku mwami waku Loma, nambi nkayasuminisha?”
LUK 20:23 Nomba Yesu walenshiba miyeyo yabo yaipa walabambileti,
LUK 20:24 “Kamundesha mali, nomba cinso ne lina lilipo nilyabani?” Balakumbuleti, “Byonse nibya mwami waku Loma.”
LUK 20:25 Lino neye walakumbuleti, “Kamubengani ku mwami waku Loma bintu byakendi, Neco neye Lesa mupeni bintu byakendi.”
LUK 20:26 Neco balalilwa kucana mulandu mulibyo mbyalamba pamenso abantu. Lino balapwilwa mano pakukumbula kwa Yesu, balamwenowa tonto.
LUK 20:27 Basaduki nabambi balesa kuli Yesu. Bantu aba bali kwambeti bantu bafwa nteshi bakapundukepo. Balamwipusha Yesu eti,
LUK 20:28 “Bashikwiyisha, Mose watulembela Milawo yakwambeti, Na muntu lafu, nekushiya mukashendi, kwakubula mwana, mukwabo welela kumweba mukalubingi kwambeti asemenemo bana bamukwabo uyo walafwa.”
LUK 20:29 Lino kwalikuba batuloba basanu ne babili pamukowa, mukulene bantu waleba mukashi, nsombi walafwa katana asemenamo mwana.
LUK 20:30 Neye wabubili walamupyana mukashi nomba neye walafwa katana asemenamo mwana,
LUK 20:31 Wabutatu walamupyana neye walafwa katana asemenamo mwana. Lino bonse basa basanu ne babili balapwa kufwa kwakubula kusemenamo bana mumutukashi uyo.
LUK 20:32 Kumapwilisho, mukashi uyo walafwa neye.
LUK 20:33 “Lino pabusuba bwakupunduka kubafu, mukashi uyo nakabe muka bani? Pakwinga bonse bamukowa basanu ne babili balikuba balamwebepo.”
LUK 20:34 Yesu walakumbuleti, “Bantu bacino cindi bakute kweba nekwebwa.
LUK 20:35 Nsombi abo beti bakapundushiwe kubafu nekwikala mubuyumi bulesanga, nteshi bakebanenga.
LUK 20:36 Nabo nibakekalengeti bangelo, kayi nteshi bakafwepo. Balo nibakabe bana ba Lesa pakwinga balapunduku kubafu.
LUK 20:37 Nomba pamakani akupunduka kubafu, neye Mose walambapo, pamakani a cifukusa cisa calikubangila mulilo, pakwinga Mwami walambeti, ‘Ni Lesa wa Abulahamu ni Lesa wa Isaki kayi ni Lesa wa Yakobo.’
LUK 20:38 Anu ekwambeti nte Lesa wa bantu bafwa, nsombi Lesa ni Lesa wabantu bayumi, pakwinga pamenso akendi bantu bonse nibayumi.”
LUK 20:39 Beshikwiyisha Milawo nabambi balakumbuleti, “Bashikwiyisha mulamba cena”
LUK 20:40 Neco baliya kuyanda kumwipushapo Yesu mipusho naimbi.
LUK 20:41 Yesu walabepusheti, “nipacebo cini bantu bakute kwambeti Mupulushi Walaiwa nimwanendi Dafeti?”
LUK 20:42 Pakwinga Dafeti mwine mulibuku lya kutembaula walambeti, “Mwami walambila Mwami wakame eti, Ikala kulikasa lyakame lyakululyo
LUK 20:43 kushikila nkasandule balwani bakobe, bakabe pakulyata myendo yakobe.”
LUK 20:44 “Na Dafeti mwine walamukuweti, Mwami, nomba ngobeconi mwanendi?”
LUK 20:45 Bantu bonse mpobalikunyumfwa mbyalikwamba Yesu, nendi walabambila beshikwiya bakendi eti,
LUK 20:46 “Kamucenjelani ne beshikwiyisha Milawo. Nabo basuni kwendana kabalibafwala minganjo itali, kwambeti bantu babapenga mitende yabulemu mumisena yamakwebo. Basuni kwikala pabipuna byabulemu mung'anda yakupaililamo ne mumisena yamalyalya.
LUK 20:47 Nomba ebakute kulamuna manda bamukalubingi, ne kupaila mipailo itali itali kwambeti bantu bababone. Cakubinga Lesa nakabape mulandu kupita bantu nabambi balabulunga kwinseco.”
LUK 21:1 Yesu walalangishisha, walabona bantu babile kababika bipo byabo mucakubikamo bipo byamali mu Ng'anda ya Lesa.
LUK 21:2 Walabona mutukashi mukalubingi kabikamo tumali tubili.
LUK 21:3 Lino Yesu walambeti, “Ndamwambilinga cakubinga uyu mukalubingi wapenga labikimo bupe bwapitapo bambi bonse.
LUK 21:4 Pakwinga bonse aba, balafunyu pa mali angi ngobakute, nsombi neye mubupenshi bwakendi labikimo mali onse ngakutenga mung'anda yakendi.”
LUK 21:5 Beshikwiya nabambi bali kabamba pamakani a Ng'anda ya Lesa eti balaibaka ne mabwe eshikuboneka cena, kayi nebipo byakutwala kuli Lesa. Lino Yesu walambeti,
LUK 21:6 “Ibi byonse mbyomulabononga, nicikashike cindi mpoti kukabule libwe nambi limo lyeti likashale palibwe linendi, mabwe onse nakamwayaulwe.”
LUK 21:7 Lino beshikwiya balepusha Yesu eti, “Bashikwiyisha, nomba ibi nibikenshike lilyoni? Kayi nitukenshibile kucani eti bintu byonse ibi bili pepi kwinshika?”
LUK 21:8 Yesu walambeti, “Kamucenjelani kwambeti kutakaba muntu naba umo eti akamubepe. Pakwinga bantu bangi balakesanga mulina lyakame kabambeti, ‘Njame Mupulushi usa Walaiwa.’ Kayi eti, ‘cindi cilashiki.’ Mutakabakonkela.
LUK 21:9 Mwakanyumfwa makani a nkondo kayi nebimfulunganya mubishi, mutakatina. Ibi bintu byelela kutanguna kwinshika, nomba nteko kwambeti mapwililisho a cishi alashiki.”
LUK 21:10 Lino Yesu walapitilisha kubambileti, “Bishi nibikalwane ne bishi nabimbi, nayoyo mishobo nikabukilane ne mishobo inabo.
LUK 21:11 Nikukabe mikukumo iyosha. Nikukabe nsala, malwashi ne lulanga mumisena yapusana pusana. Nikukenshike bintu byeshikuyosha nebingashilo byeshikukankamanisha kwilu.
LUK 21:12 “Nsombi byonse ibi kabitana binshika, nimukasungwe nekupenshewa. Nimukatwalwe mumanda akupaililamo, nimukabetekwe nekubikwa mujele. Nimukatwalwe ku bami ne baleli pacebo ca njame.
LUK 21:13 Ici nicikabe cindi caina ca kukambauka Mulumbe Waina.
LUK 21:14 Lino mutakasukama mumyoyo kuyeyeti nitwambe cani pamulanduyu.
LUK 21:15 Pakwinga ninkamupe maswi a mano cakwambeti kuliya mulwani wenu eti akacikonshe kukana nambi kutoteka.
LUK 21:16 Ne bamashali benu bonse, bamakwenu, beshikamukowa, nebanenu, nibakamutwale kubalwani benu, bambi pakati penu nibakamushine.
LUK 21:17 Bantu bonse nibakamupate pacebo ca njame.
LUK 21:18 Necikabeco kuliya mushishi nambi umo wenu weshi ukataike.
LUK 21:19 Mukalimbikile cakubula kubwelela munyuma nimukatambule buyumi bwenu.”
LUK 21:20 Mwakaboneti munshi wa Yelusalemu ulashingulukwa ne beshi nkondo, mukenshibeti konongeka kwawo kulashiki.
LUK 21:21 Lino abo bali mu Yudeya bakafwambile kumilundu, abo beshi bakabenga mukati mu Yelusalemu bakapulemo, balikumabala kabatakengila mu Yelusalemu.
LUK 21:22 Pakwinga ici nicikabe cindi cacisubulo, kwambeti byonse bisa byalalembwa mumabala bikenshike.
LUK 21:23 Batukashi beti bakabenga ne mabunda nibakabe mumapensho, nabo beshi bakabenga ne bana balayamwanga mumasubayo. Pakwinga nikukabe mapensho anene mucishici, kayi ne bukalu bwa Lesa nibukabe pabantu bamu Isilaeli.
LUK 21:24 Nabambi nibakayaswe bibeshi kayi nibakamantwe busha kubantu bamishobo imbi. Lino Yelusalemu nikalyataulwe ne baswamashi kushikila cindi cabo cikapwe.
LUK 21:25 “Kulakabanga bingashilo kulisuba ne kumwenshi ne kunyenyenshi. Pacishi pano, bantu nibakalisukame nekutina pakunyumfwa kuwota kwa lwenje ne mankape.
LUK 21:26 Bantu nibakawisuke ne buyowa pakulangilila bilandanga kwinshika mucishi ca panshi conse, pakwinga ngofu sha kwilu nishikatenkanishiwe.
LUK 21:27 Lino nibakabone ame nde Mwana Muntu kanjisa mumakumbi nengofu kayi nebulemu bunene.
LUK 21:28 Lino bintu ibi byakatatika kwinshika, mukanyamuke nekwinuna mitwi yenu, pakwinga kulubulwa kwenu kulasenene pepi.”
LUK 21:29 Lino Yesu walabambila mukoshano eti, “Kamulangani mukuyu nebitondo bimbi byonse.
LUK 21:30 Na mulabono matewu atatiki kusonsa mukute kwishibeti cilimo cili pepi.
LUK 21:31 Copeleco nenjamwe mwakabona bintu ibi kabinshika mukenshibe kwambeti Bwami bwa Lesa buli pepi.
LUK 21:32 “Ndamwambilinga cakubingeti musemano uwu nteti ukapwe kufwa bintu ibi kabitana binshika.
LUK 21:33 Kwilu ne cishi ca panshi nibikapite, nsombi maswi akame nteshi akapwepo ngofu sobwe.”
LUK 21:34 “Kamucenjelani kwambeti mutaba bantu basuni kulya ne kusekelela malyalya, nekukolwa kayi nekusukama pa bintu bya buyumi buno, pakwinga busuba ubo ngabwisa mwakutenshiba eti kose.
LUK 21:35 Nibukese bushikubo pabantu bonse bekala pa cishi capanshi
LUK 21:36 Ikalani mwalibambila lyonse, nekupaila cindi conse, kwambeti mube nengofu shakupuluka kubintu ibi byeshibikeshike, kwambeti mukemane pamenso pa Mwana Muntu.”
LUK 21:37 Masuba ayo, Yesu walikeyisha mu Ng'anda ya Lesa, nsombi mashiku lyonse walikuya ku mulundu wa maolifi akwikala.
LUK 21:38 Lino mumenemene bantu bangi bali kabaya ku Ng'anda ya Lesa kuya kukutika kwiyisha kwakendi.
LUK 22:1 Bushiku bwakukondwa bwa kulya shinkwa wabula cishikufufumusha, ubo bwalikukwiweti Pasika mpobwalashika pepi.
LUK 22:2 Bamakulene beshimilumbo, ne beshikwiyisha Milawo balikabayandaula nshila yakushininamo Yesu. Nomba bali kutina bantu.
LUK 22:3 Lino Satana walengila muli Yudasi, walikukwiweti Isikalyoti, uyo walikuba umo wa beshikwiya bali likumi ne babili ba Yesu.
LUK 22:4 Neco Yudasi walaya kupangana ne bamakulene beshimilumbo ne beshikwendelesha Ng'anda ya Lesa ncobela kwinsa kwambeti amuyabe Yesu kulyendibo.
LUK 22:5 Lino balakondwa, kayi balasuminishana kumulipila mali.
LUK 22:6 Yudasi walasumina ne kutatika kuyandaula cindi caina cakumuyabilapo, bantu bonse kabatacinshi.
LUK 22:7 Bwalashika busuba bwakukondwa bwakulya shinkwa wakutafufumusha, busuba bwakushina twana twambelele twakulya pabusuba bwa Pasika.
LUK 22:8 Lino Yesu walatuma Petulo ne Yohane ne kubambileti, “Kamuyani mutubambile byakulya bya pabusuba bwa Pasika kwambeti tulye.”
LUK 22:9 Balo balamwipusheti, “Nikupeyo nkomulayandanga kwambeti twenga tubambile?”
LUK 22:10 Yesu walabambileti, “Kamunyumfwani! mwengila mu Yelusalemu nimucane mutuloba wanyamuna nongo ya menshi, mu mukonkele mpaka mung'anda moshi engile.
LUK 22:11 Lino mu mwambile mwine ng'andeti, Bashikwiyisha balepushungeti, ‘Nomba cili kupeyo cipinda moshi balyele byakulya bya Pasika ne beshikwiya babo’
LUK 22:12 Lino na amuboneshe cipinda cinene ca pelu cabambiwa cena, mopelomo emoti mutubambile byakulya.”
LUK 22:13 Lino balaya kucana bintu byonse mbuli mwalabambilila Yesu. Lino balatatika kubamba byakulya bya Pasika.
LUK 22:14 Lino mpocalashika cindi cakulya Yesu walekala pa tebulu pamo ne batumwa bakendi kwambeti balye.
LUK 22:15 Lino Yesu walabambileti, “Ndayandishishanga kulya Pasika pamo nenjamwe nkantana kutatika kupenshewa.
LUK 22:16 Ndamwambilinga cakubinga nteshi nkalyepo Pasika, kushikila cikakwanilishiwe mu Bwami bwa Lesa.”
LUK 22:17 Lino Yesu mpwalamanta nkomeshi nekulumba Lesa, walabambileti, “Kamutambulani munwe mwense.
LUK 22:18 Lino ndamwambilinga kufuma lelo nteshi nkanwepo waini, kushikila Bwami bwa Lesa bukese.”
LUK 22:19 Kufumapo Yesu walamanta shinkwa, walalumba Lesa, nekukomona nekupa beshikwiya bakendi nekwambeti, “Uyu emubili wakame ulayabwa cebo canjamwe. Kamwinsanga ici lyonse pakunganukila.”
LUK 22:20 Copeleco mpobalapwisha kulya mulalilo, Yesu walapa beshikwiya bakendi nkomeshi nekubambileti, “Nkomeshi iyi nicipangano calino lino ca Lesa, nemilopa yakame yeshi iketike pacebo cenu.
LUK 22:21 “Nsombi kamubona! Uyo lanjabanga kubalwani lalinga pamo nenjame patebulu pano.
LUK 22:22 Pakwinga Mwana Muntu nakafwe kwelana ne kuyanda kwa Lesa. Nsombi muntu lamuyabanga Mwana Muntu nakapenge. Caina muntuyo nalabula kusemwa.”
LUK 22:23 Lino beshikwiya balatatika kulipusheti, nomba welakwinseco niyani pakati petu.
LUK 22:24 Lino beshikwiya balatatika kupikishaneti, “Inga niyani mukulene pakati petu?”
LUK 22:25 Lino Yesu walabambileti, “Bami ba bantu bakunsa bakute ngofu pabantu babo kayi bakute kulyela masuku pamutwi bantu, bakute kukwiweti, ‘Beshikwinsa byaina kubantu.’
LUK 22:26 Nsombi pakati penu citabanga mushoboyu. Cakubinga mukulene pali amwe abe weshikulicepesha kupita bonse, neye weshi kwendelesha abe musha wenu.
LUK 22:27 Nomba mukulene niyani? Sena ni usa lalinga pa tebulu na ni musha? Sena nte usa lalyelenga pa tebulu? Nomba ame ndilyeti musha pakati penu.
LUK 22:28 “Amwe mulekala nenjame mumasunko akame onse.
LUK 22:29 Lino copeleco, mbuli ba Ta ncobalampa ngofu shakwendelesha, nenjame nindimupeni ngofu.
LUK 22:30 Nimukalye ne kunwa pamo nenjame, kayi nimukekale pabipuna bya Bwami ne kubeteka mishobo likumi ne ibili ya ba Isilaeli.”
LUK 22:31 “Shimoni, Shimoni, nyumfwa! Satana layandanga kumupupulusha mumasunko mbuli mulimi ncakute kupupulusha maila.
LUK 22:32 Nsombi ndakupailili kwambeti lushomo lwakobe lutapwa. Lino obe wakatembenuka mumuyo ukayuminishe banobe.”
LUK 22:33 Nsombi Petulo walakumbuleti, “Mwami, ame ndalibambila kuya nenjamwe mujele nambi kufwa.”
LUK 22:34 Yesu walakumbuleti, “Ndakwambilinga Petulo, lelo kombwe nkatana alila, nunkane mankanda atatu eti nkonjinshipo.”
LUK 22:35 Yesu walepusha beshikwiya bakendi eti, “Pasa mpondalamutuma nkamubulile mpotomona, cola nambi nkwabilo nomba nicani ncomwapengapo?” Balo balakumbuleti, “Kuliyawa.”
LUK 22:36 Lino walabambileti, “Muntu uliyense ukute mpotomona nambi cola, anyamune. Neye uyo wabula mupeni, aulishe byakufwala byakendi kwambeti aule mupeni.
LUK 22:37 Cakubinga celela kwinshika calalembwa Mumabala eti, ‘Neye balamubelengela pamo ne babwipishi.’ Ndamwambilingeti Mabala aya alenshikinga cancinencine.”
LUK 22:38 Beshikwiya balambeti, “Kamubona Mwami tukute bibeshi bibili,” Yesu walabakumbuleti, “Ni ningi byopelebyo.”
LUK 22:39 Yesu walafumamo mu Yelusalemu nekuya ku mulundu wa maolifi mbuli ncalikwinsa lyonse. Naboyo beshikwiya bakendi balamukonkela.
LUK 22:40 Mpwalashika pamusena uyo Yesu walabambileti, “Kamupailani kwambeti mutengila mumasunko.”
LUK 22:41 Lino Yesu walabashiya, walendako pang'ana walafukama nekupaila.
LUK 22:42 Walambeti, “Bata, na musuni kamufunyani nkomeshi ya mapensho iyi. Necikabeco mutensa kuyanda kwakame, nsombi mwinse kuyanda kwenu.”
LUK 22:43 Lino mungelo wakwilu walesa kumuyuminisha.
LUK 22:44 Pacebo cakupenshewa mumoyo, walapaila cangofu kupita pakutanguna. Lino inkasalo yakendi yalikubeti mandondo a milopa alakanga panshi.
LUK 22:45 Mpwalafuma akupaila walabwelela kuli beshikwiya bakendi. Walacana nkabalibona pacebo ca miyeyo,
LUK 22:46 Yesu walabepusheti, “Nipacebo cini mona tulo? Kamupundukani mupaile kwambeti mutengila mumasunko.”
LUK 22:47 Yesu nkacamba, likoto lya bantu, lyalesa kalili lyatanguninwa ne Yudasi, umo wabeshikwiya likumi nebabili. Walesa pepi walamupa mutende ne kumushonshota.
LUK 22:48 Nsombi Yesu walamwambileti, “Yudasi, sena ulayabanga Mwana Muntu kupitila mukumushonshota?”
LUK 22:49 Lino beshikwiya balikuba ne Yesu mpobalabona calikwinshika balepusha Yesu eti, “Mwami, Se tubayase ne bibeshi?”
LUK 22:50 Lino umo wa beshikwiya walatimbula litwi lya kululyo lya musebenshi wa mukulene wa beshimilumbo bonse.
LUK 22:51 Nsombi Yesu walambeti, “Cilekeni kwinseco.” Popelapo Yesu walekata litwi lya muntu uyo nekumushilika.
LUK 22:52 Yesu walambila bonse abo balesa kumwikata, bamakulene ba beshimilumbo nebamukulene baba kamulonda ba Ng'anda ya Lesa, kayi nebamakulene ba Bayuda. Walabepusheti, “Sena mulenshi kwisa ne mipeni nemingwala eti nde kapondo?
LUK 22:53 Ndalikuba nenjamwe mu Ng'anda ya Lesa lyonse, nomba muliya kunjikatapo. Lino cino cindi nicenu ca ngofu sha mwami wa mushinshe.”
LUK 22:54 Lino balekata Yesu nekumutwala kung'anda ya mukulene wa beshimilumbo bonse. Neye Petulo walikakonkela Yesu capatali.
LUK 22:55 Lino balakunka mulilo pakati palubansa lwang'anda, bonse balekala panshi pamo. Neye Petulo walekala pakati pabo.
LUK 22:56 Lino mutukashi umo wa basebenshi mpwalabona Petulo kayota mulilo wamulangishisha, ne kwambeti, “Uyu neye walikuba ne Yesu.”
LUK 22:57 Nsombi Petulo nendi walakana nekwambeti, “Sobwe obe mutukashi nkandimwinshipo uyu ame.”
LUK 22:58 Mpopalapita kacindi kang'ana mutuloba naumbi neye walamubona Petulo nekumwambileti, “Obe njobe umo wabasa.” Nomba Petulo walakumbuleti, “Ntamepo sobwe.”
LUK 22:59 Mpopalapita kacindi kanda kukwana ola umo naumbi muntu walamba cangofu eti, “Nicakubinga muntu uyu walikuba ne Yesu pakwinga nimwine Galileya.”
LUK 22:60 Petulo walakumbuleti, “Ayo makani ngolambanga nkandainshi ame nambi pang'ana.” Lino petulo kacamba, kombwe walalila.
LUK 22:61 Mwami Yesu walafutatuka nekulangilisha Petulo. Lino nendi Petulo walanuka maswi a Mwami Yesu ngalamwambileti, “Kombwe nkatana alila lelo, obe Petulo nunkane mankanda atatu.”
LUK 22:62 Lino Petulo walafuma pansa, walalila cebo ca cikonko ncali kukute mumoyo.
LUK 22:63 Lino bantu balikulonda Yesu, balatatika kumuseka nekumuma.
LUK 22:64 Balamufweka pamenso, balamuma nekumwipusheti, “Lotela, nomba niyani lakumu?”
LUK 22:65 Kayi balamba maswi angi akumucobola.
LUK 22:66 Mpobwalaca bamakulene ba Bayuda, ne beshimilumbo, kayi ne beshikwiyisha Milawo balabungana. Balamumanta Yesu nekuya nendi kunkuta yabo.
LUK 22:67 Balamwipusheti, “Twambile na njobe Mupulushi Walaiwa usa.” Nsombi nendi walabakumbuleti, “Nambi ndimwambile, nteshi mushome sobwe,
LUK 22:68 na ndimwipushe mwipusho, nteshi munkumbulepo.
LUK 22:69 Kufuma lelo ame nde Mwana Muntu nimbenga ndekala kulikasa lyakululyo kwa Lesa wangofu shonse.”
LUK 22:70 Lino bonse balepusheti, “Sena ulambangeti njobe Mwanendi Lesa?” Neye walakumbuleti, “Ee njame mbuli ncomulamba mobene.”
LUK 22:71 Balo balambeti, “Sena lino inga katuciyandola nabambi bakamboni? Tulalinyufwili kendi ncalamba mwine.”
LUK 23:1 Bantu bangi balanyamuka, nekutwala Yesu kuli Pilato.
LUK 23:2 Lino balatatika kumubepeshela Yesu eti, “Twalamucana muntu uyu kayungaula bantu ba mushobo wetu. Walikwambila bantu eti tucileke kusonka musonko kuli mwami wa ku Loma. Kayi ukute kwambeti ni Mupulushi Walaiwa kayi eti emwami.”
LUK 23:3 Lino Pilato walamwipusha Yesu eti, “Sena njobe, Mwami wa ba Yuda?” Yesu walakumbuleti, “Mulamba mobene.”
LUK 23:4 Pilato walambila bamakulene beshimilumbo nebantu bonse basa eti, “Ame kuliya mulandu ngondacana pa muntu uyu.”
LUK 23:5 Nsombi balo balayuminina kumubepeshela kabambeti, “Layungaulunga ne kufulunganya bantu pakwiyisha kwakendi mucishi conse ca Yudeya. Walatatikila ku Galileya lino mpaka lashiki ne kuno.”
LUK 23:6 Pilato mpwalanyumfweco walepusheti, “Sena uyu muntu nimwine Galileya?”
LUK 23:7 Lino mpwalanyumfwa kwambeti Yesu ukute kufuma mucishi ncalikwendelesha Helode, walamutuma kuli Helode uyo walikuba mu Yelesalemu pa cindico.
LUK 23:8 Helode mpwalabona Yesu walakondwa, pakwinga lyonse walikunyumfwa mbili yakendi. Neco walikuyanda kumubona. Walikuyandishisha kwambeti akamubonepo kensa cikankamanisho.
LUK 23:9 Neco Helode walamwipusha mipusho ingi, nsombi Yesu nendi liya kumukumbulapo ciliconse.
LUK 23:10 Bamakulene beshimilumbo ne beshikwiyisha ba Milawo balesa pepi nekutatika kumubepesha cangofu.
LUK 23:11 Helode nebashilikali bakendi balamuseka Yesu ne kumunyansha. Lino balamufwalika cakufwala cabwami, nekumubwesha kuli Pilato.
LUK 23:12 Kufuma busuba ubo Helode ne Pilato balatatika kunyumfwana pakwinga balikuba bapatana.
LUK 23:13 Lino Pilato walabunganya bamakulene beshimilumbo ne beshikwendelesha kayi ne bantu bonse.
LUK 23:14 Lino walabambileti, “Uyu muntu mulamulete kuli njameti nkayungaula bantu, lino ame ndamwipushu mwense kamulipo, ndacana kwambeti liya mulandu pamakani onse ngomwa mwambanga.
LUK 23:15 Helode neye liya kucanapo mulandu pali uyu muntu, weco neye lamubweshe kuli afwe. Kamubona uyu muntu liya kwinsapo mulandu wakufwilapo.
LUK 23:16 Neco ndimukwipowa ne kumusungulula.”
LUK 23:17 Nomba Pilato lyonse walikubasungululila kayili umo pabusuba bwa Pasika.
LUK 23:18 Nsombi bonse bantu balolobesha pamo eti, “Ashinwe muntu uyu, mutusungwilile Balabasi.”
LUK 23:19 Balabasi uyu walasungwa pakwinga walapanga cimfulunganya mucishi ne kushina bantu.
LUK 23:20 Nsombi Pilato walikuyanda kumusungulula Yesu, neco walamba nabo bantu basa kayi.
LUK 23:21 Nomba nabo balolobesheti, “Mupopeni palusanda! Mupopeni!”
LUK 23:22 Pilato walabambila bantu kabutatu eti, nomba lenshi cani caipa uyu? Ame ndacana kwambeti liya mulandu ngwelakufwilapo. Neco ndimukwipowa nekumusungulula.
LUK 23:23 Nsombi bonse bayuminina kolobesheti, “Welela kupopwa palusanda.” Lino Pilato walakomwa kumaswi ayo.
LUK 23:24 Neco Pilato walapingula kwelana ne ncobalikusenga bantu baseti cinshike.
LUK 23:25 Pilato walasungulula Balabasi uyo walaleta cimfulunganya nekushina bantu ngobalasenga. Yesu bamwinse kwelana mbuli kuyanda kwabo.
LUK 23:26 Bashilikali balamumanta Yesu kwambeti benga bamupope. Balakumana ne Shimoni waku Kulene, nkafuma muminshi. Balamwikata nekumunyamwisha lusanda kwambeti akonkenga panyuma pa Yesu.
LUK 23:27 Bantu bangi balikumukonkela. Pakati pabo palikuba batukashi bali kabalila nekunyumfwa kwipilwa pacebo ca Yesu.
LUK 23:28 Lino Yesu walapilibuka ne kubambileti, “Amwe mobatukashi ba ku Yelusalemu mutalilila ame sobwe, nsombi mulilile mobene kayi ne bana benu.
LUK 23:29 Pakwinga masuba nakashike bantu mpoti bakambengeti, ‘Bakute colwe batukashi balabula kusemapo nekuyamwishapo!’
LUK 23:30 Pacindico nibakasenge malundu eti, ‘Kamutuwila’ Kayi netucina eti, ‘Tufwekeleleni.’
LUK 23:31 Nomba lino na kulico kulinjame ndecitondo catontola, nomba nikukabeconi kuli njamwe mobitondo byayuma?”
LUK 23:32 Balamanta ba kapondo babili kwambeti benga bapopwe pamo ne Yesu.
LUK 23:33 Mpobalashika kumusena walikukwiweti cifupa ca mutwi, balapopa Yesu palusanda. Kopeloko balapopako bakapondo basa palusanda, umbi kululyo naumbi kucipiko.
LUK 23:34 Yesu walambeti, “Ta, kamubalekelela pakwinga nkabacinshi ncobalenshinga.” Lino balensa nsolo nekuyabana byakufwala byakendi.
LUK 23:35 Bantu balikuba bemana popelapo kabebela. Nomba bamakulene ba Bayuda abo kabaweluluka Yesu nekwambeti, “Walapulusha bambi, lino neye alipulushe mwine, na ni Mupulushi uyo Walaiwa ne Lesa.”
LUK 23:36 Bashilikali naboyo balamuseka, balesa pepi nekumupa waini wasasa eti anwe.
LUK 23:37 Nekumwambileti, “Na njobe Mwami wa Bayuda, lipulushe omwine.”
LUK 23:38 Pelu palusanda palikuba palembweti, “Uyu emwami wa ba Yuda.”
LUK 23:39 Kapondo umo walikuba wapopwa pamo ne Yesu, walamucobola Yesu eti, “Sena ntobe mupulushi washomeshewa? Lipulushe nenjafwe utupulushe.”
LUK 23:40 Nsombi umbi walakalilila munendi nekumwambileti, “Sena obe nkotini Lesa? Tulapopwa pamo twense mu mapensho.
LUK 23:41 Nsombi afwe tobabili twelela kupopwa pakwinga tulatambulunga cilambo celela pa bintu mbyotwalikwinsa. Lino uyu neye kuliya caipa ncalensapo.”
LUK 23:42 Lino walambila Yesu eti “Mukanganuke mwakesa mu Bwami bwenu.”
LUK 23:43 Lino Yesu walamwambileti, “Cakubinga ndakwambilinga lelo, nukekale nenjame mu Paladaiso.”
LUK 23:44 Lino cindi mpocalashika pa 12 koloko, kwalaba mushinshe pacishi conse kushikila 3 koloko,
LUK 23:45 lino cikwisa calikucala mu Ng'anda ya Lesa calatwamuka pakati.
LUK 23:46 Lino Yesu walolobesha ne liswi lya pelu eti, “Ta mushimu wakame ndaubiki mumakasa enu.” Mpwalapwisha kwambeco, walafwa.
LUK 23:47 Mukulene wa bashilikali mpwalaboneco, walalumbaisha Lesa, ne kwambeti, “Nicakubinga uyu muntu walikuba walulama.”
LUK 23:48 Naboyo bantu bangi balikuba babungana kabebela, mpobalabona calenshika balabwelela kumanda kwabo nkabayakulyuma pantiti ne kungumana.
LUK 23:49 Bantu bonse balikumwinshiba Yesu, ne batukashi basa balamukonkela baku Galileya, balemana patali kababona byonse byalenshika.
LUK 23:50 Kwalikuba muntu walikukwiweti Yosefe walikwikala mumushi wa Alimateya mucishi ca Yudeya. Walikuba umo wamulibunga lya Nkuta inene ya Bayuda, walikuba muntu uli cena walemekwa
LUK 23:51 nendi wali kupembelela kwisa kwa Bwami bwa Lesa.
LUK 23:52 Uyu muntu walaya ku musenga Pilato citumbi ca Yesu.
LUK 23:53 Lino walaselusha citumbi palusanda ne kupombela mucikwisa caina, walamubika mu cumbwe ca mulibwe umo mwalikuba mutana mubikwapo muntu uliyense.
LUK 23:54 Bwalikuba busuba bwakulibambila pakwinga busuba bwa Sabata bwalikuba pepi kutatika.
LUK 23:55 Batukashi baku Galileya basa balikukonkela Yesu balaya ne Yosefe akubona cumbwe mwalabika citumbi ca Yesu.
LUK 23:56 Balabwelela ku ng'anda a kubamba mafuta anunkila cena. Lino pabusuba bwa Sabata, balapumwina kwelana ne Milawo Lesa njalapa Mose.
LUK 24:1 Lino mumenemene pa busuba bwa pa Sondo, batukashi abo balanyamuna mafuta ne byanunkila mbyobalabamba kuya kucumbwe.
LUK 24:2 Balacana libwe lyakunkulushiwapo pacishinga ca cumbwe.
LUK 24:3 Nomba mpobalengila mucumbwe baliya kucanamo citumbi ca Mwami Yesu.
LUK 24:4 Kabacikankamana, balabonowa bantu babili balikuba bafwala byakufwala byabekema kabali bemana pepi nabo.
LUK 24:5 Batukashi abo balatina nekukotama panshi. Lino bantu abo balabepusheti, “Mulamulangwelinga cani muntu muyumi pakati pa bafu?
LUK 24:6 Nkalimo muno, lapunduku. Kamwanuka maswi ngalamwambila mpwalikuba ku Galileya.
LUK 24:7 Eti Mwana Muntu welela kuyabwa mumakasa a bantu baipa, nekupopwa palusanda, nekupunduka kubafu pakapita masuba atatu.”
LUK 24:8 Popelapo batukashi basa balanuka maswi aya.
LUK 24:9 Mpobalafuma kucumbwe kusa, balambila beshikwiya likumi ne umo kayi ne bantu bambi bonse.
LUK 24:10 Abo batukashi balikuba Maliya wa ku Magadala, ne Yohana ne Maliya banyina Jemusi. Balo ne batukashi bambi balikubapo balambila batumwa makani aya.
LUK 24:11 Nsombi maswi ayo kubeshikwiya alaboneka eti nikutamokowa, neco baliya kubashoma batukashi abo.
LUK 24:12 Nsombi nendi Petulo walanyamuka nekufwambilako kucumbwe. Mpwalashika walabonowa muli bikwisa byonka, walabwelela kung'anda kali wakankamana pabintu byalenshika.
LUK 24:13 Pabusuba ubo beshikwiya babili balikuya kumunshi walikukwiweti Emausi. Mushinso wa kufuma ku Emausi kushika ku Yelusalemu walikuba wa makilomita akwana likumi ne limo.
LUK 24:14 Mpobalikuya munshila bali kababandika pa bintu ibyo byonse byalenshika.
LUK 24:15 Kabacibandika nekwipushanya, Yesu mwine walesa pepi ne kwendela pamo nabo.
LUK 24:16 Balamubona nomba baliya kumwinshiba.
LUK 24:17 Yesu walabepusheti, “Nimakani cini ngomulenga nkamubandikilana?” Lino nabo balemana kayi cinso cabo nkacili calaka nemapensho,
LUK 24:18 lino umbi walikukwiweti kileopasi walamwipusheti, “Sena njobe mwensu wenka mu Yelusalemu utenshi byalenshika masuba apita kunyuma?”
LUK 24:19 Yesu walepusheti, “Byamushobocini?” Lino balakumbuleti. Sha Yesu wa ku Nasaleti. Uyo muntu walikuba munshinshimi wali kwinsa bintu byangofu pamenso a Lesa ne bantu bonse.
LUK 24:20 Nsombi bamakulene beshimilumbo ne bakulene betu bambi balamutwala kwambeti apewe mulandu wakushinwa, kufumapo balamupopa palusanda.
LUK 24:21 Nsombi afwe twalikuba twengashila kwambeti nakalubule ba Isilaeli. Lino palapiti masuba atatu kufuma mpobyenshika byonse ibi.
LUK 24:22 Lino kayi batukashi nabambi pakati petu balatukankamanisha. Nabo balaya kucumbwe mumene mene,
LUK 24:23 lino mubili wakendi baliya kucanamo. Mpobalabwela balambeti balabono bangelo abo balabambileti Yesu nimuyumi.
LUK 24:24 Bambi mulikoto lyetu balaya kucumbwe ne kucana mbuli ncobalamba batukashi basa, nabo baliya kumubona Yesu.
LUK 24:25 Lino Yesu walabambileti, “Amwe mobantu baluya, bakute kubula kuyanda kushoma bwangu bintu byonse byalamba bashinshimi.
LUK 24:26 Sena nkamucinshi kwambeti mupulushi walaiwa usa walikwelela kunyumfwa byeshikubaba byonse ibi kwambeti engile mubulemu bwakendi?”
LUK 24:27 Lino walabasansulwila byonse byalembwa mumalembo onse, kutatikila mumabuku a Mose mpaka ku bashinshimi bonse bilambanga palyendiye.
LUK 24:28 Mpobalashika pepi ne Yelusalemu, Yesu walenseti lapitililinga.
LUK 24:29 Nsombi beshikwiya abo balamukakatisha ne kwambeti, “Kamwikalani nenjafwe pakwinga kulashipi, bonani lisuba lilenga akwibila.” Neco walengila mung'anda ne kwikala nabo.
LUK 24:30 Mpwalekala nabo pakulyela, Yesu walamanta shinkwa, walalumba Lesa, Kayi walakomona nekubayabila.
LUK 24:31 Popelapo menso abo alacaluka. Lino balamwinshiba popelapo walashimanganowa.
LUK 24:32 Lino balatatika kwambilaneti, “Cancine ncine maswi akendi ayasanga mumoyo mpwatwambilanga munshila pasa, nekupandulula mabala.”
LUK 24:33 Kufumapo balanyamuka nekubwelela ku Yelusalemu, uko nkobalacana beshikwiya likumi ne umo kabali babungana pamo nebanabo,
LUK 24:34 kabambeti, “Nicakubinga Mwami lapunduku kubafu, labonekele kuli Shimoni.”
LUK 24:35 Lino naboyo babili basa, balasansulula calenshika munshila mpobalamwinshiba Mwami mpwalabakomwena shinkwa.
LUK 24:36 Kabacamba babili abo, Yesu mwine walashika nekwimana pakati pabo bonse ne kwambeti, “lumuno lube nenjamwe.”
LUK 24:37 Balo balatilimuka nekutina pakwinga balayeyeti balabononga cipuku.
LUK 24:38 Nendi walabambileti, “Nomba mulapengelenga cani ne kutoshana mumyoyo mwenu?
LUK 24:39 Kamubona makasa nebimpanta byakame, kwambeti njame. Kamunjikata munyumfwe pakwinga cipuku ciliya musuni nebifupa mbuli mbyomulabonongeti ndibikute ame.”
LUK 24:40 Lino mpwalambeco walababonesha makasa nebimpanta byakendi.
LUK 24:41 Nabo baliya kushoma pakwinga balikuba bakondwa, kayi ne kukankamana. Lino walabepusheti, “Sena mukutepo byakulya pano?”
LUK 24:42 Balamupa cipansha ca nswi yakuyoka.
LUK 24:43 Walacitambula ne kulya bonse nkababonako.
LUK 24:44 Lino walabambileti, “Ibi ebintu byondamwambila mpondalikuba nenjamwe. Pasa ndalikwambeti byonse byalembwa pali njame mu Milawo Lesa njalapa Mose, ne mumabuku abashinshimi, ne mulibuku lya kutembaula.”
LUK 24:45 Lino walabanyafwa kwambeti banyufwishishe Mabala.
LUK 24:46 Walabambileti, “Byalalembwa nibi; Mupulushi welela kupenshewa ne kupunduka kubafu pabusuba bwabutatu.
LUK 24:47 Kwambeti mulina lyakendi Mulumbe Waina ukakambaukwe kubantu ba mishobo yonse, kutatikila ku Yelusalemu. Kwambeti basanduke mumoyo benseco neye Lesa empwela kubalekelela bwipishi bwabo.
LUK 24:48 Amwe mobakamboni pabintu ibi.
LUK 24:49 Ninkamutumine cipo ico Bata ncobalashomesha, nsombi mwelela kwikala mumunshi muno kushikila mukatambule ngofu sheti shikafume kwilu.”
LUK 24:50 Lino Yesu walabatangunina kufuma mumunshi umo kuya kushika ku Betaniya. Kopeloko walatambika makasa akendi nekubaleleka.
LUK 24:51 Lino kacibaleleka walapansana nabo, nekumantwa kuya kwilu.
LUK 24:52 Lino balamukambilila, panyuma pakendi balabwelela ku Yelusalemu kabali bakondwa maningi.
LUK 24:53 Cindi conse balikucanika mu Ng'anda ya Lesa kabalumbaisha Lesa.
JOH 1:1 Pakutatika, kakuli kwabula bintu byonse kwalikuba Liswi, Liswi ili lyalikuba kuli Lesa. Kayi Liswi ili lyalikuba Lesa.
JOH 1:2 Liswi ili lyalikuba ne Lesa cindi conse.
JOH 1:3 Byonse byalabako kupitila mulyendiye, kayi kuliyawa cintu calabako kwabula endiye.
JOH 1:4 Mulyendiye mwalikuba buyumi, kayi buyumi ubo ebwalikuba cinyina ca mumuni kubantu.
JOH 1:5 Mumuni uwu ulamunikinga mumushinshe, kayi mushinshe nkawalacikonsha kushima mumuni.
JOH 1:6 Neco Lesa walatuma muntu naumbi, lina lyakendi walikuba Yohane.
JOH 1:7 Nendi uyu walesa kwinshila bukamboni, nekwambila bantu sha mumuni usa, kwambeti bantu bonse banyumfwe nekushoma.
JOH 1:8 Nteko kwambeti nendi walikuba mumuni, nsombi walesa kuba kamboni wa mumuni.
JOH 1:9 Mumuni wancine ncine, weshi kumunikila bantu bonse, walesa pacishi capanshi.
JOH 1:10 Yesu walikuba pacishi capanshi, nomba bantu bapacishi capanshi baliya kumwinshiba, nambi Lesa walalenga bintu byonse kupitila mulyendiye.
JOH 1:11 Walesa kubantu bamushobo wakendi, nomba bantu bakendi baliya kumutambula.
JOH 1:12 Necikabeco nabambi balamutambula nekushoma lina lyakendi, kayi bopelaba walabapa ngofu shakuba bana ba Lesa
JOH 1:13 Neco Kuba bana ba Lesa kuliya kufuma mukusemwa kwabo, nambi mu kuyanda kwa mubili, nambi kwanda kwa muntu sobwe, sombi kwalafuma kuli Lesa.
JOH 1:14 Lino Liswi lyalasanduka muntu, nekwisa kwikala pamo nenjafwe. Walikuba ne nkumbo kayi ne cancine ncine. Kayi twalabona bulemu bwakendi, bulemu mbwalatambula kuBaishi.
JOH 1:15 Yohane walamubela bukamboni. Walikwambila bantu mwangofu kwambeti, “Uyu engondalikwambeti, kuli lesanga panyuma pakame wampita, pakwinga nkantana nsemwa, nendi walikubapo.”
JOH 1:16 Weco kupitila munkumbo shakendi shesula twense twalalelekwa mwakupwililila, kulelekwa kwakonkana konkana.
JOH 1:17 Lesa walatupa Milawo kupitila muli Mose, nomba inkumbo nekushomeka kwalesa kupitila muli Yesu.
JOH 1:18 kuliya muntu walamubonapo Lesa. Nsombi umo enka Lesa usa, wekala pamo neBaishi, ewalamuyubulula.
JOH 1:19 Lino ubu ebukamboni mbwalapa Yohane kubamakulene baBayuda baku Yelusalemu balatuma beshimilumbo neba Levi nabambi kuyakwipusha Yohane, balamwipusheti “Njobe bani?”
JOH 1:20 Nendi walasumina cancine ncine nekubakumbula mwakubula kusoleka, “Ame ntame Mupulushi Walaiwa usa sobwe.”
JOH 1:21 Balamwipusha kayi, “Nomba njobe Eliya?” Neye walambeti, “Sobwe, ntame Eliya.” Nabo balambeti, “Njobe Mushinshimi ngotulapembelelenga usa?” Neye Yohane walakumbuleti, “Sobwe ntame.”
JOH 1:22 Lino twambile cancine ncine, kwambeti twenga tubapandulwile cena balatutumu. Omwine ukute kwambeti njobe bani?
JOH 1:23 Yohane walabakumbuleti, mbuli mwalambila mushinshimi Yesaya, “Ame njame liswi lya muntu lolobeshenga mucinyika; Lambangeti, lulamikani nshila mwakupita Mwami.”
JOH 1:24 Lino basa bantu balatumwa ne Bafalisi,
JOH 1:25 balamwipusha Yohane, “Na ntobe Mupulushi Walaiwa usa, nambi Eliya, nambi Mushinshimi ngotulapembelelenga usa, nomba nicani ulabatishinga bantu?”
JOH 1:26 Yohane walabakumbuleti, “Ame ndababatishinga ne menshi nsombi pakati penu apa pali umbi ngomutenshi.
JOH 1:27 Nendi uyu lesanga panyuma pakame, nkandelela nekuba musha wakendi wela kusungulula ntambo sha nkwabilo shakendi.”
JOH 1:28 Bintu ibi byalenshikila ku Betaniya, kutala lwa kucwe kwa mulonga waYolodani, uko Yohane nkwali kubatisha.
JOH 1:29 Mumene mene Yohane walabona Yesu kesa kulyendiye, lino walambeti, “Kamubonani Mwana Mbelele wa Lesa, weshikufunya bwipishi bwapacishi capanshi!
JOH 1:30 Uyu endiye usa ngondalikwambeti, ‘Panyuma pakame palesanga muntu wampita, pakwinga ame nkantanansemwa nendi walikubako.’
JOH 1:31 Nenjame nkandimwinshi, nomba ndalesa akubatisha ne menshi kwambeti Baislaeli bamwishibe.”
JOH 1:32 Kayi Yohane walamwinshila bukamboni, pakwambeti, “Ndalabona Mushimu Uswepa kauseluka kwilu walikuboneketi nkulimba, walesa kwikala pali endiye.
JOH 1:33 Ame nkandali kumwinshiba, nsombi Lesa walantuma kwisa akubatisha ne menshi ewanjishibisha kwambeti, ‘Nubone Mushimu Uswepa wesanga kwikala palyendiye, epeloyo eshi kubatisha ne Mushimu Uswepa.’ ”
JOH 1:34 Ame ndalabibona, kayi ndamwambilingeti, “Epele uyu Emwana waLesa.”
JOH 1:35 Mumene mene busuba bwalakonkapo Yohane walikuba pamusena popelapo pamo ne beshikwiya bambi babili.
JOH 1:36 Mpwalabona Yesu kapita, walambeti, “Kamubonani Mwana mbelele wa Lesa!”
JOH 1:37 Beshikwiya babili basa mpobalanyumfwa maswi alico, balamukonka Yesu.
JOH 1:38 Yesu mpwalacebuka ne kuboneti balamukonkelenga, walabepusheti, “Nomba mulayandanga cani?” Nabo balambeti, “Tulayandanga kwinshiba mukute kwikala kupeyo, Labi? Bupandulushi bwa Labi nikwambeti, shikwiyisha.”
