JOH 1:39 Yesu walakumbuleti “Tiyeni mwenga mukubone.” Nabo balaya nendi. Nomba cindi calikuba mu ma 4 koloko mansailo mpobalayakubona nkwalikwikala, balekala kopeloko ubo busuba.
JOH 1:40 Umo pali basa babili walanyumfwa maswi a Yohane ne kumukonka Yesu, walikuba Ndileya mukwabo Shimoni Petulo.
JOH 1:41 Mpwalamucana shimoni mukwabo, walamwambileti, “Tulamucana Klistu, Mupulushi Walaiwa.”
JOH 1:42 Neco walamumanta ne kuya nendi kuli Yesu. Yesu mpwalamulangishisha walambeti, “Njobe Shimoni, mwanendi Yohane, nomba lino Lina lyakobe nube Kefa.” Bupandulushi bwa maina Kefa ne Petulo, alambangeti libwe.
JOH 1:43 Mpobwalaca Yesu walayeya shakuya ku Galileya. Walacana Filipo, ne kumwambileti, “Unkonke.”
JOH 1:44 Filipo walikuba waku munshi wa Betsaida, kucomwabo Ndileya ne Petulo.
JOH 1:45 Filipo walacana Nataniyele ne kumwambileti, “Tulamucana usa Mose ngwalalemba sha endiye mulibuku lya Milawo, usa bashinshimi ngobalalemba sha endiye. Yesu Mwana waYosefe, waku Nasaleti.”
JOH 1:46 Nomba Nataniyele walamwipusheti, “Sena kuNasaleti ngakufuma kantu kayina?” Filipo walakumbuleti, “Tiye ulibonene wenka.”
JOH 1:47 Yesu mpwalamubona Nataniyele nkesa, walambeti, “Cakubinga uyu emwana mwine mwine waku Islayele wabula bundengamano.”
JOH 1:48 Nataniyele walamwipusheti, “Mulanjishibi aconi?” Yesu walakumbuleti, “Pasa mpowanga wekala mwinshi mwacitondo camukuyu, Filipo katana akukuwa, ame ndalakubona.”
JOH 1:49 Nataniyele walambeti, “Bashikwiyisha, cakubinga njamwe Mwana Lesa, njamwe Mwami wa Islayele.”
JOH 1:50 Yesu walamukumbuleti, “Sena ulashomo pakwinga ndakwambilyeti ndalakubona mwinshi mwa citondo camukuyu. Nomba nubone byapita apa.”
JOH 1:51 Kayi walambeti, “Lino cancine ncine ndakwambilingeti nukabone kwilu kwacaluka, nukabone bangelo ba Lesa nkabatanta kayi kabaseluka kwisa kuli Mwana Muntu.”
JOH 2:1 Mpopalapita masuba abili, kwalaba bwinga ku Kana munshi walikuba mucimpansha ca Galileya. Nabo banyina Yesu balayako.
JOH 2:2 Yesu neye pamo ne beshikwiya bakendi balakwiwako kubwinga ubu.
JOH 2:3 Mpowalapwa waini ngobalikunwa bantu, banyina Yesu balamwambileti, “Ulabapwili waini.”
JOH 2:4 Yesu walakumbuleti, “Ma kamutang'ambila ncendela kwinsa, Cindi cakame nkacitana cishika.”
JOH 2:5 Necikabeco banyina balambila basebenshi bapabwingeti, “Mwinse ciliconse nceti amwambile.”
JOH 2:6 Lino popelapo palikuba nongo sha mabwe shisanu ne imo, balashibikapo pacebo ca mwambo wa Bayuda wakuliswepesha. Munongo iliyonse mwalikwingila menshi akwana mingomo isanu nambi kupitililapo.
JOH 2:7 Lino Yesu walambila basa basebenshi, “Kamushani menshi munongo shonse shisule.” Naboyo balesusha mpaka pamilomo.
JOH 2:8 Panyuma pakendi walabambileti, “Lino tekulani, mutwalile mukulene lendeleshenga bwinga.” Naboyo balamutwalila.
JOH 2:9 Mukulene wa bwinga mpwalatelela menshi asa Yesu ngalasandula kuba waini, liya kwinshiba kwalafuma waini uyo. Nomba basebenshi basa balateka menshi balikwinshiba. Lino mukulene walikwendelesha bwinga walakuwa shibwinga,
JOH 2:10 ne kumwambileti, “Bantu bakute kutanguna kuyaba waini waina, nomba bantu bekuta, ukute kubapa waini waina pang'ana. Nomba amwe mwanga mwabika waina kushika cino cindi!”
JOH 2:11 Ici calikuba cishikunkamanisha cakutanguna Yesu ncalensa mumunshi wa Kana mucimpansha ca Galileya nkwalalesha bulemu bwakendi, neco beshikwiya bakendi balamushoma.
JOH 2:12 Panyuma pakendi Yesu walaya ku Kapenao, pamo ne banyina ne bakwabo ne beshikwiya bakendi, nkobalakekala kwamasuba ang'ana.
JOH 2:13 Cindi ca kusekelela Pasika wa Bayuda calaba pepi, Yesu walanyamuka kuya kuYelusalemu.
JOH 2:14 Kopeloko walengila mulubuwa lwa Ng'anda ya Lesa walakacana bantu balolishinga ng'ombe, mbelele ne nkulimba. Kayi nabambi kabali bekala pa bipuna kabashintana mali.
JOH 2:15 Popelapo walapanga ciswepu ca loshi ne kutatika kubatandanyina pansa bonse, pamo ne ngombe, ne mbelele shabo shonse. walawisha matebulu a bantu balikushintana mali ne mali alamwaikila panshi mbwee.
JOH 2:16 Kayi walambila balikulisha nkulimba eti, “Bipulisheni pansa, mutaisandula Ng'anda ya Bata kuba ya kwinshilamo makwebo.”
JOH 2:17 Beshikwiya balanuka Mabala alambangeti, “Kulibenga kwakame mung'anda yenu kulyeti mulilo ulabangilinga mukati mwakame.”
JOH 2:18 Popelapo bamakulene ba Bayuda balamwipusheti, “Nicikankamiko cini ncoshi winse kwambeti utuleshe naukute ngofu shakwinsa bintu ibi?”
JOH 2:19 Yesu walabakumbuleti, “Na mwipwaye Nga'nda ya Lesa ino, nenjame nindiyibake mumasuba atatu.”
JOH 2:20 Lino nabo balambeti, “Nga'nda ya Lesa iyi yalamanta byaka makumi ana ne byaka bisanu ne cimo pakuibaka, lino amwe ngamuibaka mumasubowa atatu?”
JOH 2:21 Nomba Ng'anda ya Lesa njalikwamba Yesu walikuba mubili wakendi.
JOH 2:22 Mpwalapunduka kubafu, beshikwiya bakendi balanuka kwambeti walabambilapo makani awa, neco balashoma Mabala ne maswi ngalamba.
JOH 2:23 Yesu mpwalikuba mu Yelusalemu pakusekelela kwa Pasika, bantu bangi balamushoma pakubona bikankamisho mbyalensa.
JOH 2:24 Nomba Yesu liya kubashoma, pakwinga walikubenshiba ncebabele bonse.
JOH 2:25 Nkalapembela kwambeti muntu umbi amwambile ncebabele bantu, pakwinga mwine walikwinshiba bili mumyoyo ya bantu.
JOH 3:1 Muntu wamulikoto lya Bafalisi, lina lyakendi Nikodemo, mutangunishi wa Bayuda,
JOH 3:2 walesa kuli Yesu mashiku ne kwambeti, “Bashikwiyisha, tucinsheti njamwe shikwiyisha ngwalatutumina Lesa, pakwinga kuliya muntu wela kwinsa bingashilo byeshikukankamanisha mbyomulenshinga, na Lesa nkalipo nendi.”
JOH 3:3 Yesu walambeti, “Cancine ndakwambilinga kuliya muntu wela kwingila mubwami bwa Lesa na liya kusemwa cipya.”
JOH 3:4 Nikodemo walepusheti, “Sena muntu ngosemwa kayi cipya lakulu kendi? Sena ngawingila mulibunda mubanyina ne kusemwa cipya?”
JOH 3:5 Yesu walamukumbuleti, “Ndakwambilinga cancine ncine kwambeti kotana wingila mu Bwami bwa Lesa citanshi kusemwa ne menshi ne Mushimu Uswepa.
JOH 3:6 Muntu ukute kusemwa kumubili, nsombi kumushimu ukute kusemwa ne Mushimu Uswepa.
JOH 3:7 Kotakankamana pakwinga ndakwambilyeti wela kusemwa katubili.
JOH 3:8 Lukupwe lukute kupupula kulubasu kulikonse, kayi mukute kunyumfweti lulapupulunga, nsombi nkokute kwinshiba nkolulafumunga nambi nkolulenga. Nicimo cimo ne muntu uliyense lasemwa ne Mushimu Uswepa.”
JOH 3:9 Nikodemo walepusheti, “Ibi ngabinshika aconi?”
JOH 3:10 Yesu walambeti, “Sena obe ntobe shikwiyisha wenshibikwa mu islayeli, nomba nkobinshi aconi bintu ibi?”
JOH 3:11 Ndakwambilinga cancine ncine tukute kwamba mbyotwinshi, kayi tukute kupa bukamboni mbyotwalabona, nomba amwe nkamulashomonga maswi etu.
JOH 3:12 Na nkamulashomonga mpondamwambilinga byapanshi pano, nomba ngamushoma aconi ndamwambila bintu byakwilu?
JOH 3:13 “Kuliya muntu walayako kwilu, nsombi Mwana Muntu ewalesa kufuma kwilu.
JOH 3:14 Nomba kayi mbuli Mose mucinyika musa walapacika njoka ya mukuba pelu pacitondo, copeleco neye Mwana Muntu nakanyamunwe pelu mushobomo.
JOH 3:15 Kwambeti uliyense wamushoma akabe ne buyumi butapu.
JOH 3:16 Kayi Lesa walabasunisha bantu pacishi capanshi, ecebo cakendi walayaba Mwanendi umo enka, kwambeti uliyense eti akamushome akacane buyumi butapu.
JOH 3:17 Lesa nkalatuma Mwanendi panshi pano, kwambeti omboloshe milandu ya bantu, nsombi kwambeti abapulushe.
JOH 3:18 “Namuntu washoma muli Yesu, Lesa nteshi akamomboloshe, nsombi abo balabulunga kushoma balomboloshewanga kendi, pakwinga nkabalashomonga Mwana wa Lesa enka.
JOH 3:19 Lombolosho nulu lwakwambeti nekukabeti mumuni walesa pacishi capanshi bantu balasuna mushinshe, kupita mumuni pakwinga incito shabo shaipa.
JOH 3:20 Uliyense lenshinga byaipa, wapatana ne mumuni. Kayi nkakute kwisa patuba, kutina incito shakendi shaipa kwambeti ngashibonekela.
JOH 3:21 Nsombi balenshinga byancine ncine bakute kwisa patuba, kayi bya kwinsa byabo bikute kwinshibiketi labinshi mwakunyumfwila Lesa.”
JOH 3:22 Panyuma pakendi, Yesu ne beshikwiya bakendi balaya ku cimpansha caYudeya. Walekala nabo kwacindi citali kopeloko kabatisha bantu.
JOH 3:23 Neye Yohane walikubatisha ku Ainoni pepi ne Salimu, pakwinga ekwalikuba menshi angi. Bantu balikushika kulyendiye, walikubabatisha.
JOH 3:24 Pacindici Yohane walikatana uwalwa mujele.
JOH 3:25 Beshikwiya bambi baYohane balatatika kutototekeshana ne Muyuda naumbi shamwambo wakuliswepesha.
JOH 3:26 Neco beshikwiya basa balesa kuli Yohane ne kumwambileti, “Mwiyi bonani, muntu usa ngomwalikwamba nendi kutala kwa mulonga wa Yolodani, usa ngomwalenshila bukamboni neye labatishinga, kayi bantu bonse balafwambilinga kulyendiye.”
JOH 3:27 Yohane walakumbuleti, “Muntu nkela kutambula kantu kalikonse na Lesa liya kumupa.
JOH 3:28 Amwe ngamumbela bukamboni pakwinga mwalanyumfwa ndalambeti, Ntame Mupulushi Walaiwa, nsombi njame walatumwa pantangu pakendi.
JOH 3:29 Nyabwinga nimuka shibwinga. Nomba munendi nyabwinga emanapepi kanyumfwako ukute kukondwa anyumfwa maswi ashibwinga. Nicimo cimo nenjame kukondwa kwakame kulakwana.
JOH 3:30 Usa welela kuba ne bulemu bunene bwapita bwakame.”
JOH 3:31 “Weshikufuma kwilu wapita bonse. Weshikufuma panshi pano niwapanshi pano, kayi ukute kwamba bya panshi pano. Weshikufuma kwilu wapita bonse.
JOH 3:32 Nendi uyu lenshinga bukamboni pa bintu mbyalabona ne kunyumfwa, nsombi paliya ukute kushoma maswi akendi.
JOH 3:33 Nsombi muntu ashoma maswi akendi, ukute kulesheti Lesa ukute kukwanilisha malayano akendi.
JOH 3:34 Uyo Lesa ngwalatuma, ukute kwamba maswi a Lesa, pakwinga Lesa ukute kumupa Mushimu Uswepa wabula cipimo.
JOH 3:35 Bata bamusuni mwanabo, kayi babika bintu byonse mumakasa akendi.
JOH 3:36 Muntu lashomonga mwanoyo, ukute buyumi butapu. Nsombi lakananga kushoma mwanoyo, nteshi akabe nebuyumi, neco bukalu bwa Lesa buli palyendiye cindi conse.”
JOH 4:1 Bafalisi balanyumfweti Yesu lasandulunga bantu bangi kuba beshikwiya ne kubabatisha kupita Yohane,
JOH 4:2 Yesu uliya kubatishapo muntu naba umo, nsombi beshikwiya bakendi ebalikubatisha.
JOH 4:3 Yesu mpwalenshiba ncebalikwamba, walafumako kuYudeya ne kubwelela ku Galileya.
JOH 4:4 Pabulwendo bwakendi walaciboneti welela kupitila mucishi ca Samaliya.
JOH 4:5 Lino walashika ku munshi waku Samaliya, walikukwiweti Sika, pepi ne kamusena ako Yakobo nkalapa Yosefe mwanendi.
JOH 4:6 Kopeloko kwalikuba mukalo walikuba waYakobo. Yesu walekala panshi pambali pamukalo uyo, pakwinga walikuba laleme nemusuma. Cindi calikuba muma 12 koloko munshi.
JOH 4:7 Mutukashi wa kuSamaliya walesakuteka menshi. Yesu walamusengeti, “kamumpako menshi akunwa.”
JOH 4:8 Pacindi ico beshikwiya bakendi balikuba balayi akula cakulya mumunshi.
JOH 4:9 Mutukashi usa walakumbuleti, “Amwe Bayuda, nicani mulasengenga menshi kuli nde Musamaliya?” Pakwinga Bayuda nkabendelana ne Basamaliya.
JOH 4:10 Yesu walambeti, “Nkocishi cipo Lesa ncalayandanga kukupa, kayi nkomwinshi lakusengenga menshi akunwa, numwinshi nshinga nulamusenge menshi eshikupa buyumi.”
JOH 4:11 Mutukashi uyo walambeti, “Nkambo, muliyawa cakutekesha, kayi mukalo uyu nutali, nomba menshi eshikupa buyumi ayo nimwafunye kupeyo?
JOH 4:12 Sena amwe mwapita bata bakulukulu balikubako ba Yakobo? uyo walashiya mukalo uyu ngalikunwamo mwine ne bana bendi kayi ne biswika byakendi.”
JOH 4:13 Yesu walakumbuleti, “Muntu uliyense lanunga menshi aya nakanyumfwe inyotwa kayi.
JOH 4:14 Nsombi uliyense uyo lanunga menshi ngondamupa nteshi akanyumfwepo inyotwa kayi. Pakwinga menshi ayo ngoshi nkamupe nakabeti kamulonga kansansa menshi eshikupa buyumi butapu.”
JOH 4:15 Mutukashi uyo walambeti, “Nkambo, kamumpako ayo menshi kwambeti ntakanyumfwapo nyotwa nambi ntakesa kayi kuno akuteka menshi.”
JOH 4:16 Yesu walambeti, “Koya ukuwe baibobe mwise,”
JOH 4:17 Mutukashi uyo walambeti, “Ndiyawa mulume.” Yesu walakumbuleti, “Ulambanga cakubinga uliyawa mulume.
JOH 4:18 Obe walebwapo kendi kubatuloba basanu, kayi mutuloba ngoli nendi lino nte ibobe, mutukashi walambeti, mulamba cakubinga.”
JOH 4:19 Mutukashi walambeti, “Nkambo, ndacinshibi kwambeti njamwe Mushinshimi.
JOH 4:20 Bamashali betu bakulukulu balikupaila Lesa pa mulundu uyu, nsombi amwe Bayuda mukute kwambeti kuYelusalemu ekwelela kupailila.”
JOH 4:21 Yesu walamwambileti, “Koshoma ncendambanga.” Cindi nicikashike nceshi mukabule kupailila Bata pa mulundu pano, nambi kuYelusalemu.
JOH 4:22 Basamaliya mukute kupaila ngo mutenshi, afwe Bayuda tukute kupaila ngotwinshi, pakwinga lupulusho nilukacanike kupitila mu Bayuda.
JOH 4:23 “Nomba cindi nicikashike, kayi cilashiki kendi, bantu beshikupaila Cancine ncine mpoti bakapaile Bata mu Mushimu nemu cancine ncine. Bata bakute kuyanda bantu beshikumupaila mumushoboyo.
JOH 4:24 Lesa ni Mushimu, neco beshikumupaila bela kumupaila mu Mushimu ne mu Cancine ncine.”
JOH 4:25 Mutukashi usa walambeti, “Ndicinsheti Klistu Mupulushi Walaiwa lakesanga, akashika, nakatwambile byonse.”
JOH 4:26 Yesu walamwambileti, “Ame ngolambanga nendi njame wopeloyo.”
JOH 4:27 Pacindi copeleco beshikwiya ba Yesu balashika, nomba balakankamana mpobalacana kabandika ne mutukashi. Paliya walamwipusheti, “Ulayandanga cani” Nambi, “Nicani mulabandikinga nendi?”
JOH 4:28 Mutukashi usa walashiya mungomo wakendi ne kuya mu munshi akwambila bantu,
JOH 4:29 “Katuyani mubone muntu lang'ambili byonse mbyondalensa. Sena ngakali usa Mupulushi Walaiwa?
JOH 4:30 Lino bantu balayoboloka kufuma mumunshi kwisa kuli Yesu.”
JOH 4:31 Pacindi copeleco beshikwiya ba Yesu balamusengeti, “Mwiyi, kamulyani.”
JOH 4:32 Nendi walakumbuleti, “Ame nkute cakulya amwe ncomutenshi.”
JOH 4:33 Popelapo beshikwiya balatatika kwipushana, “Sena kuli naumbi lamuletele cakulya?”
JOH 4:34 Nomba Yesu walambeti, “Cakulya cakame nikwinsa ibyo mbyasuni Lesa walantuma ne kupwisha mulimo wakendi.”
JOH 4:35 Mukute kwambeti, pakati pakushanga ne kutebula pali myenshi ina nambi ingi, nsombi kamulangishisha bishango bilapi kendi, bilapembelengowa kutebula.
JOH 4:36 Musebenshi shikutebula latatiki kendi kufola, kayi labunganyanga bisepo kubuymi butapu. Neco shikushanga ne shikutebula nibakakondwe pamo.
JOH 4:37 Neco mwambo wakwambeti, “Nabambi bakute kushanga, kayi nabambi bakute kwisa kutebula niwakubinga.”
JOH 4:38 Ndamutumunga kuya kutebula bishango mumabala alalimwa kendi ne bantu bambi. Amwe mulacaninipo pindu pa ncito yabo.
JOH 4:39 Basamaliya bangi ba mumunshi musa balamushoma Yesu pacebo cabukamboni bwa mutukashi usa, bwakwambeti, “nendi langambili byonse mbyondalensa.”
JOH 4:40 Lino Basamaliya mpobalashika kuli Yesu, balamusengeti ekale nabo. Neco walekala kopeloko masuba abili.
JOH 4:41 Popelapo bantu bangi balashoma pacebo ca maswi ngobalanyumfwa kuli Yesu.
JOH 4:42 Usa mutukashu balamwambileti, “Tulashomo lino, tuliya kushoma pacebo ca maswi akobe, nsombi pacebo cakwambeti tulalinyumfwili tobene. Tulenshibi cakubinga kwambeti uyu eMupulushi wa bantu ba pacishi capanshi conse.”
JOH 4:43 Nomba mpopalapita masuba abili, Yesu walafumako nekuya ku Galileya.
JOH 4:44 Nomba Yesu mwine walambeti, “mushinshimi, nkakute kupewa bulemu kucomwabo.”
JOH 4:45 Mpwalashika kuGalileya, bantu balamutambula, pakwinga balabonapo kendi byonse mbyalensa pakusekelela Pasika ku Yelusalemu pakwinga naboyo balikubako.
JOH 4:46 Kufumapo Yesu walaya kumunshi wa kana ku Galileya, kusa nkwalasandula menshi kuba waini. Kopeloko kwalikuba mukulene wamfulumende ku Kapelenaumu walikukute mwana mulwashi.
JOH 4:47 Mpalanyumfweti Yesu lashiki kuGalileya kufuma kuYudeya, walesa kulyendiye nekumusengeti enga nendi ku Kapelenaumu, kwambeti enga ashilike mwanendi walikuba pepi kufwa.
JOH 4:48 Yesu walamwambileti, “wabula kubona bingashilo ne bikankamanisho, nkamushomo sobwe.”
JOH 4:49 Mukulene wa mfulumende walambeti, “Nkambo, katuyani pamo mwaname nkatanafwa.”
JOH 4:50 Yesu walamwambileti, “Koya mwanobe lasenguku kendi.” Muntuyo walashoma maswi a Yesu nekuya kucomwabo.
JOH 4:51 Mpwalikuya walakumana ne basebenshi bakendi, nabo balamwambileti, “Mwanenu laba cena.”
JOH 4:52 Walabepusha cindi ncalaba cena mwanoyo, nabo balambeti, “Watatika kunyumfwa cena lilo munshi muma 1 koloko.”
JOH 4:53 Lino baishi mwana balanuketi ecindi Yesu mpwalabambileti, “Mwanobe lasenguku.” Neco bonse bamung'anda yakendi balamushoma.
JOH 4:54 Ici calikuba cingashilo cacibili ncalensa ku Kana, wa kuGalileya mpwalafuma ku Yudeya.
JOH 5:1 Panyuma pakendi kwalikuba kusekelela kwa Bayuda, ku Yelusalemu neye Yesu walayako
JOH 5:2 Lino kopeloko pepi necishinga cambelele, kwalikuba kalishiba ka menshi kalikukwiweti Betsaida mumbali mwalishiba ili mwalikuba mwebakwa tumanda tubili.
JOH 5:3 Mu tumandomo mwalikona bantu bangi balwashi, balema ne bashipilwa kayi ne bakokonyana mibili
JOH 5:4 (Pakwinga mungelo walikufandaula menshi, neco mulwashi walikwingila bwangu mumenshi walikushilikwa.)
JOH 5:5 Nomba pa bantu balwashi abo palikuba umbi walakolwa kwa byaka 38.
JOH 5:6 Yesu mpwalamubona nkali wona, waleshiba kwambeti walakolwa kwa cindi citali. Lino walamwipusheti, “Sena ulayandanga kushilikwa?”
JOH 5:7 Mulwashi uyo walambeti, “Nkambo ndiyawa muntu welakuntwala mumenshi na alafundaulwa, ndambeti njingile nkutekucana naumbi lampitili kendi.”
JOH 5:8 Yesu walamwambileti, “Punduka, manta mpasa yakobe, yamba kwenda.”
JOH 5:9 Popelapo muntu uyo walashilikwa, walamanta mpasa yakendi nekuyamba kwenda. Busuba ubo bwalikuba bwa Sabata.
JOH 5:10 Lino Bayuda balambila uyu walashilikwa, “Lelo nipa Sabata, milawo yetu nkayasuminisha kunyamuna mpasa yakobe.”
JOH 5:11 Nomba neye walambeti, “Lanshiliki elangambilyeti, ‘Nyamuna mpasa yakobe nekwenda.’”
JOH 5:12 Nabo balamwipusheti, “Niyani uyo lakwambily eti nyamuna mpasa yakobe wende?”
JOH 5:13 Nomba uyu muntu walashilikwa nkalamwinshiba walamushilikwa, pakwinga Yesu walikuba lengili mukati mwa bantu bangi abo balikuba popelapo.
JOH 5:14 Panyuma pakendi Yesu walamucana mu Nga'nda ya Lesa, usa ngwalashilika, walamwambileti, “Bona, lino ulashilikwa, kotakensa kayi byaipa, kwambeti nkotakakolwa kayi bulwashi nabumbi bwaipa.”
JOH 5:15 Muntu usa walaya kwambila Bayuda kwambeti Yesu elamushiliki.
JOH 5:16 Lino batangunishi ba Bayuda balatatika kumushupa Yesu pacebo cakushilika muntu pa Sabata.
JOH 5:17 Nsombi Yesu walabambileti, “Bata balasebensenga cindi conse mpaka lelo lino, nenjame ndelela kusebensa.”
JOH 5:18 Makani aya alapesheti bayuda bapitilishe kupingila kushina Yesu. Balikwambeti Yesu lapwayanga mulawo wa Sabata, kayi pakwambeti ni mwana wa Lesa, walyelanishinga ne Lesa.
JOH 5:19 Lino Yesu walambeti, “Ndamwambilinga cancine ncine kwambeti paliya ncela kwinsa Mwana palwakendi mwine. Nsombi ukute kwinsa ncalabononga baishi nkabensa. Bilenshinga baishi neye Mwana mbyakute kwinsa.
JOH 5:20 Pakwinga baishi basuni Mwana, neco bakute kumulesha byonse nabo mbyobalenshinga. Baishi nibamuleshe mulimo wapita ibi kwambeti mubinshibe.
JOH 5:21 Mbuli Bata ncobakute kupundusha bafwa, nekubapa buyumi, copeleco Mwana lapanga buyumi kuli abo mbasuni.
JOH 5:22 Baishi nkabakute kombolosha muntu sobwe. Nsombi balapa ngofu Mwana kwambeti abe weshikombolosha byonse.
JOH 5:23 Bata bakute kuyandeti bantu bonse balemekenga Mwana, mbuli ncobakute kulemeka Baishi. Muntu labulunga kulemeka Mwana, nkakute kulemeka Baishi balamutuma.
JOH 5:24 “Ndamwambilishingeti muntu uliyense lanyumfu maswi akame nekushoma walantuma, nakabe ne buyumi butapu. Uyo nendi nteshi akomboloshewe, nsombi lapulu kendi mu lufu, nekuya mubuyumi butapu.
JOH 5:25 Kayi ndamwambilingeti cindi nicikashike, kayi cilashiki kendi, apo bantu bafwa mposhi bakanyumfwe maswi a Mwana wa Lesa, kayi abo beshibakanyumfwe ne bakashome nibakabe ne buyumi.
JOH 5:26 Mbuli baishi ncebalicitente ca buyumi nendi Mwana walaba citente cabuyumi.
JOH 5:27 Neco walamupa mwana ngofu shakombolosha bantu, pakwinga ni Mwana Muntu.
JOH 5:28 Mutakankamana, pakwinga cindi nicikashike bantu bonse bali mumanda nibakanyumfwe maswi akendi nekupunduka.
JOH 5:29 Bantu balensa byaina nibakapunduke kwambeti babe ne buyumi, nsombi balensa byaipa, nibakapunduke kwambeti bomboloshewe.”
JOH 5:30 “Ame nkandela kwinsa kantu pandenka. Nkute kombolosha mbuli ncobakute kung'ambila Bata. Kayi nkute kombolosha mubululami, pakwinga nkankute kwinsa mbyonsuni, nsombi mbyobasuni Bata balantuma.
JOH 5:31 “Na ndalinshili bukamboni, bukamboni bwakame nkabwakwana.
JOH 5:32 Nsombi kuli naumbi ukute kunjinshila bukamboni, kayi bukamboni mbwakute kunjinshila nibwancine ncine.
JOH 5:33 Amwe mwalatuma ntumi kuli Yohane mubatishi, nendi walensa bukamboni bwakubinga.
JOH 5:34 Nteko kwambeti ame nsuni bukamboni bwa muntu, nsombi ndambanga ibi kwambeti amwe mupuluke.
JOH 5:35 Yohane mubatishi walikubeti lampi yalikumunika, amwe mwalakondwa ne mumuni kwakacindi kang'ana.
JOH 5:36 Nsombi ame nkute bukamboni bwapita bwa Yohane. Bata balampa incito njondelela kwinsa, kayi incito njondenshinga iyi ilaleshengeti Bata ebalantuma.
JOH 5:37 Kayi Bata abo balantuma, balanjinshila bukamboni. Nomba amwe muliya kunyumfwa maswi abo, nambi kubona cinso cabo.
JOH 5:38 Maswi abo nkakute kwikala muli njamwe, pakwinga nkamukute kumushoma Bata ngobalatuma.
JOH 5:39 Mukute kubelenga Mabala a Lesa, pakwinga mukute kuyeyeti nimucanemo buyumi butapu. Nomba kayi Mabala opelayo akute kunjinshila bukamboni.
JOH 5:40 Nomba amwe mulakananga kwisa kuli njame kwambeti mube ne buyumi.
JOH 5:41 “Nkandalangaulunga kupewa bulemu kubantu sobwe.
JOH 5:42 Nsombi ndimwinshi kwambeti amwe nkamusuni Lesa mumyoyo yenu.
JOH 5:43 Ame ndalesa mulina lya Bata, nomba amwe muliya kuntambula. Nsombi umbi esa mulina lyakendi ne kulyamba mwine uyo engomukute kutambula.
JOH 5:44 Lino nomba nga mushomaconi na musuni owa kulumbaishiwa ne banenu, Nsombi nkamusuni kutambula bulemu mbwela kumupa Lesa?
JOH 5:45 Nomba mutayeyeti njame ndeshi nkamwambilenga byaipa kuli Bata. Weshi akamwambilenga nkwali, Mose ngomwalikuba mwashoma.
JOH 5:46 Ne mwalashoma Mose cancine ncine ne mwalanshoma ne njame, pakwinga neye walalemba makani alikwamba njame.
JOH 5:47 Nomba na nkamulashomonga mbyalalemba, nomba ngamushoma aconi maswi akame?”
JOH 6:1 Panyuma pakendi Yesu walatampuka lwenje lwa Galileya ulo kayi lwalikukwiweti lwenje lwa Tibeliyo
JOH 6:2 Likoto linene lyalamukonkela, pacebo cakwambeti lyalabona bingashilo byeshi kukankamanisha mbyalensa pakushilika balwashi.
JOH 6:3 Yesu walatanta mulundu ne kwikala panshi ne beshikwiya bakendi.
JOH 6:4 Lino kusekelela kwa Pasika kwalaseng'ena pepi.
JOH 6:5 Lino Yesu mpwalalangishisha, walabona likoto lyabantu linene lisa nkalisa kulyendiye. Lino nendi walepusha Filipo, “Sena ngatuya tula kupeyo cakulya cakulyesha bantu bonse aba?”
JOH 6:6 Walepushila nsulo kwambeti amweleshe Filipo, nsombi mwine walikwinshiba cakwinsa.
JOH 6:7 Filipo walakumbuleti, “Nambi mali akwana masauzande ali 200 nkelakukwana kula cakulya cakwambeti uliyense alyeko nambi pang'ana.”
JOH 6:8 Weshikwiya wakendi umbi, lina lyakendi Ndileya, mukwabo Shimoni Petulo, walambila Yesu eti,
JOH 6:9 “Pali mutuloba pano, ukute shinkwa usanu ne tunswi tubili. Nomba sena ngatukwana bantu bonse aba?”
JOH 6:10 Yesu walambeti, “Bambileni bantu bekale panshi.” Popelapo palikuba mila yamwemfu ingi, nabo bantu abo balekala panshi. Batuloba bonka balikubapo balikuba bakwana 5,000.
JOH 6:11 Lino walamanta shinkwa usa, mpwalalumba Lesa, walabayabila bantu abo balikuba bekala panshi. Walensa copeleco ne tunswi tusa, nekubayabila bantu abo mobalikuyandila.
JOH 6:12 Bantu bonse abo mpobalekuta, Yesu walambila Beshikwiya bakendi, “Yowelani byashalanga panshi kwambeti kabitatayanikowa.”
JOH 6:13 Nomba balayowela byonse bya shinkwa usanu usa, ne kwisusha mitanga likumi ne ibili.
JOH 6:14 Bantu basa mpobalabona ceshikukankamanisha ncalensa Yesu, balambeti, “Cancine ncine uyu nimushinshimi usa ngobalikwambeti nakese panshi pano.”
JOH 6:15 Yesu walenshiba kwambeti bantu abo balikuyandeti bamwikate ne kumubika pabwami cakumukakatisha. Neco walaya kayi kumulundu kwayenka.
JOH 6:16 Mansailo, beshikwiya ba Yesu balaya ku Lwenje.
JOH 6:17 Kopeloko balengila mubwato kwambeti batampuke lwenje kuya ku Kapelenaumu. Kwalashipa Yesu nkatana uya kulyendibo.
JOH 6:18 Pacindici kwalikuba cipuupu cinene, neco palaba mankape pa menshi.
JOH 6:19 Beshikwiya mpobalendako makilomita akwana atatu nambi ana, balabona Yesu nkenda pa menshi nkesa pepi kubwato bwabo, neco nabo balatina.
JOH 6:20 Nsombi Yesu walambeti, “Njame, mutatina.”
JOH 6:21 Lino balikuyandeti engile mubwato nomba pacindi copeleco bwato bwalashika kutala kwa Lwenje nkobalikuya.
JOH 6:22 Lino mumene mene likoto lya bantu lyalashalila kutala kwa lwenje, lyalenshiba kwambeti panga bwato bumo. Kayi bantu balenshiba kwambeti Yesu liya kwingilamo mubwato ubo beshikwiya bakendi balaya bonka.
JOH 6:23 Lino mato nambi alafumina ku Tibeliyasi alashika pepi ne busena bantu basa mpobalyela cakulya Mwami mpalalumba Lesa.
JOH 6:24 Likoto lisa lyalaboneti Yesu kuliya, nabo beshikwiya bakendi kuliya, bantu bonse basa balengila mubwato busa, nekuya ku kapelenaumu akuyandaula Yesu.
JOH 6:25 Mpobalamucana Yesu kutala kwa lwenje, balamwipusheti, “Bashikwiyisha, mwalashika lilyoni kuno?”
JOH 6:26 Yesu walambeti, “Kwamba cakubinga, amwe mwanangaulanga pacebo cakwambeti mwalalya cakulya nekwikuta, nteko kwambeti mwalanyumfwishisha bikankamanisho bisa ncebyalikwamba sobwe.
JOH 6:27 Kamutasebensanga kwambeti mucane cakulya cikute konongeka, nsombi musebensenga kwambeti mucane cakulya ceshikwikalilila, buyumi butapu. Mwana Muntu endiye wela kumupa cakulya copeleci, pakwinga Lesa Bata mpobalabika cinshibilo ca kusuminisha kwabo.”
JOH 6:28 Nabo balamwipusheti, “Twinse aconi kwambeti tukonke mbyalayandanga Lesa?”
JOH 6:29 Yesu walabakumbuleti, “Lesa ncalayandanga kwambeti mwinse nikushoma ame ndalatumwa ne Lesa.”
JOH 6:30 Kayi balamwipusheti, “Ningamutubonesha cingashilo camushobo cini kwambeti twacibona tumushome? Nimwinsepo cani?
JOH 6:31 Bashali betu bali kulya mana mucinyika musa, mbuli Mabala a Lesa ncalambangeti, ‘walikubapa cakulya ceshi kufuma kwilu kwambeti balye.’”
JOH 6:32 Yesu walambeti, “Ndamwambilinga cakubinga kwambeti nte Mose walikubapa cakulya calikufuma kwilu sobwe, nsombi ni Bata. Mbuli Bata ncabalamupanga cakulya cancine ncine pacino cindi cilafumunga kwilu.
JOH 6:33 Pakwinga cakulya Lesa ncakute kupa, endico ceshikufuma kwilu, ceshikupa buyumi kubantu bonse ba mucishi capanshi.”
JOH 6:34 Popelapo balambeti, “Mwami, kamutupanga cakulya ici masuba onse.”
JOH 6:35 Yesu walabambileti, “Njame shinkwa ceshikupa buyumi. Uliyense lesanga kuli njame nekunshoma nteshi akanyumfwe nsala. Kayi uliyense lashomonga njame, nteshi akanyumfwe nyotwa.
JOH 6:36 Mbuli ncondalamwambileti kumbona mulambononga, nsombi nkamulashomonga.
JOH 6:37 Abo bonse mbobampa bata, nibakese kuli njame, nomba muntu uliyense lesanga kuli njame, nteshi nkamukane.
JOH 6:38 Pakwinga ndalafuma kwilu kwisakwinsa kuyanda kwa uyo walantuma, kutambeti njinse kuyanda kwakame sobwe.
JOH 6:39 Kuyanda kwa uyo walantuma nikwambeti mbule kutaya nambi umo pali abo mbalampa, nsombi kwambeti nkabapundushe kubafu pabusuba bwakupwililisha.
JOH 6:40 Pakwinga Bata ncobalayandanga nikwambeti muntu uliyense lamubono Mwanoyo nekumushoma, akabe ne buyumi butapu. Kai ame ninkamupundushe kufuma kubafu pabusuba bwa kupwililisha.”
JOH 6:41 Popelapo Bayuda nabambi balatatika kung'unung'usha cebo cakwambeti Yesu walambeti, “Ame njame shinkwa walafuma kwilu.”
JOH 6:42 Pacebo ici balambeti, “Se uyu nte Yesu mwanendi Yosefe usa? Baishi ne banyina tubenshi. Nomba nicani lambangeti, Ndalafuma kwilu?”
JOH 6:43 Yesu walabakumbuleti, “Mutang'unung'ushanga pakati penu.
JOH 6:44 Paliya wela kwisa kuli njame, nsombi Bata balantuma ebelakumuleta kuli njame. Nomba na ucikonsha kwisa kulinjame ninkamupundushe kubafu pabusuba bwa kupwililisha.
JOH 6:45 Bashinshimi balalembeti, ‘Lesa nakamwiyishe muntu uliyense.’ Pakwinga muntu uliyense lanyumfwilinga Bata, nekwiya kulyendibo, ukute kwisa kuli njame.
JOH 6:46 Ici nkacilapandululungeti pali muntu walababonapo Bata sobwe, nsombi uyo enka walafuma kuli Lesa ewalababona.
JOH 6:47 Ndamwambilinga cakubingeti uyo lanshomonga ukute buyumi butapu.
JOH 6:48 Ame njame shinkwa ceshikupa buyumi.
JOH 6:49 Bashali benu balikulya mana mucinyika musa, nikukabeco balafwa.
JOH 6:50 Nomba shinkwa uwu walafuma kwilu, muntu aulya nteshi akafwe.
JOH 6:51 Ame ndeshinkwa weshikupa buyumi walafuma kwilu. Na muntu uliyense ulya shinkwa uwu, nakabe nebuyumi butapu. Shinkwa weshinkamupe nimubili wakame, ngoshi nkape kwambeti bantu bonse bapacishi capanshi babe nebuyumi.”
JOH 6:52 Popelapo Bayuda basa balatatika kutotekeshana bonka, kabambeti, “Ngatulya aconi mubili wakendi?”
JOH 6:53 Yesu walambeti, “Ndamwambilinga cakubinga, Na mubula kulya mubili wa Mwana Muntu nekunwa milopa yakendi, nkamwela kuba nebuyumi muli njamwe.
JOH 6:54 Uliyense lalinga mubili wakame nekunwa milopa yakame, ukute buyumi butapu, ame ninkamupundushe kubafu pa busuba bwa kupwililisha.
JOH 6:55 Pakwinga mubili wakame shinkwa wacancine ncine, kayi milopa yakame ecakunwa cancine ncine.
JOH 6:56 Uliyense lalinga mubili wakame nekunwa milopa yakame ukute kwikala mulinjame, nenjame nkute kwikala mulyendiye.
JOH 6:57 Mbuli Bata bayumi balantuma, kayi nenjame ndemuyumi pakuba mulyendibo, copeleco uliyense lalinga mubili wakame, nakabe nebuyumi pakuba mulinjame.
JOH 6:58 Shinkwa walafuma kwilu ni wopelowu. Wapusana ne mana asa bashali benu ngobalikulya, nsombi panyuma pakendi balikabafwa. Nomba lalinga shinkwa wopelowu, nakabe nebuyumi butapu.”
JOH 6:59 Yesu walamba ibi mpwalikwiyisha munga'nda yakupaililamo ku kapelenaumu.
JOH 6:60 Beshikwiya bangi mpobalamunyumfwa kambeco balambeti, “Ciyo ici cayuma, niyani wela kucinyumfwishisha?”
JOH 6:61 Yesu walenshiba mumoyo mwakendi kwambeti beshikwiya bakendi balatongaukunga. Neco walabepusheti, “Sena mulepilwa?
JOH 6:62 Nomba nimukense aconi mwakabona Mwana Muntu kaya kwilu nkwalikuba?
JOH 6:63 Mushimu wa Lesa eukute kupa buyumi, mubili paliya ncokute. Maswi ngondamwambili akute kuleta mushimu wa Lesa ukute kupa buyumi.
JOH 6:64 Nomba pali nabambi pali amwe balabulunga kushoma.” Pakwinga Yesu walenshiba kendi eshakabule kumushoma, walamwinshibila limo weshakamuyabe kubalwani bakendi.
JOH 6:65 Lino walambeti, “Weco ndamwambilingeti paliya muntu wela kwisa kuli njame na Bata baliya kumupa ngofu sha kwisa kuli njame.”
JOH 6:66 Kufumapo beshikwiya bangi ba Yesu balamushiya ne kucileka kwenda nendi.
JOH 6:67 Lino Yesu walepusha beshikwiya likumi ne babili basa, “Nomba amwe nkamulandanga kuya?”
JOH 6:68 Shimoni Petulo walambeti, “Mwami, nomba ngatuya kuli bani? Njamwe mukute maswi eshikupa buyumi butapu.
JOH 6:69 Afwe twashoma kayi tucinshi kwambeti njamwe Waswepa walafuma kuli Lesa.”
JOH 6:70 Lino Yesu walambeti, “Sena ntame ndalamusala amwe omuli likumi ne babili? Nsombi umo pali amwe ni Satana”
JOH 6:71 Walikwamba Yuda, mwanendi Shimoni Isikalyoti. Nambi walikuba umo pali basa beshikwiya likumi ne babili, ewalamuyaba kubalwani bakendi.
JOH 7:1 Panyuma pakendi Yesu walikwendana mucishi ca Galileya, nkalikuyanda kuya Yudeya. Pakwinga bamakulene Babayuda balikuyanda kumushina.
JOH 7:2 Cindi cakusekelela mishasha calikuba pepi,
JOH 7:3 lino bakwabo Yesu balamwambileti, “Inga nicani kutaya kuYudeya kwambeti beshikwiya bakobe bakabone bikankamanisho mbyolenshinga.
JOH 7:4 Kuliya muntu ukute kusoleka mbyalenshinga na kayanda kwinshibikwa. Kwelana ne mbyolenshinga leka bantu bonse bakwinshibe.”
JOH 7:5 Nambi bamakwabo balambeco nkabali kumushoma.
JOH 7:6 Yesu walabambileti, “Cindi cakame nkacitana cishika, nsombi amwe mukute cindi cakuya kulikonse nkomulayandanga.
JOH 7:7 Bantu basuni byapanshi pano nkabela kumupata, nsombi bakute kupata njame, pakwinga nkute kubalesha ncito shabo shaipa.
JOH 7:8 Amwe kamuyani akusekelela uko. Ame nkandengonga pakwinga cindi cakame nkacina cishika.”
JOH 7:9 Yesu mpwalambeco, walashalila mu Galileya.
JOH 7:10 Nomba bamakwabo mpobalaya akusekelela mishasha isa, Yesu neye walabakonkela. Nomba liya kuyanda kubonekela kubantu.
JOH 7:11 Bamakulene ba Bayuda balikumuyandaula uko nkobalikusekelela, nkabepushaneti, “Nomba usa muntu ulikupeyo?”
JOH 7:12 Popelapo palikuba kunung'unusha palyendiye. Bambi balikwambeti, “Usa muntu waina”Nsombi bambi balikwambeti, “Sobwe, usa layungaulunga bantu.”
JOH 7:13 Nomba nkapalikuba muntu weshikwamba patuba sha Yesu, pakwinga balikutina Bayuda.
JOH 7:14 Lino kusekelela mpokwalashika pakati, Yesu walaya ku Nga'nda ya Lesa nekutatika kwiyisha.
JOH 7:15 Bamakulene ba Bayuda balakankamana nekwambeti, “Nomba muntu uyu ubinshi aconi bintu ibi pabula balamwiyishapo!”
JOH 7:16 Nomba Yesu walambeti, “Mbyonkute kwiyisha nte byakame sobwe, nsombi bikute kufuma kuli Bata abo balantuma.
JOH 7:17 Uliyense layandanga kwinsa kuyanda kwa Lesa, nakenshibeti kwiyisha kwakame kulafumunga kuli Lesa nteko kuli ndemwine
JOH 7:18 Pakwinga muntu lambangowa byakendi ukute kuliyandawila bulemu. Nsombi nendi ukute bulemu bwa uyo walamutuma, wopeloyo ewancine ncine, kayi mumoyo mwakendi muliya bwipishi.
JOH 7:19 “Lino sena Mose liya kumupa Milawo ya Lesa? Nsombi paliya naba umo mulinjamwe ukute kwikonkela. Nomba nicani mulayandanga kunshina?”
JOH 7:20 Nsombi likoto lya bantu lyalamukumbuleti, “Sena ulakonyo. Layandanga kukushina niyani?”
JOH 7:21 Nendi Yesu walabakumbuleti, “Ndalensowa ceshikukankamanisha cimo, mwense mwalakankamana.”
JOH 7:22 “Nte pasa Mose walamupa mulawo wa kupalula bana benu batuloba (mulawo uyo uliya kufuma kuli Mose nsombi walafuma kubamashali benu bakulukulu.) Neco mukute kupalula mwana mutuloba nambi nipa busuba bwa Sabata.”
JOH 7:23 “Na mwanoyo mukute kumupalula pa Sabata, nicani nkamukute kutina kupwaya mulawo wa Mose? Nomba nicani mulankalalilinga pacebo cakwambeti ndashilika muntu pabusuba bwa Sabata?
JOH 7:24 Kamucileka kombolosha kwakulanga pamenso, lino tatikani kombolosha mubululami.”
JOH 7:25 Popelapo bantu nabambi baku Yelusalemu balambeti, “Sena muntu usa ngobalayandanga kushina, nte wopele uyu?
JOH 7:26 Nte uyu lambanga patuba, kwakubula weshikwambapo kantu kalikonse! Ekwambeti aba bantu bacinsheti eMupulushi Walaiwa?
JOH 7:27 Mupulushi Walaiwa akesa, paliya weshakenshibe nkoshakafume. Nomba uyu tukwinshi twense nkwalafumunga.”
JOH 7:28 Popelapo Yesu kaciyisha mu Nga'nda ya Lesa walolobesha, “Mukwinshi nkondalafuma. Nsombi ndiya kwisa palwakame sobwe. Uyo walantuma washomeka, nomba amwe nkamumwinshi.
JOH 7:29 Nsombi ame ndikwinshi, pakwinga njame ndalafuma kulyendiye, kayi endiye walantuma.”
JOH 7:30 Popelapo bantu balayanda kumwikata Yesu, nsombi paliya nambi umo walamwikatamo, pakwinga cindi cakendi calikacitana cishika.
JOH 7:31 Bantu bangi mulikoto ilyo balamushoma, kayi balikwambeti, “Mupulushi Walaiwa akesa, nakensepo bingashilo byapita ibi muntuyu mbyalenshi?”
JOH 7:32 Neco Bafalisi balanyumfwa kunung'unusha kwa bantu balikwamba sha Yesu. Nomba bamakulene beshimilumbo balatuma bamalonda bamu Nga'nda ya Lesa kwambeti bamwikate.
JOH 7:33 Lino Yesu walabambileti, “Ndi nenu kwa kacindi kang'ana kantananja kuli walantuma.
JOH 7:34 Cakubinga nimukanyandaule, nsombi nteshi mukancane. Kayi uko nkondenga amwe nkamwela kushikako.”
JOH 7:35 Popelapo bamakulene ba Bayuda balatatika kwipushaneti, “Uyu layandanga kuya kupeyo uko afwe nkotwela kubula kumucana? Sena layandanga kuya kuminshi ya ba Giliki kwekala bantu betu nekuya kubeyisha?
JOH 7:36 Lambangeti, nimukanangaule nsombi nteshi mukancane, kayi eti, uko nkwalenga, amwe nkamwela kushikako. Anu maswi awa alapandululunga cani?”
JOH 7:37 Pa busuba bunene bwakupwisha kusekelela. Yesu walemana nekwamba mwakolobesha, “Napali muntu ukute inyotwa, kesani kulinjame kwisakunwa.
JOH 7:38 Muntu wanshoma, moyo wakendi nukabeti tumilonga twa menshi eshikupa buyumi.Mbuli Mabala a Lesa ncalambangeti, nakabeti tumilonga twa menshi”
JOH 7:39 Yesu walamba sha Mushimu Uswepa uyo bantu bamushoma ngoshi bakatambule. Pacindico Mushimu Uswepa walinkautana upewa kubantu, pakwinga Yesu walinkatana utambula bulemu bwakendi.
JOH 7:40 Popelapo likoto lya bantu mpolyalanyumfwa maswi awa, nabambi balatatika kwambeti, “Cancine muntu uyu niMushinshimi.”
JOH 7:41 Nabambi balikwambeti, “uyu eMupulushi Walaiwa usa.” Nsombi nabambi balikwambeti, “Sena Mupulushi Walaiwa ngaufuma ku Galileya sobwe!
JOH 7:42 Mabala a Lesa alambangeti Mupulushi Walaiwa wela kufumina mu cikombo ca Mwami Dafeti, kayi wela kusemenwa mumunshi wa Betelehemu uko nkwalikwikala Dafeti”
JOH 7:43 Lino bantu balatatika kupansana pacebo ca Yesu.
JOH 7:44 Nabambi balikuyanda kumwikata, nsombi paliya walamwikata.
JOH 7:45 Bamalonda ba Nga'nda ya Lesa basa balabwelela kuli bamakulene beshimilumbo neBafalilsi. Nabo balepusha bamalonda basa, “nicani muliya kwisa nendi?”
JOH 7:46 Bamalonda balakumbuleti, “Bintu uyu muntu mbyalamba paliya muntu naumbi walabyambapo sobwe.”
JOH 7:47 Lino Bafalisi balambeti, “Sena nenjamwe lamubepe kendi?
JOH 7:48 Sena mwalanyumfwapo kwambeti umo wabamakulene nambi Bafalisi pali wamushoma?
JOH 7:49 Nomba bantu aba baluya batainshi Milawo Lesa njalapa Mose, ecebo cakendi bashinganwa.”
JOH 7:50 Lino Nikodemo, umo waBafalisi, usa walaya kuli Yesu kumasuba akunyuma, walabepusha banendi,
JOH 7:51 “Sena milawo yetu yasuminisha kombolosha muntu ngotutana tunyumfwapo maswi akendi kwambeti twinshibe mbyalenshi?”
JOH 7:52 Nabo balambeti, “Sena nenjobe owakuGalileya? Koya ubelenge Mabala niwinshibeti kuliya mushinshimi wela kufuma kuGalileya.”
JOH 7:53 Popelapo bantu bonse balabwelela kucomwabo.
JOH 8:1 Lino Yesu walaya ku mulundu wa ma olifi.
JOH 8:2 Mumene mene walaya ku Nga'nda yaLesa. Bantu bonse balesa kulyendiye, walekala panshi nekutatika kubeyisha.
JOH 8:3 Bafalisi neBeshiwiyisha Milawo balaleta mutukashi ngobalekata bupombo, nekumwimanika pakati pabo.
JOH 8:4 Lino balambila Yesu, “Bashikwiyisha, mutukashuyu wacanika kapombolwa.
JOH 8:5 Lino kwelana ne Milawo Lesa njalapa Mose mutukashi uyu wela kupwaiwa mabwe. Nomba amwe mulambangapongaconi?”
JOH 8:6 Balamwipusha mwipusho uyu pakumwelesha kwambeti bamucaninepo mulandu. Nomba Yesu pacindi copeleco walakotama, nekutatika kulemba panshi ne munwe wakendi.
JOH 8:7 Pakupitilisha kumwipusha, Yesu walakotamuka nekubambileti, “pakati penu uyo utana kucimwapo, ayambilile kumanta libwe amupwaye mutukashi uyu.”
JOH 8:8 Mpwalambeco, kayi walakotama nekupitilisha kulemba panshi.
JOH 8:9 Mpobalanyumfweco bantu balatatika kufumapo umo neumo,bamakulene ebalatatikila kupalangana. Lino palashalowa mutukashi usa kaliwemana pantangu pa Yesu.
JOH 8:10 Yesu walakotamuka nekumwipusha, “Mutukashi obe balayikupeyo bakupanga mulandu? Sena paliya nambi umo lashalapo kukupa mulandu?”
JOH 8:11 Mutukashi walambeti, “Mwami, paliya.” Neye Yesu walamwambileti, “Nenjame nkandakupanga mulandu sobwe. Koya nsombi kuyambila lelo kotakabweshapo kwipisha.”
JOH 8:12 Kayi Yesu walambila bantu bonse, “Ame njame mumuni ulamunikilinga bantu bonse. Muntu lankonkonga, nteshi akende mumushinshe, nsombi nakekale mu mumuni weshikupa buyumi.”
JOH 8:13 Nabo Bafalisi balamwambileti, “Ulalinshilinga bukamboni omwine. Bukamboni ubo ntebo bwakubinga.”
JOH 8:14 Yesu walabakumbuleti, “Nambi ndalinshilinga bukamboni, bukamboni bwakame nibwakubinga, pakwinga ndikwinshi nkondalafuma nenkondenga. Nsombi amwe nkamukwinshi nkondalafuma, nambi nenkondenga.
JOH 8:15 Amwe mukute kombolosha pakukonka miyeyo ya bantu. Ame nkankute kombolosha muntu uliyense.
JOH 8:16 Nsombi ndambeti ng'omboloshe, kombolosha kwakame ngakuba kwancine ncine, pakwinga nkandipo ndenka sobwe, pakwinga Bata balantuma balinenjame.
JOH 8:17 Kayi mumilawo yenu mwalembweti bukamboni bwa bantu babili nibwakubinga
JOH 8:18 Ame nkute kulinshila bukamboni, nabo Bata balantuma bakute kunjinshila bukamboni.”
JOH 8:19 Lino nabo balamwipusheti, “Baiso abo balikupeyo?” Yesu walambeti, “Nkamunjishi, kayi ne Bata nkamubenshi. Nimunjinshi nimubenshi Bata.”
JOH 8:20 Yesu walamba maswi awa mpwalikwiyisha mu Nga'nda ya Lesa, mucipinda cakutambulilamo bupe bwa bantu. Paliya walamwikata, pakwinga cindi cakendi calinkacitana cishika.
JOH 8:21 Panyuma pakendi Yesu kayi walabambileti, “Ame ndenga, nimukanangaule, nomba nkondenga amwe nkamwela kushikako nimukafwilowa mubwipishi.”
JOH 8:22 Lino Bayuda balambeti, “Sena layandanga kulishina, pakwambeti, ‘nkondenga, nkamwela kushikako?”
JOH 8:23 Yesu walabambileti, “Amwe njamwe ba pacishi capanshi pano, ame ndalafuma kwilu. Amwe mobapanshi pano, nsombi ame ntame wapacishi capanshi sobwe.
JOH 8:24 Weco ndalamwambilingeti. nimukafwile mubwipishi bwenu. Pakwinga na nkamulashomonga kwambeti njame wopeloyo lalyambanga, nimukafwile mubwipishi bwenu.”
JOH 8:25 Lino nabo balamwipusheti, “Obe njobe bani?” Yesu walambeti, “Mbuli ncondamwambilanga pakuyamba.
JOH 8:26 Nkute bingi byakwamba nebyakumomboloshelapo. Walantuma niwancine ncine, kayi nkute kwambila bantu bapanshi pano bintu mbyendalanyumfwa kulyendiye.”
JOH 8:27 Bantu basa baliya kwinshibeti Yesu walikwamba sha Baishi.
JOH 8:28 Lino Yesu walabambileti, “Mwakantantika Mwana Muntu, popelapo nimukenshibeti njame wopeloyo lalyambanga. Nimukenshibe kwambeti nkankute kwinsa bintu pandenka, nkute kwamba ibyo Bata mbyobalanjiyisha.
JOH 8:29 Nsombi uyo walantuma, uli pamo nenjame. Nendi nkakute kunshiya ndenka, pakwinga cindi conse nkute kwinsa byeshi kumukondwelesha.”
JOH 8:30 Mpobalanyumfwa Yesu nkamba makani awa, bantu bangi balamushoma.
JOH 8:31 Yesu walambila bantu abo balamushoma, “Na mulakonkelenga kwiyisha kwakame cindi conse, cakubinga nimube beshikwiya bakame.
JOH 8:32 Nimwinshibe cakubinga, kayi naco cakubinga nicikamusungululeni.”
JOH 8:33 Nabo balambeti, “Afwe njafwe bana ba Abulahamu, kayi nkatuna tubapo basha ba muntu uliyense. Nomba aconi ulambangeti, ‘nimukasungululwe?”
JOH 8:34 Yesu walabakumbuleti, “Ndamwambilinga cakubinga kwambeti muntu uliyense lenshinga bwipishi nimusha kubwipishi.
JOH 8:35 Musha nkakute kwikalisha panga'nda ya mwami wakendi cindi conse, nsombi mwinepabo.
JOH 8:36 Lino namwana lamusungululu, okwambeti mulasungululwa cancine ncine.
JOH 8:37 Ndicinshi kwambeti njamwe bana ba Abulahamu, nsombi mulayandanga kunshina, pakwinga nkamulasumininga maswi akame mumyoyo mwenu.
JOH 8:38 Ame nkute kwamba ibyo mbyondalabona kuli Bata, nsombi amwe mulenshinga mbyomwalanyumfwa kuli bameshenu.”
JOH 8:39 Nabo balambeti, “Bameshetu ni Abulahamu.” Neye Yesu walabambileti, “nemuli bana ba Abulahamu, ne mulenshinga bintu mbyalikwinsa.
JOH 8:40 Nomba lino mulayandanga kunshina, ame ndamwambilinga makani akubinga ngondalanyumfwa kuli Lesa. Abulahamu liya kwinsapo bintu byamushobo uyu sobwe.
JOH 8:41 Amwe mulenshinga ibyo bameshenu mbyobakute kwinsa.” Nabo balamwambileti, “ntafwe bana bamu bupombo sobwe, tukutowa mushali wetu umo, Lesa.”
JOH 8:42 Yesu walambeti, “Lesa nabanga mushali wenu, ne mwalansuna, pakwinga ndalafuma kuli Lesa, nomba lino ndikuno. Ndiya kwisa mungofu shakame, nsombi sha uyo walantuma.
JOH 8:43 Nomba nicani nkamulanyumfunga mbyondambanga? Pakwinga nkamwela kukonsha nekunyumfwa maswi akame.
JOH 8:44 Amwe mwalafuma kuli mushali wenu Satana. Pakwinga emubepeshi kayi shikushina kufuminowa cindi cakunyuma kayi, mulyendiye muliya cancine ncine sobwe.Ambanga ukute kwambowa bya mumutwi wakendi
JOH 8:45 Nsombi ame nkute kwamba cakubinga, weco nkamulanshomonga.
JOH 8:46 Nibani pakati penu welakumpa mulandu wabwipishi? Nipacebo cini ndamwambilanga cakubinga, nkamulashomonga?
JOH 8:47 Muntu waLesa ukute kukutika maswi a Lesa, nomba amwe mulakananga kunyumfwa, pakwinga ntamwe bantu baLesa.”
JOH 8:48 Popelapo ba Yuda balamwipusheti, “Sena afwe nkatulambanga cakubingeti njobe wakuSamaliya, kayi wekatwa ne mushimu waipa?”
JOH 8:49 Yesu walambeti, “Ndiyawa mushimu waipa. Nkute kulemeka Bata, nsombi amwe nkamukute kumpa bulemu.
JOH 8:50 Nsombi nkandayandanga kulemekwa, nsombi nkwali layandangeti mpewe bulemu, kayi eukute kombolosha mubululami.
JOH 8:51 Cakubinga ndamwambilinga muntu anyumfwa maswi akame, nteshi akafwe sobwe.”
JOH 8:52 Lino bantu balamwambileti, “Lino tulenshibi kwambeti ukute mushimu waipa. Abulahamu nebashinshimi bonse balafwa! Nomba obe ulambangeti muntu anyumfwa makani akobe nteshi akafwe sobwe.
JOH 8:53 Sena obe wapita Abulahamu mushali wetu mukulukulu nebashinshimi bonse balafwa? Nomba ulayeyengeti njobe bani?”
JOH 8:54 Yesu walambeti, “Na kandilipa bulemu, bulemubo nibwabulyo. Nomba Bata,bakute kumpa bulemu,abo nenjamwe mbomulambangeti eLesa wenu.
JOH 8:55 Amwe muliya kumwinshiba, nsombi ame ndimwinshi, nendalambeti nkandimwinshi nendalaba mubepeshi mbuli ncemubele. Nomba ame ndimwinshi weco nkute kunyumfwa maswi akendi.
JOH 8:56 Mushali wenu mukulukulu Abulahamu walikuba walasekelela kubona kwisa kwakame. Kayi walakondwa.”
JOH 8:57 Lino ba Yuda balamwipusheti, “Byaka byakobe nkabina bikwana nambi makumi asanu, ngowambaconi eti walamubona Abulahamu?”
JOH 8:58 Yesu walambeti, “Ndamwambilinga cakubinga, Abulahamu nkatanasemwa, ndalikubapo.”
JOH 8:59 Lino mpobalanyumfweco balabwesa mabwe kwambeti bamupwaye. Nsombi Yesu walasolama ne kupita mubantu nekufuma mu Nga'nda ya Lesa.
JOH 9:1 Lino Yesu mpwalikwenda walabona muntu walasemwa kaliwashipilwa.
JOH 9:2 Beshikwiya bakendi balamwipusheti, “mwiyi, niyani walalubisha kwambeti muntuyu asemwe kaliwashipilwa? Sena nimwine nambi, nibashali bakendi?”
JOH 9:3 Yesu walambeti, “Nteko kwambeti walasemwa kaliwashipilwa cebo ca bwipishi bwakendi, nambi bwipishi bwabashali bakendi sobwe.Nsombi kwambeti Lesa apewe bulemu kupitila mumuntuyu
JOH 9:4 Nkakucili munshi twela kusebensa ncito njebalantumina Bata. Mashiku alesanga muntu wela kusebensa
JOH 9:5 Kandicili panshi pano, njame ndapanga mumuni bantu bonse.”
JOH 9:6 Mpwalambeco, Yesu walasankila mata panshi, walakandila tumankatya nekumunanika mumenso muntu washipilwa
JOH 9:7 Lino walamwambileti, “Koya usambe pakalishiba kaSiloyamu. Lina lyakwambeti Siloyamu lilapandululungeti mutumwa. Neco muntuyo walaya akusamba, walatatika kulanga mpwalikubwelela.”
JOH 9:8 Popelapo baneshi nnebantu balikumubona nkasenga senga balambeti, “Sena uyu nte usa walikukute cinga cakusenga senga kaliwekala panshi?”
JOH 9:9 Bambi balambeti, “Ee endiye.” Nabambi balikwambeti, “Nteye, wakoshanakowa nendi.” Nsombi mwine walambeti, “Njame.”
JOH 9:10 Lino bantu basa balamwipusheti, “Nomba nicani capesheti utatike kubona?”
JOH 9:11 Nendi walambeti, “Muntu usa ngobakute kukuweti Yesu, walakandila bulongo nekunanika mumenso mwakame nekung'ambileti, ‘Koya, usambe mukalishiba kaSiloamu. Mpondalasamba ndalatatika kubona.’”
JOH 9:12 Neco basa bantu balamwipusheti, “Ingalino ulikupeyo?” Muntu usa walambeti, “Nkandikwishi nkwabele.”
JOH 9:13 Neco balamumanta usa muntu walikuba washipilwa nekuya nendi kuli bamakulene baBafalisi,
JOH 9:14 pakwinga busuba mbwalakandila bulongo mbwalashilikisha muntu washipilwa bwalikuba bwaSabata
JOH 9:15 Neco bamakulene ba Bafalisi balamwipusheti, “Obe watatika coni kubona?” Nendi walabambileti, “walananika bulongo mumenso, ndalaya akusamba, weco lino ndabononga.”
JOH 9:16 Ba falisi nabambi balambeti, “Muntuyu nkalatumwa neLesa, pakwinga nkalakonkelenga mulawo wa Sabata.” Nsombi nabambi balambeti, “Muntu shikwinsa byaipa ngawinsa byeshikukankamanisha byamushobo uyu?” Neco palaba kupansana umo ne munendi.
JOH 9:17 Kayi muntusa walikuba washipilwa Bafalisi balamwipusheti, “Nomba obe ulambangaponga aconi pali uyo lakushiliki?” Neye walambeti, “Ni Mushinshimi.”
JOH 9:18 Nomba bamakulene ba Bayuda nkabalashometi muntuyo nkalikubona nomba lino labononga, mpaka balakuwa bamashali bakendi.
JOH 9:19 Mpobalesa balabepusheti, “Amwe uyu nimwanenu? sena nicakubinga walasemwa nkatalanga? Nomba kulabeconi kwambeti lino lakonshonga kubona?”
JOH 9:20 Bamashali bakendi balambeti, “Ncotwinshi afwe nikwambeti uyu nimwanetu, kayi walasemwa nkatalanga.
JOH 9:21 Lino nkatucinshi cilenshiki kwambeti atatike kubona, kayi nkatucinshi mobilenshikili. Kayi nkatumwinshi naniyani lamushiliki. Kamumwipusha mwine nimukulene.”
JOH 9:22 Bashali balambeco cebo cakutina bamakulene baBayuda, abo balapangana kwambeti, muntu uliyense eshyakambeti Yesu eMupulushi Walaiwa, nibakamutandanye munga'nda yakupaililamo.
JOH 9:23 Weco bashali bakendi balambeti, “nimukulene, kamumwipushani.”
JOH 9:24 Popelapo bamakulene baBayuda balamukuwa katubilli usa muntu walikuba washipilwa, nekumwambileti, “Lumbila kuli Lesa, kayi wambe cakubinga. Afwe tucinshi kwambeti muntu usa nishikwinsa byaipa.”
JOH 9:25 Nendi walambeti, “nkandicinshi nanishikwinsa byaipa, ncenjinshi, nikwambeti nkandalikubona, nsombi lino ndabononga.”
JOH 9:26 Nabo balamwipusheti, “nomba walakwinsaconi pakukushilika?”
JOH 9:27 Nendi walabakumbuleti, “Ndamwambilikendi, nomba muliya kunyumfwa. Nomba nicani mulayandanga kubinyumfwa kayi? Mpani nenjamwe mulayandanga kuba beshikwiya bakendi?”
JOH 9:28 Popelapo balatatika kumushingana, nekumwambileti, “Njobe shikwiya wakendi. Afwe njafwe beshikwiya baMose.
JOH 9:29 Twashometi Lesa walambila Mose, nomba uyu nkatukwinshi nkwalafuma.”
JOH 9:30 Muntuyo walakumbuleti, “Ndakankamananga kunyumfweti nkamukwinshi nkwalafuma, nsombi elamboneshe.
JOH 9:31 Tucinshi kwambeti Lesa nkakute kunyumfwila bantu beshikwinsa byaipa. Lesa, ukute kunyumfwila bantu bakute kumunyumfwila nekwinsa mbyalayandanga.
JOH 9:32 Kufuma kumatatikilo acishi kuliyawa muntu walanyumfwapo kwambeti muntu lashiliki muntu walasemwa kaliwashipilwa.
JOH 9:33 Muntuyu nalabula kufuma kuli Lesa, naliyawa kucikonshya kwinsa ici cintu.”
JOH 9:34 Lino nabo balambeti, “Obe walasemwa mubwipishi. Ulayandanga kutwiyisha?” Mpobalambeco balamutandanya mung'anda yakupaililamo.
JOH 9:35 Yesu mpwalanyumfweti bamakulene baBayuda balamutandanya munga'nda yakupaililamo usa walikuba washipilwa mpwalamucana walamwipusheti, “Wamushoma Mwana Muntu?”
JOH 9:36 Nendi walambeti, “Mwami, ng'ambileni niyani kwambeti ndimushome!”
JOH 9:37 Yesu walamwambileti, “Ulamubono kendi, endiye lambanga nenjobe.”
JOH 9:38 Neye walamusuntamina nekwambeti, “Mwami, ndashomo.”
JOH 9:39 Lino Yesu walambeti, “Lombolosho ndondaleshila nikwambeti batabono babone, balabononga bashipilwe.”
JOH 9:40 Bafalisi nabambi balikuba pepi, mpobalanyumfweco balamwipusheti, “Sena nenjafwe twashipilwa?”
JOH 9:41 Yesu walambeti, “Nemwanga mwashipilwa, nemuliya mulandu. Nsombi pakwinga mulalyambangeti, mulabononga, ekwambeti mucikute mulandu.”
JOH 10:1 Panyuma pakendi Yesu walambeti, “Ndamwambilinga cakubinga, muntu labulunga kwingilila pacishinga cambelele nikabwalala kayi nikapondo.
JOH 10:2 Nsombi muntu lengililinga pacishinga endiye mwembeshi wa mbelele.
JOH 10:3 Mulonda ukute kumucalwila. Mbelele shikute kunyumfwa maswi akendi, kayi ukute kushikuwa maina mbelele shakendi, nekushipulisha.
JOH 10:4 Ashipulisha ukute kushitangunina, nashoyo shikute kumukonkela, pakwinga shikute kwinshiba maswi akendi.
JOH 10:5 Mwensu nkashela kumukonkela sobwe, pakwinga nkashainshi maswi a mwensu. Neco shikute kumufwamba.”
JOH 10:6 Yesu walabambila mukoshano uyu, nsombi nabo baliyakunyumfwishisha ncalikubambila.
JOH 10:7 Ecebo cakendi kayi Yesu ncalabambilileti, “Ndamwambilinga cakubinga, ame njame cishinga cambelele.
JOH 10:8 Bonse balesa kantanjisa nibakabwalala kayi nibakapondo, neco mbelele shiliya kubanyumfwila.
JOH 10:9 Njame cishinga, bonse balengilinga kupitila mulinjame nibakapuluke. Kupitila mulinjame nibakengilenga ne kupula nekucana cakulya.
JOH 10:10 Nsombi nendi kabwalala ukute kwishila kwiba, kushina ne kononga. Nomba ame nkandipo ico, ndalesa kupa bantu buyumi, kayi bwakwaninina.”
JOH 10:11 Ame njame mwembeshi waina. Mwembeshi waina ukute kutaya buyumi bwakendi pacebo cambelele shakendi.
JOH 10:12 Nomba mwembeshi wakwingisha ncito yakwembela mbelele nte mwembeshi waina pakwinga nte mwine neco abona kaumpe ukute kushishiya nekufwamba, nomba nako kaumpe kakute kwikatapo nashimbi kayi shilashala shikute kupalangana.
JOH 10:13 Usa shikulembwa incito ukute kufwamba, pakwinga ntemwinesho, neco nkakute kusukama.
JOH 10:14 Ame njame mwembeshi waina. Mbelele shakame ndishinshi, kayi nashoyo shinjishi.
JOH 10:15 mbuli bata ncobanjishi, nenjame ndibenshi, ndalibambila kutaya buyumi bwakame pacebo cambelele shakame.
JOH 10:16 Kayi nkute nashimbi mbelele shabula kuba shamucata ici. Nashoyo nishikanyumfwe maswi akame, ninkashilete pamo,nishikabe mulitanga limo kayi ne mwembeshi umo.
JOH 10:17 “Bata bansuni, pakwinga ndalibambila kuyaba buyumi bwakame kwambeti nkabe nabo kayi.
JOH 10:18 Kuliya muntu wela kundamuna buyumi bwakame, ndabuyabanga mukuyanda kwakame. Nkute ngofu shakutaya buyumi bwakame, kayi ne ngofu shakubumanta. uwu emulawo ngobalampa Bata.”
JOH 10:19 Bantu balatatika kupansana pacebo ca maswi awa.
JOH 10:20 Bangi pakati pabo balikwambeti, “Ukute mushimu waipa, kayi wakonya. Nicani mulamunyumfwilinga?”
JOH 10:21 Nomba bambi balikwambeti, “Maswi awa ntewo amuntu wekatwa ne mushimu waipa. Sena mushimu waipa ngaumubonesha washipilwa kwambeti abone?”
JOH 10:22 Lino calikuba cindi camupewo pakusekekelela kupwa kwa kwibaka Ng'anda ya Lesa ku Yelusalemu.
JOH 10:23 Lino Yesu walinkenda mumukushi wa Nga'nda ya Lesa, walikukwiweti mukushi waSolomoni.
JOH 10:24 Lino bamakulene baYuda balamubunganina nekumwipusheti, “Nomba nukatuyubwilile lilyoni nanjobe Mupulushi Walaiwa? Twambile.”
JOH 10:25 Yesu walambeti, “Ndalamwambila kendi, nsombi nkamulashomonga. Mulimo ngonkute kwinsa mulina lya Bata, eukute kunjishila bukamboni.
JOH 10:26 Nomba amwe nkamulashomonga, pakwinga nkamulipo mulikoto lyambelele shakame.
JOH 10:27 Mbelele shakame shikute kunyumfwa maswi akame. Ame ndishinshi, kayi shikute kunkonkela.
JOH 10:28 Nkute kushipa buyumi butapu, kayi nteshi shikataike. Paliya muntu wela kundamuna.
JOH 10:29 Bata balampa mbelele isho banene kupita bonse, neco paliya muntu wela kubalamuna mumakasa abo.
JOH 10:30 Ame neBata tobamo muntu umowa.”
JOH 10:31 Lino bamakulene baBayuda balabwesa mabwe kwambeti bamupwaye.
JOH 10:32 Yesu walabambileti, “Ndamuboneshe mulimo waina walafumina kuli Bata. Nomba nipa ncito shipeyo nshomulayandanga kumpwaila mabwe?”
JOH 10:33 Bamakulene ba Baciyuda balamukumbuleti, “Nkatulayandanga kukupwaya mabwe pacebo ca mulimo waina sobwe, nsombi pacebo cakwambeti ulanyanshanga Lesa. Obe omuntu, ulalyelanikinga neLesa.”
JOH 10:34 Yesu walabakumbuleti, “Sena mu Milawo yenu nkamwalembweti, ‘Ame ndambeti mobalesa?
JOH 10:35 Tucinsheti Mabala a Lesa nkela kupwaiwa. Kayi nakubinga, naLesa walikubakuwa, balapewa maswi wakendi eti balesa.”
JOH 10:36 “Ngamwabaconi uyo Lesa ngwalaswepesha nekumutuma pacishi capanshi, amwe mulamwambilingeti lanyanshanga Lesa, sena nipacebo cakwambeti njame Mwana wa Lesa?
JOH 10:37 Nomba na nkandenshinga mulimo ngobalampa Bata, kamutanshoma.
JOH 10:38 Nsombi na emulimo ngondenshinga, kamushomani mulimo nambi nkamulanshomonga kwambeti mukonshe kwinshiba nekunyumfwishisha kwambeti ame nkute kwikala muli Bata, nabo Bata bakute kwikala muli njame.”
JOH 10:39 Popelapo bantu basa balayanda kayi kumwikata, nsombi neye walapushumuka.
JOH 10:40 Yesu walabwelela kayi kutala kwa mulonga wa Yolodani uko Yohane nkwalikubatishila bantu pakuyamba, lino walekala kopeloko.
JOH 10:41 Bantu bangi balesa kulyendiye, nkabambeti, “Yohane liya kwinsapo byeshikukankamanisha sobwe, nsombi byonse mbyalikwamba pamuntu uyu byalikuba byakubinga.”
JOH 10:42 Kopeloko bantu bangi balashoma Yesu.
JOH 11:1 muntu walikukwiweti Lazaro, walakolwa, walikwikala mumunshi waBetaniya, kucomwabo Maliya ne Malita.
JOH 11:2 Uyu Maliya endiye usa walananika mafuta anunkila kumyendo yaMwami nekumupukutisha mishishi yakendi. Lazaro walikuba mukwabo Maliya Lazalo ewalikukolwa.
JOH 11:3 Lino bamakwabo batukashi balatuma mulumbe kuli Yesu kumwambileti, “Mwami, munenu ngomusuni nimulwashi.”
JOH 11:4 Yesu mpalanyumfwa walambeti, “Kukolwa uko nteshi kumushine Lazalo sobwe, nsombi cilenshiki kwambeti Lesa alemekwe, kayi kwambeti Mwanendi Lesa apewe bulemu.”
JOH 11:5 Yesu walikusuna Malita nekanike wakendi, kayi neLazalo.
JOH 11:6 Nomba mpalanyumfwa shamalwashi, Yesu walekala masuba abili pamusena popelapo mpwalikuba.
JOH 11:7 Panyuma pakendi walambila beshikwiya bakendi, “katuyani kuYudeya.”
JOH 11:8 Beshikwiya bakendi balambeti, “Mwiyi, lino apa bamakulene baBayuda nkabayanda kumupwaya mabwe, Inga nicani mulayandanga kubwelelako?”
JOH 11:9 Yesu walambeti, “Sena busuba ntebukute mifunshya yacindi likumi ne ibili? Muntu nalendenga mu mumuni nkela kulisuntula pakwinga ukute kubona mumuni wacishici.
JOH 11:10 Nsombi nalendenga mashiku empwela kulisuntula, pakwinga nkalendenga mu mumuni.”
JOH 11:11 Mpwalambeco walabambileti, “Lazalo, munetu lono tulo, nsombi ndenga akumupundusha kutulo.”
JOH 11:12 Beshikwiya bakendi balambeti, “Mwami, nawona tulo, nabe cena.”
JOH 11:13 Balo balikuyeyeti walikwamba shatulowa, nsombi Yesu walikwambeti Lazalo wafwa.
JOH 11:14 Lino Yesu walabambila mwakutasoleketi, “Lazalo lafu,
JOH 11:15 Nkandabangonga, nsombi ndakondwa cebo canjamwe kwambeti mushome. Katuyani.”
JOH 11:16 Popelapo Tomasi, walikukwiweti mpundu, walambila beshikwiya banendi, “Katuyani nendi tuyetufwile pamo.”
JOH 11:17 Yesu mpwalashika kuBetaniya walacaneti Lazalo wabikwa kendi mumanda masuba ana alapiti.
JOH 11:18 Munshi waBetaniya walikuba pepi neku Yelusalemu, musuma wakwanowa makilomita atatu.
JOH 11:19 Ecebo cakendi kwalikuba bantu bangi balesa kuli Malita ne Maliya kwisakubatontosha pacebo ca lufu lwa Lazalo mukwabo.
JOH 11:20 Malita mpwalanyumfeti Yesu lesanga, walayakumucinsha. Nomba Maliya walashala munga'nda.
JOH 11:21 Lino Malita walambila Yesu, “Mwami, nemwanga kuno mukwetu Lazalo naliya kufwa.
JOH 11:22 Nsombi nambi lino ndicinsheti Lesa namupeni ciliconse ncomwela kumumusenga.”
JOH 11:23 Yesu walamwambileti, “Mukwenu napunduke.”
JOH 11:24 Malita walambeti, “Ndicinsheti nakapunduke pa busuba bwakupwililisha bantu bonse bakapundukanga.”
JOH 11:25 Yesu walamwambileti, “weshikupundusha bantu kubafu nekupa buyumi njame. Muntu washoma ame, nambi ufwa nakabe ne buyumi.
JOH 11:26 Kayi abo bayumi banshoma nteshi bakafwe sobwe. Sena ulashomonga?”
JOH 11:27 Nendi walambeti, “Cakubinga Mwami, ndashomeshesha njamwe Mupulushi Walaiwa, Mwana wa Lesa, walikuyandika kwisa pacishi capanshi.”
JOH 11:28 Malita mpwalambeco, walamukuwa Maliya kanike wakendi kumbali nekumwambileti, “Lashiki Shikwiyisha, lakukunga.”
JOH 11:29 Maliya mpwalanyumfwa bwite, walanyamuka bwangu bwangu, nekwisa kuli Yesu.
JOH 11:30 Pacindici Yesu walinkatana ashika mumunshi, nsombi walikacili pamusena mpobalakumana ne Malita.
JOH 11:31 Nomba bantu balikuba munga'nda kabatontosha Maliya, mpobalaboneti lanyamuku bwangu bwangu kufuma mung'anda, balamukonka. Balikuyeyeti lenga akulilila kumanda.
JOH 11:32 Maliya mpwalashika palikuba Yesu, nekumubona, walaliwisha panshi kumyendo kwakendi nekwambeti, “Mwami, nemwanga kuno, mukwetu naliya kufwa.”
JOH 11:33 Yesu mpwalabona Maliya kalila kayi nebantu balikubapo nkabalila, walekatwa kumoyo kayi calamubaba.
JOH 11:34 Lino walabepusheti, “Mwalamubika kupeyo?” Balambeti, “Mwami, katuyani mukubone.”
JOH 11:35 Yesu walalila.
JOH 11:36 Popelapo bantu basa balambeti, “bonani, ncanga wamusuna.”
JOH 11:37 Nomba nabambi pakati pabo balambeti, “Muntuyu walashilika muntu washipilwa usa, Inga walalilwaconi kushinkilila Lazalo kwambeti nkatafwa?”
JOH 11:38 Yesu walikacililila mucali, mpwalikuya kumanda. Lino manda alikuba amuliceni, pacishinga pa manda palikuba cilibwe.
JOH 11:39 Lino walambeti, “Cifunyeni cilibweco.” Malita, mukwabo Lazalo walafwa, walamwambileti, “Mwami latatiki kendi kununka, pakwinga palapiti masuba ana.”
JOH 11:40 Yesu walamwipusheti, “Sena ndiya kukwambileti washoma nubone bulemu bwaLesa?”
JOH 11:41 Lino bantu mpobalafunya cilibwe cisa. Yesu walalanga kwilu nekwambeti, “Ta, ndamulumbunga kwambeti mukute kunkumbula ndasenganga.
JOH 11:42 Ndicinshi kwambeti mukute kunyumfwa cindi conse. Lino ndambangeci pacebo calikoto lyabantu balipano kwambeti, bashometi njamwe mwalantuma.”
JOH 11:43 Mpwalambeco walakuwa mwakolobesheti, “Lazaro, pula!”
JOH 11:44 Popelapo muntu usa walikuba wafwa walapula kenda kaliwapombailwa bikwisa byamalila kumakasa mpaka kumyendo,cikwisa cimbi calikuba cafwekelela kumenso. Yesu walabambileti, “Mupombololeni, kayi mumuleke ende.”
JOH 11:45 Bangi bantu balamushindikila Maliya, balabona bintu mbyalensa Yesu balamushoma.
JOH 11:46 Nsombi Bayuda nabambi balaya kuli bamakulene baBafalisi, kuyakubambila byonse Yesu mbyalensa.
JOH 11:47 Lino bamakulene beshimilumbo neBaFalisi balakuwa nkuta inene ya Bayuda, nekwipushaneti, “Nitwinseconi lino, pakwinga muntuyu lenshinga byeshikukankamanisha bingi?
JOH 11:48 Twamulekelela bantu bonse nibamushome, nomba Baloma nibakese bakatonongele Ng'anda ya Lesa, kayi ne mushobo wetu.”
JOH 11:49 Nsombi umo pakati pabo, lina lyakendi Kayafa, mukulene wa beshimilumbo bonse mucaka ico, walabambileti, “Mwatabila aconi amwe!
JOH 11:50 Sena amwe nkamulabonongeti caina kwambeti muntu umo afwile bantu bonse, kupita kwambeti mushobo wonse wonongeke?”
JOH 11:51 Cakubinga kwamba kulico nkakwalikuba kwamumano akendi sobwe. Pakwinga walikuba Shimilumbo Mukulene, walikushinshima kwambeti Yesu nakafwile mushobo wa bantu.
JOH 11:52 Cakubinga nteko kwambeti kubafwila bonkowa nsombi, kubunganya pamo bana baLesa balamwaika.
JOH 11:53 Kufumina busa busuba bamakulene ba Bayuda balatatika kupangana sha kushina Yesu.
JOH 11:54 Weco Yesu nkalikwenda pantangalala pakati pabantu. Nomba walafumako nekuya kucishi calikuba pepi necinyika, kumunshi walikukwiweti Efulemu, nkwalekala kopeloko pamo nebeshikwiya bakendi.
JOH 11:55 Kusekelela kwa Pasika kwalaseng'ena pepi. Neco bantu bangi beshikufuma kuminshi balaya ku Yelusalemu kucika cakuliswepesha, Pasika nkayitana iyamba.
JOH 11:56 Balikumulangaula Yesu, lino mpobalabungana mu Nga'nda ya Lesa balepushaneti “Sena amwe mulayeyengaconi? Sena lesanga ku Pasika kuno?”
JOH 11:57 Nomba bamakulene beshimilumbo neBafalisi balambeti uliyense lenshibi kuli Yesu, atwinshibishe kwambeti bamwikate.
JOH 12:1 Mpokwalashala masuba asanu nebumo kwambeti Pasika ishike, Yesu walaya ku Betaniya, uko kwalikuba Lazalo usa ngwalapundusha kubafu.
JOH 12:2 Balamubambila cakulya cakulemeka Yesu, ico Malita ncalabanyamfwilisha kutebeta. Lazalo walikubapo mpobalikulya pamo ne Yesu.
JOH 12:3 Lino Maliya walamanta libotolo lyamafuta anunkila nado, adula cikamba nekutatika kunanika myendo ya Yesu, kapukutisha nemishishi yakendi. Lino bantu balikuba mung'anda balanyumfwa bwema bwamafutayo.
JOH 12:4 Nomba Yuda Isikalioti, umo wa beshikwiya baYesu, uyo panyuma pakendi walamuyaba kubalwani bakendi, walambeti,
JOH 12:5 “Nomba nicani mafuta awa uliya kwaulisha mali a muwayawaya akwana 300 kwambeti apewe kubantu bapenga?”
JOH 12:6 Uku nkakwalikuba kwambeti usuni bapenga sobwe, nsombi pacebo cakwambeti walikuba kabwalala. Nendi ewalikusunga mali nekwibamo.
JOH 12:7 Yesu walambeti, “mulekeni abike mafuta awa kushikila busuba bwa kubikwa mumanda kwakame.
JOH 12:8 Pakwinga bantu bapenga nimubenga nabo cindi conse, nomba ame nteshi mubenganga pamo nenjame cindi conse.”
JOH 12:9 Bantu bangi mpobalanyumfweti Yesu uli kuBetaniya, nabo balayako. Baliya kuya pacebo caYesu enka sobwe, nsombi balayakubona Lazaro ngwalapundusha kubafu.
JOH 12:10 Weco bamakulene beshimilumbo balapangana shakwambeti Lazaro neye bamushine,
JOH 12:11 Pakwinga pacebo ca Lazaro bantu bangi bali kubashiya nekushoma Yesu.
JOH 12:12 Busuba bwalakonkapo bantu bangi balesa akusekelela Pasika, balanyumfweti Yesu lesanga kuYelusalemu.
JOH 12:13 Neco balamanta misampi yamalala nekuya akukumana nendi. Kabolobesheti, “Bulemu kuli Lesa! Walelekwa uyo lesanga mulina lya Mwami! Alelekwe Mwami wa Islaeli!”
JOH 12:14 Yesu walatanta mwana wa mbongolo ngobalamuletela, mbuli Mabala ncalambangeti,
JOH 12:15 Kotatina, obe munshi wa Siyoni. “Bona, Mwami wakobe lesanga, watanta mwana wa mbongolo.”
JOH 12:16 Pacindico beshikwiya bakendi baliya kunyumfwishisha. Nsombi Yesu mpwalapunduka nebulemu, empobalanuka kwambeti ibi byalembwa muMabala byalikwamba endiye, nekwambeti balamwinshila bintu ibi.
JOH 12:17 Bantu balikuba neYesu mpwalakuwa Lazaro mumanda nekumupundusha kubafu nabo balapitilisha kwamba pabintu mbyobalabona.
JOH 12:18 Ecebo cakendi bantu ncebalayilakukumana nendi, pakwinga balanyumfwa ceshikukankamanisha ncalensa.
JOH 12:19 Popelapo Bafalisi balatatika kwambilaneti, “Bonani afwe paliya ncetulenshinga, pakwinga bantu bonse balafwambilinga kulyendiye.”
JOH 12:20 Nomba kwalikuba Bagiliki nabambi pakati pabantu balaya kuYelusalemu akupaila pacindi cakusekelela.
JOH 12:21 Ba Giliki balayakubona Filipo, waku Betisaida muGalileya. Balamusengeti, “nkambo tulayandanga kubona Yesu.”
JOH 12:22 Filipo walambila Ndileya, bonse babili balaya akwambila Yesu.
JOH 12:23 Yesu walambeti, “Cilashiki cindi cakwambeti Mwana Muntu atambule bulemu bwakendi.
JOH 12:24 Kwamba cakubinga, imbuto ya witi yabula kubyalwa mubulongo nekufwa ikute kaili imo imo. Nomba yafukilwa, ikute kukula nekusema bisepo bingi.
JOH 12:25 Muntu usuni buyumi bwakendi, nakabutaye, nsombi uyo utabusuni buyumi bwakendi mucishi cino nakapewe buyumi butapu.
JOH 12:26 Muntu layandanga kunsebensela, ankonkele, kwambeti musebenshi wakame akabe nenjame kulikonse nkotinkabenga. Muntu asebensela ame, Bata nibakamupe bulemu.”
JOH 12:27 “Lino ndapengenga mumoyo. Nomba ng'ambe cani? Sena ng'ambeti, ‘Bata kamumpulusha pacindici ku mapensho alesanga pantangu? Nomba sobwe, pakwinga encondaleshila.
JOH 12:28 Bata kamulemekani Lina lyenu.” Popelapo kwalanyumfwika Maswi kwilu akwambeti, “ndalilemeke, kayi nimpitilishe kulilemeka.”
JOH 12:29 Lino likoto linene lyabantu mpolyalanyumfwa maswi awo, balambeti, “Nimukunkumo wa mfula.” Nomba nabambi balambeti, “Nimungelo wambanga nendi.”
JOH 12:30 Yesu walabambileti, “Maswi aliyakunyumfwika pacebo ca Njame sobwe, nsombi nakumunyamfwa.
JOH 12:31 Lino ecindi cakwambeti cishi capanshi comboloshewe. Lino Satana, mwami wa cishi capanshi, Lesa namuwale kunsa.
JOH 12:32 Nomba ndakanyamunwa pelu, ninkabunganye bantu bonse kuli njame.”
JOH 12:33 Yesu walamba maswi awa kwambeti abaleshe mushobo walufu ndoshi akafwe nalo.
JOH 12:34 Bantu basa balamwambileti, “Milawo yetu ikute kwambeti Mupulushi Walaiwa nakabengapongowa. Nomba amwe mulambilingeti Mwana Muntu welela kunyamunwa pelu Mwana Muntu wopeloyo niyani?”
JOH 12:35 Lino Yesu walambeti, “Mumuni ucili pakati penu kwacindi cing'ana. Kamwendani, mu mumuni nkauciliko, mushinshe nkautamukoma. Pakwinga uliyense lendenga mumushinshe nkakute kwinshiba nkwalenga.
JOH 12:36 Kamushomani mumuni kaucili nenjamwe kwambeti mube bantu bamunikilwa.” Yesu mpwalapwisha kwamba makani awa walafumapo nekuya kumusena nkobatenshi.
JOH 12:37 Nambi Yesu walensa byeshikukankamanisha bingi, nsombi nabo baliya kumushoma.
JOH 12:38 Ici calenshika mbuli ncalamba mushinshimi Yesaya, “Mwami, niyani lashomo kukambauka kwetu? Niyani labono ngofu sha Mwami?”
JOH 12:39 Neco nkamwalashoma pakwinga mbuli Yesaya kayi walambeti,
JOH 12:40 “Lesa walabapofola menso, nekuyumisha mitwi yabo, cakwambeti menso abo nkacikonsho kubona, nambi kwishiba nemyoyo yabo. Nambi kusandukila kuli njame kwambeti ndibasengule.”
JOH 12:41 Yesaya mpwalikwamba maswi awa, walikwamba sha Yesu, pacebo cakwambeti walabona bulemu bwakendi.
JOH 12:42 Nomba nikukabeco batangunishi babo bangi balashoma Yesu. Nsombi pacebo ca kutina Bafalisi kwambeti ngababatandanya mu libungano, nkabalikwambila bantu patuba.
JOH 12:43 Balikusuna kulumbwa kubantu kupita kulumbwa ne Lesa.
JOH 12:44 Neco Yesu walamba mwakolobesheti, “Muntu lanshomonga, nkalashomonga ame ndenka sobwe, nsombi lashomonga uyo walantuma.
JOH 12:45 Kayi muntu labononga ame, labononga uyo walantuma.
JOH 12:46 Ame njame mumuni, kayi ndalesa panshi pano, kwambeti uliyense lanshomo akabule kwikala mumushinshe.
JOH 12:47 Muntu anyumfwa maswi akame nomba ubula kwanyumfwa, nteshinkamomboloshe pakwinga ndiya kwisa kombolosha cishi, nsombi kwisa kupulusha.
JOH 12:48 Muntu lankananga, kayi labulunga kutambula maswi akame, mpwali weshakamomboloshe. Maswi ngondamba eshakamupeshe mulandu pa busuba bwakupwililisha!
JOH 12:49 Ici nicakubinga pakwinga nkankute kwambowa bintu mukuyeya kwakame, nsombi Bata balantuma ebalang'ambila byakwamba, ne mwakwambila.
JOH 12:50 Kayi ndicinsheti milawo njalampa ikute kupa buyumi butapu. Weco mbyonkute kwamba, nkute kwamba Bata ncobalang'ambila.”
JOH 13:1 Kusekelela kwa Pasika mpokwalikuba pepi, Yesu walenshibeti cindi cakwambeti afume pacishi capanshi kuya kuBaishi cilashiki. Nendi walikubasuna bantu bakendi pacishi capanshi, walabasunishisha cakupwililila.
JOH 13:2 Pacindi Yesu ne beshikwiya bakendi mpobalikulya cakulya camansailo, Satana walikuba labiki kendi mumoyo wa Yudasi, mwana wa Simoni Isikariote, miyeyo yakwambeti amuyabe Yesu kubalwani bakendi.
JOH 13:3 Yesu walikwinshiba kwambeti Baishi balamupa ngofu pabintu byonse. Kayi kwambeti walafumina kuli Lesa, kayi lakenga kuBaishi.
JOH 13:4 Neco pacindi ncobalikulya walemana nekufulula mwinjila wakendi wakunsa nekumanta cikwisa cakupukutisha nekucisunga mubukome.
JOH 13:5 Mpwalenseco waletila menshi mumbale, nekutatika kusambisha myendo yabeshikwiya bakendi, nkabapukuta necikwisa cisa ncalasunga mubukome.
JOH 13:6 Mpwalashika pali Simoni Petulo, nendi walambeti, “Mwami, sena ngamunsambisha kumyendo?”
JOH 13:7 Yesu walamukumbuleti, “Ncondenshinga nkocinshi, nsombi nukenshibe kuntangu.”
JOH 13:8 Petulo walambeti, “Nteshi munsambishe kumyendo sobwe.” Yesu walamukumbuleti, “Na mbule kukusambisha, ekwambeti ntobe weshikwiya wakame.”
JOH 13:9 Simoni Petulo walambeti, “Mwami, nanico kamutasambishowa myendo nsombi kumakasa kayi nekumutwi.”
JOH 13:10 Yesu walamwambileti, “Muntu lasamba mubili wonse ukute kuswepa cilayandikinga nikusambowa kumyendo konka. Mwense mulaswepe kufunyakowa umo.”
JOH 13:11 Yesu walambeco pakwinga walikwinshiba kendi uyo weshakamuyabe, encalambileti, “Mwense mulaswepe kufunyakowa umo.”
JOH 13:12 Yesu mpwalapwisha kubasambisha kumyendo, walafwala cakufwala cakendi capelu nekubwelela mpwalikuba ekala. Lino walabepusheti, “Sena muleshibi ncondenshili cisa?
JOH 13:13 Amwe mukute kunkuweti, ‘Mwiyi’ Nambi ‘Mwami.’ Ee mwela kwambeco, pakwinga njame.
JOH 13:14 Nomba ame ndeMwami kayi Shikwiyisha wenu, ndamusambishi kumyendo yenu, ekwambeti nenjamwe mwelela kusambishana kumyendo.
JOH 13:15 Lino ndamupa cilesho, kwambeti nenjamwe mwelela kwinshila nabambi mbuli ncondamwinshili.
JOH 13:16 Ndamwambilinga cakubingeti, kuliya musebenshi wapita mwami wakendi, kayi kuliya mutumwa wapita walamutuma.
JOH 13:17 Lino mpomulenshibi bintu ibi, Lesa nakamuleleke na mukacinsenga.
JOH 13:18 “Maswi awa nkandambilinga mwense sobwe, pakwinga ndibenshi abo mbondalasala. Ibi bilenshiki mbuli Mabala a Lesa ncalambangeti, ‘Uyo walikulyela mumbale yakame walambukila.’
JOH 13:19 Ndamwambililinga limo ibi nkabitana binshika, kwambeti mukashometi, cakubinga njame.
JOH 13:20 Nomba ndambilishingeti uliyense latambulunga mbondatumunga, latambulunga njame. Kayi lantambulunga, latambulumga walantuma.”
JOH 13:21 Yesu mpwalambeco, walatatika kupenshewa mumoyo nekubambileti, “Ndamwambilinga cakubinga umo pakati penu nanjabe kubalwani bakame.”
JOH 13:22 Beshikwiya bakendi balatatika kulangana, kutenshibeti lambanga bani.
JOH 13:23 Yesu walikuba wekala pepi shikwiya ngwalikusuna.
JOH 13:24 Lino Simoni Petulo walamukuwa nemakasa shikwiya uyo nekumwambileti, “Bepushe nomba balambanga ani?”
JOH 13:25 Popelapo shikwiya walikuba pepi walamuyamina Yesu, nekumwipusheti, “Mwami, nomba mulambanga ani?”
JOH 13:26 Yesu walakumbuleti, “Uyo ngoshimpe shinkwa ngweshinsunse mumbale.” Lino mpwalapwa kusunsa walapa Yuda Isikaliote mwanendi Simoni Isikaliote.
JOH 13:27 Yuda mpwalatambulowa shinkwa Satana walamwingila, popelapo Yesu walamwambileti, “Koya winse bintu mbyolayandanga kwinsa mwakufwambana.”
JOH 13:28 Necikabeco, paliya naba umo pakati abo mbwalikulya nabo walenshiba ncalamwambilila mushoboyo.
JOH 13:29 Nomba pacebo cakwambeti Yuda ewalikusunga mali, beshikwiya balayeyeti lamutumunga kuya kula byakulya byalikuyandika pabusuba bwa Pasika, nambi byakupa bantu bapenga.
JOH 13:30 Yudasi mpwalatambula shinkwa usa,walapula pansa, kayi kwalikuba kulashipi kendi.
JOH 13:31 Yudasi mpwalapula, Yesu walambeti, “Lino Mwana Muntu napewe bulemu, Kayi mulyendiye Lesa nalemekeshewe.
JOH 13:32 Lino na Lesa lalemekwa kupitila muMwanendi, ekwambeti, nendi Lesa nakamulemeke Mwanendi, kayi ecilenshikinga pacino cindi.
JOH 13:33 Mobana bame, ndinenu kwakacindi kang'ana, nimukanangaule, nsombi ndamwambilinga ncondalambila bamakulene ba Bayuda, ‘Nkondenga ame, amwe nkamwela kushikako.’
JOH 13:34 Lino ndamupanga mulawo walino lino, wakwambeti musunanenga, mbuli mondamusunina, nenjamwe kamusunananga.
JOH 13:35 Pakwinga namusunanenga, bantu bonse nibakenshibeti njamwe beshikwiya bakame.”
JOH 13:36 Simoni Petulo walamwipusha Yesu, “Mwami, mulenga kupeyo?” Yesu walambeti, “Nkandela kuya pamo nenjobe sobwe, nsombi nukankonkele mumasuba akuntangu.”
JOH 13:37 Petulo walamwipusheti, “Mwami, ingacelakunkanisha kumukonka lino nicani? Ame ndalibambila kuyaba buyumi bwakame pacebo cenu.”
JOH 13:38 Lino Yesu walambeti, “Sena walibambila kuyaba buyumi bwakobe pacebo cakame! Cakubinga ndakwambilinga kombwe nkatana alila nunkaneti nkonjishi mankanda atatu.”
JOH 14:1 Yesu walambila beshikwiya bakendi, “Myoyo yenu kaitashupika. Kamushomani Lesa, kayi mushome nenjame.
JOH 14:2 munga'nda muli Bata muli bipinda bingi yakwikalamo necabula kubeco, nendalamwambila. Ndenga akumubambila misena.
JOH 14:3 Lino ndakapwisha kumubambila misena, ninkabwele kwisakumumanta, kwambeti mukabenga nkweshinkabenga.
JOH 14:4 Cakubinga nkondenga mukwinshi, nenshila muyinshi.”
JOH 14:5 Tomasi walambeti, “Mwami, nkatukwinshi nkomulenga, nomba nshila yakwilako ngatuyinshibaconi?”
JOH 14:6 Yesu walamukumbuleti, “ame njame nshila, kayi njame cancine ncine nebuyumi. Paliya muntu welakuya kuli Bata, kwakubula kupitila muli njame.
JOH 14:7 Pakwinga nemunjishi, nemwabeshiba Bata. Kufumina lelo mulabenshibi kayi mulababono.”
JOH 14:8 Filipo walambeti, “Mwami tulesheni Bata kwambeti tushome.”
JOH 14:9 Yesu walamukumbuleti, “Filipo, ndekala nenu cindi citali, nomba nkotana unjinshiba? Labono ame elababono Bata. Nomba nicani ulambangeti, ‘Kotulesha Baiso?
JOH 14:10 Sena nkaulashomonga kwambeti ame nkute kwikala muli Bata, kayi Bata bakute kwikala muli njame? Maswi ngonkute kumwambila nkakute kufuma kuli njame ndenka sobwe, nsombi Bata abakute kwikala muli njame, endibo bakute kwinsa bintu byonsebi.
JOH 14:11 Kamunshomani kwambeti ame nkute kwikala muli Bata kayi Bata bakute kwikala muli njame. Nanteco, shomani ncito shakame.
JOH 14:12 Cakubinga ndambilishingeti uyo lanshomonga mulimo ngondenshinga nendi nakawinse, pakwinga ndenga kuli Bata neco nendi nakense byapita pali ibi.
JOH 14:13 Neco ciliconse ncoshimukasenge muLina lyakame, ninkacinse kwambeti Bata bakapewe bulemu kupitila mu Mwanabo.
JOH 14:14 Ninkense ciliconse ncoshi mukasenge muLina lyakame.”
JOH 14:15 “Na munsuni, konkelani milawo yakame.
JOH 14:16 Lino ninkasenge Bata kwambeti, bakamupe weshikumunyamfwilisha naumbi uyo eshakekale nenu masuba onse.
JOH 14:17 Mushimu Uswepa nukamuleshe cancine ncine. Cishi nkacela kumutambula sobwe, pakwinga nkacimubono kayi nkacimwinshi. Nsombi amwe mumwinshi, pakwinga ukute kwikala muli njamwe, kayi nakekale muli njamwe kwacindi conse.
JOH 14:18 “Nteshi ndimushiyeti bana banshiwa. Ninkese kayi kuli njamwe.
JOH 14:19 Kulashalowa kacindi kang'ana, cishi capanshi nteshi cikambonepo nsombi amwe nimukambone. Pakwinga ndemuyumi, nenjamwe nimukabe bayumi.
JOH 14:20 Pabusuba ubo nimukenshibeti Bata, nenjame tuli muntu umo, kayi amwe nenjame tuli muntu umo.
JOH 14:21 “Muntu latambulunga milawo yakame nekwikonka, endiye unsuni. Kayi uyo unsuni ame, Bata nibakamusune. Nenjame ninkamusune, kayi nakenshibe ncombele.”
JOH 14:22 Yuda naumbi, kutamba usa Yuda Iskaliote sobwe, walamwipusheti, “Mwami nomba ngamuliyubululaconi kuli njafwe kwakubula kuliyubulula ku cishi capanshi?”
JOH 14:23 Yesu walambeti, uyo unsuni, nakakonke ciyisho cakame. Nabo Bata nibakamusune, ame ne Bata nitukekale mulyendiye.
JOH 14:24 Muntu utansuni, nteshakakonkele ciyisho cakame. Maswi awa ngomulanyumfunga nteyo akame sobwe, nsombi na Bata balantuma.
JOH 14:25 Ndamwambilililimo nkandicili nenjamwe.
JOH 14:26 Nsombi usa weshikunyamfwilisha, Mushimu Uswepa uyo Bata ngoshibakatume mulina lyakame, endiye weshakamwiyishe byonse, kayi nakamwanusheni byonse ibyo mbyondalamwambila kandicili nenjamwe.
JOH 14:27 Ndamupanga lumuno. Lumuno ndondelela kumupa. Ndamupanga lumuno lwapusana nelumuno ndocela kupa cishi capanshi. Neco myoyo yenu itashupika nambi kutina.
JOH 14:28 Mulanyumfu mpondamwambilangeti, ndenga, nsombi ndakesanga kayi kuli njamwe. Nemunsuni, nemulakondwa kwambeti ndenga kuli Bata, pakwinga Bata bampita.
JOH 14:29 Ndamwambilililimo bintu ibi nkabitana binshika, kwambeti byakenshika, mukashome.
JOH 14:30 Nteshi mpitilishe kwamba nenjamwe pakwinga Satana mwami wa cishi capanshi, lesanga. Nomba uliya ngofu palinjame,
JOH 14:31 Nomba bantu bonse bela kwinshiba kwambeti ame nsuni Bata, weco ndenshinga ncobalang'ambila. “Lino kamunyamuka twenga.”
JOH 15:1 Ame njame citondo ca vaini, nomba Bata ebalimi.
JOH 15:2 Nabo bakute kutimbula misampi iliyonse mulinjame itaseme bisepo. Nomba misampi ikutekusema bisepo Bata bakute kwibambilila cena kwambeti ikate bisepo bingi.
JOH 15:3 Amwe mulapenselwa kayi mulaswepe kendi pacebo ca maswi ngondalamwambila.
JOH 15:4 Kamwikalililani mulinjame kayi nenjame ninkekalilile muli njamwe. Kuliyawa musampi wabulakwikata kucinyina welakwikata bisepo. Copeleco nenjamwe nkamwela kwikata bisepo nankamulekalilinga muli njame.
JOH 15:5 Ame njame citondo cancine ncine ca vaini nomba amwe njamwe misampi. Muntu uliyense eshakekalilile mulinjame, nenjame mulyendiye nakekate bisepo bingi. Weco kwakubula njame kuliyawa ncomwela kwinsa.
JOH 15:6 Namuntu nkalekalanga mulinjame, nakawalwe kunseti misampi yatemwa, ikute kuyuma. Misampi yamushoboyo ikute kubunganishiwa nekuwalwa mumulilo nekutentwa.
JOH 15:7 Namulekala mulinjame, kayi maswi akame ekala mulinjamwe, ngamunsenga ciliconse ncomwela kuyanda, nimukapewe.
JOH 15:8 Bata bakute kulemekeshewa namulekata bisepo bingi, kayi cikute kulesheti njamwe beshikwiya bakame bancine ncine.
JOH 15:9 Mbuli Bata ncobansuni, nenjame ndimusuni amwe. Mwikalenga mu lusuno lwakame.
JOH 15:10 Namukonkelenga milawo yakame, nimwikalenga mulusuno lwakame, mbuli ame nconkute kukonkela milawo ya Bata nekwikalilila mulusuno lwabo.
JOH 15:11 “Ndamwambili ibi kwambeti kukondwa kwakame kube muli njamwe kayi kwambeti kukondwa kwenu kube kwakwana.
JOH 15:12 Mulawo wakame niwakwambeti musunanenga mbuli ncondimusuni.
JOH 15:13 Kuliya muntu ukute lusuno lwapita ulu lwakutaya buyumi bwakendi pacebo cabanendi.
JOH 15:14 Namulakonkelenga kwiyisha kwakame ekwambeti njamwe mobaname.
JOH 15:15 Nteshi ndimukuwengeti basebenshi sobwe pakwinga musebenshi nkakute kwinshiba bilenshinga mwami wakendi. Nsombi ndamukungeti baname, pacebo cakwambeti byonse mbyondalanyumfwa kuli Bata ndalamwambila.
JOH 15:16 Ntamwe mwalansala sobwe, nsombi njame ndalamusala. Kayi ndalamupatula kwambeti mukekate bisepo bitalobo. Neco ciliconse ncoshimukasenge kuli Bata mulina lyakame nibakamupe.
JOH 15:17 Neco mulawo wakame niwakwambeti musunanenga.
JOH 15:18 “Na cishi capanshi cikamupate, mukanuke kwambeti calatatikila kupata njame.
JOH 15:19 Nemwekalangeti bantu bamucishi nebalamusuna, nomba pacebo cakwambeti ntamwe bamucishi capanshi sobwe. Nomba bamupela pakwinga ame ndalamusala pakati pabo, weco ntamwe banabo sobwe.
JOH 15:20 Kamwanukanga maswi asa ngondalamwambileti, ‘Musebenshi nkapiti mwami wakendi.’ Na balampensha, nenjamwe nibakamupenshe. Na balanyumfwa maswi akame, nibakanyumfwe maswi enu.
JOH 15:21 Nsombi nibakamwinshile bintu mbyobalenshila kulinjame, pakwinga nkabamwinshi walantuma.
JOH 15:22 Nendalabula kwisa kubeyisha, nebalabula kuba nemulandu. Nomba lino paliyawa mpobela kukanina mulandu wabo.
JOH 15:23 Muntu lapatananga nenjame, lapatananga neBata.
JOH 15:24 Nendalabula kwinsa bintu pakati pabo bitana binshiwapo nemuntu uliyense, cakubinga nebalakabulu kuba nemulandu. Nomba pakwinga balabibona, nsombi bapata ame neBata.
JOH 15:25 Nomba byalenshika mushoboyo mbuli ncecalembwa mulibuku lyabo lya milawo kwambeti, ‘Balapatana nenjame kwakubula mulandu.’
JOH 15:26 “Shikumunyamfwa lakesanga, uyo ni Mushimu weshukayubulule cancine ncine cilambanga shaBata, Ninkamutumine, nendi uyo akesa nakambele bukamboni.
JOH 15:27 Nenjamwe nimukambele bukamboni, pakwinga mulekala nenjame kufuma kumatatikilo.”
JOH 16:1 “Ndamwambili makani awa kwambeti mutakatyompwa.
JOH 16:2 Lino nibakamutandanye mu mandakupaililamo.Kayi cindi nicikashike cakwambeti bantu beshibakamushinenga nibakayeyengeti balasebenselenga Lesa.
JOH 16:3 Nibakense bintu bilico pacebo cakwambeti nkababenshi Bata kayi nenjame nkabanjinshi.
