JOH 16:4 Nsombi ndamwambililinga limo bintu ibi kwambeti cindi cakashika mukanuketi ndalamwambilapo kendi. Ndiya kumwambila bintu ibi pakuyamba pakwinga ndalikuba nenu.”
JOH 16:5 Nomba lino ndenga kuli Bata balantuma, nsombi paliya nambi umo lanjipushunga kwambeti, “Ulenga kupeyo.”
JOH 16:6 “Nomba mumyoyo yenu mulesulu miyeyo yakungumana pacebo ca bintu mbyondamwambili.
JOH 16:7 Nsombi ndamwambilinga cakubinga, caina kuli njamwe kwambeti ame njenga. Pakwinga nankandenga, munyamfwilishi usa nteshi akese kuli njamwe. Nsombi ndaya ninkamutume kulinjamwe.
JOH 16:8 Lino akesa shikumunyamfwa nakababoneshe bantu ba panshi pano pabwipishi bwabo nepabululami, kayi nekombolosha kwa Mwami Lesa.
JOH 16:9 Bacimwa pacebo cakwipa kwabo pakwinga nkabashomo mulinjame.
JOH 16:10 Bacimwa pamakani abululami pakwinga ndenga kuli Bata kayi nteshi mukambonepo sobwe.
JOH 16:11 Bacimwa pashakombolosha, pakwinga Lesa lamombolosho kendi mwami lendeleshenga cishi cino.
JOH 16:12 “Nkute Maswi angi akumwambila nsombi nkamwela kwanyumfwishisha sobwe.
JOH 16:13 Nsombi wakashika Mushimu nukamwiyishe byancine ncine. Pakwinga Nteshi ukambenga bintu byakuliyandila sobwe, nsombi bintu ibyo Bata mbyoshibakamwambilenga, endibyo mbyoshi ukambenga. Kayi nukamwiyishe bintu byakuntangu.
JOH 16:14 Nukampe bulemu pakwinga nukamante bintu kufuma kulinjame nekwisa kumwambila.
JOH 16:15 Bintu byonse byaBata nibyakame. Weco ndamwambilingeti nukamante bilafumunga kuli njame nekwisa kumwambila.
JOH 16:16 “Kwacindi cing'ana nteshi mukambone, nsombi pakapita kacindi cing'anowa nimukambone.”
JOH 16:17 Beshikwiya bakendi nabambi balatatika kwipushaneti, “Nomba nicani ncalatwambilinga? Lambangeti, ‘Kwacindi cing'anowa nteshi mukambone.’ Kayi lambangeti, ‘pakwinga ndenga kuli Bata.’
JOH 16:18 Nomba inga cilapandululunga cani, ‘Kwacindi cing'ana’ Nkatulanyumfwishishinga mbyalayandanga kutwambila.”
JOH 16:19 Yesu walenshibeti balayandanga kumwipusha, neco walabambileti, sena mulepushanyanga pamakani ngondamwambileti, kwakacindi kang'ana nteshi mukambonepo, nsombi pakapita kacindi kang'ana kayi nimukambone?
JOH 16:20 Ndamwambilinga cakubinga kwambeti nimukalile kayi nimukongumane, nsombi cishi nicikasekelele. Amwe nimukongumane, nsombi kungumana kwenu panyuma pakendi nikukabe kusekelela.
JOH 16:21 Lino pacindi cakupulukamo mutukashi ukute kushupika pacebo cakwambeti cindi cilashiki. Nomba mwana asemwa nkakute nekuyeyako shakushupika, pakwinga kukute kuba kusekelela kwambeti mwana lasemwa.
JOH 16:22 Nenjamwe mulashupikinga lino, nsombi ninkamubone kayi. Popelapo myoyo yenu nikasekelele, kayi paliya muntu weshakamulamune kukondwa kwenu.
JOH 16:23 “Pabusuba ubo nteti mukayande kunjipusha.necikabeco ndamwambilinga cakubinga kwambeti Bata nibakamupe ciliconse nceshi mukasenge mulina lyakame.
JOH 16:24 Kushikila lelo nkamuna musengapo cintu mulina lyakame. Nomba lino mwela kusenga mulina lyakame, neco, nimukapewe, kwambeti kukondwa kwenu kube kwakwana.”
JOH 16:25 Ndamwambili bintu ibi mumapinda. Cindi nicikashike mposhinkambe pantangalala shaBata, ntetinkambepo mumapinda sobwe.
JOH 16:26 Busuba ubo nimukasenge kupitila mulina lyakame, ntetikukayandiketi ndimusengele kuli Bata sobwe.
JOH 16:27 Bata bamusuni pakwinga munsuni, kayi mwanshometi ndalafuma kuliBata.
JOH 16:28 Ndalafuma kuli Bata kwisa panshi pano. Lino kayi ndafumunga panshi pano kuya kuliBata.
JOH 16:29 Beshikwiya bakendi balambeti, “Lino mulambanga mwakunyumfwika, kutamba mumapinda sobwe.
JOH 16:30 Lino tulenshibi kwambeti mubinshi byonse, neco nkatwela kumwipusha. Weco lino tulashomo kwambeti mwalafuma kuli Lesa.”
JOH 16:31 Yesu walabakumbuleti, “Sena lino empomulashomo?
JOH 16:32 Cindi nicishike, kayi cilashiki kendi, nceshimumwaike uliyense kuya kwabo, nimunshiye ndenka. Nsombi nkandipo ndenka sobwe pakwinga Bata bali nenjame.
JOH 16:33 Ndamwambili bintu ibi kwambeti mube neLumuno pakushoma njame. Cishi nicikamupenshe nsombi kamuyumani pakwinga ame ndacikomo cishi capanshi.”
JOH 17:1 Yesu mpwalamba bintu ibi, walalanga kwilu nekwambeti, “Cindi cilashiki Ta. Kamumupani bulemu mwanenu, kwambeti nendi Mwanenu amupe bulemu.
JOH 17:2 Pakwinga mwalamupa ngofu shakwendelesha bantu bonse kwambeti ape buyumi butapu kuli bonse mbomwalamupa.
JOH 17:3 Buyumi butapu nikwinshiba njamwe kayi neYesu Klistu ngomwalatuma.
JOH 17:4 Ndamuletele bulemu pacishi capanshi pakupwisha mulimo ngomwalantuma.
JOH 17:5 Neco Ta kamumpani bulemu pacino cindi ncendesanga kulinjamwe. Bulemu busa mbondalikukute kacitana cilengwa cishi.”
JOH 17:6 “Balamwishibi cena abo mbomwalampa pano pacishicapanshi, balikuba benu, nsombi mwalampa. Kayi balakonka maswi enu.
JOH 17:7 Lino bacinshi kwambeti byonse mbyomwalampa byalafuma kulinjamwe.
JOH 17:8 Pakwinga ndalabeisha maswi ngomwalangambila kayi balatambula. Neco bacinshi kwambeti ndalafuma kuli njamwe, kayi bashoma kwambeti njamwe mwalantuma.
JOH 17:9 “Ndabapaililinga. Nkandapaililinga cishi capanshi sobwe, nsombi ndapaililinga abo mbomwalampa pakwinga nibenu.
JOH 17:10 Byonse mbyonkute nibyenu, kayi byenu byonse nibyakame, neco nkute kupewa bulemu mulyendibo.
JOH 17:11 Lino ndesanga kulinjamwe. Nteshi mbenganga mucishi capanshi sobwe, ndesanga kulinjamwe, nsombi nabo mobacili. Ta omwaswepa kamubasunga mulina lyenu ndyomwalampa, kwambeti babeti umo mbuli njafwe ncetuli umo
JOH 17:12 Mpondalikuba nabo, ndalikubasunga nengofu nshomwalampa. Ndalabacingilila cena kayi kuliya nambi umo walataika, kufunyakowa usa walikuba welela kutaika, kwambeti byonse byalalembwa binshike.
JOH 17:13 “Lino ndesanga kuli njamwe. Ndambanga bintu ibi nkandicili panshi pano kwambeti, kukondwa kwakame kwisule mumyoyo yabo.
JOH 17:14 Ndabeyishi maswi enu. nsombi cishi cilabapata, pakwinga nabo baliya cibusa necishi capanshi, mbuli ame ncondababula cibusa ne cishi capanshi.
JOH 17:15 Nkandasengenga kwambeti mubafunye mucishi capanshi sobwe, nsombi kwambeti mubacingilile kumulwani.
JOH 17:16 Nabo ntebo bapacishi capanshi, mbuli ame ncendabula kuba wapa cishi capanshi.
JOH 17:17 Mubaswepeshe necancine ncine kwambeti babe benu. Maswi enu ecanci ncine.
JOH 17:18 Mbuli ncemwalantuma ame pacishi capanshi pano, nenjame ndabatumu pacishi capanshi pano.
JOH 17:19 Pacebo cabo ndalibenge kuli njamwe, kwambeti nabo balibenge kuli njamwe mucancine ncine.”
JOH 17:20 Nkandapaililinga aba bonka sobwe, nsombi bonse beshibakanshome pacebo ca mulumbe wabo.
JOH 17:21 Ndabapaililinga kwambeti bonse bakabebamo. Mbuli amwe Ta ncomuli mulinjame, kayi nenjame ndimulinjamwe nabo bekale muli njafwe. Neco bantu bonse bakashome kwambeti mwalantuma.
JOH 17:22 Ndabapa bulemu mbomwalampa, kwambeti babe bamo, babe mbuli afwe ncetuli bamo.
JOH 17:23 Ame njikale mulyendibo, nenjamwe muli njame kwambeti babe bamo cancine ncine. Neco bantu bonse nibakenshibe kwambeti njamwe mwalantuma, kayi mubasuni mbuli ncomunsuni.
JOH 17:24 Ndandangeti, abo mbomwalampa babe pamo nenjame uko nkoshi nkabe. Ndandangeti babone bulemu bwakame mbomwalampa, pakwinga mwalansuna kendi nkacitana cilengwa cishi capanshi.
JOH 17:25 Omwalulama Ta, cishi capanshi ciliya kumwinshiba sobwe, nsombi ame ndimwinshi, kayi aba bacinsheti njamwe mwalantuma.
JOH 17:26 Ndalabenshibisha Lina lyenu, kayi ninkapitilishe kubeyisha kwambeti lusuno ndomukute palinjame lube mulyendibo, kwambeti nenjame mbe mulyendibo.
JOH 18:1 Yesu mpwalapwisha kwamba walaya pamo nebeshikwiya bakendi kutala kwa cisapa ca Kedroni, nkobalakengila mulibala lya bitondo bya maolifi,
JOH 18:2 Uko Yesu nebeshikwiya bakendi nkobalikukumanina cindi conse. Neco Yuda walamuyaba walikwishiba musena wopelowo.
JOH 18:3 Yuda walanyamuka pamo nebashilikali baku Loma nebamalonda baku Nga'nda ya Lesa abo balatumwa nebamakulene beshimilumbo neBafalisi. Nabo balaya kulibala uko kabalibamanta malampi ne nsakamwenge kayi ne byensho byankondo.
JOH 18:4 Nomba Yesu walikwinshiba byeshibimwinshikile. Weco nendi walemana patuba, nekubepusheti, “Nomba mulayandanga bani?”
JOH 18:5 Balamukumbuleti, “tulayandanga Yesu waku Nasaleti.” Yesu walambeti, “Njame.” Yuda walamuyaba kubalwani bakendi, neye walikubapo.
JOH 18:6 Yesu mpwalabakumbuleti, “Njame,” Balabwelela kunyuma nekuwa panshi.
JOH 18:7 Kayi Yesu walabepusha, “Nomba mulayandanga bani?” Nabo balambeti, “tulandanga Yesu wa ku nazaleti.”
JOH 18:8 Yesu walambeti, “Ndamwambili eti njame, nomba na mulayandanga njame, aba balekeni bayenga.”
JOH 18:9 Walambeco kwambeti bikwanilishiwe mbyalambeti, “Ndiya kutayapo naba umo pali abo mbomwalampa.”
JOH 18:10 Shimoni Petulo walikukute cingwebe. Walasokolola nekukwempula litwi lyakululyo lya Makasi musebenshi wa shimilumbo mukulene.
JOH 18:11 Lino Yesu walambila Petulo, “Bwesha cingwebe cakobe mumukopa. Sena ulayeyengeti mbule kunwa nkomeshi ya mapensho njobalampa Bata?”
JOH 18:12 Mushilikali mukulene nebashilikali bakendi, kayi nebamalondabamuNg'anda ya Lesa, balamwikata Yesu nekumusunga.
JOH 18:13 Pakutanguna balaya nendi kuli Anasi, mupongoshi wa Kayafa, walikuba mukulene wa beshimilumbo bonse mucaka copeleco.
JOH 18:14 Kayafa eusa walambila bamakulene baBayuda kumasuba akunyuma kwambeti caina namuntu umo ufwa kupita kwambeti bantu bonse bafwe.
JOH 18:15 Shimoni Petulo neshikwiya naumbi balamukonkela Yesu. Shikwiya naumbi uyo walikuba wenshibana neshimilumbo mukulene. Lino walengila pamo ne Yesu munga'nda ya shimilumbo mukulene.
JOH 18:16 Nsombi Petulo walemana kunsa pepi necishinga, usa shikwiya walikuba wenshibikwa walapula nekuya kwamba nemutukashi pacishinga kwambeti ambile Petulo engile,
JOH 18:17 Nomba mutukashi musebenshi walepusha Petulo, “Sena obe ntobe umo wa beshikwiya bamuntuyu?” Petulo walambeti, “Ame? Sobwe.”
JOH 18:18 Kwalikuba kwatontola, neco basebenshi ne bamalonda balakunka mulilo ngobalikuyota bwimene,neye Petulo walayakwimanapo kayota mulilo.
JOH 18:19 Pacindi copeleco shimilumbo mukulene walepusha Yesu sha beshikwiya bakendi, kayi nebintu mbyalikwiyisha.
JOH 18:20 Yesu walambeti, “Ame ndalikwamba mwakutasoleka ku muntu uliyense. Ndalikwiyisha mumanda akupaililamo kayi ne mu Nga'nda ya Lesa, bantu bonse mobakute kubungana. Ndiya kwambapo bintu mwakusoleka sobwe.
JOH 18:21 Nomba lino mulanjipushilinga cani? Kamwipushani abo balanyumfwa bintu mbyondalikwamba bacishi ncendalikwiyisha.”
JOH 18:22 Mpwalambeco, umo wa bamalonda walikuba wemana popelapo walamuma Yesu nekwambeti, “Ngokumbula aconi mushoboyo shimilumbo mukulene?”
JOH 18:23 Yesu walamukumbuleti, “na ndamba bintu byaipa kobishumbula. Nsombi na ndamba byakubinga nomba ulangumininga cani?”
JOH 18:24 Lino Anasi walamutuma Yesu kaliwasungwa kuli Kayafa shimilumbo mukulene.
JOH 18:25 Simoni Petulo mpwalikuba wemana nkaciyota mulilo, nabambi balamwipusheti, “Sena obe ntobe umo wabeshikwiya ba muntusa?” Petulo walakaneti, “Sobwe ntame.”
JOH 18:26 Musebenshi naumbi wa mukulene wabeshimilumbo bonse, mwanse muntusa Petulo ngwalakwempula litwi, walamwipusheti, “Sena ndiya kukubonapo mulibala musa nkoli nendi?”
JOH 18:27 Petulo walakana kayi, pacindi copeleco kombwe walalila.
JOH 18:28 Mumene mene bamakulene baBayuda balamumanta Yesu kufuma kuli Kayafa nekuya nendi kunga'nda ya mwendeleshi wa Loma. Bantu bangi balashala pansa, kutina kwambeti ningababa babulakuswepa, kayi nkabela kusuminishiwa kulyako Pasika.
JOH 18:29 Neco Pilato walapulapansa nekubepusheti, “Mulamucana nemulandu cini muntuyu?”
JOH 18:30 Nabo balambeti, “Nalabula kwinsa byaipa muntuyo netuliya kumuleta kuli njamwe sobwe.”
JOH 18:31 Neco Pilato walabambileti, “Mumanteni mwenga mumomboloshe kwelana ne milawo yenu.” Nsombi Bayuda basa balambeti, “Afwe nkatwasuminishiwa kushina muntu sobwe.”
JOH 18:32 Ibi byalenshika kwambeti maswi Yesu ngalamba sha lufu lwakendi akwanilishiwe.
JOH 18:33 Pilato walengila munga'nda yakendi kayi, nekukuwa Yesu. Walamwipusheti, “Sena obe, njobe Mwami wa Bayuda?”
JOH 18:34 Yesu walambeti, “Sena kwamba kulico nikwenu mobene, nambi pali bantu balamwambilapo sha njame?”
JOH 18:35 Pilato walambeti, “Sena ulayeyengeti njame Muyuda? Nibantu bakobe kayi ne beshimilumbo bamakulene endibo balakulete kulinjame, nomba walensa cani?”
JOH 18:36 Yesu walakumbuleti, “Bwami bwakame ntebo bwapacishi capanshi sobwe. Bwami bwakame nebwanga bwapacishi capanshi pano batuloba bakame nebalandwaninini nkondo kwambeti babule kuntwala kuli bamakulene baBayuda. Nsombi bwami bwakame ntebo bwa pacishi capanshi sobwe.”
JOH 18:37 Pilato walambeti, “Lino ekwambeti njobe Mwami ntendimo?” Yesu walambeti, “Mulalyambili mobene kwambeti njame Mwami. Ame ndalesa pacishi capanshi pano kayi ndalasemwa nekwisa mucishi kusakwamba cancine ncine. Uliyense usuni cancine ncine ukute kunyumfwa maswi akame.”
JOH 18:38 Pilato walamwipusha Yesu, “Anu cancine ncine nicani?” Pilato mpwalamba maswi awa, walapula kunsa kwalikuba Bayuda, nekubambileti, “Ame ndiya kumucanapo ne mulandu uli wonse muntuyu.
JOH 18:39 Nsombi kukonka cinga cenu, pacindi ca kusekelela Pasika nkute kumusungulwila muntu umo. Sena mulayandanga kwambeti ndimusungwilile Mwami waBayuda uyu?”
JOH 18:40 Popelapo nabo balolobesha nekwambeti, “Uyo sobwe nsombi Balaba.” Balaba walikuba cigabenga.
JOH 19:1 Popelapo Pilato walamumanta Yesu ne kumukwipisha.
JOH 19:2 Lino bashilikali balabamba mushini wa myunga nekumufwalika kumutwi. Kayi balamufwalika mwinjila wamushobo wabulemu ufubeluka,
JOH 19:3 balikabesa kulyendiye nkabambeti, “Mitende, mobami ba Bayuda!” Pacindici balatatika kumuma.
JOH 19:4 Pilato walapula pansa kayi nekubambila Bayuda, “Kamubonani ndamulete kuli njamwe, neco mwinshibe kwambeti ndiya kumucanapo ne mulandu uli wonse.”
JOH 19:5 Popelapo Yesu walapula nkali afwala mushini wa myunga kumutwi ne cakufwala cifubeluka cisa, Pilato walambeti, “Uyu muntusa.”
JOH 19:6 Bamakulene beshimilumbo nebamalonda ba mu Nga'nda ya Lesa basa mpobalabona Yesu, balolobesheti, “Mupopeni! Mupopeni!” Pilato walambeti, “Mumanteni mwenka mwenga mumupope pakwinga ame ndiya kumucanapo nemulandu.”
JOH 19:7 Bantu balambeti, “Afwe tukute mulawo, nomba twakonka mulawo wetu uyu welela kufwa, pakwinga walikwambeti, ‘Njame Mwana wa Lesa.’ ”
JOH 19:8 Lino Pilato mpalanyumfwa maswi awa, walanyumfwa buyowa kwine.
JOH 19:9 Nomba walengila kayi munga'nda nekwipusha Yesu, “Nomba obe kwenu nikupeyo?” Nsombi Yesu nkalakumbula sobwe.
JOH 19:10 Kayi Pilato walamwipusheti, “Nicani nkolankumbulunga? Sena nkocinsheti nkute ngofu sha kukusungulula nekukupopa?”
JOH 19:11 Yesu walambeti, “Lesa, abula kumupa ngofu nemuliya kwinsapo ciliconse palinjame. Weco uyo wanjaba kuli njamwe ukute bwipishi bunene.”
JOH 19:12 Mpwalanyumfwa maswi awa, Pilato walayandishisha kwambeti amusungulule Yesu. Nsombi Bayuda balolobesha, mwamusungulula muntuyu ekwambeti nkamwekatana ne mwami wa kuLoma. Uliyense lalyambanga kuba mwami, ekwambeti nimulwani wamwami wa ku Loma.
JOH 19:13 Pilato mpwalanyumfweco, walamupulisha Yesu, nekwikala pacipuna cakomboloshelapo milandu, pabusena bwalikukwiweti, “Lubansa lwa mabwe.” Mu cihebeli ukute kukwiweti, Gabata.
JOH 19:14 Nomba bwalikuba busuba bwakulibambila sha Pasika, kayi cindi calikuba muma 12 koloko munshi. Pilato walambila Bayuda, “Uyu Mwami wenu.”
JOH 19:15 Nomba nabo balolobesha nekwambeti, “Mushineni! Mushineni! Kapopwani!” Pilato walabepusheti, “Sena mpope Mwami wenu?” Bamakulene beshimilumbo balakumbuleti, “Tuliyawa Mwami naumbi sobwe, nsombi Mwami wa ku Loma enka.”
JOH 19:16 Popelapo Pilato walamutwala Yesu kulyendibo kwambeti bamupope.kufumapo Yesu walaba mumakasa abo.
JOH 19:17 Bashilikali balamumantisha Yesu lusanda lwakendi, balapula nendi mulubansa nekuya kumusena walikukwiweti. “Cifupa ca mutwi” Mu Cihebeli bakute kwambeti “Gologota.”
JOH 19:18 Kopeloko balamupopa palusanda. Kayi balapopa bantu bambi babili, umbi kulikasa lyalulyo naumbi kulikasa lya kucipiko, Yesu nendi walikuba pakati.
JOH 19:19 Pilato walalemba cishibisho pelu palusanda. Walalembeti, “Yesu wa kuNasaleti, Mwami wa Bayuda.”
JOH 19:20 Mpwalapopela Yesu palikuba pepi neku Yelusalemu. Neco Bayuda bangi balikababelengapo. Cishibisho ici calikuba calembwa mumishobo itatu, Cihebeli ne Cilatini kayi ne Cigiliki.
JOH 19:21 Bamakulene ba beshimilumbo ba Bayuda balambila Pilato, “Kamutalembeti, Mwami wa Bayuda sobwe. Nsombi mwine ewalikulyambeti eMwami wa Bayuda.”
JOH 19:22 Nomba Pilato walambeti, “Mbyondalembe, nibibe copeleco mbuli ncondalembe.”
JOH 19:23 Bashilikali basa mpwobalapopa Yesu, balamanta bayakufwala byakendi nekutwamunamo tumpansha tuna, mushilikali uliyense walamanta kampansha kakendi. Balamanta kayi nemwinjila wakendi uyo walikuba watungwa necikwisa cimo kayi nkawalikuba ne lupeto.
JOH 19:24 Lino bashilikali abo balambilaneti, “Katutautwamuna sobwe, nsombi twinse nsolo kwambeti twinshibe na nibani eshi aumante.” Byalenshika mushoboyo kwambeti bikwanishiwe balambwa mumabala, “Balayabana byakufwala byakame, kayi mwinjila wakame balawinshila nsolo.” Weco ncobalensa bashilikali basa.
JOH 19:25 Nomba pepi ne lusanda palemana banyina, ne mukwabo banyina, kayi palikuba Maliya mukashendi klopa ne Mariya wa ku magadalena.
JOH 19:26 Lino Yesu mpalabona banyina ne shikwiya usa ngwalikusuna nkabalibemana pepi, walambila banyina eti, “Ma mwanenu uno.”
JOH 19:27 Walambila kayi shikwiya usa eti, “Banyoko aba.” Lino kufumina popelapo shikwiya usa walabamanta batukashi abo ne kutatika kubasunga cena kwakendi.
JOH 19:28 Yesu walenshiba kwambeti lino byonse bilakwanilishiwa. Lino kwambeti bikwanilishiwe byonse byalambwa mumabala, nendi walambeti “Nkute inyotwa.”
JOH 19:29 Popelapo palikuba nsupa yesula waini wasasa. Bashilikali basa balasabika cisambo mu waini wasasa usa, nekucisomeka kukatondo ka hisopi nekukashikisha pamulomo pakendi.
JOH 19:30 Yesu mpalasupita waini wasasa walambeti, “Byonse bilakwanilishiwa.” Lino walakotama mutwi nekufwa.
JOH 19:31 Bwalikuba busuba bwakulibambila sha Pasika. Bamakulene ba Bayuda nkabali kwandeti bitumbi ibyo bibe pa lusanda pa busuba bwa Sabata, pakwinga busuba bwa Sabata ubo bwalikuba bunene. Weco balamusenga Pilato kwambeti batyokole myendo ya bantu basa balikuba bapopwa nekubafunya.
JOH 19:32 Lino bashilikali balesa, nekutyokola umo pa babili basa balapopwa pamo ne Yesu. Balensa copeleco ne kumunendi usa.
JOH 19:33 Nsombi mpobalashika pali Yesu, pakubona kwambeti lafu kendi, neco baliya kutyokola myendo yakendi.
JOH 19:34 Nsombi umo wa bashilikali basa walamuyasa mumbafu ne lifumo, nomba mwalafuma milopa ne menshi.
JOH 19:35 Uyo walabona bintu ibi endiye labinshilinga bukamboni, kwambeti ne njamwe mushome. Bukamboni bwakendi nibwancine ncine, kayi mwine ucinshi kwambeti mbyalambanga nibyakubinga.
JOH 19:36 Ibi byalenshika kwambeti byalambwa mumabala bikwanilishiwe, mabala akwambeti, “Nteshi bakatyokole lifupa lyakendi nambi limo.”
JOH 19:37 Kayi kuli mabala nambi alambangeti, “Bantu nibakamwebele uyo ngobalayasa.”
JOH 19:38 Panyuma pakendi Yosefe wa ku Arimatea walasenga Pilato kwambeti amusuminishe kufunya citumbi ca Yesu. Yosefe walikuba weshikwiya wa Yesu, nsombi mwakusolama, pakwinga balikutina bamakulene ba Bayuda. Lino Pilato walamusuminisha, nendi walafunya citumbi ico.
JOH 19:39 Kwalesa kayi nikodemasi, usa walaya kuli Yesu mashiku pakutatika pasa. Nendi walaleta mafuta anunkila a mule asankanishiwa ne aloe, alikuba alema makilogilamu akwana 32.
JOH 19:40 Bantu babili aba balamanta mubili wa Yesu nekupomba mucikwisa caswepa ne mafuta anunkila cena, balakonka mwambo wa Bayuda.
JOH 19:41 Uko Yesu nkwalapopwa kwalikuba libala. Nomba mulibala umo mwalikuba cumbwe calino lino, citana cibikwamo muntu.
JOH 19:42 Lino bwalikuba busuba bwa kulibambila kwa Bayuda kusekelela Pasika, Nomba manda ayo alikuba pepi, balabika Yesu mopelomo.
JOH 20:1 Pabusuba bwa Sondo mumene mene nkapacili pashipa shipa, Mariya wa ku Magadalene walaya ku manda a Yesu. Mpwalashika walabona kwambeti cilibwe cisa cafunywapo kendi pacishinga ca manda.
JOH 20:2 Neco walafwamba kuya akushika kuli Simoni Petulo ne shikwiya umo usa ngwalikusuna Yesu maningi. Walabambila kwambeti, “Balamufunyumo Mwami mumanda kayi nkatucinshi nkobalamubiki.”
JOH 20:3 Popelapo Petulo ne shikwiya naumbi balapula nekuya ku manda.
JOH 20:4 Bonse babili balafwamba, nomba usa shikwiya naumbi walafwamba kupita Petulo, neco ewalatanguna kushika kumanda.
JOH 20:5 Walakotama nekubonowa bikwisa nkabili byafungana, nomba nendi liyawa kwingilamo.
JOH 20:6 Shimoni Petulo mpwalashika walayakwingila mumanda. Nomba walabonowa bikwisa byabungana nkabili popelapo,
JOH 20:7 Kayi kakwisa kasa kalikuba kumutwi kwakendi. Kakwisa aka nkakalikuba pamo ne bikwisa nabimbi bisa, nsombi kalikuba pakonka nkakali kapombwa.
JOH 20:8 Popelapo shikwiya naumbi usa walatatikila kushika ku manda, nendi walengilamo. Nomba mpwalabona bintu ibi, walashoma.
JOH 20:9 Kushikila cindi copeleco nabo basa balinkabatana banyumfwishisha maswi akwambeti Yesu welela kupunduka kubafu.
JOH 20:10 Panyuma pakendi beshikwiya basa balabwela kucomwabo.
JOH 20:11 Nomba Maliya walemana pansa pamanda nkalila, nkacilila mushoboyo, walakotama nekusumbila mumanda,
JOH 20:12 walabona bangelo babili nkabali bafwala mingila ituba. Bangelo abo balikuba bekala panshi,palikuba pona citumbi ca Yesu pasa.
JOH 20:13 Nabo balamwipusheti, “Obe mutukashi, ulalilinga cani?” Nendi walakumbuleti, “Pacebo cakwambeti balamufunyumo Mwami wakame kayi nkandicinshi nkobalamubiki.”
JOH 20:14 Mpwalamba bintu ibi walacebuka nekubona muntu nkali wemana popelapo, nsombi liyawa kumwinshiba kwambeti ni Yesu.
JOH 20:15 Lino Yesu walamwipusheti, “Mutukashi obe ulalilinga cani?” Mariya nendi walikuyeya kwambeti nimusebenshi wamulibala, neco walamwambila kwambeti, “Nkambo, na njamwe mulamufunyumo, kamungambilani nkomulamubiki kwambeti njenga akumumanta.”
JOH 20:16 Yesu walambeti, “Maliya!” Nendi walacebuka nekwambeti, “Laboni!” Uku ekwambeti, “Bashikwiyisha.”
JOH 20:17 Yesu walamwambileti, “Kotanjikata pakwinga nkanta nja kuli Bata. Nsombi koya wambile bakwetu, ubambileti, ndenga kuli Bata, kayi Ebameshenu, kuli Lesa wakame kayi endiye Lesa wenu.”
JOH 20:18 Maliya waku Magadalene walaya akwambila beshikwiya bakendi eti, “Ndamubono Mwami,” Neco walabambila byonse mbyalamwambila Mwami.
JOH 20:19 Mansailo mpokwalashipa pabusuba bwa Sondo, Beshikwiya basa balikuba pamo. Bishinga byalikuba byacalwa, pakwinga balikutina bamakulene ba Bayuda. Lino Yesu walesa akwimana pakati pabo nekwambeti “Lumuno lube nenjamwe!”
JOH 20:20 Mpwalambeco walababonesha makasa akendi ne kumbafu nkwalayaswa, neco beshikwiya basa balakondwa mpobalabona Mwami.
JOH 20:21 Kayi Yesu walambeti, “Lumuno lube nenu.” Mbuli Bata balantuma, nenjame ndamutumunga.
JOH 20:22 Panyuma pakendi walabambila kayi walayoyela, “kamutambulani Mushimu Uswepa.
JOH 20:23 Bantu abo mboshi mukalekelele bwipishi bwabo nibakalekelelwe cakubinga, nomba abo mboshi mukabule kulekelela nteshi bakalekelelwe sobwe.”
JOH 20:24 Umo wa basa beshikwiya balilikumi ne babili, Tomasi walikukwiweti mpundu, nkalikuba pamo ne beshikwiya banendi pacindi Yesu mpwalesa.
JOH 20:25 Lino beshikwiya banendi basa balamwambila eti, “Afwe tulamubono Mwami.” Nsombi Tomasi walambeti, “Ndabula kubona bilonda bya misupikili, nambi kutyonka cimbombo cakame kumbafu nkwalayaswa nkandela kushoma sobwe.”
JOH 20:26 Mpopalapita masuba asanu ne atatu, beshikwiya basa balikuba munga'nda mopelomo ne Tomasi walikuba nabo. Bishinga byalikuba byacalwa, nsombi Yesu walesa, walemana pakati pabo nekwambeti, “Lumuno lube nenu!”
JOH 20:27 Mpwalambeco, walambila Tomasi eti, “Tyonka cimbombo cakobe mumbafu mwakame, kayi bona makasa akame. Kobika cimbombo cakobe apa. Cileke kutonshanya kayi ushome.”
JOH 20:28 Tomasi walambeti, “Mwami wakame! Lesa wakame!”
JOH 20:29 Yesu walambeti, “Sena ulashomo pacebo cakwambeti ulambono? bakute colwe balashomonga ncebatana babona.”
JOH 20:30 Yesu walensa bingashilo nabimbi bingi byeshikukankamanisha pamenso abeshikwiya bakendi, ibyo byabula kulembwa mulibuku ili.
JOH 20:31 Nsombi ibi bilalembwe kwambeti mushometi Yesu eMupulushi Walaiwa usa, Mwanendi Lesa, kwambeti mwashoma mube ne buyumi butapu mulina lyakendi.
JOH 21:1 Panyuma pakendi Yesu walalilesha kayi kuli beshikwiya bakendi kumulonga wa Tibeliyo.
JOH 21:2 Shimoni Petro, Tomasi ne Nataniele wa kumunshi waku Kana mucishi ca Galileya, bana basa ba Sebediya, kayi ne beshikwiya nabambi babili, balikuba pamo.
JOH 21:3 Shimoni Petulo walabambileti, “Ame ndenga akwikata inswi.” Nabo balambeti, “Nenjafwe tulenga nenjobe.” Balanyamuka nekuya akwingila mubwato. Nomba mashiku baliya kwikatapo inswi.
JOH 21:4 Mpobwalaca Yesu walemana pa mutunta. Nsombi beshikwiya basa nkabalenshibeti ni Yesu.
JOH 21:5 Lino nendi walabepusha eti, “Sena muliya kwikatapo inswi?” Nabo balambeti, “Sobwe, tulabwelekowa.”
JOH 21:6 Yesu walabambileti, “Walani kombe kulubasu lwakululyo kwa bwato, nimwikate.” Naboyo balawala kombe, nomba balalilwa kukwela kombe pakwinga kalekata inswi shingi.
JOH 21:7 Popelapo shikwiya usa Yesu ngwalikusuna maningi walambila Petulo eti, “Ni Mwami!” Shimoni Petulo mpwalanyumfwa kwambeti ni mwami, walafwala mwinjila wakendi (pakwinga walikuba laufululu mwinjila) Nomba walaliwala mu lwenje.
JOH 21:8 Lino beshikwiya nabambi basa balesa ne bwato kumutunta, nkabadonsa kombe kesula ne nswi shingi. Nkalikuba kutali ne mutunta, nsombi walikuba pepi ne ntamwa shakwana makumi asanu ne ana.
JOH 21:9 Mpobalashika kumutunta balabona mulilo wa malasha kapali inswi ne shinkwa.
JOH 21:10 Yesu walabambileti, “kamuletani inswi shing'ana pali isho nshomulekata.”
JOH 21:11 Lino Shimoni Petulo walengila mubwato musa nekukwelela kombe kumutunta, kalikuba kekata inswi shakwana mwanda ne makumi asanu ne shitatu. Nambi inswi shalafula mushobo uyu, kombe nkakalatwamuka sobwe.
JOH 21:12 Yesu walabambileti, “Kamwisani mulye.” Nomba pa beshikwiya basa nkapalikuba nambi umo walaliyuminisha kumwipusheti, “Njobe bani?” Pakwinga balenshibeti ni Mwami.
JOH 21:13 Yesu walaya akumanta buledi ne kubapa. Walensa copeleco ne nswi shisa.
JOH 21:14 Pacindi ici alakwana mankanda atatu akubonekela kuli beshikwiya bakendi kufuma mpalapunduka kubafu.
JOH 21:15 Mpobalapwisha kulya, Yesu walepusha Simoni Petulo eti, “Obe Shimoni mwanendi Yohane, sena unsuni kupita bonse aba?” Nendi walambeti, “Cakubinga Mwami, mucinshi kwambeti ndimusuni.” Yesu walamwambileti, “Sunga mbelele shakame.”
JOH 21:16 Yesu walamwipusha kayi katubili eti, “Obe Shimoni mwanendi Yohane, sena unsuni?” Nendi walambeti, “Cakubinga Mwami mucinsheti ndimusuni.” Yesu walamwambileti, “Sunga mbelele shakame.”
JOH 21:17 Yesu walamwipusha kayi kabutatu eti, “Obe Simoni mwanendi Yohane, sena unsuni?” Nendi walambeti, “Cakubinga Mwami mucinsheti ndimusuni.” Yesu walamwambileti, “Sunga mbelele shakame.”
JOH 21:18 “Ndakwambilinga cakubinga, pacindi mpowalikuba mutuloba, walikulisunga wenka beloti nekuya kulikonse nkowalikwanda. Nomba wakacembela, nukatandabule makasa akobe kwambeti umbi akusunge beloti nekuya nenjobe nkotasuni.”
JOH 21:19 (Yesu walamba bintu ibi kwambeti abenshibishe moshi akafwile Petulo kwambeti Lesa akalemekwe. Mpalambeco, walambila Petulo eti, “Nkonke.”)
JOH 21:20 Petulo walacebuka nekubonowa shikwiya usa Yesu ngwalikwanda maningi nkamukonkela munyuma. Endiye shikwiya usa walikuba watamina pantiti pa Yesu Pacindi cakusekelela pasa nekumwipusheti, “Mwami weshi akamuyabe kubalwani benu nibani?”
JOH 21:21 Popelapo Petulo walamubona nekumwipusheti, “Mwami, nomba uyu cilyeconi?”
JOH 21:22 Yesu walamwambileti, “Na ndandanga kwambeti nendi abe ne buyumi kushikila mpaka nkabwele, sena kuli obe ngaciba cani? Obe nkonke.”
JOH 21:23 Lino lulumbi lwalanyumfwika pakati pa beshikwiya bonse kwambeti usa munabo nteshi akafwe sobwe, nsombi walambeti, “Na ndandanga kwambeti nendi akabe ne buyumi mpaka nkabwele, sena kuli obe ngaciba cani?”
JOH 21:24 Uyu eweshikwiya usa walensa bukamboni bwa bintu byalenshika ibyo, kayi endiye walabilemba. Tucinshi kwambeti bukamboni bwakendi nibwakubinga.
JOH 21:25 Nomba kuli bintu nabimbi bingi Yesu mbyalensa. Nebyalalembwa byonse ibyo ndashoma kwambeti pacishi conse capanshi nepalakabulu mabuku akulembamo byonse ibyo.
ACT 1:1 Kuli wasunika Teofilo; Mulibuku lya kutanguna ndalalembamo bintu byonse Yesu mbyalikwinsa ne kwiyisha
ACT 1:2 kushikila pabusuba mbwalamantwa kuya kwilu. Katana amantwa kwilu, kupitila mu ngofu sha Mushimu Uswepa, walabambila batumwa mbwalasala ncobela kwinsa.
ACT 1:3 Panyuma pa kufwa ne kupunduka kubafu, Yesu walabonekela ku batumwa bakendi tunkanda twingi, munshila shingi shapusana pusana kushomesha kwambeti nimuyumi, walabonekela kulyendibo kwa masuba makumi ana. kayi walabambila sha Bwami bwa Lesa.
ACT 1:4 Kacilinabo, Yesu walabambileti, “Kamutafuma mu Yelusalemu nanshi, mupembelele Mushimu Uswepa ngobalalaya Bata, mbuli ncondalamwambila.
ACT 1:5 Yohane walikubatisha ne menshi, nomba papita masuba ang'anowa, nimubatishiwe ne Mushimu Uswepa.”
ACT 1:6 Batumwa mpobalabungana pamo ne Yesu, balamwipusheti, “Nkambo, sena ecino cindi nceti mubweshele Bwami ku Baislayeli?”
ACT 1:7 Yesu walabakumbuleti, “Nkacayandiketi amwe mwinshibe cindi nceti bikenshikenga bintu bili mungofu sha Bata.
ACT 1:8 Nomba Mushimu Uswepa wakesa pali njamwe nimukatambule ngofu. Kayi nimukabe bakamboni bakame ku Yelusalemu ne ku Yudeya konse kayi ne ku Samaliya, mpaka kushika kwakuma cishi capanshi.”
ACT 1:9 Yesu mpwalapwisha kwambeco walamantwa kwilu batumwa kabebelela, kushikila likumbi mpolyabashinkilila, balacileka kumubona.
ACT 1:10 Batumwa basa kabacili balangishisha kwilu, mwakutengashila, batuloba babili bafwala byakufwala bituba, balemana pambali pabo,
ACT 1:11 ne kubepusheti, “Amwe batuloba ba ku Galileya mwemanina cani pano kamuli mwalangishishowa mwilu? Yesu opele uyu lamantwa kufuma pakati penu kuya kwilu, nakese kayi ndendende mbuli momula mubonene kaya Kwilu.”
ACT 1:12 Lino basa batumwa balabwelela ku Yelusalemu kufuma ku mulundu wa ma Olifi. Palikubowa mushinso ufupi wabula kukwana ntamwa myanda likumi, kufuma ku Yelusalemu.
ACT 1:13 Mpobalengila mu Yelusalemu, balatanta mucipinda capelu mung'anda mobali kukumana. Abo balayako balikuba; Petulo ne Yohane ne Jemusi ne Ndileya ne Filipo ne Tomasi ne Batolomeyo ne Mateyo ne Jemusi Mwanendi Alufeyo ne Shimoni wa mucipani ca bantu balikulwanina lwanguluko mu cishi ca Islayeli, kayi ne Yudasi mwanendi Jemusi.
ACT 1:14 Bonse balikuba balimbikila kupaila ne moyo umo, kayi palikuba Maliya banyina Yesu ne bakwabo Yesu, pamo ne batukashi nabambi.
ACT 1:15 Mpopalapita masuba ang'ana, bashoma muli Yesu bali mwanda umo ne makumi abili, balabungana pamo, Petulo walemana pakati pabo ne kwambeti,
ACT 1:16 “Mobanse bame, calikuba celela kukwanilishiwa calalembwa mu Mabala a Lesa sha Yudasi. Mushimu Uswepa kupitila muli Dafeti, walamba sha endiye uyo walatangunina bantu kuya kwikata Yesu.
ACT 1:17 Yudasi wanga wamulikoto lyetu, wakutenga ncito njasebensanga pamo ne njafwe.”
ACT 1:18 Mali asa ngalacana pakwinsa bwipishi bulico walaula libala, mulibala umo emwalalisungilila. Walalaka panshi cakushapo libunda, walapasuka libunda ne mila yakendi yalapula panshi mbwee.
ACT 1:19 Bonse bantu balikwikala mu Yelusalemu balanyumfwa. Kwelana ne mulaka wabo, libala ilyo balalikuweti, “Akeledama.” Akeledama ekwambeti, “Libala lya milopa.”
ACT 1:20 Petulo walapitilisha kwambeti, “Pakwinga mulibuku lya Kutembaula muli maswi alambangeti, “Ng'anda yakendi isanduke matongo, Kapataba muntu shikwikalamo!” Muli kayi maswi alambangeti, “Naumbi amante musena wancito yakendi!
ACT 1:21 “Pacebo ico, twelela kusalapo umo pa bantu abo mbotwalikuba nabo, pacindi Mwami Yesu mpwalikuba pakati petu
ACT 1:22 kufumina pacindi Yohane mpwalikubatisha bantu, mpaka busuba Yesu mbwalamantwa kufuma pakati petu ne kuya kwilu. Umo wa bantu aba abe kamboni pamo ne njafwe, pa shakupunduka kubafu kwa Yesu.”
ACT 1:23 Neco balasalapo batuloba babili Yosefe Balasaba, lina lyakendi nalimbi ni Yusito, kayi ne Matiya.
ACT 1:24 Neco,balapaileti, “Nkambo Lesa, njamwe mwishi myoyo ya bantu bonse, kamutuleshani uyo ngomulasalapo pa batuloba babili aba,
ACT 1:25 kwambeti amante ncito iyi ya butumwa, njalashiya Yudasi, uyo walafwa ne kuya kumusena wamwelela.”
ACT 1:26 Panyuma pakendi balabauma nsolo pa batuloba babili aba. Nsolo yalawila Matiya, neco walaba palikoto lya batumwa likumi ne umo.
ACT 2:1 Lino mpobwalashika busuba bwa Pentekosite, beshikwiya bonse balabungana pamo mung'anda.
ACT 2:2 Popelapo kwilu kwalanyufwika mukokomo ulyeti walukupwe lwangofu ne kwisa kwisula mung'anda njobalikubamo.
ACT 2:3 Balabona nsakamwenge shamulilo, shalikuboneketi ndemi kashipansana ne kwisa kwikala pali umo ne umo.
ACT 2:4 Bonse balesulilwa ne Mushimu Uswepa ne kutatika kwamba mumilaka yapusana pusana, Mushimu ewalikubambisheco.
ACT 2:5 Lino mu Yelusalemu mwalikuba Bayuda nabambi balikusuna Lesa, balafumina mubishi byonse bya pacishi capanshi.
ACT 2:6 Mpobalanyumfwa usa mukokomo, bantu bangi balabungana pamo. Bonse balapwilwa mano pakwinga umo ne umo walabanyumfwa bashoma basa kabamba mumulaka wakendi mwine.
ACT 2:7 Balakankamana kwine ne kwambeti, “Sena aba bonse balambanga ntebo ba ku Galileya?
ACT 2:8 Inga cilabeconi kwambeti uliyense pakati petu lanyumfunga kabamba mulaka wakendi mwine?
ACT 2:9 Tobambi twafuma ku Apati ne ku Midiya ne ku Elamu ne ku Mesopotamiya ne ku Yudeya ne ku Kapadokiya ne ku Ponto ne ku Asiya,
ACT 2:10 ne ku Filigiya ne ku Pamfiliya ne ku Injipito ne kubimpansha bya Libya pepi ne ku Kulene. Tobambi tobensu tulafumini ku Loma.
ACT 2:11 Nabambi ni Bayuda ne bantu nabambi basumina ciyisho ca Ciyuda. Tobambi toba ku Kelete ne baku Alabu. Nomba twense tulabanyumfunga kabamba mumilaka yetu ncito sha ngofu sha Lesa!”
ACT 2:12 Bonse balakankamana ne kupwilwa mano, balatatika kwipushana umo ne munendi, “Inga nicani ici?”
ACT 2:13 Nomba nabambi balatatikowa kuseka ne kwambeti, “Balakolewa waini.”
ACT 2:14 Petulo walemana pamo ne batumwa banendi likumi ne umo, ne kwamba maswi akubilikisha, “Amwe Bayuda, pamo ne njamwe mwekala mu Yelusalemu muno, kamukutikani kayi munyumfwishishe maswi akame.
ACT 2:15 Aba bantu nkabakolewa waini mbuli ncomulabayeyelenga, cino cindi cicili muma 9 koloko mumenemene.
ACT 2:16 Ici encalamba mushinshimi Yoweli, kwambeti,
ACT 2:17 “Lesa lambangeti, Mu masuba akupwililisha ninketile Mushimu wakame mubantu bonse, bana benu batuloba ne batukashi, Nibakakambaukenga shanjame. Misepela nibakabonenga bintu byakame mucimbonimboni, Bamacekulu nibakalotenga maloto.
ACT 2:18 Cakubinga mumasuba opelawo ninketile Mushimu wakame mubasha bakame batuloba ne batukashi, Nibakakambaukenga shanjame.
ACT 2:19 Ninkense bikankamanisha mwilu, pano pacishi capanshi nipakabe bingashilo ibi, milopa, mulilo ne bwishi bwatikama.
ACT 2:20 Lisuba nilikashipe mbii mbuli mushinshe ne mwenshi nukafubele pyuu, mbuli milopa, kabutana bushika busuba bunene buyosha bwakame Ndekali Mwami.
ACT 2:21 Popelapo uliyenseti akakuwe Mwami kwambeti amunyamfwe nakapuluke.”
ACT 2:22 Petulo walapitilisha kwambeti, “Amwe Baislayeli, kamunyumfwani maswi awa, alambanga sha Yesu waku Nazaleti. Lesa walashomesha kwambeti walamutuma kuli njamwe pakwinsa bishomesho byangofu ne bishikukankamanisha, kayi ne bingashilo. Mucinshico, pakwinga byalenshika pakati penu.
ACT 2:23 Lesa walikuba wabibambilalimo kwambeti, Yesu nakayabwe kuli njamwe ne kumushina pakumutwala mumakasa abantu baipa abo balamupopa palusanda.
ACT 2:24 Nomba Lesa walamusungulula kubishikubaba bya lufu ne kumupundusha kubafu, pakwinga calikuba capatali kwambeti lufu lumukome.”
ACT 2:25 Dafeti pakwamba sha endiye walambeti, “Ndalikubona Mwami Lesa pamenso pakame cindi conse, Pakwinga uli kucikasa cakame calulyo kwambeti kantatenkana.
ACT 2:26 Ecebo cakendi moyo wakame walakondwa, kayi ndalikwamba mwakusangalala. Cakubinga nawo mubili wakame nukapumwine mukupembelela,
ACT 2:27 Pakwinga nteti mukanshiye mumanda, nambi kulekelesha musebenshi wenu washomeka kubola,
ACT 2:28 Mulandeshe nshila sha kubuyumi, kayi kuba ne njamwe nikukankondweleshe kwine.”
ACT 2:29 Kayi Petulo walapitilisha kwamba, “Mobanse bame ndamwambilishingeti, ‘cikokwe wetu Dafeti walafwa, ne manda ngwalabikwamo mpwacili pano nelelo.’
ACT 2:30 Kacili muyumi, walikuba mushinshimi, kayi walikwinshiba Lesa ncalamulaya pakulumbileti, umo wabashikululwa bakendi nakabe Mwami mbuli Dafeti.”
ACT 2:31 Anu Dafeti walabonenalimo sha kupunduka kubafu kwa Klistu kwambeti “Nteti nkamushiye mu manda, kayi ne mubili wakendi uliya kubolapo sobwe!”
ACT 2:32 Twense pano tobakamboni bamakani awa, akwambeti Lesa walapundusha Yesuyu kubafu.
ACT 2:33 Walasumpulwa ne kuya kwikala kucikasa ca kululyo ca Lesa ne kutambula Mushimu Uswepa, uwo Lesa Baishi ngobalamulaya. Ibi mbyomulabononga ne kunyumfwa ecipo ncalatutumini.
ACT 2:34 Dafeti uliya kuya kwilu sobwe, nsombi nendi ewalambeti, “Mwami Lesa, walambila Mwami wakame kwambeti, Ikala kucikasa cakame cakululyo,
ACT 2:35 mpaka nkasandule balwani bakobe bakabe cakulyatapo myendo yakobe.”
ACT 2:36 Kayi Petulo walapitilisha kwambeti, “Bonse Baislayeli mwinshibe lino kwambeti, Yesu usa ngomwalapopa palusanda, Lesa walamusala kuba Mwami ne Klistu.”
ACT 2:37 Lino basa bantu mpobalanyumfweco, balayaswa kumoyo. Balamwipusha Petulo ne batumwa banendi, “Mobanse bame nicani ncotitwinse afwe?”
ACT 2:38 Petulo walabambileti, “Shiyani bwipishi, umo ne umo abatishiwe mu Lina lya Yesu Klistu. Mwenseco bwipishi bwenu nibulekelelwe, kayi nimutambule Mushimu Uswepa, cipo ca Lesa.
ACT 2:39 Lesa walalailisha amwe, bana benu ne bantu bonse bekala kutali, abo Mwami Lesa wetu mbweshakakuwe.”
ACT 2:40 Petulo walamba maswi angi, ne kubacenjesheti, “Lipulusheni mobene ku cisubulo ceti cise pa bantu baipa aba.”
ACT 2:41 Popelapo bantu balatambula maswi akendi balabatishiwa. Pabusuba bopelobo bantu myanda makumi atatu balaba kulubasu lwa beshikwiya.
ACT 2:42 Bantu abo balikuyandishisha kwiya ku batumwa. Balikubangana pamo lyonse kayi balikulyela pamo shinkwa kayi ne kupaila pamo.
ACT 2:43 Bantu balaba ne buyowa pakubona bishikunkamanisha ne bingashilo bingi Lesa mbyalikwinsa kupitila batumwa.
ACT 2:44 Abo bonse balikuba bashoma muli Yesu balikuba bekatana pamo ne kuyabana bintu byabo.
ACT 2:45 Balikulisha mabala abo ne bintu byabo, kayi ne kuyabanya kuli umo ne umo kwelana ne kubulilwa kwakendi.
ACT 2:46 Busuba ne busuba balikubungana pamo mulubuwa lwa Ng'anda ya Lesa ne moyo umo, kayi balikukuwa banabo kumanda kwabo kuya kulyela pamo. Balikulya cakulya mwakukondwa, ne myoyo yasunguluka,
ACT 2:47 kabatembaula Lesa, kayi bantu bonse balikulesha kwina moyo kulyendibo. Busuba ne busuba, Lesa walikuyungisha cibelengelo ca bantu balikutambula lupulusho.
ACT 3:1 Lino busuba nabumbi Petulo ne Yohane balikuya ku Ng'anda ya Lesa cindi ca 3 koloko mansailo, kuya kupaila.
ACT 3:2 Bantu nabambi balaleta muntu walasemwa kali mulema myendo. Masuba onse balikumubika pa cishinga ca Ng'anda ya Lesa, calikukwiweti “Cishinga Capa,” Kwambeti asengenga bantu balengilinga mu lubuwa lwa Ng'anda ya Lesa.
ACT 3:3 Uyu muntu mpwalabona Petulo ne Yohane kabengila mu lubuwa lwa Ng'anda ya Lesa, walabasengeti, “Kamumpako kantu.”
ACT 3:4 Balo balamulangishisha, popelapo Petulo walamwambileti, “Kotulangishisha!”
ACT 3:5 Nendi walabangishisha kayeyeti natambuleko kantu.
ACT 3:6 Nomba Petulo walamwambileti, “Mali ndiyawa, nsombi nindikupe cintu nconkute. Mu Lina lya Yesu Klistu waku Nasaleti, Imana wende!”
ACT 3:7 Walamwikata kucikasa cakululyo, ne kumunyamfwilisha kwimana. Popelapo bimpanta ne tupondopashi twakendi twalayuma yuma.
ACT 3:8 Walaulukila mwilu, walemana nji! ne kutatika kwenda kaculauka culauka, walengila mu lubuwa lwa Ng'anda ya Lesa pamo nendibo kalyendela mwine, katembaula Lesa.
ACT 3:9 Bantu bonse balamubona kenda ne kutembaula Lesa.
ACT 3:10 Balamwinshibeti endiye walikwikala pa Cishinga Capa ca Ng'anda ya Lesa. Ici calenshika ku muntuyu calabakankamanisha ne kubapwisha mano.
ACT 3:11 Bantu bonse, balakankamana kwine, balafwambila kumukushi walikukwiweti, “Mukushi wa Solomoni.” Uko kwalikuba Petulo ne Yohane, balacana usa muntu kali wabekatilila.
ACT 3:12 Petulo mpwalaboneco walamba nabo bantu abo, walambeti, “Amwe Baislayeli mulakankamanangeconi? Mulatulangangeconi cisa eti muntuyu tulamwendeshe ne ngofu shetu tobene? Sena mulayeyengeti afwe njafwe tukute kupaila Lesa kupita amwe?
ACT 3:13 Nteco ico sobwe, Lesa wa Abulahamu, Lesa wa Isake, Lesa Yakobo, kayi Lesa wa bamashali betu, elapa bulemeneno Yesu musebenshi wakendi. Amwe ngomwalatwala mu makasa a bendeleshi ne kumukana pamenso pa Pilato, nendi kayanda kumusungulula.
ACT 3:14 Nsombi mwalakana musebenshi washomeka kayi walulama, mwalasenga Pilato kwambeti, amusungulwile kapondo usa.
ACT 3:15 Mwalashina citente ca buyumi, nsombi Lesa walamupundusha kubafu, kayi afwe tobakamboni pa makani awa.
ACT 3:16 Muntuyu ngomulabononga kayi ngomwinshi, lashomo lina lya Yesu. Lushomo ndwakute muli Yesu, elulayumishi myendo yakendi, kwambeti abe cena, mbuli ncomulamubononga mwense.”
ACT 3:17 Kayi ndicinshi mobanse bame kwambeti, amwe ne batangunishi benu mwalensa ibi mwakubula kwinshiba.
ACT 3:18 Nomba Lesa walambilalimo kubashinshimi bonse kwambeti, Klistu nakapenshewe, neco walacikwanilisha ndendende.
ACT 3:19 Neco shiyani bwipishi, bwelelani kuli Lesa kwambeti afunye bwipishi bwenu,
ACT 3:20 na mwinseco, cindi cakatontoshi keshikufuma pamenso pa Mwami Lesa nikakamushikile, kayi nakamutumine Klistu Yesu uyo Lesa ngwalasalilalimo cebo ca njamwe.
ACT 3:21 Uyo nendi walatambulwa Kwilu mpaka kushika cindi cakubambulula bintu, mbuli Lesa ncalamba kupitila mubashinshimi bakendi bakulukulu bashomeka.
ACT 3:22 Mose walambeti, Lesa Mwami wenu nakapundushepo umo pakati pabanse benu uyo eshakabe mushinshimi ulyeti ame. Mukamunyumfwilenga mbyeti akamwambilenga byonse.
ACT 3:23 Uliyense eshakabule kunyumfwila mushinshimi uyo nibakamufunye pa bantu ba Lesa ne kumononga.
ACT 3:24 Bashinshimi bonse balikwambapo, kutatikila Samiyele, mpaka bashinshimi bonse balabako panyuma pakendi, balikukambauka sha masuba ano.
ACT 3:25 Kushomesha kwa Lesa kupitila mubashinshimi bakendi nikwenu, kayi mukutemo lubasu mu cipangano ncalabamba Lesa ne bamashali benu bakulukulu. Mbuli ncalambila Abulahamu kwambeti, Kupitila mubashukulu bakobe, ninkape colwe mishobo yonse ya pacishi capanshi.
ACT 3:26 Neco Lesa walasala musebenshi wakendi, cakutanguna walamutuma kuli njamwe, kwambeti amupe colwe pakunyamfwilisha uliyense kushiya nshila shakendi shaipa.
ACT 4:1 Petulo kacamba ne basa bantu, kali pamo ne Yohane, kwalesa beshimilumbo nabambi, pamo ne mukulene wa bamalonda baku Ng'anda ya Lesa, ne Basaduki nabambi.
ACT 4:2 Balikuba bakalala pacebo cakwambeti, batumwa babili basa balikwiyisha bantu ne kukambauka sha kupunduka kwa Yesu.
ACT 4:3 Neco balabekata ne kubabika mujele cindi ca mansailo kakuli kulashipuluku, kwambeti bekalemo mpaka lilo mumene.
ACT 4:4 Nikukabeco, bantu bangi balanyumfwa maswi abatumwa basa balashoma. Cibelengelo cabashoma calakwana myanda makumi asanu.
ACT 4:5 Mpobwalaca mumene, batangunishi ba Bayuda ne bamakulene babo ne beshikwiyisha Milawo ya Mose, balabungana mu Yelusalemu.
ACT 4:6 Popelapo palikuba Mukulene wa Beshimilumbo bonse Anasi ne Kayafa ne Yohane ne Alesandulo ne nabambi bamumukowa wa Shimilumbo Mukulene.
ACT 4:7 Balemanika Petulo ne Yohane pakati ne kubepusheti, “Mwacikonshaconi kwinsa cisa, nambi mwensa cisa mungofu shabani?”
ACT 4:8 Petulo, pakwisulilwa ne Mushimu Uswepa, walabakumbuleti, “Amwe batangunishi ba bantu, ne njamwe bamakulene muli pano.
ACT 4:9 Pakwinga mulatwipushunga lelo pa ncito yaina yalenshika pa muntu mulema usa ne kusengulwa kwakendi,
ACT 4:10 lino mwinshibe mwense, ne Baislayeli nabambi, uyu muntu wemana pamenso penu wapola cakupwililila, pacebo cangofu sha lina lya Yesu Klistu waku Nasaleti, usa ngomwalapopa palusanda, Lesa ngwalapundusha kubafu.”
ACT 4:11 Kwamba sha Yesu, Mabala Lesa alambangeti, “Libwe ndyomwalakana mobeshikwibaka ng'anda Lyopelyo lyalaba libwe Lyayandika kupita onse.”
ACT 4:12 Paliya muntu nakaba umo, welela kupulusha bantu, nsombi Yesu enkowa, pakwinga paliya lina nalimbi pacishi capanshi, Lesa ndyalapa muntu naumbi, lyelela kutupulusha.
ACT 4:13 Ba munkuta mpobalabona kubula buyowa kwa Petulo ne Yohane, balakankamana, pakwinga balikuba bantu bulyo, babula lwiyo. Popelapo balenshibeti, balikwenda pamo ne Yesu.
ACT 4:14 Mpobalabona usa muntu walasengulwa kaliwemana pepi ne Petulo ne Yohane, balabula pa kubatotekela.
ACT 4:15 Balabambileti, bapule munkuta. Balo bashala kabalifwiya.
ACT 4:16 Balambeti, “Inga tubensaconi bantu aba? Bantu bonse bekala mu Yelusalemu bacinshi ncobensa bantu aba cikankamanisha ncotwelela kubula kucikana sobwe.
ACT 4:17 Nomba pakutina kwambeti awa makani katayampuwo, katubatinishani kwambeti, kabatambanga sha Yesu babandikanga ne muntu uliyense.”
ACT 4:18 Mpobalalifwiyeco, balabakuwa ne kubambilisheti, kabatashumbulanga, nambi kwiyisha sha Yesu.
ACT 4:19 Nomba Petulo ne Yohane balabakumbuleti, “Kamulyomboloshani mobene, nicipeyo calulama pamenso a Lesa, kunyumfwila amwe? Nambi kunyumfwila Lesa?
ACT 4:20 Mwandi afwe, nkatwelela kucileka kwambapo pabintu mbyotwalabona ne kubinyumfwa.”
ACT 4:21 Nomba bankuta balabatinisha mwangofu, ne kubasungulula. Balacana kwambeti nkabelela kubapa cisubulo, pakwinga bantu bonse balikabatembaula Lesa palico calenshika.
ACT 4:22 Usa muntu walasengulwa munshila yakankamanisha walikuba ne byaka byapita makumi ana.
ACT 4:23 Petulo ne Yohane mpobalasungululwa, balaya kwambila banabo mbyobalambilwa ne beshimilumbo bamakulene ne bamakulene Baciyuda.
ACT 4:24 Bashoma mpobalanyumfweco, balapaila pamo ne moyo umo. Balambeti, “Mwami Lesa, njamwe mwalalenga kwilu, ne cishi capanshi ne lwenje, kayi ne byonse bilimo.”
ACT 4:25 Kupitila mu Mushimu Uswepa mwalamba ku mushali wetu mukulukulu Dafeti, musebenshi wenu uyo walambeti, Niciyani calakalalisha bantu batamwishi Lesa, inga bantu balapanganina cani bintu byabulyo?
ACT 4:26 Bami bapacishi capanshi balalibambila, nabo bendeleshi balabungana pamo kulwana ne Lesa, kayi ne Wasalwa wakendi.
ACT 4:27 “Nicakubinga, Helode ne Ponsho Pilato, balabungana mu munshi muno, pamo ne bantu batamwinshi Lesa, kayi ne Baislayeli, kwambeti balwane ne Yesu musebenshi wenu Washomeka uyo ngomwalasala kuba Mesiya.
ACT 4:28 “Neco, balenseco, amwe ncomwalabamba kendi mungofu shenu, kwelana ne kuyanda kwenu kwambeti celela kwinshika.
ACT 4:29 Neco Mwami, kamubonani ncebalatutinishinga, kamutunyamfwilishako tobasebenshi benu, kwambeti twambenga maswi enu kwakubula buyowa.
ACT 4:30 Tandabulani cikasa cenu kwambeti bantu basengulwe, bingashilo ne bishikukankamanisha, binshike mu lina lya Yesu musebenshi wenu washomeka.”
ACT 4:31 Mpobalapwisha kupaila, ng'anda njobalikuba babunganamo yalatatika kutenkana. Bonse balesulilwa ne Mushimu Uswepa, balatatika kwamba maswi a Lesa kwakubula buyowa.
ACT 4:32 Likoto lya bashoma Lesa balikuba ne moyo umo ne miyeyo imo. Paliya muntu walikuba ne muyeyo wakwambeti, “Ibi mbyonkute nibyakame ndenka.” Bonse balikuyabana bintu mbyobalikukute.
ACT 4:33 Batumwa balikukute bukamboni bwangofu bwa kwambeti Yesu cakubinga walapunduka kubafu. Bonse Lesa walikubaleleka kwine.
ACT 4:34 Nkapalikuba wabulilwa pakati pabo, pakwinga abo balikukute mabala, nambi manda, balikulishapo ne kuleta mali kuli batumwa.
ACT 4:35 Nabo batumwa balikuyaba mali ku muntu uliyense kwelana ne kubulilwa kwakendi.
ACT 4:36 Palikuba muntu walikukwiweti Yosefe, wamucikombo ca Levi, walasemenwa ku Saipulasi, uyo batumwa ngobalatumbika lina eti Banabasi, uku ekwambeti, “Shikuyuminisha.”
ACT 4:37 Nendi walaulisha libala lyakendi, ne kuleta mali kuli batumwa.
ACT 5:1 Lino palikuba muntu naumbi lina lyakendi Hananiya ne Safila mukashendi, nabo balaulisha libala lyabo.
ACT 5:2 Walanyumfwana ne mukashendi, ne kufunyapo mali ngobalaulisha libala, ambi walatwala kuli batumwa.
ACT 5:3 Petulo walamwipusheti, “Hananiya obe, nipacebo cini ulamusuminishi Satana kwingila mumoyo wakobe cakwinseti ulatatiki kubepa Mushimu Uswepa, ne kufunyapo mali ngolaulishi libala lyakobe?
ACT 5:4 Sena libala nkalyanga lyakobe kotana ulyulisha? kayi mpowaulisha libala, sena nkowakutenga mali mumakasa akobe? Nkowayandikanga kwisa cisa? Apa uliya kubepa muntu sobwe, nsombi ulabepe Lesa.”
ACT 5:5 Hananiya mpwalanyumfwa maswi awa, walawa panshi ne kufwa popelapo. Ici calabayosha kwine bantu bonse balanyumfwako calenshika.
ACT 5:6 Batuloba misepela balesa kufungaila citumbico mucikwisa, balacinyamuna ne kuya kubika mu manda.
ACT 5:7 Mpopalapita maola atatu, nendi mukashendi walengila mung'anda katacinshi cilenshiki.
ACT 5:8 Petulo walamwipusheti, “Kong'ambila cena, sena awa emali onka ngomwaulisha libala lyenu? Mutukashuyo walakumbuleti, ‘Ee, wopelowo emulo wakendi.’
ACT 5:9 Kayi Petulo walamwipusheti, ‘Inga wasuminina cani kwambeti mwelekeshe Mushimu wa Mwami? Bantu bangakubika baibenu balipansa pa cishinga apa, nenjobe nibakumante.”
ACT 5:10 Nendi popelapo walawa panshi pamyendo ya Petulo, ne kufwa. Mpobalengila batuloba misepela basa, balacana kali wafwa kendi. Balanyamuna citumbi ne kuya kubika mu manda pepi ne mpobabika baibendi.
ACT 5:11 Mubungano wonse ne bantu bonse nabambi, balanyumfwako balaba ne buyowa.
ACT 5:12 Batumwa balensa bingashilo ne bishikukankamanisha bingi pakati pa bantu. Bonse bashoma Klistu balikubungana pamo mu Mukushi wa Solomoni.
ACT 5:13 Paliya naba umo walikuba kunsa kwalikoto walalibanda kwambeti abunganenga nabo, nsombi ne kukabeco bantu balikubalumbaisha.
ACT 5:14 Bantu bashoma muli Lesa balatatika kufulilako, cakwinseti lyalaba likoto linene lya batuloba ne batukashi.
ACT 5:15 Pacebo ca bintu byalikwinsa batumwa, bantu bangi balatatika kuleta nekoneka balwashi babo pa malili ne pa mpasa munshila, kwambeti Petulo apitanga, mpani cifunsha cakendi ngacibakumyako balwashi.
ACT 5:16 Makoto abantu alesa kufuma muminshi yashinguluka Yelusalemu balikwisa kabali banyamuna balwashi ne bekatwa ne mishimu yaipa, kayi bonse balikusengulwa.
ACT 5:17 Popelapo Mukulene wa Beshimilumbo, ne banendi ba mucipani ca Basaduki mulanyumfwa munyono. Neco balayeya kwinsapo kantu.
ACT 5:18 Balabekata batumwa basa ne kubacalila mujele.
ACT 5:19 Nomba cindi camashiku, mungelo wa Mwami walabicalula bisasa bya jele ne kubapulishamo ne kubambileti,
ACT 5:20 “Kamuyani mwambile bantu bonse mu Ng'anda ya Lesa maswi abuyumi ubu bwalinolino.”
ACT 5:21 Basa batumwa balanyumfwa, balengila mu lubuwa wa Ng'anda ya Lesa mumenemene ne kutatika kwiyisha. Mukulene wa Beshimilumbo mpwalashika ne banendi, walakuwa libungano lya bamakulene Baciyuda. Walatuma bamalonda baku Ng'anda ya Lesa kwambeti benga babamante batumwa basa ku Jele.
ACT 5:22 Nomba mpobalashika kujele, baliya kubacanamo sobwe. Mpobalabwelako balabambileti,
ACT 5:23 “Tulacana bishinga byakujele kabili byacalwa ne kupinkwa cena cena, kayi ne bamalonda kabali bemana ncili pacishinga. Nomba mpotulacalulu bisasa, tuliya kucanamo muntu naba umo sobwe.”
ACT 5:24 Mukulene wa bamalonda baku Ng'anda ya Lesa ne beshimilumbo bamakulene mpobalanyumfwa awa maswi, balapwilwa mano ne kuyeyeti nicani ceticinshike.
ACT 5:25 Muntu naumbi walesa kubambileti, “Kamunyumfwani! Basa bantu mbomwacalila mujele, bali mu Ng'anda ya Lesa baleyishinga bantu.”
ACT 5:26 Popelapo mukulene wa bamalonda, pamo ne bashilikali nabambi, balaya kubamanta batumwa. Nsombi baliya kubakakatisha batumwa, pakwinga balikutina bantu kwambeti ngababapwaya mabwe.
ACT 5:27 Mpobalaleta batumwa basa, balabemanika pamenso pa nkuta inene ya Bayuda, apo Mukulene wa Beshimilumbo mpwalatatika kubepusha.
ACT 5:28 Walambeti, “Mucinshi cena kwambeti, twalamukanisha mwangofu kwambeti, kamutayishanga mulina lya Yesu, nsombi amwe mulamwaya biyisho byenu mu Yelusalemu monse, kayi mulayandanga kutusambila lufu lwa muntuyu?”
ACT 5:29 Nomba Petulo ne batumwa banendi balakumbuleti, “Twelela kunyumfwila Lesa, kupita kunyumfwila bantu.
ACT 5:30 Amwe mwalashina Yesu pakumupopa pa lusanda. Nomba Lesa wa bamashali betu bakulukulu walamupundusha kubafu.
ACT 5:31 walamusumpula epeloyo ne kumubika kucikasa cakendi cakululyo kuba mutangunishi ne Mupulushi. Walenseco kwambeti ape cindi Baislayeli cakusanduka kufuma ku bwipishi bwabo, kwambeti Lesa abalekelele.
ACT 5:32 Njafwe bakamboni ba bintu ibi, ne Mushimu Uswepa uyo Lesa ngwakute kupeti cipo kubantu bakute kumunyumfwila.”
ACT 5:33 Bomboloshi bankuta inene mpobalanyumfweco, balakalala kabayanda kubashina.
ACT 5:34 Nomba Mufalisi naumbi pakati pabo, lina lyakendi, Gamaliyele, shikwiyisha milawo, uyo bantu ngobalikupa bulemu, walemana. Walambeti, “Batumwa bapuleko pansa nanshi.”
ACT 5:35 Apo lino walabambila bomboloshi Bankuta inene kwambeti, “Amwe Baislayeli, cenjelani ne ncomulayandanga kwinshila bantu aba.
ACT 5:36 Na mulanukunga ca linolinowa, kwalikuba muntu naumbi lina lyakendi Teuda walikulisumpula ne kulibandeti ni muntu walemekwa, bantu bali myanda ina balamukonkela, nsombi balamushina, bantu bonse balikumukonkela balamwaika ne kupwilalimo.
ACT 5:37 Kayi pacindi ncobalikubelenga bantu, palesa naumbi lina lyakendi Yudasi waku Galileya, nendi walayungaula bantu, bangi balamukonkela. Neye balamushina, bantu bonse balikumukonkela balamwaika.
ACT 5:38 Neco pankaniyi, ndamwambilishingeti, balekeni bantu aba, balekeni benga. Na ncobalayeyenga ne ncobalenshinga, bilafumunga kubantu nicikamwaike.
ACT 5:39 Nomba na bilafumunga kuli Lesa, nteti mucikonshe kubakoma sobwe. Ngamucaniketi mulalwanangowa ne Lesa.” Bonse balakonkela maswi ngalamba Gamaliyele.
ACT 5:40 Balabakuwa batumwa ne kubengisha mukati, ne kwambeti babakwapule bikoti, ne kubambileti, “Kamutakabweshapo kwambila bantu mu lina lya Yesu.” Popelapo balabaleka.
ACT 5:41 Batumwa mpobalapula pansa, balikuba bakondwa kwambeti Lesa lababoneti belela kupenshewa cipansoni pacebo ca Yesu.
ACT 5:42 Busuba ne busuba batumwa balapitilisha kwiyisha ne kukambauka Mulumbe Waina mulubuwa lwa Ng'anda ya Lesa, kayi ne mu manda abantu kwambeti Yesu e Wasalwa wa Lesa.
ACT 6:1 Mu masubawo, beshikwiya balikabaya kufulilako. Bayuda balikwamba Cigiliki balikutongokela Bayuda banabo balikwamba Cihebeli, busuba ne busuba nkabalikuyaba cena mali, ne bipo nabimbi kubamukalubingi babo.
ACT 6:2 Batumwa likumi ne babili, balabunganya beshikwiya bonse pamo, ne kubambileti, “Nkacaina kwambeti afwe tushiyenga kukambauka maswi a Lesa, tutatike kusamalila bamukalubingi.
ACT 6:3 Mobanse, musalepo pakati penu, batuloba basanu ne babili, babwikalo bwaina, besulilwa ne Mushimu Uswepa, bakute mano, mbotitupe incito iyi.
ACT 6:4 Afwe nitulibenge kukupaila, ne kukambauka maswi a Lesa.”
ACT 6:5 Bonse balakondwa kunyumfwa maswi alico. Neco balasala; Stefano, muntu wa lushomo, wesulilwa ne Mushimu Uswepa. Filipo ne Pulokolasi ne Nikana ne Timoni. Pamenasi ne Nikolasi waku Antiyokeya, uyo kendi walikukonka kwiyisha kwa Ciyuda.
ACT 6:6 Kufumapo balabemanika pamenso pabatumwa, nabo batumwa balapaila ne kubika makasa pa batuloba basa.
ACT 6:7 Maswi a Lesa alamwaikila kulikonse, nabo beshikwiya balatatika kufulilako mu Yelusalemu. Beshimilumbo bangi nabo balashoma.
ACT 6:8 Stefano walikuba muntuyo Lesa ngwalapa colwe ne ngofu shingi, cakwinseti walikwinsa bishikukankamanisha ne bingashilo byangofu pakati pa bantu.
ACT 6:9 Kwalesa bantu nabambi balafuma ku Kulene ne ku Alekisandiliya, bakung'anda yakupaililamo yalikukwiweti, Ng'anda ya Mipailo ya bantu Basunguluka. Aba bantu pamo ne bantu baku Kilikiya, neku Asiya, balatatika kutotekeshana ne Stefano.
ACT 6:10 Nsombi balalilwa kumushinina, pakwinga Mushimu Uswepa ewalikumupa mano akwamba.
ACT 6:11 Lino balayungaula bantu nabambi kwambeti, bambengeti, “Twalamunyumfwa kacobola Mose ne Lesa.”
ACT 6:12 Neco, balakalalisha bantu, bamakulene Baciyuda, ne beshikwiyisha milawo ya Mose. Bonse pamo balamubukila Stefano, balamwikata ne kuya nendi ku nkuta inene ya Bayuda.
ACT 6:13 Balaleta bakamboni babwepeshi abo balambeti, “Ee muntuyu nishikwambowa maswi akunyansha Ng'anda ya Lesa, kayi ne milawo ya Mose.
ACT 6:14 Twalamunyumfwa kambeti, Yesu waku Nasaleti nakapwaye Ng'anda ya Lesa ne kushinta miyambo njalatupa Mose.”
ACT 6:15 Bomboloshi bonse balikuba mu nkuta balaswamuna menso abo pali Stefano, pakwinga cinso cakendi calaboneketi ca mungelo.
ACT 7:1 Lino, Mukulene wa Beshimilumbo walamwipusha Stefano, “Sena bintu ibi ni byakubinga?”
ACT 7:2 Nendi walakumbuleti, “Kamunyumfwani bamatata ne mobanse bame! Lesa wabulemu walabonekela kuli mushali wetu mukulukulu Abulahamu mpwalikwikala ku Mesopotamiya, katanalongela ku Halani.
ACT 7:3 Walamwambileti, ‘Fuma mucishi cakobe, ushiye banse bobe, wenga kucishi nceti ndikuleshe.’
ACT 7:4 Walafuma mucishi ca Akaladayo nekuya kwikala ku Halani. Baishi mpobalafwa, Lesa walamufunyako ne kumuleta mucishi cino ncomwekalamo lelo.
ACT 7:5 Lesa uliya kumupako nakaba kabela kang'ana kacishici kuba kakendi mwine. Nsombi walamulayeti, cishi conseci nicikabe cakendi ne bashikulu bendi, nikukabeti nkalikukute mwana pacindico.
ACT 7:6 Lesa walamwambileti, ‘Bashikulu bobe nibakabe basha mucishi cabwensu moti bakapenshewe kwa byaka myanda ina.’
ACT 7:7 Kayi Lesa walambeti, ‘Ame ninkape mulandu mushobo uyo weti ukabasunge busha. Balo nibakapule mucishico ne kwisa kunkambilila pamusena uno.’
ACT 7:8 Lesa walapangana ne Abulahamu, ne kumupa cingashilo ico ecando cakupalulwa. Neco Abulahamu walamupalula Isake mwanendi, kakute masuba asanu ne atatu akusemwa. Neye Isake walapalula Yakobo mwanendi, neye Yakobo walapalula banabendi bali likumi ne babili, abo ebamashali betu bakulukulu.
ACT 7:9 Abo bamashali betu balamunyonokela Yosefe mukwabo, balamulisha busha ku Injipito. Nsombi Lesa walikuba nendi,
ACT 7:10 cakwinseti, walamupulusha mu mapensho akendi onse. Walamupa mano alenshisha kwambeti, Mwami Falawo waku Injipito amuyande, kayi walamubika Yosefe kuba muntu shikwendelesha cishi ca Injipito, kayi mukulene shikulangilila pamukowa wakendi Falawo wonse.
ACT 7:11 Nomba mwalaba nsala mucishi conse ca Injipito ne Kenani, bantu balapenga, ne bamashali betu kumo balabula cakulya.
ACT 7:12 Yakobo mpwalanyumfweti ku Injipito kuli cakulya, walatumako banabendi bamashali betu. Ubu bwalikuba bulwendo bwabo bwakutanguna.
ACT 7:13 Pabulwendo bwabo bwacibili, Yosefe walaliyubulula kubakwabo, kayi walamwinshibisha Mwami Falawo shabanse bendi bonse.
ACT 7:14 Yosefe walabakuwa baishi ba Yakobo, pamo ne banse bendi. Bonse pamo balikuba bantu makumi asanu ne abili ne basanu.
ACT 7:15 Yakobo walaya kwikala ku Injipito pamo ne bamashali betu basa. Bonse balafwila kopeloko.
ACT 7:16 Bitumbi byabo byalakabikwa ku Sekemu, kunamaumbwe awo Abulahamu ngwalaula ne mali kubana bendi Hamoli ku Sekemu.
ACT 7:17 “Cindi mpocalashika pepi kwambeti Lesa akwanilishe cipangano ncalambila Abulahamu, mushobo wetu wali kauli ulafulu mu Injipito.
ACT 7:18 Panyuma pakendi kwalapyana Mwami naumbi mu Injipito walikubula kumwinshiba Yosefe.
ACT 7:19 Mwami uyo walaupita panshi mushobo wetu, walatatika kupensha bamashali betu, pakubakakatisheti bashiyenga bana babo pansa kwambeti bafwe.
ACT 7:20 Pacindico Mose walasemwa, walikuba mwana wapa. Walalelwa ne kwa myenshi itatu mung'anda ya baishi.
ACT 7:21 Mpobalamushiya pansa mwanendi Falawo mutukashi walamumanta, walikumuleleti mwanendi.
ACT 7:22 Neco Mose walaiya mano a bantu bonse baku Injipito, mano ne ncito shakendi shalikuba shangofu.”
ACT 7:23 “Mose mpwalaba ne byaka makumi ana, walayeya kuya kufwakashila banse bendi bene Islayeli.”
ACT 7:24 Lino mpwalabona mwine Injipito kapensha umo wabanse bendi, Mose walamufuna mwine Islayeli ne kumushina mwine Injipito.
ACT 7:25 Walikuyeyeti banse bendi bene Islayeli nibenshibe kwambeti Lesa, kufumina muli Mose nakabapulushe, nsombi balo baliya kwingashileco.
ACT 7:26 Mpobwalaca mumene walacana bene Islayeli babili kabalwana. Walelekesha kubafuna. Walabambileti, “Amwe batuloba, moba mukowa umo, inga mulalwanininga cani?”
ACT 7:27 Nomba uyo walasoka munendi, walanyakila Mose pambali ne kwambeti, “Niyani walakubiketi ube mutangunishi shikutombolosha?
ACT 7:28 Sena ulayandanga kunshina mbuli ncowashina mwine Injipito usa lilo?”
ACT 7:29 Mpwalanyumfweco, Mose walafwambila kucishi censu ca Midyani. Kopeloko nkwalasemena bana batuloba babili.
ACT 7:30 “Lino mpokwalapita byaka makumi ana, mungelo walabonekela kuli Mose mucinyika pepi ne mulundu wa Sinai, pacinkupu cisa calikubangila mulilo mucinyika.
ACT 7:31 Mose mpwalaboneci walakankamana, walaseng'ena pepi kwambeti abonesheshe.” Popelapo walanyumfwa liswi lya Lesa lyakwambeti,
ACT 7:32 “Ame njame Lesa wabamashali bakobe, Lesa wa Abulahamu ne Isake ne Yakobo.” Popelapo Mose walatatika kututuma ne kutina cakwinseti calala kulangako.
ACT 7:33 Popelapo Lesa walamwambileti, “Kofulula nkwabilo shakobe, pakwinga pamusena apo mpowalyata Paswepa.
ACT 7:34 Ndabono kupenshewa kwabantu bakame mu Injipito. Ndanyumfu kulilishanya kwabo, lino ndesa kubapulusha, lino kwesa ndikutume ku Injipito.”
ACT 7:35 Uyo Mose engobalakana Baislayeli pakumwipusheti, “Niyani walakubiketi ube mukulene kayi momboloshi wetu?” Epeloyo engwalatuma Lesa kwambeti abe mukulene kayi mupulushi, kufumina mumungelo usa walamubonekela pacinkupu cisa calikubilima mulilo.
ACT 7:36 Mose ewalabatangunina bantu ne kubapulisha mucishi ca Injipito, walikwinsa bishikukankamanisha, ne bingashilo ku Injipito, palwenje lufubela ne mucinyika, kwabyaka makumi ana.
ACT 7:37 Mose uyo ewalabambila Baislayeli kwambeti, “Lesa nakatume naumbi kufumina mubanse benu eshakabe mushinshimi eti njame.”
ACT 7:38 Mose ewalikuba nabo pamubungano wa Baislayeli mucinyika. Nendi ewalemana pamo ne mungelo walikwamba pakati pa bamashali betu bakulukulu pamulundu wa Sinai. Ewalatambula maswi abuyumi akutwambila.
ACT 7:39 “Bamashali betu bakulukulu balakana kumunyumfwila, pakwinga myoyo yabo yalikuyeya ku Injipito.
ACT 7:40 Neco, Aloni balamwambileti, ‘Kotupangila Lesa eshatutanguninenga, pakwinga nkatucishi cilenshiki kuli Mose, walatufunya ku Injipito.’
ACT 7:41 Mumasuba opelawo balabumba cimbwanga ca mwanawang'ombe. Balatwala milumbo kucimbwanga ne kukondwa ne ncito yalabamba makasa abo.”
ACT 7:42 Neco Lesa walabafutatila, ne kubaleketi bakambililenga nyenyenshi shakwilu, mbuli ncocalembwa mu mabuku abashinshimi bakulukulu akwambeti, “Amwe Baislayeli, kamutayeyangeti Mwalikubengela ame nyama nshomwali kushina ne kutwala milumbo, kwabyaka makumi ana musa mucinyika.
ACT 7:43 Mwalikunyamuna lesa wenu Moleki mutente, Ne nyenyenshi ya lesa wenu Lefani, bimbwanga mbyomwalabumba Kwambeti mubikambililenga. Pacebo ico ninkamutandanyine kutali, kupitilila cishi ca Babulo.”
ACT 7:44 “Bamashali betu bakulukulu balikukute tente wa cipangano walikulesheti Lesa mpwali pakati pabo musa mucinyika. Walapangwa mbuli Lesa ncalamwambila Mose mucikoshanyo ncalabona.
ACT 7:45 Uyo tente walapewa ku bamashali betu kufuma ku ba mashali babo, tente iyo yalikuba ya cishiya matongo. Yalikubapo cindi Yoswa mpwalikubatangunina, pakulamuna cishi mishobo njalatandanya Lesa. Tente iyo yalekala mpaka mucindi ca Dafeti.
ACT 7:46 Lesa walikumusuna Dafeti, nendi Dafeti walasenga kwambeti amwibakile ng'anda, Lesa wa Yakobo.
ACT 7:47 Nomba Solomoni ewalebaka ng'andeyo.
ACT 7:48 Nikukabeco Lesa wapita byonse, nkakute kwikala mung'anda yebakwa ne makasa, mbuli ncalamba mushinshimi mukulukulu.” Kwambeti,
ACT 7:49 “Lesa lambangeti, Kwilu ecipuna cakame ca Bwami, cishi capanshi epakulyata myendo yakame. Ngamunjibakila ng'anda ilyeconi? Nambi nimusena ulyeconi ngondelela kupumwininamo?
ACT 7:50 Sena ntame ndalapanga bintu byonsebi?”
ACT 7:51 Stefano walapitilisha kwambeti, “Ha! Amwe bantu balunkanwa, myoyo yenu ilyeti bantu batashomo Lesa, kayi matwi enu ashinka. Mwakoshanowa ne bamashali benu bakulukulu, pakwinga nenjamwe mulakananga kunyumfwila Mushimu Uswepa.”
ACT 7:52 “Sena pali mushinshimi ngobalabula kupensha bamashali benu bakulukulu? Paliyawa, balo balikushina bantu balikwamba shakwisa kwa Musebenshi Waswepa usa. Nsombi amwe mwalamulisha kubalwani bakendi ne kumushina.
ACT 7:53 Amwe omwalatambula Milawo ya Lesa njobalikuleta bangelo pacishi capanshi, nsombi amwe muliya kwikonkela sobwe.”
ACT 7:54 Neco Bomboloshi bankuta inene mpobalanyumfwa maswi onse ngalamba Stefano, balatatika kubimba myoyo cebo cabukalu.
ACT 7:55 Stefano walesulilwa ne Mushimu Uswepa, walalanga kwilu, walabona bulemeneno bwakendi Lesa, kayi walabona Yesu kali wemana kucikasa cakululyo ca Lesa.
ACT 7:56 Popelapo walambeti, “kamubonani! Ndabono kwilu kulacaluku, kayi ndabononga Mwana Muntu wemana kucikasa cakululyo ca Lesa.”
ACT 7:57 Popelapo bendeleshi bankuta inene balashinka mumatwi ne kolobesha! Pacindico bonse balafwambila akumutanya Stefano.
ACT 7:58 Balamukwekweshela kunsa kwamunshi, nkobalakamupwaya mabwe. Bakamboni balafulula minjila yabo yakunsa ne kwibungika pa myendo ya mutuloba musepela, lina lyakendi Saulo.
ACT 7:59 Mpobalikumupwaya mabwe, Stefano walatatika kupaileti, “Yesu Mwami wakame, tambulani mushimu wakame.”
ACT 7:60 Walasuntama panshi ne kubilikisheti, “Nkambo kamubalekelelako bwipishi ubu mbobalenshinga.” Mpwalapwisha kwamba awa maswi walataya moyo.
ACT 8:1 Nendi Saulo walasuminisheti balenshi cena kumushina. Kufuma busuba bopelobo mapensho mu mubungano waku Yelusalemu alatatika. Bashoma bonse, kufunyakowa batumwa, balamwaikila mubimpansha byonse bya Yudeya ne Samaliya.
ACT 8:2 Batuloba nabambi balibenga kuli Lesa ebalamubika Stefano mumanda ne kumulila mwakwetelwa.
ACT 8:3 Saulo walatatika kononga mubungano. Walikwingila mu ng'anda ne ng'anda, kekata batuloba ne batukashi bonse pamo ne kubawala mujele.
ACT 8:4 Bashoma basa balamwaika, balaya kukambauka Mulumbe Waina konse nkobalikuya.
ACT 8:5 Nendi Filipo walakashika ku Samaliya, kaya kubakambaukila bantu bakopeloko makani a Klistu Mupulushi Walaiwa.
ACT 8:6 Makoto abantu mpobalanyumfwa maswi ngalikwamba Filipo, ne kubona bishikukankamanisha mbyalikwinsa, balakutikisheti banyumfwishishe cena.
ACT 8:7 Pakwinga ne mishimu yaipa yalikupula mubantu bangi kaibilikisha. Batontola biso ne balema myendo balikusengulwa.
ACT 8:8 Neco bantu balikuba mu munshi usa balakondwa.
ACT 8:9 Mu munshi wa Samaliya, mwalikuba muntu naumbi, lina lyakendi Shimoni, walikuba mung'anga walikukondwelesha bene Samaliya bonse, muntu walikulibanda mwineti walemekwa.
ACT 8:10 Bantu bayampuwo ne bantu bulyo bonse, balikumunyumfwila kabaya kwambeti, “Shimoni uyu ningofu sha Lesa nshobakute kwambeti ngofu shinene.”
ACT 8:11 Balikumukonkela konkela, pakwinga kwacindi citali walikubakondwelesha ne bung'anga bwakendi.
ACT 8:12 Nomba pacindi Filipo mpwalikukambauka Mulumbe Waina wa Bwami bwa Lesa, kayi ne lina lya Yesu Klistu, bantu balashoma ne kubatishiwa, batuloba ne batukashi.
ACT 8:13 Nendi Shimoni mung'anga usa walashoma, ne kubatishiwa. Popelapo walatatika kwenda pamo ne Filipo, pakwinga walakankamana pakubona bishikukamanisha ne bingashilo byangofu mbyalikwinsa Filipo.
ACT 8:14 Batumwa basa balashala mu Yelusalemu, mpobalanyumfweti bene Samaliya balatambulu maswi a Lesa, balatumako Petulo ne Yohane.
ACT 8:15 Mpobalashika, balatatika kupailila basa bashoma kwambeti batambule Mushimu Uswepa.
ACT 8:16 Pacindico paliya muntu naba umo walikuba latambulupo Mushimu Uswepa pakati pabo nekukabeti balikuba babatishiwa mulina lya Mwami Yesu.
ACT 8:17 Lino Petulo ne Yohane mpobalabika makasa palyendibo, balatambula Mushimu Uswepa.
ACT 8:18 Shimoni usa mpwalaboneti Mushimu Uswepa ulatambulwa, mpobalabikwa makasa ne batumwa basa, walapulisha mali kwambeti abape.
ACT 8:19 Walambeti, “Kamumpako ngofu ishi, kwambeti nenjame ngondabiki makasa palyendiye, utambula Mushimu Uswepa.”
ACT 8:20 Petulo walamukumbuleti, “Koya ulobe pamo ne mali akobe. Sena ulayeyengeti ngofu sha Lesa nishakula ne mali?
ACT 8:21 Muncito iyi, obe uliyamo lubasu sobwe, pakwinga moyo wakobe nkawalulama pamenso a Lesa.
ACT 8:22 Ecebo cakendi sanduka, leka caipa ncolayeyenga. Senga Mwami Lesa kwambeti akulekeleleko manjeyaulwa aipa ali mumoyo wakobe.
ACT 8:23 Pakwinga ndakubono kwambeti ukute munyono waipa, wasungililwa ku bwipishi.”
ACT 8:24 Apo Shimoni usa walambeti, “Kamumpaililako kuli Mwami Lesa kwambeti kacitenshika kuli njame ncomulamba.”
ACT 8:25 Mpobalapwisha kupa bukamboni ne kukambauka maswi a Lesa, Petulo ne Yohane balabwelela ku Yelusalemu. Balikabaya kukambauka Mulumbe Waina muminshi ingi ya bene Samaliya.
ACT 8:26 Mungelo wa Lesa walamwambila Filipo, “Nyamuka, koya kucibela cakumusansa, ukonke nshila ilafumunga ku Yelusalemu kuya ku Gaza nshila isa yapita mucinyika.”
ACT 8:27 Cakubinga Filipo walanyamuka, walaya. Walakumanya mwendeleshi wa ku Itopiya muntu walikupewa bulemu, walikusunga nkomwa ya mali a mfulumende ya mwami mutukashi Kandasi wa ku Itopiya. Walikufumina ku Yelusalemu nkwalaya kukambilila Lesa.
ACT 8:28 Pacindici walikubwelela kucomwabo kali wekala mung'ola, kabelenga libuku lya mushinshimi Yesaya.
ACT 8:29 Mushimu Uswepa walamwambila Filipo, “Koya ku ng'ola isa, wendenga pepi nayo.”
ACT 8:30 Filipo walafwambila kung'ola isa, walanyumfwa mwendeleshi usa kabelenga libuku lya mushinshimi Yesaya. Filipo walamwipusheti, “Nkambo, Sena mulanyumfwishishinga mabala ngomulabelengenga?”
ACT 8:31 Mwendeleshi usa walakumbuleti, “Ha! Nganyumfwisheconi kwabula muntu naumbi lapandululunga?” Mpwalapwa kwambeco walamusengeti, “Kotanta mung'ola twendele pamo.”
ACT 8:32 Awa e Maswi a mu Mabala a Lesa ngalikayakubelenga, “Walikubeti mbelele ilatanguninwanga kuya kushiniwa, eti mwana mbelele wamwena tonto pa kumucesa bweya. Uliya kwambapo nambi liswi limo.
ACT 8:33 Balamunyansha, kayi baliya kumombolosha mubululami. Paliya muntu eshakambe shamukowa wakendi, pakwinga buyumi bwakendi bulatimbulwa pacishi capanshi kwakubula kushiyapo mwana.”
ACT 8:34 Popelapo Mwendeleshi usa walepusha Filipo, “Kamung'ambilako, inga mushinshimi lambanga bani? Sena lalyambanga mwine, nambi lambanga shamuntu naumbi?”
ACT 8:35 Popelapo Filipo walatatika kumukambaukila Mulumbe Waina wa Yesu kutakila pa Mabala a Lesa ngalikubelengapo.
ACT 8:36 Kabacenda pamo munshila, balashika pamusena naumbi mpobalacana menshi. Mwendeleshi usa walambeti, “Ntawa menshi apa. Sena pacili nacimbi celela kunkanisha kubatishiwa?”
ACT 8:37 Filipo walakumbuleti, “Ngamubatishiwa na mulashomo ne moyo wenu wonse.” Usa mwendeleshi walambeti, “Ndashoma kwambeti Yesu Klistu ni Mwanendi Lesa.”
ACT 8:38 Popelapo mwendeleshi walemanika ng'ola. Bonse babili, Filipo ne mwendeleshi usa, balaya mumenshi, neco Filipo walamubatisha.
ACT 8:39 Mpobalikufuma mumenshi, Mushimu wa Lesa walamunyamunapo Filipo. Mwendeleshi usa uliya kumubonapo Filipo kayi, nomba Mwendeleshi usa walapitilisha bulwendo bwakendi kaliwakondwa.
ACT 8:40 Filipo walacaniketi uli ku Azoto. Walapitana mucishi conse kakambauka Mulumbe Waina muminshi yonse mpaka walashika ku Kaisaleya.
ACT 9:1 Saulo usa walapitilisha kuyosha sha kushina bantu balikukonkela kwiyisha kwa Yesu. Walaya kuli Mukulene wa Beshimilumbo,
ACT 9:2 kuya kusenga makalata akumusuminisha kuyanawo ku manda akupaililamo ku Damasiko, kwambeti acanako nabambi bantu bacikonkela kwiyisha kwa Yesu, babe batuloba, nambi batukashi abasunge ne kubaleta ku Yelusalemu.
ACT 9:3 Mpobalashika pepi ne ku Damasiko mu bulwendo bwakendi, mwakutengashila mumuni watuba tuu walafuma kwilu ne ku mushinguluka.
ACT 9:4 Walawa panshi ne ku nyumfwa liswi lya kwambeti, “Saulo, Saulo, ulampenshelenga cani?”
ACT 9:5 Saulo walepusheti, “Inga njamwe bani Mwami?” Liswi lyalamukumbuleti, “Njame Yesu ngolapenshenga.
ACT 9:6 Nyamuka, koya wingile mu munshi uwu, ni bakwambile ca kwinsa.”
ACT 9:7 Bantu mbwalikuba nabo balemana, babula ca kwambapo, maswi awo bali kwanyumfwa, nsombi nkabalikumubona muntu walikwamba.
ACT 9:8 Saulo walanyamuka, nsombi mpwalakapula menso, calala kubona cili conse. Neco banendi mbwalikuba nabo balengila nendi mu munshi wa Damasiko kabali bamwikatilila ku cikasa.
ACT 9:9 Walekala masuba atatu katabono, katali cakulya, nambi kunwa cili conse.
ACT 9:10 Lino mu Damasiko mwalikuba shikwiya naumbi lina lyakendi Hananiya. Uyo walabona mucimbonimboni Mwami kamukuweti, “Hananiya!” Nendi walakumbuleti, “Mwami!”
ACT 9:11 Lino Mwami wala mwambileti, “Nyamuka, wenga kunshila njobakute kukuweti, ‘Nshila ya Tandabala.’ Washika ku ng'anda ya Yuda, wenga wipusheko muntu wa ku Taliso, lina lyakendi ni Saulo. Lapailinga pacino cindi.
ACT 9:12 Mucimbonimboni walabona muntu lina lyakendi ni Hananiya walesa ku bika makasa akendi palyendiye kwambeti akonshe kubona kayi.”
ACT 9:13 Mpwalanyumfweco Hananiya walambeti, “Mwami, bantu bangi balang'ambili sha muntuyu, walabenshila bintu byaipa bantu benu ku Yelusalemu.
ACT 9:14 Lino kayi uli kuno pakusuminishiwa ne beshimilumbo bamakulene kwambeti ese abasunge abo bonse bakute kukambilila amwe.”
ACT 9:15 Nsombi nendi Mwami Yesu walamwambileti, “Koya, pakwinga muntuyu ndamusala, ni musebenshi wakame eshakakambaukile mishobo imbi sha Lina lyakame, bami ne bene Islayeli.
ACT 9:16 Ame nindimuboneshe bishikubaba bingi mbyeshi akanyumfwe pacebo ca lina lyakame.”
ACT 9:17 Popelapo Hananiya walanyamuka ne kuya kwingila mu ng'anda umo mwalikuba Saulo. Walabika makasa pali Saulo ne kwambeti, “Mwanse wame Saulo, Mwami Yesu uyo wakubonekela pa nshila mpo wesanga kuno, lantumu. Layandangeti utatike kubona, kayi eti wisulilwe ne Mushimu Uswepa.”
ACT 9:18 Popelapo mu menso mwa Saulo mwalafuma bintu bilyeti mamba answi. Walatatika kubona kayi, walanyamuka ne kubatishiwa.
ACT 9:19 Panyuma pakulya cakulya, walaba ne ngofu. Saulo walekala ne beshikwiya baku Damasiko kwa masuba ang'ana.
ACT 9:20 Mwakutataya cindi, Saulo walatatika kukambauka mu manda akupaililamo a Bayuda, kwambeti Yesu ni Mwanendi Lesa.
ACT 9:21 Bantu bonse balikumunyumfwa balakankamana ne kwipushana bene, “Sena uyu nteyo usa walikushina bantu bashoma Yesu ku Yelusalemu? Sena kuno nte leshili kwisa kusunga bantu bamushobo uwu bonse ne kubatwala kuli beshimilumbo bamakulene?”
ACT 9:22 Ngofu sha Saulo sha kukambauka shali kuya kukonempa, walapwisha mano Bayuda balikwikala mu Damasiko, ne kubashinineti Yesu endiye Mupulushi Walaiwa.
ACT 9:23 Mpopalapita cindi citali, Bayuda balapanganeti bamushine Saulo.
ACT 9:24 Bantu balikuyanda kumushina bali kumupembelela munshi ne mashiku pacishinga ca mushi kwambeti bamushine. Nomba nabambi bantu balaya kumwambila nshebalapangana.
ACT 9:25 Neco pacindi ca mashiku beshikwiya bakendi balamubika mu mutanga ne kumupulishila pa cibwanko ca lubumbu lwa lilinga.
ACT 9:26 Mpwalashika ku Yelusalemu, Saulo walelekesha kusankana pamo ne beshikwiya. Nomba bonse balikuba ne buyowa, balikutonshanya kwambeti neye ni shikwiya.
ACT 9:27 Popelapo Banabasi, walamumanta Saulo ne kumutwala kuli batumwa. Banabasi walabambila batumwa mbuli Saulo mwalabonena Mwami Yesu pa nshila ya ku Damasiko, ne Mwami ncalamwambila, kayi walabambila ncali kukambauka Saulo mulina lya Yesu mwakubula buyowa ku Damasiko.
ACT 9:28 Neco Saulo walekala nabo, walendana mu Yelusalemu monse kaya ku kambauka mulina lya Mwami Yesu mwakubula buyowa.
ACT 9:29 Saulo walikwamba ne kutotekeshana nabo Bayuda bali kwamba Cigiliki. Pacebo ico, naboyo balelekesha kumushina.
ACT 9:30 Beshikwiya mpobala nyumfweco, balaya pamo nendi ku Kaisaleya, ne kumutuma ku Taliso.
ACT 9:31 Mibungano yonse yaku Yudeya, ne ku Galileya, kayi ne ku Samaliya yalekala mubote. Kayi yalayumayuma, bantu balafula, pakwinga bantu cindi conse balikupa bulemu Mwami. Kayi Mushimu Uswepa walikubayuminisha.
ACT 9:32 Petulo mpwali kwendana uku ne uku, walakekala pamo ne bantu ba Lesa baku Lida.
ACT 9:33 Uko nkwalacana mutuloba naumbi lina lyakendi Eneya, walikuba watontola biso bya mubili, walikonowa pampasa kwa byaka bisanu ne bitatu, kwakubula kupunduka.
ACT 9:34 Petulo walamwambileti, “Eneya, Yesu Klistu lakusengulunga. Punduka, yansula mpasa yakobe.” Popelapo walapunduka.
ACT 9:35 Mpobalamubona bantu bonse bekala mu Lida, ne mu Saloni, balashoma Mwami.
ACT 9:36 Ku Yopa kwalikuba shikwiya naumbi mutukashi, lina lya kendi Tabita mu Cigiliki ni Dolika. Wali kwinsa ncito shingi shaina, wali kunyamfwa bapenshi.
ACT 9:37 Pacindico Dolika walakolwa ne kufwa. Bantu balasambisha citumbi, ne kuconeka mu cipinda capelu mu ng'anda.
ACT 9:38 Ku Yopa kwalikuba pepi ne ku Lida, neco beshikwiya mpobalanyumfweti Petulo uli ku Lida, balatuma bantu babili kuya kumwambileti, “Tulapapata, kamwisani kuno lino lino.”
ACT 9:39 Petulo walanyamuka ne kuya nabo. Mpwalashika, balamushindikila mu cipinda ca pelu cisa. Walacanamo batukashi bangi bamukalubingi kabalila, balamushinguluka Petulo ne kumulesha minjila ne byakufwala nabimbi mbyali kutunga Dolika, cindi ncalikuba muyumi.
ACT 9:40 Petulo walasenga bonse mwa bulemu kwambeti benga pansa. Walasuntama panshi ne kupaila. Walacebukila kwalikuba citumbi cisa ne kwambeti, “Tabita, punduka!” Tabita walakapula, mpwalabona Petulo, walekala ne kwikala.
ACT 9:41 Petulo walamwikata kucikasa ne kumunyamfwilisha kwimana. Petulo walakuwa bantu bonse, bashoma Lesa, ne basa batukashi bamukalubingi, ne kumutwala Tabita kulyendibo kali muyumi ntaa!
ACT 9:42 Makani awa mpwalanyumfwika ku Yopa, bantu bangi balashoma Mwami Lesa.
ACT 9:43 Petulo walekala masuba angi ku Yopa ku ng'anda ya muntu naumbi lina lyakendi Shimoni, kanyuka mpaya.
ACT 10:1 Ku Kaisaleya kwalikuba muntu naumbi lina lyendi Kolonelyo. Muntuyu walikuba mukulene wabashilikali Baciloma, bamulikoto lyalikukwiweti “Likoto lyaku Italiya.”
ACT 10:2 Walikuba muntu walibenga, shikutina Lesa, pamo ne bantu bonse bamung'anda yakendi.Walikunyamfwilisha Bayuda bapenga kayi nekupaila Lesa cindi conse.
ACT 10:3 Busuba nabumbi cindi camuma 3 koloko mansailo, walabona bintu mucimbonimboni. Walabona mungelo wa Lesa kesa kulyendiye ne kwambeti, “Koloneliyo!”
ACT 10:4 Nendi Koloneliyo walamulangishisha mungeloyo, cabuyowa, ne kumwipusheti, “Nicani Nkambo?” Mungeloyo walambeti, “Lesa lakondwa ne mipailo yakobe, kayi lanuku ncito shakobe shankumbo.
ACT 10:5 Pacino cindi kotuma bantu ku Yopa, benga bakuwe muntu lina lyakendi Shimoni, ukute kukwiweti Petulo.
ACT 10:6 Lekalanga kuli Shimoni naumbi, kanyuka mpaya, ng'anda yakendi ili mumbali mwa lwenje.”
ACT 10:7 Mpwalafumapo mungelo usa ngwalikubandika nendi, Koloneliyo walakuwa basebenshi bakendi babili ne mushilikali. Uyo mushilkali walikuba umo wa abo balikumusebensela, neye walikuba muntu usuni kupaila Lesa.
ACT 10:8 Koloneliyo mpwalapwisha kubambila byonse, walabatuma ku Yopa kwalikuba Petulo.
ACT 10:9 Mpobwalaca, basa bantu balatumwa kabacili munshila pepi ne munshi, Petulo walatanta pelu paciluli cabwantalala kuya kupaila, lisuba kalili pamutwi.
ACT 10:10 Petulo kacili pacilulico, walanyumfwa nsala, walikuyanda kulyapo kantu. Kabacibamba cakulya, kwalesa cimbonimboni kulyendiye.
ACT 10:11 Walabona Kwilu kwalacaluka, ne cintu calikwisa panshi calikuboneketi cikwisa cinene casungwa nkokola pelu shina.
ACT 10:12 Mopelomo mwalikuba banyama bamishobo ya shiyanashiyana, beshikukalaba, ne bikeni bishikuluka mwilu.
ACT 10:13 Petulo walanyumfwa liswi lyakwambeti, “Petulo, Punduka, koshina ulye.”
ACT 10:14 Petulo walambeti, “Sobwe, Nkambo, ame nkanandyapo cintu cabula kuswepa, nambi cishikusesemya.”
ACT 10:15 Kayi Petulo walanyumfwa liswi lya kwambeti, “Bintu mbyalaswepeshe Lesa, obe kotambeti nkabyaswepa sobwe.”
ACT 10:16 Ici calenshika tunkanda tutatu, panyuma pakendi cikwisa cisa calabwelela kwilu.
ACT 10:17 Cindi Petulo mpwalikuyeya bupandulushi bwacintu cisa ncalabona mu cimbonimboni, basa bantu batatu balatumwa ne Kolonelyo, balecana ng'anda ya Shimoni, ne kwimana pacishinga.
ACT 10:18 Balakuwa ne kwipusheti, “Sena paliko mwensu pano lina lyakendi Shimoni, ukute kukwiweti Petulo?”
ACT 10:19 Petulo kaciyeya sha bintu bisa mbyalabona mucimbonimboni, Mushimu Uswepa walamwambileti, “Kobona bantu batatu balakuyandaulunga.
ACT 10:20 Nyamuka, seluka, wenga nabo kotatonshanya sobwe, pakwinga njame ndabatumu.”
ACT 10:21 Petulo walaseluka ne kubambila bantu basa, “Muntu ngomulalangaulunga njame. Muleshili cani?”
ACT 10:22 Balo balambeti, “Kolonelyo, mukulene wabashilikali latutumu kulinjamwe. Nimuntu walulama, kayi ukute kutina Lesa, Bayuda bonse bakute kumulumba. Mungelo wa Lesa ewamwambileti amukuwe kung'anda kwakendi kwambeti enganyumfwishishe cena maswi ngomukute.”
ACT 10:23 Popelapo Petulo walabengisha mung'anda, ne kubasengeti bone. Mpobwalaca mumenemene walanyamuka ne kuya nabo. Beshikwiya nabambi baku Yopa balamushindikila.
ACT 10:24 Busuba bwakonkapo, balakashika ku Kaisaleya. Kolonelyo walikabapembelela, pamo ne bakwabo ne banendi mbwalakuwa.
ACT 10:25 Petulo mpwalashika pepi kwambeti engile mung'anda, Kolonelyo walamutambula ne kuliwisha pamyendo ya Petulo, kwambeti amukambilile.
ACT 10:26 Nomba Petulo walamunyamfwilisha kwimana, walambeti, “Aa! Imana, nenjame ndemuntu mbuli njobe!”
ACT 10:27 Petulo walikaya kwamba ne Kolonelyo mpobalikwingila mung'anda, umo mwalacana bantu bangi babungana.
